title: Sparkle Cutout Cookies
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 c. margarine", "2/3 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Combine softened cream cheese, margarine, sugar and vanilla until well blended.", "Add flour and salt.", "Mix well.", "Chill.", "On a lightly floured surface, roll dough to 1/4-inch thickness.", "Cut with assorted cookie cutters.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Decorate with colored sugar or icing.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes, just until edges start to brown lightly."]

title: Fruit Scones
ingredients: ["3 c. self-rising flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. firmly packed light brown sugar", "1/2 c. dry cranberries or cherries, coarsely chopped", "1/2 c. chilled butter, cut into pieces (1 stick)", "1 c. whipping cream"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Butter 2 large cookie sheets.", "Sift flour into bowl.", "Mix in both sugars.", "Add butter and rub in fingertips until mixture resembles coarse meal.", "Add 1/2 cup dried fruit.", "Stir in enough cream to form soft, slightly sticky dough. Turn dough out onto slightly floured surface and knead until just combined.", "Gather dough into ball; flatten into disc.", "Roll out to thickness of 3/4-inch.", "Cut out rounds using 2-inch round cookie cutter.", "Gather scraps and re-roll on floured surface.", "Cut out additional rounds."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 can sauerkraut", "1 c. celery, cut fine", "1 onion, chopped", "1/2 green pepper or 5 or 6 red sweet canned peppers or pimentos, cut up"]
directions: ["Bring sugar and vinegar to boil and let cool.", "Drain well and cut up sauerkraut.", "Add rest of ingredients.", "Pour syrup over and let stand overnight.", "Very important to stand overnight. Delicious."]

title: Roasted Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients: ["2 c. unwashed pumpkin seeds", "1 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "dash of soy sauce", "dash of garlic powder", "salt", "1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and spread on cookie sheet.", "Bake approximately 1 hour at 250\u00b0.", "Stir often until seeds are no longer wet and are nicely browned."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. self-rising flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add flour, chips and vanilla.", "Stir until well mixed.", "Add nuts.", "Drop by half teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Makes 5 dozen.", "Dust with powdered sugar."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped nuts (pecans), divided in half", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix together to form a ball.", "Save half of pecans to roll finished ball in. (This tastes better if made a day ahead.)"]

title: Ladyfingers
ingredients: ["1 1/2 stick butter", "1/4 c. sugar", "4 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. nuts", "2 c. plain flour", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Cream softened butter and sugar until smooth.", "Add vanilla, nuts, salt and flour.", "Roll by hand into small rolls.", "Place on greased cookie sheet and bake 30 minutes at 325\u00b0 or until brown. Cool slightly and place in a bag of powdered sugar and shake to coat.", "Dry on waxed paper.", "Store in airtight container."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans (mixed in)", "1 c. chopped pecans (on the outside)"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese set at room temperature, then mix together."]

title: Rhubarb Butter Crunch
ingredients: ["3 c. rhubarb, chopped", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. oats", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. margarine"]
directions: ["Preheat", "oven", "to", "350\u00b0.", "Mix", "rhubarb with sugar and 3 tablespoons flour in a 9 x 9-inch baking pan.", "Mix oats, brown sugar", "and 1 1/2 cups flour in bowl.", "Cut in butter and margarine until crumbly.", "Sprinkle over rhubarb.", "Bake 40 minutes. May double", "rhubarb", "for", "a", "9 x 13-inch pan, leaving topping ingredients the same."]

title: Chex Party Mix
ingredients: ["1/2 stick butter", "4 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. Rice Chex", "2 c. Wheat Chex", "2 c. pretzels", "1 c. peanuts"]
directions: ["Melt butter in a roasting pan. Mix in salt and Worcestershire sauce. Mix in remaining ingredients. Stir well. Bake at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour. Pour out on towel and let cool."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 cup margarine", "1/2 cup sugar", "1 cup crushed Potato chips", "1/2 cup chopped nuts", "2 cups flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar, add remaining ingredients and mix well.", "Drop by tsp. on greased sheet.", "Bake 15 min. at 350\u00b0. Roll in powdered sugar or cinnamon if desired when cool."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Add pineapple to cheese mixture, pepper and onion.", "Add salt into cheese mixture.", "Add 1/2 cup nuts.", "Form into two large balls and cover each with the remaining nuts.", "Chill in refrigerator. Serve with crackers or chips."]

title: Garden Club Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks softened margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix in order given.", "Drop by teaspoon on lightly greased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 12 minutes.", "Watch carefully after 10 minutes.", "Let cookies cool a minute.", "Transfer to cooling racks or towels.", "Immediately sift powdered sugar over cookies. Makes about 4 dozen cookies."]

title: Mississippi Mud Cake With Mini Marshmallows
ingredients: ["1/2 c. cocoa", "2 sticks real butter", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. chopped nuts (optional)", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Melt butter and cocoa in a saucepan and pour over sugar.", "Add beaten eggs, flour, nuts and vanilla.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "After the cake comes out, pour 1 package of mini marshmallows over the cake and spread out."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, peeled and cut diagonally", "1 medium green pepper, seeded and cut in strips", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks (save juice)", "1/3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Cook carrots, covered, in a small amount of water, just until tender, about 15 minutes.", "Add green pepper; cook 3 minutes longer.", "Drain.", "Drain pineapple; save juice.", "Add water, if necessary, to make 1/3 cup of liquid.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch and salt in saucepan; stir in pineapple liquid, vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook until thick, stirring constantly.", "Add sauce and pineapple to vegetables; heat.", "Serve hot or cold."]

title: Arctic Salad Squares
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 can whole cranberries", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 (16 oz.) carton Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese; add mayonnaise, sugar, cranberries and pineapple.", "Stir well.", "Add nuts and Cool Whip.", "Pour into pan or bowl and freeze.", "Enjoy."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. broken pretzels", "1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "20 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. softened cream cheese", "8 oz. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Melt margarine and mix with broken pretzels and 1/2 cup of sugar.", "Cook over low heat for 7 minutes.", "Pour into baking dish and cool, then break into small pieces.", "Set aside."]

title: White Sauce For Chicken
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "juice of 1 lemon", "black pepper", "a little sugar (optional)"]
directions: ["Heat almost to a boil.", "After chicken is almost done on the grill, coat with White Sauce."]

title: Caramel Pralines
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "1 c. sugar (to brown)", "1 can cream", "1 stick butter", "3 or 4 c. pecans", "1 Tbsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["On medium-low fire, add cream to 3 cups sugar and dissolve. Bring to 234\u00b0 (soft ball).", "While cooking sugar and cream, burn 1 cup sugar on medium-low. Sugar should turn to liquid crystal about the same time the other pot reaches 234\u00b0 (soft ball).", "Combine crystal sugar to large pot by pouring slowly.", "Mixture will rise high, then simmer down.", "It should be 234\u00b0 or soft ball.", "Remove from fire.", "After stirring good, add butter, vanilla and pecans. Set aside for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring several times to cool and it gets dull.", "Spoon on waxed paper."]

title: Cheese Log
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 1/2 c. finely chopped pecans, divided", "1/2 c. finely chopped celery", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, 1/2 cup of pecans and remaining ingredients until thoroughly blended.", "Shape into two 8-inch long logs.", "Roll in remaining pecans; chill."]

title: Hot Cheese Puffs
ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "3/4 tsp. grated onion", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. chopped chives", "1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper", "2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese", "bread slices"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients, except bread; blend well.", "Cut bread into 1 1/2-inch rounds; spread with cheese mixture.", "Bake for 15 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Yield:", "25 servings."]

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: ["1 large onion, chopped", "1 large green pepper, chopped", "6 slices bacon, crumbled", "3 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 1/2 c. rice", "oil"]
directions: ["Fry bacon crisp in large skillet.", "Pour off drippings.", "Cover bottom of skillet with oil.", "Saute pepper and onion just until tender.", "Meanwhile, cook rice according to directions.", "Pour rice over onion and pepper.", "Add crumbled bacon and soy sauce.", "Stir slightly to mix.", "You can add cabbage, carrots, ham, chicken or hamburger meat."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix well and form into ball."]

title: Almond Bars
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted plain flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "1 stick margarine", "1 egg yolk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "1 c. sliced almonds"]
directions: ["Cream butter,", "margarine and sugar thoroughly.\tAdd egg yolk; add flour,\tsalt", "and", "vanilla.", "Grease cookie sheet and spread dough with\tfingers", "dusted with flour.", "Beat egg white and brush over cookies.", "Sprinkle almonds over dough and press down with hand.", "Bake", "at", "275\u00b0", "for\t45", "minutes", "or", "lightly browned.", "Cut within", "a", "few minutes into desired portions.", "A 10 x 15-inch cookie sheet works well."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "1/4 c. vinegar (more tart, if desired)", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1/2 tsp. each: salt, pepper and paprika", "1/2 c. oil"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except oil and blend well.", "Add oil last."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. potato chips, crushed", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["In mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla.", "Stir in potato chips and chopped nuts.", "Add flour.", "Blend well.", "Form into small balls with hands.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Flatten with floured glass.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 minutes.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "8 oz. crushed pineapple - drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream the cheese and add rest of ingredients.", "Shape into ball and refrigerate.", "Roll ball into nuts."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Cream cheese in bowl. Add pineapple, green pepper, onion and seasoned salt. Add pecans (reserving some to roll ball into). Form into a ball and chill. Roll in nuts just before serving."]

title: Pimento Cheese
ingredients: ["3/4 lb. cheese", "2 Tbsp. butter", "pinch of salt", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. sugar", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Heat in double boiler until melted, then mash up pimiento pepper real good.", "Remove from boiler and stir for a few minutes longer."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans or walnuts", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla, then add potato chips and nuts; mix well.", "Stir in flour.", "Form into balls and press flat with the bottom of a sugar-coated glass on a cookie sheet.", "Bake 12 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven."]

title: Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 c. sifted all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Cream together the margarine, sugar and vanilla.", "Add crushed potato chips and pecans.", "Stir in flour.", "Form small balls with 1 tablespoon of dough.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Press balls with flat bottom of glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake in oven at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes, or until cookies are light brown."]

title: *Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, sliced diagonally", "1 medium green pepper, cut in 1-inch squares", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Cook carrots in slightly salted water for 15 minutes.", "Add pepper and cook for 3 minutes more; drain.", "Drain pineapple and save juice.", "Add water to juice to make 1/3 cup.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch, salt, liquid, vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook and stir until bubbly.", "Add vegetables and pineapple.", "Heat through. Serves 6."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) can beets", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. butter (optional)"]
directions: ["Drain liquid from beets into saucepan.", "Boil down to half. Shake together vinegar and flour.", "Stir into boiling mixture.", "Add sugar and salt; bring to boil.", "Add beets and butter; heat through."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 Tbsp. crushed onion", "1 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped fine", "chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Shape into desired shape.", "Roll in finely chopped pecans."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple.", "Soften cream cheese and combine with other ingredients including 1/2 cup of nuts.", "Put into refrigerator for 1 1/2 hours.", "Take out and roll in remainder of nuts."]

title: Barbecue Pecans
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. ketchup", "1/8 tsp. hot sauce", "4 c. pecans (halves)", "salt (optional)"]
directions: ["Combine first four ingredients.", "Stir in pecans and mix well. Spread pecans evenly in a shallow baking pan.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 30 minutes, stirring frequently.", "Drain on paper towels.", "Sprinkle with salt, if desired.", "Yield: 4 cups."]

title: Cheese-Macaroni Salad
ingredients: ["2 c. cooked seasoned macaroni", "1 c. diced celery", "1 c. cooked peas", "1/2 c. shredded uncooked carrots", "1 green pepper, shredded", "salt and pepper", "mayonnaise", "cheese balls or stuffed olives"]
directions: ["Chill macaroni.", "Combine with celery, peas, carrots and green pepper.", "Season to taste.", "Moisten with mayonnaise.", "Mix lightly with two forks.", "Serve on any crisp salad greens.", "Garnish with cheese balls or diced stuffed olives.", "Yield: 6 servings."]

title: Barbecue Sauce For Meatballs
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 c. celery", "1/2 c. green pepper", "bit bottle ketchup", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 c. white vinegar"]
directions: ["Cook onion, celery and pepper.", "Add ketchup, sugar and vinegar.", "Warm, then add to meatballs."]

title: Pete'S Sauerkraut
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can sauerkraut (don't drain)", "5 Tbsp. ketchup", "1/2 tsp. Kraft prepared mustard", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "pinch of sugar", "pinch of salt", "1/2 tsp. chili powder"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in saucepan.", "Cook on high heat for 2 minutes,", "stirring\tconstantly.", "Cook", "on medium heat for 7 minutes,", "stirring often to keep from burning.", "Delicious over hot dogs."]

title: Asparagus Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["24 slices sandwich bread", "1/2 c. butter, softened", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "4 oz. Blue cheese", "24 spears (fresh or frozen) asparagus", "1/2 c. butter, melted"]
directions: ["Cook asparagus; drain.", "Trim crusts from bread.", "Flatten each piece with rolling pin.", "Mix softened butter with cheeses.", "Spread mixture on each piece of bread and top with a piece of asparagus. Roll and dip in butter.", "Cut into fourths and freeze.", "When ready to serve, bake 15 minutes at 400\u00b0.", "Makes 96."]

title: Kraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (No. 2) can sauerkraut", "2 c. celery, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1/4 c. oil", "1 1/3 c. vinegar", "1 1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Wash and rinse kraut; add vegetables.", "Mix dressing and pour over mixture.", "Let stand overnight."]

title: Pecan Butter Balls
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter*", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["*Margarine may be substituted but the flavor is not quite the same."]

title: Cranberry Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. cranberries (fresh)", "2 c. sugar", "dash of salt", "1 c. finely chopped celery (optional)", "1 c. crushed pineapple", "3/4 c. chopped pecans", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Grind cranberries and add sugar and salt.", "Let set overnight in refrigerator.", "Next morning, add remainder of ingredients. Keeps well in refrigerator."]

title: Pork Tenderloin(Marinated And Stuffed With Spinach)
ingredients: ["oil", "garlic", "salt & pepper", "Worcestershire sauce", "soy sauce", "brown sugar", "honey"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients together well.", "Marinate tenderloin in sauce and turn several times.", "Marinate overnight.", "Cut tenderloin lengthwise. Then fill with spinach.", "Roll and tie together.", "Saute tenderloin on high heat for just a few minutes to seer in juices. Rub tenderloin with mustard thoroughly.", "Roll in bread crumbs and Romano cheese.", "Place in pyrex dish and bake to your desired doneness.", "Cut into 1/2 inch slices.", "Serve with baked potato or rice and a favorite vegetable."]

title: "Refried" Beans
ingredients: ["2 lb. dried pinto beans", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 medium green pepper, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. chili powder"]
directions: ["Wash and sort beans.", "Put in a large pan and cover with cold water.", "Bring to boil and boil for 2 minutes.", "Turn off heat, cover and let sit 2 hours.", "Drain.", "Put back into pan, cover with water and bring to boil.", "Reduce heat and simmer until beans are tender, 1 to 2 hours.", "(Note:", "You may also cook soaked beans in crock-pot until tender if desired.)", "Drain water; reserve some. Mash beans to desired consistency.", "Saute onion, green pepper and garlic in a little vegetable oil.", "Add to mashed beans along", "with salt and chili powder.", "Eat \"as is\" or use for burritos or tostados."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. garlic", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Let cheese soften; stir in other ingredients except pecans. Form a ball and roll in chopped pecans."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, using 1 cup nuts.", "Shape into ball and roll in remaining nuts."]

title: Cheese Spread Or Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix all together well.", "Form into a ball or leave in a dish. Refrigerate for 1 hour.", "Add nuts on top."]

title: Cranberry Pie
ingredients: ["2 c. raw cranberries", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "1 tsp. almond extract", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "3/4 c. melted butter"]
directions: ["Pour 2 cups of raw cranberries in greased pie plates (10-inch).", "Sprinkle 1/2 cup of sugar over them.", "Beat 2 eggs. Gradually add 1 cup of sugar, flour, butter and almond extract. Pour over cranberries.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes."]

title: Cabbage Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 medium onion", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. oil", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Combine onion and vinegar in blender.", "Add sugar.", "Let stand 20 minutes.", "Add oil, salt and celery seed.", "Keeps weeks in refrigerator."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 can (16 oz.) sauerkraut", "1 c. grated carrots", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped onion", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 vegetable oil", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["In a large bowl mix sauerkraut, carrots, celery, green pepper and onion.", "Combine sugar, vinegar and oil.", "Pour over vegetables and mix well.", "Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours.", "Yields 10 to 12 servings."]

title: Pineapple Dip
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "small can crushed pineapple", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. green pepper", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "large pkg. unsalted chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Use on Wheatsworth crackers."]

title: Pineapple Cream Pie
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "1/2 c. walnuts, finely chopped", "1 stick melted butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "8 oz. sour cream or yogurt", "1 large can crushed pineapple, unsweetened and undrained"]
directions: ["Combine flour, nuts, margarine and sugar.", "Press into a pie plate and bake at 350\u00b0 until just slightly browned, about 15 minutes.", "Cool for 15 minutes and fill with a combination of the remaining ingredients.", "Chill overnight."]

title: Rhubarb Butter Crunch
ingredients: ["3 c. rhubarb, cut up", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. oatmeal (rolled oats)", "1 1/2 c. flour", "3/4 c. margarine"]
directions: ["Mix rhubarb with sugar and 3 tablespoons flour.", "Stir and set aside.", "Combine brown sugar, oatmeal and 1 1/2 cups flour.", "Cut in the margarine until crumbly.", "Sprinkle half of the mixture into the bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Pour the rhubarb over the crust and top with the rest of the crumbly mixture.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 40 minutes."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. pecans", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream first 2 ingredients and next 4. Form into balls and press with fork.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Cool slightly and dust with powdered sugar."]

title: Party Mix
ingredients: ["2 c. Wheat Chex", "2 c. Rice Chex", "2 c. Corn Chex", "3/4 c. Pretzel sticks", "1 1/2 c. peanuts", "4 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce", "1/2 tsp garlic powder", "1 stick margarine", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 250 degrees.", "Melt margarine in large shallow pan.", "Stir in ingredients.", "Mix until all pieces are coated with butter.", "Cook for 1 hour.", "Stir occasionally."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix soft cream cheese with the pineapple until well blended. Fold in the green pepper, onion and garlic salt; stir well.", "Form into a ball shape and roll in the chopped pecans.", "Place in refrigerator until firm.", "Serve with crackers and/or raw veggies."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can pineapple, crushed", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients except pecans.", "Wrap in wax paper and chill.", "Roll chilled cheese balls in chopped pecans.", "Makes 2 cheese balls."]

title: Chocolate Nut Caramels
ingredients: ["2 c. granulated sugar", "1 1/2 c. dark corn syrup (Karo)", "2 c. cream", "1 c. butter (not margarine)", "4 sq. Baker's baking chocolate", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Put sugar, corn syrup, 1 cup cream and butter together.", "Stir and cook to a vigorous boil.", "Gradually add the other cup of cream. Do not allow the mixture to stop boiling while cream is being added.", "Cook until thermometer reads 250\u00b0, stirring gently. Without a thermometer, cook to hard ball stage.", "Remove from fire; add chocolate, nuts and vanilla.", "Beat until chocolate is melted."]

title: Pixie Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. mustard"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients until well blended."]

title: Toffee Squares
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 lb. Hershey chocolate", "1 c. nuts, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Cream butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy.", "Add beaten egg yolk, vanilla and sifted flour.", "Spread on 12 x 17 1/2-inch cookie sheet and bake at 350\u00b0."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients together.", "Hold out 1 cup pecans. Mold ingredients into a ball and roll in the remaining cup of pecans.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Health Nut Spread
ingredients: ["6 medium carrots, grated", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 to 1 c. raisins", "1 1/2 to 2 c. nuts, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. honey", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar"]
directions: ["Mix all and adjust to taste.", "Can add more or less of any item.", "Serve on crackers, bagels or English muffins."]

title: Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/2 c. finely chopped celery", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "2 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, 1 cup pecans and remaining ingredients until thoroughly blended.", "Shape in a ball and roll remaining pecans.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["1 large can pineapple chunks", "3 Tbsp. flour", "24 crushed Ritz crackers", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1/4 stick margarine, melted"]
directions: ["Put pineapple in flat dish.", "Mix flour, sugar and cheese and spread over pineapple.", "Sprinkle crackers over this, then pour melted margarine over all.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can drained crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Carefully stir in drained pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Chill well.", "Form into a ball and roll in remaining cup of pecans.", "Wrap in aluminum foil and let set overnight.", "(This is so that the onion and bell pepper taste will not be too strong.)"]

title: Pecan Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. soft butter", "1/2 c. granulated sugar or 1/2 c. confectioners sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix butter, sugar, salt and vanilla.", "Work in flour.", "The last bit of flour may be worked in with hands.", "Add nuts.", "Chill dough. Roll into 1-inch balls.", "Place on ungreased baking sheet and bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes, until set, but not browned.", "Roll in sifted confectioners sugar while warm.", "Cool."]

title: Mushroom Sandwiches
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. mushrooms, chopped", "1 stick butter or margarine", "1/2 c. heavy cream", "3 Tbsp. flour (add additional flour, if needed)", "pinch of salt", "3 dashes Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Saute mushrooms with butter or margarine.", "Add the cream and salt to taste.", "Thicken with flour (mix flour with water). While cooking, add the Worcestershire sauce to hot mixture and then refrigerate overnight to thicken.", "Use to make tea sandwiches."]

title: Super Macaroni Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. macaroni", "1 large green pepper, chopped", "1 medium onion, chopped", "4 medium carrots, grated", "1 can sweetened condensed milk", "1 c. vinegar", "2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. sugar", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Cook macaroni.", "Drain and cool.", "Mix all ingredients and chill at least 4 hours.", "(Can use yellow or red bell peppers.", "Some of each looks pretty.)"]

title: Barbecue Sauce(Makes 1 Quart)
ingredients: ["1/2 stick butter", "1 c. mustard", "1 c. honey", "1 c. ketchup", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 c. vinegar", "salt and pepper (black and crushed red pepper) to taste"]
directions: ["Mix until blended well.", "Good on pork, chicken and beef.", "Also, if you like onions, chop 1/4 cup fine and add to sauce.", "If you add onions, cook until onions are tender."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. nuts", "1 1/2 c. flour, sifted"]
directions: ["Chill about an hour before baking", "at 350\u00b0.", "Makes approximately three dozen cookies."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese", "1 large can crushed pineapple", "dash of garlic salt", "1 1/2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 c. diced celery (very fine)", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper (optional)"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple well.", "Mix together; form into a ball.", "Roll in chopped nuts.", "Top with a cherry."]

title: Vegetable Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 medium can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. chopped bell peppers", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. pecans, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients well.", "Chill overnight, or until you can roll into ball.", "Roll in crushed nuts or parsley."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese; gradually add pineapple, green pepper, onion and seasoned salt.", "Mix well.", "Roll into ball and roll ball in chopped pecans.", "Chill.", "Serve with your favorite crackers. Will keep a week if kept refrigerated."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 egg yolk"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients and chill overnight.", "Roll into small balls. Press middle of cookie and put cherry or walnut in hole.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes."]

title: Nutty Fingers
ingredients: ["2 c. plain flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 sticks butter", "pinch of salt", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix and form into fingers or balls.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes. Roll in 4x sugar."]

title: Queen Of Hearts Tarts
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream together thoroughly the butter and sugar.", "Stir in the egg yolk and vanilla.", "Sift together the flour and salt and add to creamed mixture.", "Mix well.", "Shape into 3 dozen small balls and dip each into unbeaten egg white.", "Roll in chopped nuts (pecans or peanuts) and place 2 inches apart on lightly greased cookie sheet. Do not flatten balls.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "After baking 10 minutes, remove pan from oven and with a thimble, make a dent into each cookie.", "Return pan to oven.", "Work as quickly as possible and if the thimble sticks, dip into cold water.", "When cookies are done, remove to cooling rack and fill each dent, while warm, with jam or marmalade.", "A tart jam is best (plum, apricot or pineapple)."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 c. pretzels, crushed", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (9 oz.) carton Cool Whip", "1 (20 oz.) can pineapple, crushed and drained", "1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Melt margarine in square Pyrex dish.", "Stir in pretzels and 1/3 cup sugar.", "Bake in 400\u00b0 oven for 7 minutes.", "Stir pretzels after removing from the oven.", "Mix cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar; fold in the Cool Whip and the pineapple.", "Pour over the pretzels and place in the refrigerator."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick margarine", "1/3 c. sugar (or 12 pkg. Equal)", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 large can crushed pineapple, drained", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sugar (or 12 pkg. Equal)"]
directions: ["Melt margarine.", "Add 1/3 cup sugar and pretzels (don't add fine crumb and salt mixture that you get after rolling, just pieces); mix well.", "Put in oblong baking dish and bake at 300\u00b0 for 5 minutes or in microwave."]

title: Fudge
ingredients: ["4 sq. chocolate", "4 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. corn syrup (white)", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 1/3 c. Pet canned cream"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate.", "Remove from stove.", "Add sugar, corn syrup and cream.", "Mix well.", "Put back on stove.", "Stir while cooking.", "Drop chocolate into a cup of cold water until chocolate forms ball. Remove from stove.", "Add butter and vanilla, using an electric mixer.", "Beat until thick.", "Pour into greased pan.", "Let cool."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped fine", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 1/2 c. chopped pecans or walnuts"]
directions: ["Mix and shape in ball. Chill in refrigerator 2 hours, then roll in the 1 1/2 cups chopped nuts."]

title: Harvest Spice Peach Crisp
ingredients: ["2 (15 oz.) cans Harvest Spice sliced peaches, drained", "1/2 c. flour", "1/3 c. firmly packed brown sugar", "1/3 c. oatmeal", "1/3 c. chopped walnuts", "1/3 c. butter or margarine, softened"]
directions: ["Place fruit in 8 x 8-inch baking dish. Combine flour, sugar, oats and walnuts. Mix butter until crumbly; sprinkle evenly over fruit. Bake at 425\u00b0 for 15", "to 20 minutes or until golden. Serve with ice cream, if desired. Prep time: 5 minutes. Cook Time: 20 minutes. Makes 6 servings."]

title: Sweet-Sour Dressing
ingredients: ["1 small onion", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1 c. oil", "2/3 c. sugar", "2/3 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Place all in blender or processor. Blend well. Serve on fresh salad mix."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 3/4 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add vanilla, flour and potato chips.", "Mix well.", "Drop onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together; form into a ball.", "Sprinkle with additional chopped nuts, if desired."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "1 (32 oz.) jar sauerkraut, rinsed and drained", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 green pepper (medium), chopped", "1 c. chopped onion", "1 c. grated carrots"]
directions: ["In a large bowl, combine sugar and oil; mix well.", "Add all remaining ingredients.", "Chill several hours or overnight.", "Yields 6 to 8 servings."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies(For Christmas)
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening or Oleo", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream shortening until fluffy. Gradually add sugar and cream cheese making sure mixture is smooth. Beat in egg yolk, vanilla, and flour. Use a cookie press or chill until firm, roll and cut with decorative cutters. Decorate for the holiday. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Yield 3-4 dozen."]

title: Hawaiian Style Veggie Mix
ingredients: ["1 (13 to 16 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. Minute rice", "1 can (1 c.) carrots", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives (optional)"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple; measure syrup and add water to make 1 1/2 cups.", "Combine liquid, butter, pineapple, soy sauce, ginger and salt in saucepan.", "Bring to a boil.", "Stir in rice, carrots and chives.", "Cover.", "Let stand 5 minutes."]

title: Spicy Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "2 Tbsp. dry mustard", "6 Tbsp. brown sugar", "6 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. margarine"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Boil for 5 minutes.", "Reduce heat and simmer until mixture thickens.", "Serve on any meat of your choice.", "Store unused portion in the refrigerator."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 small (1 oz.) pkg. potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream together\tbutter,", "sugar\tand vanilla; add potato chips and pecans.", "Stir", "in", "flour.", "Form", "mixture", "into small balls. Place on cookie sheet and press thin with a glass that has been dipped in sugar and a little flour.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 15 minutes until light brown (golden)."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (9 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped walnuts", "1/3 c. chopped celery", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix cheese and pineapple; add half of nuts, reserving rest. Stir in remaining ingredients; shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Chill well and serve with assorted crackers."]

title: Poppy Cox
ingredients: ["2 qt. popped corn", "1 1/3 c. pecans, toasted in oven (optional)", "1 1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. Karo (white)", "1 c. butter or margarine", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix together popped corn and pecans.", "Combine sugar, Karo, butter or margarine and salt in saucepan and stir until it boils. Cook syrup, stirring occasionally for 10 to 12 minutes, until it turns caramel color.", "Remove from fire and add vanilla.", "Pour over popcorn mix and stir until covered.", "Spread on waxed paper until cool.", "Break in pieces and store in a closed container."]

title: Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. margarine or butter, softened", "3 oz. pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg yolk (reserve white)", "2 c. all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Combine sugar, margarine, cream cheese, salt, almond extract, vanilla and egg yolk; blend well.", "Stir in flour until well blended.", "Refrigerate dough at least 2 hours or overnight.", "Heat oven to 375\u00b0.", "Roll out on floured surface,", "using 1/3 of dough at a time, to 1/8 inch thick.", "Cut with floured cookie cutter.", "Place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake for 7 to 10 minutes. Leave cookies plain or brush with egg white (slightly beaten) and sprinkle with colored sugar before cooking.", "Makes 5 to 6 dozen, depending on how big and thick cookies are."]

title: Black Bean Soup
ingredients: ["1 lb. black beans", "1 medium onion", "2 or 3 garlic cloves", "salt to taste", "1 small onion", "2 Tbsp. shortening"]
directions: ["Clean and wash the black beans.", "Cover beans and soak overnight.", "Use same water, medium onion (chopped finely) and salt to taste.", "Add garlic, if desired.", "Allow beans to boil until the liquid has thickened and has nearly boiled away.", "Put the beans through a food grinder.", "This will be a paste.", "Chop the small onion and fry in the shortening.", "Add paste with sufficient water to make desired thickness.", "Cook slowly for 10 to 15 minutes. Serve with croutons or fried tortilla strips."]

title: Pineapple Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. cream cheese (8 oz.) softened", "1/4 Cup diced green pepper", "1 teas. seasoning salt", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1 to 2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1/2 Cup chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, form into a ball and refrigerate.", "Can be made a day ahead.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Russian Salad
ingredients: ["1 large lime Jell-O", "1 large lemon Jell-O", "1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Dissolve both Jell-O's in 4 cups of boiling water.", "Add 2 cups cold water and juice from pineapple.", "Add other ingredients."]

title: Marinade For Vegetables
ingredients: ["2/3 c. red wine vinegar", "1/2 c. olive oil", "3/8 tsp. minced garlic", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "4 to 5 drops hot sauce"]
directions: ["Mix marinade ingredients in a very large bowl.", "Gently stir in celery sticks, carrot sticks, bell pepper rings, onion rings, 1 pound of mushrooms, green and black olives, a small jar of pimentos, cauliflower, cherry tomatoes (halved) and broccoli. Refrigerate 6 to 12 hours, re-mixing occasionally."]

title: Russian Teacakes
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 1/4 c. flour", "3/4 c. finely chopped nuts", "1/2 c. 10x sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Mix thoroughly butter, sugar and vanilla. Work in flour, salt and nuts until the dough holds together.", "Shape the dough into 1-inch balls and place them on an ungreased baking sheet.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until set but not brown.", "While warm, roll in 10x sugar.", "Cool and roll in sugar again."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 C. pretzels, crushed", "1 stick margarine, melted", "1/2 C. sugar", "1 8 oz. Cool Whip", "1 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 C. sugar", "1 20 oz. can crushed pineapple", "1/4 C. sugar", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix pretzels, margarine and 1/2 cup sugar. Press into a 13x9 inch glass dish. Mix Cool Whip, cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar together and spread on first layer. Drain juice from pineapple and mix with 1/4 cup of sugar and cornstarch. Cook until thick, add pineapple and pour on top. Refrigerate until cool."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 - 16 oz. can diced beets", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. raisins", "1 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Drain beets; save liquid and add vinegar.", "Make a thin paste with cornstarch.", "Add rest of liquid.", "Cook until thick, stirring constantly.", "Soak raisins in very hot water until plump.", "Drain well; add butter, sugar, raisins and beets.", "Heat thoroughly, stirring often.", "Yield:", "4 servings."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies(Pecan Sandies)
ingredients: ["1 c. butter (do not use margarine)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans or walnuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla.", "Stir in 1 cup crushed potato chips and pecans.", "Add 2 cups flour gradually.", "Form into 1-inch balls.", "Place on cookie sheet.", "Press flat with floured glass bottom to about 1/8-inch thick.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Hint:", "They won't color much when done."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["6 medium-sized beets", "1/2 cup sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 cup vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Wash the beets and cook in boiling water until tender. Remove the skins.", "Cut the beets into thin slices or cubes. Set aside. Mix the sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Add the vinegar.", "Boil the sauce for 5 minutes stirring constantly.", "Add butter.", "Pour sauce over beets and let stand for a few minutes to absorb the sweet-sour flavor."]

title: Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["1 qt. mayonnaise", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. dry curd cottage cheese", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. salt", "4 oz. Roquefort or Blue cheese, crumbled"]
directions: ["Mix all 6 ingredients with electric mixer. Stir in crumbled cheese.", "Makes about 1 1/2 quarts."]

title: Party Mix
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. margarine", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 c. Corn Chex cereal", "1 c. Rice Chex cereal", "1 c. Wheat Chex cereal", "1/2 c. salted mixed nuts"]
directions: ["Place margarine in large glass bowl.", "Microwave about 1 minute on High.", "Stir in seasoned salt and Worcestershire sauce.", "Add Chex and nuts.", "Mix well until all pieces are coated.", "Microwave 5 1/2 to 6 1/2 minutes on High or until Chex look toasted.", "Stir every 2 minutes.", "Spread on absorbent paper to cool.", "Yield:", "3 1/2 cups."]

title: Golden Raisin Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["3/4 c. vegetable oil", "1/2 c. olive oil", "3/4 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. dried onion", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["In pan mix vinegar and sugar.", "Stir and boil 1 minute.", "Remove from heat and add dried onion.", "With mixer or whisk, add oils.", "Add salt, mustard and celery seed; mix well.", "Pour over salad."]

title: Sour Cream Fudge
ingredients: ["2 cups sugar", "1/2 cup sour cream", "1/3 cup corn syrup", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 tsp vanilla", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 cup chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients except vanilla and nuts. Bring to a boil slowly, stirring until sugar dissolves. Boil without stirring over medium heat until soft ball and let stand 15 minutes. Do not stir. Add vanilla; beat until candy starts to loose its gloss. Stir in nuts and pour into buttered 9x9 inch pan."]

title: Walnut Balls
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "1/2 c. superfine sugar (Bartender's sugar)", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1 c. chopped walnuts", "1 tsp. vanilla", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter.", "Add sugar slowly and cream.", "Add flour in 2 parts, chopped nuts, vanilla and salt.", "Chill overnight.", "Roll into small balls to size and bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes."]

title: Bacon Horseradish Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) sour cream", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 to 3 tsp. horseradish", "1/4 c. crumbled bacon", "dash of Worcestershire sauce", "dash of hot sauce (optional)", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and chill one hour."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 c. shortening", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "3/4 c. crushed potato chips", "1 1/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Beat together shortening and sugar.", "Add egg yolk and vanilla. Stir in flour; fold in potato chips.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 minutes."]

title: Our Best Fried Rice
ingredients: ["4 slices bacon", "1 c. diced green pepper", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "2 c. cooked rice", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["In a medium skillet, cook bacon until crisp.", "Drain and crumble.", "Set aside.", "Pour off all but 2 tablespoons drippings. To drippings in skillet, add green peppers and onion; saute 3 minutes.", "Add rice and stir-fry until golden brown about 5 minutes.", "Stir in Worcestershire sauce, salt, and reserved bacon. Heat until hot."]

title: M&M'S Cookie Bar
ingredients: ["2 c. quick oats", "1 1/2 c. flour (plain)", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. melted butter", "2 Tbsp. shortening", "1 1/2 c. M&M's", "1 can Eagle Brand", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix oats, flour, brown sugar and melted butter; reserve 1 1/2 cups for later use.", "Put the remaining in the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 minutes."]

title: Bleu Cheese Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 4 oz. pkg. blue cheese, softened", "1 stick butter, softened", "1/2 cup chopped green olives", "2 tsps. chives", "1 cup chopped nuts for garnish"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except nuts, together. Form into a ball. Place on a flat plate. Pat chopped nuts over the cheese ball. Refrigerate to set the flavors. Serve with Ritz crackers."]

title: Kraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (No. 2 1/2) can sauerkraut", "1 c. minced celery", "1 medium minced onion", "1 1/4 c. vegetable oil", "1 1/3 c. rice vinegar", "1 1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Wash and rinse kraut.", "Wash again.", "Add celery and onion.", "Mix oil, vinegar and sugar together and pour over vegetable mixture. Let stand overnight."]

title: Pull Apart Vegetable Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped chives", "1 c. butter", "3 cans refrigerated buttermilk biscuits (30)", "1/2 lb. fried bacon, crumbled", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Saute green pepper, onion and chives in butter.", "Quarter biscuits.", "Combine all ingredients (be sure biscuits are well-coated with butter).", "Pour into ungreased Bundt pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["20 oz. can sweetened crushed or chunked pineapple (undrained)", "5 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. cheese", "3/4 tube Town House crackers, crushed", "1 stick butter, melted"]
directions: ["Butter bottom of casserole dish.", "Layer ingredients in order listed.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes, until bubbly.", "Delicious with ham or can be used as a dessert."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies(Taste Like Pecan Sandies.)
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. sifted flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour and mix well. Stir in chips and nuts."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. chopped pecans (to roll ball in)", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except 1/2 cup nuts.", "Form into a ball. Cover with chopped nuts."]

title: Toffee Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream together margarine, brown sugar and egg yolk.", "Stir in flour, salt and vanilla.", "Spread in 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Frost with melted Hershey bar."]

title: Caramel Fudge Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. Diamond walnuts", "1/4 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 c. granulated sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. dairy sour cream", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Chop 1/2 cup of the walnuts to medium size pieces.", "Chop remaining walnuts into fine pieces for coating fudge balls.", "Melt butter in heavy 2-quart saucepan.", "Add sugars, salt and sour cream.", "Cook over low heat, stirring until sugars dissolve. Cover; boil slowly 5 minutes.", "Uncover; cook rapidly without stirring to 236\u00b0 (soft ball stage).", "Remove from heat; cool to lukewarm.", "Add vanilla; beat until mixture is creamy and begins to hold its shape.", "Stir in medium size walnut pieces.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper.", "Quickly shape into balls. Roll in finely chopped walnuts.", "Let stand until firm.", "Makes 24 balls."]

title: Asparagus Rolls
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "6 slices bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled", "1 Tbsp. chives", "1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1 can asparagus", "Parmesan cheese to taste", "fresh bread, cut crust off and mashed flat"]
directions: ["Put mixture on bread and roll. Melt 1/2 pound butter. Brush on rolls and freeze. Cut off edges of bread with electric knife. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes until brown."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 c. cooked beets, cut into 1/2-inch cubes", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. mild vinegar", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Melt butter in saucepan.", "Add cornstarch; mix until smooth. Stir sugar and vinegar, making a smooth sauce.", "Add beets; let cook slowly until thoroughly heated."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["2 c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 can drained crushed pineapple (save juice)", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Combine pretzels and 1/2 cup sugar and butter.", "Mix well and press into a long oblong dish.", "Mix cream cheese, Cool Whip and 1/4 cup sugar; spread on first layer.", "Combine juice from pineapple and 2 tablespoons flour.", "Cook until thickened.", "Cool and mix with pineapples and place on top of second layer of salad."]

title: Cream Cheese Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine, softened", "1/2 c. butter, softened (no substitutes)", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Combine first 3 ingredients.", "Beat well with heavy-duty mixer. Add sugar.", "Beat until light and fluffy (5 minutes).", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Add flour to creamed mixture.", "Stir in vanilla."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 1/2 c. crushed potato chips"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Make 1-inch balls.", "Flatten on cookie sheet (the thinner the better).", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with confectioners sugar when cool.", "Yields 7 to 8 dozen. This is a really stiff batter, be patient."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or oleo", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. pecans", "1/2 c. potato chips"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; beat well.", "Add vanilla, potato chips and", "beat", "together.", "Add nuts and mix well (do not beat now). Drop", "by", "teaspoon on an ungreased cookie sheet about 2 inches apart.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 10 to 12 minutes."]

title: Baked Onions
ingredients: ["4 medium onion, red or sweet", "Black pepper to taste", "1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 cup balsamic vinegar", "1/4 cup olive oil", "1/4 cup soy sauce"]
directions: ["Mix liquids. Peel onions, cut off top and bottom.", "Place in plastic bag with marinade for 1 hour.", "Remove onions from bag and save marinade.", "Arrange onions in baking dish.", "Pour 1/4 cup marinade over onions.", "To microwave, cover dish and cook 9 to 10 minutes for 4 onions; 5 to 7 minutes for two onions.", "In oven, cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "2 c. chopped pecans or walnuts", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 tsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Mix together and mold into ball.", "Roll in chopped nuts.", "Can be frozen."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 can beets, sliced or diced and drained", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, cornstarch, salt and vinegar in a saucepan.", "Boil 5 minutes, stirring often.", "Pour sauce over heated beets and let stand for a few minutes before serving."]

title: Celery Seed Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1 c. sugar", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 c. oil"]
directions: ["Put in blender and mix well.", "Makes very good dressing."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 1/2 c. chopped pecans (3/4 c. inside ball, remainder to roll in)", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. fresh chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 1/2 tsp. celery salt", "1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "2 c. chopped pecans (reserve 1 c. to roll ball in)"]
directions: ["Mix", "and shape into ball.", "Chill about 45 minutes, then roll in 1 cup of nuts."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter (use 1/2 c. butter and 1/2 c. margarine)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream the butter and sugar.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Drop by small teaspoon on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake approximately 13 to 15 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven."]

title: Chicken Wings
ingredients: ["3/4 c. brown sugar", "1 c. soy sauce", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 tsp. mustard", "2 gloves garlic", "1/8 tsp. garlic salt"]
directions: ["Mix everything together.", "Pour over chicken wings in baking dish or pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "(Recipe is for 3 pounds of chicken wings.)"]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can sauerkraut", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. grated celery", "1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Drain can of sauerkraut, cut up.", "Add chopped vegetables and sugar.", "Stir and refrigerate."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["2 (1 lb.) cans chunk pineapple, drained", "1 c. sugar", "6 Tbsp. plain flour", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "2 c. Ritz crackers, crushed (1 sleeve)", "1 stick butter"]
directions: ["In a bowl, combine sugar and flour. In a separate bowl, mix cheese and pineapple (be sure to drain pineapple first). Mix both bowls together and pour into a 1 1/2-quart dish. Crush Ritz crackers on top of mixture. Melt the butter and drip on top of the crackers. Cover and place in fridge overnight."]

title: French Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 small onion, grated", "1/2 c. oil", "3/4 c. ketchup", "1/3 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients well so oil does not separate."]

title: Tanya'S Party Time Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["You may add 1 (2.25 ounce) jar of Armour dried beef, finely chopped."]

title: Favorite Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. grated carrots", "1 c. raisins", "1/2 c. finely chopped celery", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/3 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine carrots, raisins, celery and nuts.", "Blend mayonnaise and salt.", "Mix lightly with carrot mixture.", "Chill."]

title: Rhubarb Crunch
ingredients: ["3 c. diced rhubarb", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. shortening"]
directions: ["Mix rhubarb, 3 tablespoons flour and sugar.", "Pour into a greased 9 x 12-inch pan.", "Mix brown sugar, 1 1/2 cups flour, butter and shortening with a fork.", "Crumble mixture over rhubarb mixture.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 until brown (30 to 40 minutes)."]

title: Beryl'S Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 Tbsp. honey", "1 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Beat butter until creamy.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Beat well.", "Chill one hour.", "Form into balls and bake 30 to 35 minutes at 300\u00b0.", "Roll immediately in powdered sugar."]

title: Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "2 c. sugar", "3 level Tbsp. cocoa", "2 c. quick oats", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix the margarine, sugar and cocoa.", "Add 1/2 cup milk.", "Bring to a rapid boil for 1 minute.", "Remove from heat and add 1/2 cup peanut butter and 2 cups quick oats, 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1/2 cup chopped pecans.", "Mix well and drop on wax paper by a teaspoon."]

title: Mustard Barbeque Sauce
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine or butter", "1 c. apple cider vinegar", "1 c. mustard", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. black pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. hot sauce (Pete's)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and let come to a boil.", "Store in glass quart jars with plastic tops to keep from corroding metal.", "If you triple the recipe, it will be 2 quarts."]

title: Peach Cobbler
ingredients: ["1/8 stick butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "2 (No. 303) cans peaches, drained", "1/4 lb. butter", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Grease casserole dish.", "Drain peaches and put in casserole. Combine sugar, flour, butter and salt.", "Mix until flaky.", "Put mixture over peaches.", "Preheat oven to 375\u00b0 and bake for 10 minutes, until golden brown."]

title: Pea Salad
ingredients: ["1 can peas, drained or fresh peas, cooked", "1 c. diced celery", "1/2 c. shredded carrots", "1 onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "4 Tbsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Add vinegar and sugar to celery, onion and carrots.", "Stir well.", "Add peas last.", "Mix together with Kraft mayonnaise."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 small can chopped pineapple", "1/2 c. onion", "1/2 c. green pepper", "dash of celery salt", "1 small bag chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese a little bit.", "Mix onion, green pepper and celery salt.", "Drain pineapple and mix in.", "Form in a ball and put walnut pieces on."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 1/2 to 2 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add pineapple, salt, onion, pepper and 1 cup nuts.", "Shape into ball and cool overnight.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "This ball can be re-shaped after use and stored in the refrigerator for over a week."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 lb. can sliced beets or 2 c. whole beets if small", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Drain beets, reserving 1/3 cup liquid.", "In a saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir in reserved beet liquid, vinegar and butter.", "Cook and stir until mixture thickens.", "Add beets and heat through. Makes 4 servings."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["12 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. finely chopped walnuts", "3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. mustard", "dash of salt", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 tsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Mix altogether except for the 1/2 cup nuts.", "Save other 1/2 to roll cheese ball in.", "Chill and serve with favorite crackers."]

title: Sour Cream Lettuce Salad

directions: ["Fry bacon until crisp.", "Stir in flour and blend thoroughly. Add sour cream and cook, stirring constantly until mixture begins to thicken.", "Add sugar, salt and vinegar.", "Pour hot sauce over lettuce leaves and mix.", "Makes 4 servings."]

title: Roquefort Dressing
ingredients: ["1 pt. mayonnaise", "1 pt. sour cream", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. Roquefort, grated", "juice of 1/2 lemon", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 small onion, grated", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together until blended, using salt and pepper to taste.", "May be made ahead.", "Keeps several weeks in refrigerator."]

title: Mike'S Favorite Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "1 (10 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans (reserve 1/4 c. to roll ball in)"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together and shape into a ball.", "Roll ball in nuts.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Potato Chip Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream the butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add crushed potato chips and pecans; stir.", "Stir in flour.", "Form into small balls using 1 tablespoon dough.", "Press balls flat on greased cookie sheet with bottom of glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes or until light brown."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. margarine", "1 (32 oz.) bottle ketchup", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3 drops hot sauce", "2 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1/2 c. packed dark brown sugar"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in saucepan and bring to a boil. Let cool and store in the refrigerator until ready to use."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. finely crushed potato chips", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["First, cream the butter and sugar together.", "Add vanilla.", "Add flour and salt and mix well. Stir in potato chips and pecans. Drop from spoon onto an ungreased cookie sheet.", "With spoon dipped in water, flatten each cookie. Bake 15 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Yields 5 dozen."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, sliced", "1 medium green pepper, sliced", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks in juice", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Cook carrots, covered, in small amount slightly salted water, about 15 minutes.", "Add green pepper, cover and cook 3 minutes more.", "Drain pineapple; save juice.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch and salt; stir in reserved juice, vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook and stir until bubbly.", "Stir in vegetables and pineapple; heat thoroughly."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["1 large can pineapple chunks, drained", "1 c. sugar", "6 Tbsp. flour", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 pkg. crushed Ritz crackers", "3/4 stick melted margarine"]
directions: ["Mix", "first", "4 ingredients together and put in casserole dish. Put Ritz crackers on top and melted margarine on top of crackers. Bake 20 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 bottle ketchup", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1/2 stick margarine", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Shake well.", "This sauce is good on chicken."]

title: Rhubarb Pie
ingredients: ["4 c. rhubarb, cut in 1/2-inch pieces", "1/4 c. sugar", "6 Tbsp. flour", "1/3 c. honey", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. grated lemon peel", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Combine dry ingredients.", "Add honey; let stand a few minutes. Use two pie crusts, with slits in the top crust.", "Begin baking at 450\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Reduce heat to 350\u00b0 and cook until crust is golden brown.", "Cool a few minutes before serving."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3 Tbsp. ketchup", "3 Tbsp. curry powder", "salt (optional)", "drop of onion or garlic juice"]
directions: ["Blend together and allow to sit for at least 2 hours (best overnight).", "Will keep for weeks in a closed container in the refrigerator.", "Serve with carrot strips.", "Other veggies are good also but it is best with carrots."]

title: Sumter Salad Dressing(From Barbara'S Downstairs Tea Room)
ingredients: ["1/2 c. oil", "1/4 c. red wine vinegar", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/3 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/3 c. chopped onion", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients and refrigerate.", "Serve over spinach salad made of spinach leaves, chopped eggs, crumbled, cooked bacon and sliced fresh mushrooms."]

title: Bleu Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["4 oz. Bleu cheese", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise or Miracle Whip", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Mix Bleu cheese and cream cheese.", "Add rest of ingredients. Mix well.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Makes 3 1/2 cups."]

title: Caramel Corn
ingredients: ["1 c. brown sugar", "1/3 plus 1/3 c. corn syrup", "1/2 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "4 qt. popped corn", "2 c. unsalted peanuts"]
directions: ["Mix together all ingredients (except popcorn).", "Grease 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan.", "Put in popcorn and coat with mix and bake for 8 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

directions: ["Mix first 4 ingredients together and press into pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Then beat remaining ingredients together. Fold in Cool Whip, then beat until mixed.", "Pour on top of cooled crust.", "Top with fruit (your choice)."]

title: Sour Cream Beets
ingredients: ["1/4 c. sour cream", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "3/4 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. onion, grated", "dash of cayenne pepper", "2 1/2 c. cooked beets, cut in cubes"]
directions: ["Mix the first 6 ingredients well.", "Carefully stir in beets. Heat slowly, stirring often.", "Serve warm or cold.", "Serves 4 to 5."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies

directions: ["Cream margarine, sugar and vanilla.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Form into small cookies.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 6 to 10 minutes.", "Makes 3 dozen."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks margarine or butter", "1/2 c. granulated sugar", "1 1/2 to 1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. potato chips (equals 1 c. before crushing)", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix in order given.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar while warm."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can sauerkraut, drained", "1/2 cup green pepper", "1/2 cup onion, chopped", "1/2 cup celery, chopped", "1/2 cup oil", "1/2 cup vinegar", "1 cup sugar"]
directions: ["Toss all ingredients together in a bowl.", "Let stand refrigerated for at least 12 hours."]

title: Mushroom Sandwich Filling
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. mushrooms, chopped fine", "1 stick butter or margarine", "3 dashes Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 c. heavy cream", "salt", "1 Tbsp. flour"]
directions: ["Saute mushrooms in butter or margarine.", "Add Worcestershire sauce while cooking.", "Add heavy cream and salt to taste.", "Thicken mixture with flour, adding additional flour, if needed. Refrigerate.", "This filling is best made the day before using."]

title: Pecan Sandies
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter or margarine, softened", "4 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. sifted flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix in order given.", "Roll into small balls, not more than 1-inch wide.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 10 minutes on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Do not allow to brown.", "Roll in confectioners sugar while still warm."]

title: Grape Salad
ingredients: ["4 c. seedless grapes", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 1/2 c. pecans", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "6 Tbsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, sour cream and mayonnaise. Add sugar. Stir in grapes and pecans. Chill."]

title: Russian Wedding Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine (sweet)", "1/4 c. honey", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and add honey, flour, salt and vanilla.", "Mix well and add pecans.", "Form into small balls.", "Place on greased baking sheets.", "Bake in 300\u00b0", "oven for 40 to 45 minutes.", "Roll in powdered sugar while still hot.", "Roll again in powdered sugar when cool."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. margarine or butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 c. crushed potato chips", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["With mixer, cream the sugar and margarine.", "Add other ingredients one at a time.", "Roll dough in small balls; press with fork.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes until brown at edges. Sprinkle with powdered sugar while warm."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Put cheese ball in refrigerator to chill, then roll in 1 cup chopped pecans."]

title: Lite Vegetable Spread
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. fat-free cream cheese", "1/2 c. fat-free cottage cheese", "1/2 c. finely grated carrots", "1/2 tsp. finely grated onion", "1/8 tsp. black pepper", "3 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 tsp. celery salt", "1/8 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients together in a food processor.", "Spread on crackers or use as a dip with raw veggies."]

title: Gooba
ingredients: ["1/2 c. medium barley", "1 large onion, diced", "6 oz. mushrooms, diced", "3/4 c. chicken stock", "3 Tbsp. margarine", "garlic powder"]
directions: ["Rinse barley 3 times; parboil 1 1/2 hours, then rinse and drain.", "Saute onions until clear in margarine.", "Add mushrooms to onions; saute until mushrooms are tender.", "Combine onions, mushrooms, barley and chicken stock.", "Pour into greased baking dish.", "Sprinkle with garlic powder.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 3/4 hour."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 to 1 1/4 c. pecans, finely chopped", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add well drained pineapple and rest of ingredients.", "Wrap in wax paper to chill.", "Reserve some of the nuts to roll ball in after it has chilled."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, diagonally sliced", "1 medium green pepper, seeded and cut in 1-inch sq.", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks in their own juice", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["In saucepan, cook carrots, covered in small amount of lightly salted water, until just tender (15 minutes).", "Add green pepper; cover and cook 3 minutes more.", "Drain.", "Drain the pineapple, reserving juice.", "Add water to make 1/3 cup of liquid.", "In saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir in pineapple liquid, vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook and stir until bubbly.", "Stir in vegetables and pineapple.", "Heat through.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Instant Sweet Sliced Pickles
ingredients: ["7 c. sliced pickles (raw cukes)", "1 c. sliced green pepper (optional)", "1 c. sliced onion", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. celery seed", "1/4 tsp. celery salt", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Mix pickles, green pepper, onion and salt; let stand for 2 hours.", "Drain thoroughly."]

title: Acorn Squash
ingredients: ["1 medium acorn squash", "3 Tbsp. sour cream", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 thin sliced onion", "salt and pepper to taste", "sausage"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Halve squash and remove seeds.", "Bake, cut side down, in pan, containing 1/2-inch of water.", "Remove from oven when tender, but not too soft.", "Scoop out of shell into blender; cool slightly, then add sour cream, butter, onion and seasonings. Cover and blend until smooth.", "Mound into shells.", "Return to pan with 1/2-inch water.", "Top with slices of your favorite sausage and bake for 10 minutes.", "Place under broiler and brown."]

title: Celery Seed Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 small onion, grated", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. celery seed"]
