title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. chips, crushed", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix together and drop by teaspoonful onto baking sheet.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Chewy Cheese Bars
ingredients: ["1 butter cake mix", "1 stick melted margarine", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix the first 3 items together and spread in a 9 x 13-inch pan."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or oleo", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. nuts, broken", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Drop onto cookie sheet; flatten with fork.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until done."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 1/2 c. pecans, finely chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Cream the cream cheese and pineapple.", "Add all other ingredients and mix well.", "Form the mixture into a ball.", "Roll in crushed pecans.", "Refrigerate.", "Serve with snack crackers."]

title: Texas Trash
ingredients: ["4 c. Rice Chex", "4 c. Wheat Chex", "4 c. Corn Chex", "24 oz. can salted mixed nuts", "3 c. pretzels, broken", "1 c. oil", "1 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 Tbsp. garlic salt"]
directions: ["Mix oil, Worcestershire and garlic salt.", "Mix cereals, nuts and pretzels, then mix all together.", "Bake 2 hours at 250\u00b0, stirring every 15 minutes.", "After first hour, add 3 cups Cheerios."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small jar Roka Blue cheese", "1 small jar sharp cheese", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 c. chopped nuts, dried beef or parsley"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and roll in nuts, dried beef or parsley."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 large Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 c. coarsely crushed pretzels", "1/4 c. sugar (scant)", "1 stick melted margarine or butter", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. Cool Whip (medium carton)"]
directions: ["Combine the first 2 ingredients in saucepan.", "Let come to boil.", "Stir often.", "Set aside to cool.", "Mix the pretzels, 1/4 cup sugar and melted margarine together well.", "Press into a 10 x 6 1/2-inch baking dish.", "Blend cheese and 1/2 cup sugar until fluffy.", "Blend in Cool Whip.", "Spread over pretzel mixture.", "Spread first mixture over all.", "Chill several hours."]

title: Butter Balls
ingredients: ["4 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. butter", "4 Tbsp. 10x sugar", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. chopped walnuts", "10x sugar (for rolling)"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla until fluffy.", "Add flour; blend well.", "Fold in nuts.", "Roll into 1-inch balls. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 18 minutes, until slightly browned.", "Remove and cool slightly.", "Roll cookies in 10x sugar while still warm.", "Makes approximately 4 dozen."]

title: Grape Salad
ingredients: ["3 lb. seedless grapes (green or red)", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. sugar (more or less to taste)", "1 (8 oz.) sour cream", "pecans, chopped (depends on you)", "1 c. pecans", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "2 tsp. butter"]
directions: ["Cook until well coated (not runny); let stand until cool. Put on top of grape mixture or put chopped pecans."]

title: Ladyfingers
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. nuts", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Roll and place on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Roll in powdered sugar while warm."]

title: Barley Pilaf
ingredients: ["3/4 c. finely chopped onion", "3/4 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1 qt. chicken stock", "1/4 lb. butter or margarine", "1 3/4 c. barley, washed until water is clear", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Saute onions in 3 tablespoons butter 4 to 5 minutes.", "Add mushrooms; saute a few more minutes and remove from pan.", "Brown barley in remainder of butter, stirring often.", "Put in casserole; add onions and mushrooms, salt and 2 cups chicken stock.", "Bake, covered, in 350\u00b0 oven for 1/2 hour.", "Add remaining stock; stir and bake 1/2 hour longer.", "Serves 10."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 medium onion", "1 medium green pepper", "3/4 c. chopped celery", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. oil", "1 jar sauerkraut, drained"]
directions: ["Combine chopped vegetables and sauerkraut. Mix vinegar, oil and sugar.", "Pour dressing over salad and mix. Let set overnight."]

title: Butterballs
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt together; work in butter and vanilla.", "Add nuts; mix well.", "Shape into 1/2-inch balls.", "Place on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake in moderate oven, 350\u00b0, for about 40 minutes.", "Remove from oven and roll cookies in powdered sugar while warm.", "Expensive, but delicious and keeps well."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks margarine", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add rest of ingredients and mix. Drop by teaspoon on slightly greased cookie sheet.", "Flatten.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar while warm."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Roll
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["In medium bowl with fork, beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup pecans, the green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into a ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic wrap or foil.", "Refrigerate until well chilled."]

title: Copper Pennies
ingredients: ["1 bag carrots", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1/2 Tbsp. mustard", "1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 Tbsp. salt and pepper", "1/2 c. green pepper", "1/2 c. onion"]
directions: ["Cook carrots until slightly tender.", "Drain; let cool.", "Mix remaining ingredients and pour over vegetables.", "Marinate overnight.", "Will keep indefinitely in the refrigerator."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped nuts (reserve 1 c.)", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Divide into two balls.", "Roll in cup of nuts.", "Chill overnight for easier rolling."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 small onion", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. or less vinegar", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1 c. cream or milk", "1 1/2 to 2 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in blender and blend until smooth.", "Will keep in refrigerator for 2 weeks.", "Serve over lettuce, cabbage, etc."]

title: Cauliflower Dip
ingredients: ["2 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "grated onion", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "salt", "dash of ginger"]
directions: ["Mix well.", "Use raw cauliflower and dip in the mixture."]

title: Heavenly Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["3/4 c sugar", "2/3 c heavy cream", "3 Tbsp light corn syrup", "4 oz unsweetened chocolate, chopped", "3 Tbsp butter", "1 tsp vanilla extract"]
directions: ["In a small saucepan, combine sugar, heavy cream and corn syrup. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently with a wooden spoon, for about 3 minutes or until sugar is dissolved. Stir in chocolate and butter with a wire whisk until completely blended and smooth, Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract. Makes 1 3/4 cups."]

title: Cheese Triangles
ingredients: ["1 frozen bread (sandwich style)", "8 oz. cream cheese", "3 tsp. grated onion", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives", "1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except bread, until spreadable.", "Spread on frozen bread slices 1/4-inch thick.", "Trim crusts off.", "Cut in fourths (triangles).", "Freeze, unbaked, on cookie sheet.", "Once frozen, can bag in a Ziploc bag.", "Bake later.", "Spread out frozen on a cookie sheet and bake at 375\u00b0 for 5 to 10 minutes (until light and crispy)."]

title: Gooseberry Pie
ingredients: ["pastry for 2 crusts", "4 c. gooseberries, washed and stemmed", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 450\u00b0.", "Roll out one crust to fit 9-inch pie pan.", "Mix the berries, sugar, tapioca and salt together in large bowl.", "Pour into prepared shell.", "Dot filling with butter.", "Roll out remaining crust to form top crust.", "Place over filling. Moisten, seal and flute edges; cut slits in top.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Reduce heat to 350\u00b0.", "Bake an additional 30 minutes, or until crust is golden brown."]

title: Popcorn Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. popcorn", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. peanuts (optional)", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. molasses", "1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Pop the corn to make about 12 cups.", "Place in a large bowl; remove imperfect kernels and sprinkle with salt.", "Place butter, molasses and sugar in a saucepan and stir over low heat only long enough for sugar to dissolve.", "Simmer until syrup cracks against side of glass when tested in cold water.", "Pour over corn.", "Add peanuts, if desired, and form into balls with fingers."]

title: Pretzel Salad 1
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) bag pretzels", "1 stick butter", "6 Tbsp. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip", "1 c. sugar", "1 can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Crush pretzels in a square baking dish. Cut stick of butter into 5 or 6 pieces and lay on top of pretzels.", "Sprinkle sugar over pretzels and butter.", "Bake for 10 minutes.", "Stir and press into crust.", "Let cool."]

title: Caramel Corn
ingredients: ["12 qt. plain popped corn", "1 lb. peanuts", "2 c. butter or oleo", "1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 c. molasses", "2 lb. packed brown sugar"]
directions: ["Place popcorn in two large bowls.", "Mix nuts with each bowl. In a 5-quart saucepan, combine remaining ingredients.", "Bring to a boil over medium heat; boil and stir for five minutes.", "Pour half of syrup over each bowl of popcorn and stir to coat."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball

directions: ["Let cream cheese stand at room temperature to soften.", "Cream the cream cheese and pineapple.", "When smooth, add 1 cup pecans, pepper, onions and seasoned salt.", "Chill mixture well.", "Form into a ball and roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill until served."]

title: Bacon Spread
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "8 oz. bacon", "1/2 green pepper, chopped", "1 c. sour cream", "1/2 medium onion, chopped", "chopped walnuts"]

title: Family Living Special Wedding Cookies

directions: ["Cream margarine, sugar, salt and vanilla together.", "Add flour and pecans.", "Mix well.", "Roll into walnut sized balls.", "Bake on cookie sheet for about 1 hour at 275\u00b0.", "Remove from oven; roll into confectioners sugar.", "Cool and roll in confectioners sugar again.", "Makes about 4 dozen cookies."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies

directions: ["Mix margarine, vanilla and sugar.", "Add flour, pecans and potato chips.", "Mix well.", "Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 18 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Log
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "6 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 1/2 c. pecans", "1 tsp. garlic salt"]
directions: ["Mix all together and refrigerate overnight."]

title: Mexican Wedding Cookies

directions: ["Mix ingredients.", "Roll and put in refrigerator.", "Cut into thin slices.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until done.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

directions: ["Separate onion slices into rings.", "Combine all ingredients, except mushrooms, in small pan.", "Bring to boil.", "Meanwhile, wash and boil mushrooms.", "Add to mixture in saucepan after drained. Simmer 5 to 6 minutes.", "Cool and chill in a covered bowl for several hours."]

title: French Dressing

directions: ["Mix in blender or processor.", "Chill and serve."]

title: Cream Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. drained crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt (optional)", "pecans or walnuts to roll in (optional)"]
directions: ["Chill and serve on crackers."]

title: Chicken And Strawberry Salad

directions: ["Blend all ingredients together in a small bowl and set aside."]

directions: ["Stir sugar in sauerkraut.", "Let stand 1/2 hour.", "Stir in other ingredients.", "Refrigerate overnight."]

directions: ["Mix melted butter, flour and sugar together. Then stir in remaining ingredients.", "Roll in balls and refrigerate for 3-4 hours.", "Cook at 350\u00b0 for 12-15 minutes.", "Roll in powdered sugar."]

directions: ["Pour ingredients over sliced peaches in 9-inch pie crust. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes, then at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes or until set and lightly browned."]

title: Butterscotch Sauce
ingredients: ["1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 1/4 c. brown sugar, packed", "1/2 c. light cream", "2 Tbsp. corn syrup", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In a 1 1/2-quart casserole, stir together cornstarch and brown sugar.", "Stir in cream, corn syrup and salt.", "Add butter.", "Cook, covered, on High 4 1/2 to 5 1/2 minutes, stirring after 2 minutes, until sugar is dissolved and sauce is thickened.", "Add vanilla and stir.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups."]

title: Barbecue Sauce

directions: ["Mix all ingredients and simmer on low heat at least 30 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add 1 cup of pecans and all other ingredients.", "Chill at least 1 hour.", "Roll in rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve.", "Makes 1 large or 2 medium size balls."]

title: Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add pecans, potato chips and vanilla. Add flour.", "Roll into balls.", "Press flat with the bottom of a juice glass that has been dipped in sugar.", "Bake for 14 to 15 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: French Dressing
ingredients: ["1 small onion, grated", "1/2 c. sugar (scant)", "1 c. oil", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. ketchup", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 lemon (juice)"]
directions: ["Blend all in blender.", "Store in jar in refrigerator indefinitely.", "Yields about 1 pint."]

title: Squash Pickle
ingredients: ["8 c. thinly sliced squash", "2 c. thinly chopped onion", "2 tsp. mustard seed", "3 c. sugar", "4 bell peppers, chopped", "2 tsp. celery seed", "2 c. vinegar", "2 heaping Tbsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine", "squash,", "onion", "and bell pepper. Sprinkle with salt. Let stand 1 hour;", "drain well.", "Combine vinegar, celery seed and mustard", "seed", "in", "a pan.", "Bring to a boil.", "Add the squash mixture", "and bring to a hard boil, about 1 minute.\tNow it's ready for the jars."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 onion, minced", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1 Tbsp. chili powder", "4 Tbsp. brown sugar", "4 Tbsp. vinegar", "4 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 c. ketchup", "1 tsp. Tabasco"]
directions: ["Melt butter; add onion and garlic and cook over medium heat until onion is clear.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Turn down to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes."]

title: Cheese Olive Balls
ingredients: ["1 (5 oz.) jar Old English sharp cheese spread", "1 large jar stuffed olives", "1 stick margarine", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "dash of Tabasco", "dash of Worcestershire sauce", "dash of garlic salt"]
directions: ["Have cheese and margarine at room temperature; blend well. Mix in seasonings thoroughly.", "Cut in flour (best to crumble by hand).", "Chill dough for 20 minutes.", "Drain the olives.", "Pinch off small pieces of dough; roll around olives.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Serve."]

title: Carrot Casserole
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. carrots, sliced", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. horseradish", "1/4 tsp. salt", "dash of black pepper", "1/4 c. crackers (approximately 7)", "2 tsp. butter or margarine, melted"]
directions: ["Cook carrots until tender (drain).", "Place in a casserole. Combine mayonnaise, onion, horseradish, salt and pepper.", "Spoon over carrots.", "Mix crumbs and butter or margarine.", "Sprinkle on top.", "Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes at 350\u00b0 or until hot."]

title: Caramels

directions: ["Melt butter.", "Add corn syrup and sugar.", "Boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly.", "Add 1 1/2", "cans of sweetened condensed milk. Mix flour with remaining 1/2 can sweetened condensed milk.", "Add to sugar mixture.", "Boil until hard boil, 255 degrees on a candy thermometer, stirring constantly.", "Add vanilla and pour into buttered dish (15 x 10 x 2).", "Let cool then cut into 1 inch squares and wrap individually."]

title: Vinegar And Oil Dressing
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. vinegar", "2/3 c. oil", "2 Tbsp. black pepper", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. salt", "garlic if you like"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in blender.", "Keep in bottles in refrigerator."]

title: Sweet And Sour Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 (13 1/4 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 small green pepper, coarsely chopped"]
directions: ["Bring to a boil and let simmer slowly for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Caramel Corn
ingredients: ["12 qt. plain popped popcorn", "1 lb. peanuts", "2 c. butter", "2 lb. packed brown sugar", "1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 c. molasses"]
directions: ["Place popcorn in 2 large bowls.", "Mix 1/2 pound nuts into each bowl.", "In a 5-quart saucepan, combine remaining ingredients.", "Bring to a boil over medium heat; boil and stir for 5 minutes.", "Pour half of syrup over each bowl of popcorn and stir to coat.", "Turn coated popcorn into a large roasting pan.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Remove from the oven and break apart while warm.", "Cool. Store in airtight containers.", "Yields 12 quarts."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, except for 1 cup of chopped pecans.", "Form into ball and roll in remaining pecans."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball

directions: ["Mix softened cream cheese with all ingredients except use only 1/2 of the nuts in the mixture.", "Roll the cheese ball in the remaining nuts."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 to 1 c. chopped pecans (to roll ball in)"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients except 1/2 to 1 cup of pecans.", "Form into 1 large or 2 small cheese balls.", "Mixture will be sticky. Using your hands, roll in chopped pecans until outside is covered. Refrigerate until ready to serve."]

title: Toffee Bars

Boil margarine, butter, sugar and vanilla together on low heat until bubbly. Slowly pour boiled mixture", "over crackers.", "Top with chopped nuts. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 8 minutes."]

title: Hot Bittersweet Sauce
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter or oleo", "1 1/2 sq. chocolate, cut small", "1/4 c. cocoa", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. cream or milk", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Melt the butter or oleo and chocolate in a saucepan until smooth over low heat.", "Stir in the cocoa, sugar, cream and salt. Bring slowly to just a boil; do not stir.", "Remove from heat.", "Add vanilla and serve warm.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 large and 1 small pkg. Philadelphia brand cream cheese, softened", "1 Tbsp. sharp cream cheese", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 small chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. sour cream or onion dip", "dash of Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Cream together with 1/2 package of chipped beef (chopped). Top and cover with 1/2 package of chipped beef over the ball. Make day before using."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Mix all ingredients except pecans.", "Chill the mixture until it becomes firm.", "Shape into two balls and roll each in the crushed pecans.", "Chill until ready to serve.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese. Add pineapple, green pepper, 1 cup nuts, onion and seasoned salt. Chill well, then form mixture into a ball. Roll cheese ball in remaining pecan pieces."]

title: Teri'S Party Ball

directions: ["Mix all together and form into a ball.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (2 lb.) bag sauerkraut, rinsed and drained thoroughly", "1 c. diced celery", "1 diced green pepper", "1 finely chopped onion", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 1/2 c. sugar (granulated)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well.", "Let stand overnight (at least 24 hours).", "This will keep for weeks."]

title: Microwave Hot Fudge Sauce

directions: ["Mix dry ingredients in 2-cup measure or 1-quart casserole. Stir in water.", "Cook on Full power 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.", "Stir halfway through cooking time.", "Blend in butter.", "Cook Full power for 30 seconds or until butter is melted.", "Stir halfway.", "Blend in vanilla and serve."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["2 large cans of sauerkraut, drained and rinsed", "1 large green pepper, chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 c celery, chopped", "1-1/4 c sugar", "1/2 c vinegar", "1/2 c oil"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Refrigerate for 24 hours."]

title: Island Teriyaki
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soy sauce", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 1/2 lb. round steak (frozen)", "1 tsp. dry ginger", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "2 cloves garlic"]
directions: ["Slice steak in 1/4-inch wide strips while still frozen. Marinate in mixture of soy sauce, brown sugar, olive oil, ginger, pepper and garlic.", "Leave overnight in refrigerator.", "Put on bamboo skewers, weaving meat every 2 inches.", "Put on barbecue. Cook to taste."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 onion, chopped", "1 c. sugar", "2/3 c. vinegar", "2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. celery seed", "2 tsp. mustard", "2 c. oil"]
directions: ["Place onion, sugar, vinegar, salt, celery seed and mustard in blender.", "Blend thoroughly.", "Add oil and blend again.", "Great."]

title: Rhubarb Crunch
ingredients: ["3 c. rhubarb", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. oatmeal", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. margarine", "1/2 c. shortening"]
directions: ["Put first 3 ingredients in greased cake pan.", "Mix remaining ingredients.", "Crumble over rhubarb in pan.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 until brown."]

title: Cheese Ball

directions: ["Soften cream cheese; add rest of ingredients except 1 cup pecans.", "Chill, then form into ball and roll in chopped pecans; chill again.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Savory London Broil
ingredients: ["3 1/2 lb. London broil", "2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "4 Tbsp. ketchup", "1 tsp. minced garlic", "1 Tbsp. oil"]
directions: ["Rinse London broil in water; pat dry.", "Place London broil in skillet with oil.", "Brown very well on both sides, over medium heat.", "Transfer beef to a crock-pot."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (5 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple well and mix with softened cream cheese, pepper, onion and salt; stir in half the nuts.", "Make a ball.", "Roll ball in remaining nuts and chill.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Popcorn Balls
ingredients: ["2 gallons popped corn", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. corn syrup", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 c. salted peanuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Boil sugar, syrup, and butter together until brittle when tested in cold water.", "Add vinegar and remove from heat.", "Have popped corn ready with all hard grains removed.", "Scatter peanuts over not of popcorn if desired.", "Gradually but quickly pour the syrup over the popcorn and stir briskly until corn is well coated. While still warm, form into figures with molds or form into balls. Keep in a dry, room temperature place to keep fresh and crisp."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["4 sticks margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "2/3 c. pecans, chopped", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Miller'S Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["4 c. shredded carrots", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. celery, diced tiny", "1 c. raisins", "3/4 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Mix carrots with sugar and salt and let stand 1 hour.", "Place in large strainer.", "Add celery and raisins; let stand 30 minutes. Stir in mayonnaise.", "Let stand in strainer 20 minutes more so mayonnaise can drain.", "Serve in scoops on lettuce.", "Serves 6."]

title: Harvard Beets(Boiled)
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. margarine", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. vinegar", "3/4 tsp. cornstarch", "2 1/4 Tbsp. sugar", "1 large can beets, drained"]
directions: ["Prepare butter, cornstarch, salt, sugar and vinegar as for a medium white sauce, then add beets and heat thoroughly."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/3 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Combine first 6 ingredients in bowl; blend thoroughly.", "Form into balls.", "Roll in finely chopped nuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Kipplens
ingredients: ["2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "5 c. flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add flour, vanilla, pecans and salt. Mix well.", "Roll dough into 1-inch balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 17 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned.", "You can roll slightly cooled cookies in confectioners sugar or eat plain."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 (6 oz.) cans sliced beets", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 stick margarine", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar", "dash of salt (optional)"]
directions: ["Drain", "beets,", "reserve", "1/2", "cup liquid. Cook together, sugar, cornstarch, margarine, vinegar and beet juice and salt. Stir constantly until thickened; add beets and cook 5 minutes, covered, on medium heat.", "Stir occasionally to prevent sticking."]

title: Dressing For Slaw
ingredients: ["1/4 c. grated onion", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. celery seed", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix together and toss over a head of shredded cabbage."]

title: Pecan Fingers
ingredients: ["1/4 lb. butter", "1 c. plain flour", "pinch of salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Melt butter and add all ingredients.", "Shape into fingers and bake 30 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Children really enjoy these."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 lg. can sauerkraut (drained and rinsed)", "1 green pepper - chopped", "1 c. celery - chopped", "1 c. onion - chopped", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. oil", "1/2 c. vinegar", "salt & pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix first four ingredients in large bowl.", "Set aside.", "Put remaining ingredients in a saucepan and bring to a boil.", "Pour this mixture over the ingredients in large bowl."]

title: Toffee Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 c. butter", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 large Hershey bar or 10 small bars", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cram the butter and add sugar and egg yolk.", "Mix well.", "Add flour and vanilla.", "Spread in a 10 x 14-inch ungreased shallow pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Place the candy bar which has been broken into small pieces on top of this and spread as it melts.", "Sprinkle with chopped nuts.", "Cut while warm.", "Makes 3 dozen bars."]

title: Chocolate Gravy
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "6 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and let boil until thickened.", "Remove from heat and serve over hot biscuits."]

title: Swedish Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk, slightly beaten", "1 c. flour", "1/2 c. walnuts, ground", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar until light.", "Add egg yolk and mix well.", "Add vanilla and sifted flour.", "Roll dough into small ball and dip into egg white which has been slightly beaten.", "Roll in walnuts.", "Put on greased baking sheet and press down center with handle of knife.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until light brown.", "While still warm, put apple jelly in each center."]

title: Toffee Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. butter, softened", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 (4 oz.) bar chocolate candy", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Mix brown sugar, butter, egg yolk and vanilla.", "Stir in flour and salt.", "Press into greased oblong pan, 13 x 9 x 2-inch."]

title: Polish Teacakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 egg yolk, slightly beaten", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar until light.", "Add egg yolk; mix well. Add flour and salt; mix.", "Roll dough in small balls; dip in unbeaten egg white.", "Roll in finely chopped nuts.", "Place on buttered baking sheet; press down center of each with thimble. Bake in a 325\u00b0 oven for 5 minutes.", "Remove; press down again with thimble.", "Return to oven for about 10 to 15 minutes.", "Remove from oven; fill indents with preserves while hot."]

title: Toffee Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar, sifted", "2 c. flour, sifted", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. salt", "1 egg yolk", "10 (1 oz.) Hershey candy bars"]
directions: ["Cream together butter and brown sugar; gradually add salt, egg yolk and flour, beating smooth after each addition.", "Spread batter on cookie sheet.", "Bake 20 to 25 minutes in 325\u00b0 oven.", "Remove from oven and break Hershey bars into pieces.", "Place on top until melted.", "Spread and add pecans.", "Cool."]

title: Cha-Han(Fried Rice)
ingredients: ["3 c. cooked rice (not Minute type)", "1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1/2 onion, diced", "1 c. parboiled carrots, diced", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Saute onion in oil until golden.", "Stir in rice.", "Heat through and add remaining ingredients.", "For a creamy effect, break an egg over the rice and mix it well into the rice.", "The Japanese add any vegetable or cooked meat to Cha-Han, as they are available. Serves 4 to 5."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks margarine, softened", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 to 1 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar until well blended.", "Add flour gradually.", "Stir in vanilla, potato chips and pecans.", "Drop by spoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes.", "Sprinkle with confectioners sugar when cool."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. sauerkraut, drained", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1 c. green pepper, chopped", "1/2 c. onion, chopped", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1/3 c. vegetable oil", "1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Heat", "vinegar,\toil and sugar to", "boiling", "point.", "Pour over combined sauerkraut, celery, green pepper and onion.", "Let stand (covered) in refrigerator overnight."]

title: Pickled Beets
ingredients: ["4 cans sliced beets, drained", "1 large onion, sliced thin", "2 c. vinegar", "3 c. sugar", "1/4 c. salt", "3 tsp. celery salt"]
directions: ["Heat the vinegar, sugar, salt and celery salt.", "Pour over the beets and onion.", "Refrigerate mixture and serve cold.", "Keeps very well.", "(This is very good to take on picnics.)"]

title: Raisin Penuche Icing
ingredients: ["1/3 c. butter", "1/3 c. brown sugar", "1/3 c. light cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. chopped nuts", "3/4 c. coarsely cut raisins"]
directions: ["Combine and bring to a full boil over medium heat.", "Remove from heat.", "Gradually stir in 2 cups sifted powdered sugar until of velvety, spreading consistency.", "Spread on cooked raisin-applesauce cake."]

title: Rhubarb Crunch
ingredients: ["6 c. diced rhubarb", "6 Tbsp. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. flour", "1 c. oatmeal", "8 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Mix first 3 ingredients in bowl and put in 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix next 4 ingredients like pie crust and sprinkle on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes or until top is brown."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 c. nuts (optional)", "3/4 c. crushed potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream together butter and sugar.", "Add rest of ingredients; mix well."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1/4 c. sugar", "1. Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 tsp. instant minced onion", "2- 16 oz. cans sliced beets, drained"]
directions: ["In a small saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt; slowly pour in vinegar; add margarine and minced onion.", "Over medium heat, cook until thickened, stirring constantly.", "Reduce heat to low and add beets.", "Cook until heated, stirring occasionally."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can kraut, drained", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. oil", "3/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix together; refrigerate overnight and serve."]

title: Dressing For Spinach Salad
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 c. oil", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/3 c. ketchup", "1 medium onion"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and blend in blender until creamy.", "Cool and pour over spinach, mushrooms, boiled eggs and cooked bacon."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 can (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "1 Tbsp. (I put sugar in my pineapple)", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["In medium bowl, with fork, beat cream cheese until smooth. Drain and stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into a ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic, refrigerate overnight."]

title: Sour Cream Fudge
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "pinch of salt", "1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream", "butter or margarine", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. chopped pecans (optional)"]
directions: ["Combine sugar, salt and sour cream in a buttered heavy saucepan.", "Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture reaches soft ball stage or candy thermometer registers 234\u00b0.", "Remove from heat; stir in 2 tablespoons butter.", "Beat at high speed with an electric mixer until mixture thickens and begins to lose its gloss (4 to 5 minutes).", "Stir in pecans, if desired.", "Pour into a buttered 8-inch square baking pan or dish; chill until firm.", "Store in an airtight container at room temperature."]

title: Crunchy Brunchy
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. butter", "5 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 1/2 Tbsp. honey", "2 c. uncooked oatmeal", "1/2 c. raisins", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 440\u00b0.", "Grease small cookie sheet.", "Melt together in a large pan over low heat the butter, brown sugar and honey.", "Stir until sugar is melted.", "Remove from heat; mix in the oatmeal, raisins and nuts.", "Spread mixture on greased cookie sheet; bake until well browned.", "Take pan out; set aside to cool. (I mix occasionally while browning.)", "Crumble into small pieces with your hands.", "Store in tightly closed can or plastic bag. Serve in a bowl with lots of cold milk, or eat as a snack."]

title: Onion Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. white vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 medium onion, chopped"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in blender for 20 seconds, until creamy. Stir in 1 teaspoon celery seed.", "Yields 1 1/2 pints."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 heaping c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 stick melted butter", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) small carton Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sugar", "15 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained (save juice)", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix crushed pretzels, 1/2 cup sugar and melted butter together.", "Pat out in pan and bake 5 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Mix the cream cheese, Cool Whip and 1/2 cup sugar together.", "Spread mixture on top of crust."]

title: M. B.'S Baked Spaghetti Dish
ingredients: ["1 large onion", "1 green pepper", "1 small box mushrooms, sliced", "1 lb. spaghetti", "1/2 lb. cottage cheese", "4 oz. cream cheese", "1 bottle ketchup"]
directions: ["Saute onion, green pepper and mushrooms.", "Cook spaghetti.", "Mix cottage cheese and cream cheese with hot spaghetti; add onion, pepper and mushrooms to mixture.", "Add ketchup and mix together. Put in a casserole dish.", "Bake in a greased casserole dish at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia brand cream cheese", "1 flat can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely diced green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cheese.", "Mix ingredients, using 1 cup nuts.", "Chill. Form a ball and roll in remaining 1 cup nuts."]

title: Rhubarb Crunch
ingredients: ["3 c. rhubarb, diced", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. oatmeal", "2 cubes margarine"]
directions: ["Put rhubarb, 3 tablespoons flour and 1 cup sugar in a 2-quart baking dish.", "Blend 1 1/2 cups flour, brown sugar, oatmeal and margarine.", "Sprinkle topping over rhubarb mixture.", "Bake for 30 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

title: Toffee Squares
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter, softened", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk, beaten", "2 c. flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 (8 oz.) chocolate bar (Hershey)", "1 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and egg yolk well. Add salt, vanilla and flour. Put on cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes. While hot, break chocolate and place on top.", "Sprinkle nuts on top, then cut into squares while hot."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. crushed pretzels", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "20 oz. can drained, crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Melt 1 stick margarine.", "Combine with sugar and pretzels. Stir together and bake at 400\u00b0 for 7 minutes.", "Remove, stir and cool.", "Using mixer, combine cream cheese with sugar, into this fold Cool Whip and pineapple.", "Mix all together including cooled mixture of pretzels.", "Chill before serving."]

title: Teriyaki Steak
ingredients: ["1 c. lite soy sauce", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 round steak or chuck steak", "Worcestershire sauce to taste (approximately 1/8 tsp.)", "garlic powder to taste (1/4 tsp.)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Cut steak into serving size portions and place on cookie sheet.", "Pour marinade over pieces, turning meat to cover both sides.", "Marinate overnight in refrigerator.", "In morning, remove from refrigerator and let stand at room temperature for an hour or two before cooking, turning frequently.", "Grill until desired doneness."]

title: Paul'S Pineapple Pudding
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) can sliced pineapple", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Drain sliced pineapple; reserve juice and use for another purpose such as adding to orange juice for breakfast.", "Place slices in the bottom of a baking dish; they fit in a 10-inch ceramic pan.", "Sprinkle with brown sugar."]

title: Marinade(Great On Chicken)
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. olive oil (almost 1/3 c.)", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. Grey Poupon mustard", "1 to 2 cloves crushed garlic", "juice of 1/2 lemon (1 Tbsp.)", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Marinate overnight for best results and baste while grilling."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1 c. chopped nuts (pecans)", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix and form into balls.", "Can roll in nuts or use as spread in a bowl."]

title: Red Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2 c. ketchup", "1 1/2 c. oil", "6 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 medium onion, chopped"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and beat with a mixer for 10 minutes. Just like the kind at the pizza shop."]

title: Baked Pineapple Salad
ingredients: ["2 20 oz pineapple chunks", "1/2 c sugar", "1/2 c flour", "2 c grated sharp cheese", "2 c Ritz crackers", "1 stick margarine"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple, mix with flour and sugar. Melt margarine. Stir in crushed crackers, layer in casserole dish; 1/2 crackers, mixture, cheese, 1/2 crackers. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Cornbread Salad
ingredients: ["2 pkg. cornbread, cooked and crumbled", "8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled", "1 onion, chopped", "1/2 green pepper, chopped", "1/2 c. celery, chopped", "1 c. mayonnaise", "salt and pepper as desired"]
directions: ["Combine and toss well."]

title: Make Ahead Lettuce Salad
ingredients: ["1 head iceberg lettuce, torn", "1 large onion, chopped", "1/2 c. celery, chopped", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped", "8 oz. (1 can) sliced water chestnuts (drained)", "10 oz. (1 pkg.) peas (frozen), thawed", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/3 c. Parmesan cheese, shredded", "4 strips bacon, cooked"]
directions: ["In a 6-quart bowl, layer half of the lettuce, onion, celery, green pepper, water chestnuts and peas."]

title: Old-Fashioned Fruit Cobbler
ingredients: ["1 double pie crust in deep dish", "1 qt. fruit (peaches, cherries, berries or apples)", "4 Tbsp. flour", "scant 7/8 c. sugar", "fruit and juice of 1 small lemon", "4 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Mix flour and sugar well.", "Add fruit and juice of small lemon. Put", "all ingredients into deep dish and add top crust. Bake", "at 400\u00b0", "for", "30 minutes;", "turn down to 350\u00b0 and finish baking approximately 30 minutes longer.", "Crust should get nice and brown and juice bubble through top crust holes.", "(Make few cuts with knife in top crust before putting on pie.)"]

title: Pepperoni Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/3 c. mayonnaise", "1/3 c. onion, diced", "1/3 c. pepperoni, diced", "1/2 c. walnuts, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Soften cream cheese in microwave.", "Mix all ingredients together, except nuts.", "Place in pie plate. Sprinkle nuts on top to cover.", "Bake for 30 minutes.", "Serve with crackers or bread."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. pineapple, crushed", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, pineapple, green pepper, 1/2 cup of pecans, onion and salt.", "Form into a ball.", "Refrigerate for 15 minutes.", "Remove from refrigerator and roll in the remaining nuts."]

title: Barbecue Chicken Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/3 to 1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together; pour over browned pieces of chicken in saucepan.", "Simmer 1 hour.", "Also great for leftover fried chicken."]

title: Dressing For Fresh Vegetables Or Slaw
ingredients: ["2 c. mayonnaise", "2 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. vinegar", "4 oz. sugar", "1 1/2 Tbsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. white pepper"]
directions: ["Mix together and use with fresh broccoli and cauliflower or slaw or as a dip."]

title: New Year'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix pineapple and softened cream cheese.", "Add pepper, onion, 1 cup nuts and salt.", "Mix well.", "Chill 2 hours and form in ball; roll in remaining 1 cup pecans.", "Serve with various snack crackers."]

title: Cole Slaw Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 c. oil", "1 tsp. celery salt", "1 tsp. mustard seed", "1 onion, grated (optional)"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, salt and vinegar in blender for 2 minutes. Add oil and blend well. Add celery seed, mustard seed and onion.", "May be stored in refrigerator for future use."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour, chips and pecans.", "Form batter about 1-inch in diameter.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet; press down with a lightly floured bottom of a small glass.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 12 to 14 minutes or until edges are golden.", "Makes about 2 1/2 dozen."]

title: Butterscotch Nut Fudge
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. granulated sugar", "3/4 c. sour cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Melt butter in heavy saucepan, add brown sugar and heat to boiling.", "Add granulated sugar and sour cream.", "Cook over low heat, stirring until sugar dissolves, to soft ball stage (235\u00b0). Cool at room temperature, without stirring, until lukewarm (110\u00b0). Beat until mixture holds its shape.", "Add vanilla and nuts, quickly spread in greased pan.", "Cool and cut in squares."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter or margarine", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips or corn flakes", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add egg yolks, then flour.", "Stir in remaining ingredients.", "Drop cookies on ungreased cookie sheet and flatten with a fork.", "Cook until light brown at 350\u00b0."]

title: Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["4 c. mayonnaise (1 qt.)", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. small curd cottage cheese", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. salt", "4 oz. Blue cheese, crumbled"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in a bowl except Blue cheese.", "Mix with mixer.", "Stir in Blue cheese with fork.", "Refrigerate.", "Makes 1 1/2 quarts."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well. Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet. Press down with fork. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Party Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix the first 5 ingredients and chill for 1 hour.", "Shape into ball and roll in pecans."]

title: Ham Barbecue
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 medium chopped onion", "1 small chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. mustard", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Combine and simmer 15 minutes until warm.", "Add chipped ham."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 can kraut, drained", "1 c. onion, chopped", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 c. shredded carrots", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Cut kraut with scissors or a knife.", "Combine kraut, onion, celery, green pepper and carrot.", "Heat sugar and vinegar to boiling point.", "Pour over mixture.", "Cover bowl tightly and let stand in refrigerator 24 hours.", "Will keep 2 weeks."]

title: Roquefort Dressing
ingredients: ["1 green pepper", "1 onion", "4 oz. crumbled Blue or Roquefort cheese", "1 qt. real mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt"]
directions: ["Put onion and pepper through food processor. Add all ingredients.", "Blend with mixer at slow speed. Will keep for weeks and improves with age."]

title: Pineapple Green Pepper Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften the cream cheese.", "Mix all ingredients together, except for 1/2 cup of pecans. Form into ball; roll in reserved pecans. Refrigerate until firm.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream together butter and sugar.", "Add chips and flour.", "Add vanilla and mix well.", "Mix in pecans and form into balls.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 14 minutes.", "Bake on greased cookie sheet."]

title: Ripe Olive Spread Or Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled", "1 c. chopped ripe olives", "1 Tbsp. chopped chives or onion", "2 tsp. prepared horseradish"]
directions: ["In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Blend in sour cream; gently mix in bacon, olives, chives and horseradish. Makes 2 cups."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. pecans or walnuts (optional)", "1 Tbsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla, flour, potato chips and nuts.", "Drop by teaspoonful on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until done."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can drained crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 to 4 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients.", "Chill.", "May form into ball or place in loaf pan.", "After chilled, unmold.", "If made into ball, roll in 1/2 to 1 cup more chopped nuts.", "(May roll in parsley if you want.) If made in loaf pan, garnish with pineapple rings or chunks and parsley."]

title: Seafood Cocktail Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. ketchup", "juice of 1 lemon", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 Tbsp. horseradish", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped celery", "1/4 tsp. salt", "dash of cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and place in refrigerator until time to use."]

title: Marinated Carrots
ingredients: ["1 (No. 2) can sliced or diced carrots, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/8 tsp. garlic salt", "1 Tbsp. olive oil"]
directions: ["Combine carrots, peppers, onion, sugar and garlic salt; mix well.", "Add vinegar and olive oil; let stand overnight.", "Serve as a salad or a vegetable."]

title: Butterscotch Sauce
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. brown sugar", "2 c. corn syrup", "1/2 lb. butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. heavy cream", "1 Tbsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine and heat, but do not boil, the first 4 ingredients. After sugar dissolves, cool.", "Add the heavy cream and vanilla; beat until well blended.", "Store in covered jar.", "Will keep for months.", "Serve over ice cream or favorite puddings."]

title: Best Ever Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 lb. cream cheese", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion", "2 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "8 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "4 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Mix cream cheese, green pepper, onion, seasoned salt, pineapple and 2 1/2 cups nuts together with hands.", "Form mixture into a ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts until completely covered. Refrigerate."]

title: Caramelized Onion And Cheese Bites
ingredients: ["1 large onion, halved and thinly sliced", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1/3 c. coarsely chopped walnuts", "1 tsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. Dijon style mustard", "16 (1/4-inch) thick slices Baguette French bread", "1/2 c. Parmesan or Romano cheese"]
directions: ["In a large skillet, cook the onion in hot oil about 3 minutes or just until tender.", "Add the walnuts and the sugar.", "Continue to cook and stir about 5 minutes more or until the onion is slightly caramelized and walnuts are lightly toasted.", "Stir in the mustard."]

title: Concord Grape Pie
ingredients: ["4 c. grapes", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. butter", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "Pastry for 2 crust 9- inch pie"]
directions: ["Slip skins from grapes and set aside. Heat grapes in saucepan for 3 to 4 minutes. Then run through a sieve to remove seeds. Combine pulp, skins, cornstarch, sugar and salt."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. grated sharp cheese", "2 (8 oz.) boxes cream cheese", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 tsp. grated onion", "dash of garlic salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except nuts.", "Shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in pecans.", "Chill and serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple-Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, pineapple, green pepper, onion and salt; mix well. Chill.", "Shape into a 4-inch ball and roll in chopped pecans.", "Serve with assorted crackers."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, except nuts.", "Form into 2 balls and roll in chopped nuts.", "Freezes well."]

title: Pecan Butter Balls
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add flour, salt and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Add chopped nuts.", "Form in small balls.", "Bake on greased sheet at 325\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes.", "While hot, roll in powdered sugar; cool and roll again in powdered sugar when ready to store. They freeze well."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. sauerkraut, drained", "1/2 c. oil", "1 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. diced green pepper", "1 small onion, chopped"]
directions: ["Drain kraut. Add all ingredients together and let stand overnight."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 small can pineapple chunks, drained, dejuiced (all juice squeezed out)", "2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 1/2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Mix all of the above by hand.", "Shape as you desire or mold it. Serve with crackers, chips, etc."]

title: Honey-Parmesan Dressing
ingredients: ["1/4 c. onion", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "3/4 c. honey", "1 pt. mayonnaise", "3/4 Tbsp. black pepper", "1 1/2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Blend onion and 3/4 cup mayonnaise.", "Add honey.", "Blend until mixed well.", "Add other mayonnaise, pepper and Parmesan cheese. Mix well.", "Keep refrigerated."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Allow cheese to come to room temperature.", "Mix all ingredients except 1 cup pecans.", "Shape in round ball and roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill and serve with any kind of snack crackers."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks margarine", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "3/4 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream together margarine, sugar and flour.", "Add vanilla, chips and pecans.", "Mix well.", "Form into balls and flatten.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Shape into ball and roll in 1 cup of chopped pecans.", "This can be frozen for later use."]

title: Sweet And Sour Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. mustard", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. oil", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix all together.", "Refrigerate at least 15 minutes before using.", "Good on cooked ham and chicken.", "Also good on salads."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine cheese and pineapple until smooth.", "Add 1 cup pecans and remaining ingredients.", "Chill.", "Shape into one or 2 balls. Roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill."]

title: Radish And Onion Spread
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) Philly cream cheese", "1/2 c. butter or oleo", "1 c. radish, ground", "1/2 c. onion, ground", "1 tsp. celery salt", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix together with softened cream cheese.", "Great with crackers or chips."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained and squeezed", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1/4 c. celery finely, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Reserve 1 1/2 cups chopped pecans and blend all other ingredients well.", "Fold mixture into an airtight container and refrigerate overnight.", "Shape into a ball and roll in remaining nuts."]

title: Fruit Pizza
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. pecans", "1 c. flour", "1/4 c. quick oats", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and brown sugar; work in flour, oats and pecans. Press on lightly oiled pan (cookie sheet if a double batch). Prick with fork.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Cream the cheese, vanilla and sugar in small bowl.", "Blend well.", "Spread over crust and top with fruit slices of choice."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "assorted crackers"]
directions: ["In medium bowl, with fork, beat cream cheese until smooth. Add pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Mix thoroughly and shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic film or foil.", "Chill overnight.", "Serve with crackers.", "Can be rewrapped and frozen."]

title: Caramel Popcorn
ingredients: ["1 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "4 qt. popped corn"]
directions: ["Stir together all but popcorn and cook to medium heat until it boils.", "Boil 5 minutes.", "Pour over popped corn.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for one hour; stir every 15 minutes.", "Turn out on brown paper bag until cool."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. nuts, finely chopped", "2 c. crushed potato chips"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Mix in flour.", "Add nuts and potato chips.", "Mix well."]

title: Grammy'S Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["3 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream the butter and cream cheese gradually.", "Add sugar and beat until fluffy.", "Add flour, nuts and vanilla.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Georgia'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 green pepper", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Reserve 1 cup nuts.", "Mix remaining ingredients.", "Shape into a ball, then roll in the reserved nuts.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Lime Jello Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can crushed pineapple, drained (reserve juice)", "1 pkg. lime Jell-O", "2 pkg. cream cheese, softened", "cream", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Add water to reserved pineapple juice to measure 2 cups.", "Heat to boiling and pour over Jell-O to dissolve.", "Chill Jell-O until it begins to set.", "Add cream cheese (which has been softened with cream).", "Mix with rotary beater.", "Add celery, nuts and pineapple. Pour into molds and chill.", "Serves 8 to 10."]

title: Quick And Easy Nutty Cheese Bars
ingredients: ["1 Duncan Hines Butter Recipe golden cake mix", "3/4 c. butter or margarine, melted", "3/4 c. chopped pecans", "2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 c. packed brown sugar", "3/4 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix first three ingredients together and press mixture evenly into bottom of greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan."]

title: Rice Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. rice, cooked in chicken broth", "2 Tbsp. olive oil", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "dash of cayenne pepper", "1/4 c. each: chopped celery, chopped onions, chopped dill pickles and chopped olives", "1/4 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Cook the rice in chicken broth. Cool slightly. Mix all the ingredients together and pour into salad bowl. Chill and serve."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1 stick butter, softened", "1 stick margarine, softened", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 c. plain flour, sifted", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Allow butter, margarine and cream cheese to soften several hours.", "Mix butter and margarine.", "Add sugar; mix thoroughly.", "Add cream cheese, mixing well.", "Add flour, then vanilla, then pecans last.", "Spoon onto cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 10 minutes, or as soon as edges start to brown."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, crushed", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix together and refrigerate.", "Roll in 1 cup chopped pecans before serving."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, except nuts.", "Form a ball and roll in chopped nuts.", "Refrigerate 2 hours at least before serving with crackers or apple slices."]

title: Caramel Dipping Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. half and half", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix sugars and cornstarch in pan.", "Slowly add half and half and butter.", "Stir constantly and bring to boil.", "Boil for 1 minute.", "Stir in pecans and vanilla.", "Cook for 15 minutes or so before serving.", "Sauce can be used to dip apples or place apples in dish and pour sauce over."]

title: Bleu Cheese Log
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. Bleu cheese", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. grated sharp cheese", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. minced garlic", "chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients, except pecans, in a large bowl.", "Roll in chopped pecans.", "Serve with your choice of crackers."]

title: Ice Cream Crunch
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. oatmeal", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. flour", "2 sticks margarine", "1/2 gal. ice cream", "1 jar ice cream topping (caramel, etc.)", "1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix pecans, oatmeal, brown sugar, flour and margarine well. Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven on cookie sheet about 30 minutes.", "Stir often. Stir cool.", "Spread 1/2 on 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Pat in soft ice cream.", "Pour topping over ice cream.", "Top with rest of crumbs. Top with Cool Whip.", "Freeze."]

title: Sauce For Broiling Fish Or Chicken
ingredients: ["1/3 c. lite soy sauce", "3 Tbsp. canola oil", "1 tsp. garlic, minced", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. salt or salt substitute", "1/3 tsp. white pepper (optional)"]
directions: ["Brush fish or chicken filet with sauce.", "Broil 4 to 6 minutes."]

title: Caramels
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. cream", "1 3/4 c. corn syrup", "1 c. butter or butter substitute", "1 c. chopped nuts", "few grains salt"]
directions: ["Boil all together except the nuts and 1 cup cream.", "Boil 30 minutes.", "Add the second cup of cream and boil to a firm ball stage (248\u00b0).", "Add nuts and pour without stirring into well buttered pan.", "When cold, cut in squares.", "Wrap each square in waxed paper."]

title: Chocolate Popcorn
ingredients: ["1/3 c. unpopped popcorn", "2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. cream or milk", "1 Tbsp. butter", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. peanuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Prior to making, pop popcorn according to directions.", "Do not salt.", "(Microwave popcorn should not be used.)", "Mix in medium saucepan the remaining ingredients.", "Bring to boil and pour over popped popcorn.", "Mix in large bowl until thoroughly covered. Cool.", "Enjoy."]

title: Louisiana Creme Fudge
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "1 c. corn syrup", "2 c. whipping cream", "1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. butter", "1 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Use a large, heavy pan and cook very, very slow.", "Cook sugar, syrup and cream, stirring until boiling, then cook to 234\u00b0, soft ball stage.", "Let cool 5 minutes, then add butter and vanilla.", "Then add flour and beat 15 minutes.", "Add nuts and pour in dish.", "Cut when cool."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 stick melted butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 can crushed pineapple, drain juice", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix and press in bowl the crushed pretzels, 1/2 cup sugar and melted butter.", "Mix and spread on pretzels 1/2 cup sugar, Cool Whip and cream cheese.", "Combine 1/4 cup sugar and crushed pineapple; cook with cornstarch.", "Mix in pineapple and spread on top."]

title: Freezer Pickles
ingredients: ["1 green pepper, sliced", "2 qt. small pickles, sliced (don't peel)", "1 medium onion, sliced", "2 Tbsp. salt", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix green pepper, pickles, onion and salt in a bowl and let set in refrigerator for 2 hours.", "Drain; do not rinse.", "Add sugar, vinegar and celery seed.", "Mix with pickles, onion and green pepper.", "Put in refrigerator for 24 hours, then put in containers and freeze."]

title: Sean'S Fabulous Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/3 c. finely crushed potato chips", "1/4 c. chopped nuts", "3/4 c. sugar", "3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. sugar (set aside)"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 375\u00b0.", "In a large bowl, beat sugar, butter, egg yolk and vanilla until light and fluffy.", "Lightly spoon flour into cup; level off.", "Add flour to sugar mixture; mix well.", "Stir in potato chips and nuts."]

title: Lisa'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "3/4 c. crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, diced", "2 Tbsp. onion, diced", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. crushed pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well, reserving 1/2 cup crushed pecans. Shape into a ball.", "Roll ball in the reserved 1/2 cup pecans. Chill."]

title: Artichoke Salad
ingredients: ["3 jars marinated artichokes", "1/2 jar pimento stuffed olives", "1 small onion, sliced thin", "1 stalk celery, chopped", "1 lb. sliced mushrooms", "1 small can ripe olives", "1/2 green pepper, chopped"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in a mixing bowl.", "Add vinegar, oregano and fresh ground pepper to taste.", "Chill for 3 to 4 hours.", "It is also good if you add slices of avocados and tomatoes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. green pepper", "1/4 c. chopped onion (optional)", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together; form into ball or log and roll in pecans."]

title: Chewy Butter N' Nut Clusters
ingredients: ["6 c. Rice Chex", "12 oz. can salted mixed nuts", "1 c. butter", "1 1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In large bowl, stir together cereal and nuts; set aside.", "In 2-quart saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.", "Stir in sugar and syrup.", "Cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture comes to a full boil.", "Continue cooking until mixture reaches soft ball stage (candy thermometer will read 238\u00b0).", "Remove from heat; stir in vanilla.", "Toss candy mixture with cereal and nuts.", "Spread evenly onto buttered cookie sheet.", "Cool completely; break into clusters."]

title: Edith'S Favorite Frosting(Creamy Chocolate)
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/8 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cook cocoa, sugar and cornstarch, plus 1 cup boiling water, stirring constantly until mixture thickens.", "Remove from heat and add rest of ingredients.", "Pour on cake.", "You can spread on cake right out of the oven.", "Makes 2 cups."]

title: 5-Minute Fudge
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Combine sugar and cocoa.", "Add corn syrup, milk and butter. Let boil 5 minutes.", "After good boil begins, add vanilla and nuts. Beat until loses its gloss.", "Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper."]

title: Chocolate Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine or shortening", "2/3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 2/3 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. cocoa", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and vanilla until fluffy.", "Sift flour with cocoa and add to creamed mixture.", "Use back of wooden or other large spoon to blend thoroughly.", "Add pecans, again using back of spoon to blend thoroughly.", "Dough will be very thick. Roll teaspoonfuls of dough into small balls and bake on ungreased nonstick baking sheet in 325\u00b0 oven for 20 minutes.", "Cool and roll in powdered sugar.", "Store in tins or other covered containers."]

title: Cole Slaw Dressing
ingredients: ["1 pt. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "10 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. celery salt", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well.", "Will keep in refrigerator 1 to 2 weeks."]

title: Hot Fruit
ingredients: ["1 can pineapple chunks", "1 can sliced peaches", "1 1/2 c. cranberries (whole)", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "3 Tbsp. tapioca", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Drain the pineapple and peaches.", "Mix all ingredients, then pour into buttered casserole dish. Bake at 350\u00b0 until bubbly (20 to 25 minutes)."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 tsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "dash of salt", "1/2 c. crushed pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, except pecans.", "Chill 3 to 4 hours.", "Divide into 2 balls; roll in pecans.", "Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate."]

title: Dressing For Slaw
ingredients: ["3/8 c. margarine", "1/8 c. white vinegar", "3/8 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "dash of white pepper", "dash of cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Thoroughly blend ingredients and pour on 16 ounces of shredded slaw."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["2 (16 oz.) cans pineapple chunks, drained", "1/3 c. sugar", "3 tsp. flour", "1 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 pkg. Ritz crackers, crumbled (use 1 wrapped tube)", "1/2 c. butter, melted"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Lightly grease a 2-quart casserole. Place pineapple in a casserole dish.", "Mix sugar and flour; sprinkle over pineapple.", "Sprinkle with cheese.", "Cover with cracker crumbs.", "Pour melted butter over the crumbs and bake for 30 minutes.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Polish Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk, slightly beaten", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "chopped nuts", "melted chocolate or preserves"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar until light.", "Add egg yolk; mix well. Add flour, sifted with salt; mix.", "Roll dough into small balls. Dip in unbeaten egg whites and roll in finely chopped nuts.", "Place on buttered baking sheet; press down center of each with thimble. Bake in a 325\u00b0 oven for 5 minutes.", "Remove and press down again with thimble.", "Return to oven for 10 to 15 minutes.", "Remove and fill indentation with preserves or melted chocolate while still warm."]

title: Roquefort Dressing
ingredients: ["1 carton sour cream", "1 c. Best Foods mayonnaise", "6 oz. Blue cheese", "salt to taste", "vinegar to taste", "1 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1 clove garlic or garlic powder"]
directions: ["Blend and let stand in refrigerator for 6 to 8 hours."]

title: Russian Nut Balls(Christmas Cookie)
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "1 c. finely chopped pecans or walnuts"]
directions: ["Combine in order. Form balls 1-inch in diameter.", "Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 8 minutes; no longer than 10 minutes. Cool and roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Cranberry Salad
ingredients: ["1 can whole cranberries", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Stir the first 6 items together.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Freeze."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. cream cheese", "1 can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Gradually stir in crushed pineapple, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Chill well.", "Form into a ball; roll in chopped nuts.", "Chill until serving time.", "Garnish with maraschino cherries, parsley and pineapple slices."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. soft (tub) margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. chopped nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Cream", "the", "margarine, sugar and vanilla together.", "Add flour and", "mix", "thoroughly.", "Add\tchips", "and", "nuts; mix again. Drop by teaspoon", "on an ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15\tminutes, until they are a soft honey color.", "It is important not to overbake."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. oil", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. onion, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Add sugar to vinegar in bottle and shake until sugar is dissolved.", "Add other ingredients and store in bottle in refrigerator with lid on.", "Use on lettuce or other salads."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine the first 5 ingredients, mixing well.", "Shape into a ball.", "Refrigerate for several hours.", "Roll in chopped pecans. Keep refrigerated until ready to serve.", "Serve with your favorite crackers."]

title: Artichoke Dip
ingredients: ["1 can artichokes (plain)", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/3 c. mayonnaise", "juice of 1 lemon", "6 slices bacon, fried", "1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Chop artichoke hearts to a pulp.", "Add other ingredients, except bacon.", "Add bacon last, crumbling on top.", "Chill well. Serve with Melba rounds."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or 2 cubes margarine", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix thoroughly.", "Roll into balls (good teaspoonful dough). Flatten with glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 minutes. Watch closely.", "Take out when lightly brown.", "Don't brown too much."]

title: Chocolate Acorn Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. melted butter", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. chopped nuts", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 large chocolate or 1 (6 oz.) sweet chocolate pieces", "3/4 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Stir sugar, vanilla and pecans into melted butter. Sift together flour and add to butter mixture. Form into 42 balls, using 1 teaspoon for each.", "Flatten one end by pressing onto greased cookie sheet and pinch top to resemble acorn. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Cool."]

title: Shortbread
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. soft margarine", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix dry ingredients.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Flour hands and mix until it forms a ball; divide in half.", "Grease and flour 2 pie pans or square pans.", "Press dough into pans to cover just the bottom.", "Prick with a fork all over.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Watch carefully.", "Cut into pieces and sprinkle with powdered sugar.", "May serve with fruit of choice after baked."]

title: Pecan Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. honey", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. finely chopped pecans (can use walnuts instead)"]
directions: ["Cream butter.", "Add honey, then add flour, salt and vanilla.
