Mix well and add chopped nuts.", "Form into about 1-inch balls and place on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake for 40 to 45 minutes in a 300\u00b0 oven.", "Roll in powdered sugar while still hot, then roll in sugar again after they are cool.", "Makes about 4 dozen."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 (1 lb.) cans plain diced beets", "1/2 c. white vinegar", "2/3 c. sugar", "3/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 c. butter"]
directions: ["Drain beets; reserve 1/2 cup liquid.", "In a 3-quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch; mix well. Gradually stir in reserved beet liquid, vinegar and salt. Bring to boiling, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes or until thickened and translucent. Add beets and simmer very slowly, stirring occasionally, 15 minutes.", "Just before serving, add butter and bring to a boil.", "Serves 8."]

title: Guacamole Dip
ingredients: ["1 peeled mashed avocado", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 tsp. chili powder", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "5 to 6 drops Tabasco", "2 slices bacon, crumbled"]
directions: ["In small bowl, combine all ingredients, except bacon; mix well.", "Cover and chill for 30 minutes, or until served.", "Before serving, stir in bacon or use as garnish."]

title: Sex In A Pan
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "1/2 c. margarine", "1 c. chopped pecans or walnuts", "1 c. flour", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. margarine"]
directions: ["Choose a \"base\".", "Mix together and put in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 25 minutes or 350\u00b0 for 15-18 minutes if using brown sugar.", "(Best if made the day before.)"]

title: Crackerjacks
ingredients: ["3 1/2 qt. popped popcorn", "1 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. nuts (peanuts)"]
directions: ["Cook all ingredients, except popcorn and nuts, to hard ball stage.", "Mix with popcorn; mix well.", "Pour into large baking pan. Bake in 200\u00b0 oven for one hour.", "Stir often.", "Let cool.", "Store in airtight container."]

title: Cauliflower And Broccoli Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "dash of Worcestershire sauce", "dash of garlic salt"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients. Cut up broccoli, cauliflower and onions and add to the mixture."]

title: Mrs. Smith'S Oven Cooked Chicken
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. black pepper", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 1/4 Tbsp. sugar", "juice of 1 lemon"]
directions: ["Mix all together.", "Roll chicken in ingredients.", "Bake at 310\u00b0 to 325\u00b0 in pan for 1 hour or until done."]

title: Carrot Cream Soup
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "3 2/3 c. minced carrots", "1 c. flour", "8 1/2 c. chicken stock", "1/2 c. whipping cream", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["In 4 quart saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.", "Add onion and cook until soft.", "Add carrots and stir in flour, mixing well. Cook, stirring constantly, about 2 minutes.", "Stil stirring, add chicken stock and bring to a boil.", "Lower heat, cover and cook 1/2 hour, stirring occasionally.", "Blend in cream, add salt and pepper to taste and serve immediately.", "Makes 12 cups."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "1/2 lb. margarine", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "3 3/4 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. potato chips, crushed"]
directions: ["Cream butter and margarine until fluffy.", "Add vanilla and sugar.", "Beat well.", "Add flour and beat until well blended.", "Add crushed potato chips.", "Drop by heaping teaspoonful onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 13 to 15 minutes."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. onion, chopped"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Gradually add well drained pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion, and garlic salt.", "Chill well. Form into one large or two small balls and roll in one cup chopped pecans.", "Garnish with fresh parsley and twisted pineapple slices centered with a cherry."]

title: Pecan Balls
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. margarine", "4 Tbsp. sugar", "2 c. sifted flour", "2 c. (fine ground) pecans", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar, then add flour, pecans, salt and vanilla.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 about 10 minutes.", "Roll while hot in powdered sugar."]

title: Delicious Vinaigrette For Green Salads
ingredients: ["1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. mustard", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1 to 2 cloves garlic, crushed", "1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar", "3 Tbsp. olive oil"]
directions: ["Place the first four ingredients in a jar.", "Add the vinegar and shake well.", "Add the oil and shake well again."]

title: Cream Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "8 oz. crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Serve with vegetables or snack crackers."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter/margarine", "1 tsp. minced onion", "3 c. cooked fresh beets (canned beets, drained, may be used)"]
directions: ["Combine sugar, salt and cornstarch in top part of double boiler.", "Stir in vinegar; cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until smooth and thickened.", "Add butter, onion and beets.", "Place over hot water and cook 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["2 (20 oz.) cans pineapple chunks, drained", "1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "6 Tbsp. plain flour", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 tube Ritz crackers, crumbled"]
directions: ["Melt margarine in baking dish.", "Mix pineapple chunks, sugar, plain flour and grated cheese; pour in baking dish.", "Top with crushed crackers and dab 1 tablespoon of margarine on top.", "Bake 25 minutes or until golden brown at 350\u00b0."]

title: Sweet And Sour Meatballs
ingredients: ["1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 can pineapple chunks", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "cherries (optional)", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 small green pepper"]
directions: ["Cook meatballs.", "Drain fat from skillet and remove meatballs. Mix brown sugar and cornstarch in skillet.", "Stir in pineapple (with syrup), vinegar and soy sauce.", "Heat to boiling, stirring constantly.", "Reduce heat.", "Add meatballs.", "Cover and simmer about 10 minutes.", "Stir in green pepper and simmer 5 more minutes."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese; gradually stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Chill well.", "Form into ball and roll in 1 cup pecans.", "Chill until serving.", "Garnish with fruit and serve with assorted crackers."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/8 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well, except pecans.", "Roll in 1 cup pecans into shape of a ball."]

title: Crescents
ingredients: ["7/8 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 c. (1 stick) butter or margarine (less 1-inch)", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream the butter and sugar.", "Add flour, salt, vanilla and nuts.", "Roll in crescent shapes. Bake 15 minutes at 375\u00b0.", "Roll in powdered sugar while warm."]

title: Potato Chip Munchies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips (5 c. uncrushed)", "sugar"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In a large bowl, beat butter with electric mixer on medium speed until softened (30 seconds).", "Add 1/2 sugar and vanilla.", "Beat until fluffy.", "Mix on low speed, gradually adding flour and potato chips.", "Beat until well mixed.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten with a fork that is dipped in sugar.", "Bake 12 to 15 minutes until golden.", "Lift onto cooling rack.", "Yields 36 cookies."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. minced onion", "3 c. cooked sliced beets or 2 (16 oz.) drained canned beets"]
directions: ["In saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt; slowly stir in vinegar.", "Add butter and minced onions.", "Over medium heat, cook until thickened, stirring constantly.", "Reduce heat to low, add beets and cook until heated."]

title: Russian Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. 10x sugar", "1 c. butter (only)", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. pecans, finely sliced"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except sugar.", "Form into 1/2-inch balls. Bake in a 400\u00b0 oven until light brown, about 14 minutes.", "Roll in sugar while hot.", "Cool and roll again."]

title: Celery Seed Dressing (For 100)
ingredients: ["7 c. oil", "7 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. vinegar", "14 Tbsp. mustard", "14 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine", "7 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix together in blender; keep in refrigerator. Shake before using."]

title: Cheese Ball(Appetizer)
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. crushed pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cheese.", "Add pineapple, pepper, onion, salt and 1 cup pecans; mix well.", "Divide into 2 portions.", "Make 2 balls; roll in remaining pecans.", "Makes 2 balls."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Stir in l cup pecans, pineapple, onions and salt.", "Chill well.", "Form into ball and roll in l cup chopped pecans.", "Chill until time to serve."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 lb. can sliced beets", "1 small onion, sliced", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/3 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Drain 1/2 liquid off beets.", "Heat with onion until soft. Separately, mix together sugar, salt, cornstarch and vinegar.", "Add to hot beets and onion slowly.", "Stir as mixture thickens.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Sweet And Sour Sauce
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 can pineapple chunks", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix cornstarch and sugar in large skillet.", "Stir in pineapple with juice, soy sauce and vinegar.", "Cook until thickened, stirring constantly.", "Add green peppers; simmer 5 minutes.", "Great with meatballs."]

title: Pickled Beets
ingredients: ["2 cans beets", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. oil", "2 Tbsp. ketchup", "20 cloves (more or less)"]
directions: ["Drain juice off 1 can of beets.", "Add remaining ingredients together (except cloves) and boil until thick.", "Pour over beets and cloves.", "Put in refrigerator until cold."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese (room temperature)", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 (8 oz. can) crushed pineapple (drained)", "1 c. nuts", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Shape into two balls.", "Sprinkle with nuts.", "Chill overnight."]

title: Aunt Mary'S Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "2/3 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "salt to taste", "1 c. packed brown sugar", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 medium shredded onion", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix and cook over medium heat for 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. oil", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 c. chopped sauerkraut", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and keep in refrigerator.", "The longer it sets, the better it gets."]

title: French Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. ketchup", "3/4 c. vinegar", "3/4 c. vegetable oil", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients. Chill and serve over salad."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cheese; mix all ingredients except 1 cup of pecans. Chill.", "Form into a ball and roll in other cup of pecans.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["5 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. sugar", "1/4 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 3/4 c. light cream", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix dry", "ingredients", "together.", "Then", "in", "the top of a double boiler,", "slowly", "add milk to the dry ingredients, stirring constantly.", "Cook over boiling water until thick.", "Remove from heat and add butter and vanilla."]

title: Pineapple-Pecan Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "18 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. salt"]
directions: ["Allow cream cheese to come to room temperature.", "Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Chill until firm, 1 hour.", "Form into 2 balls, wrapping each in tinfoil, and refrigerate until ready to serve."]

title: Oatmeal Tarts
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter, melted", "1 c. packed dark brown sugar", "1 c. packed light brown sugar", "4 c. old fashioned oatmeal", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Melt butter.", "Add sugars, oatmeal, salt, vanilla and pecans; mix well.", "Fill miniature muffin pans 3/4 full. Bake 12 to 15 minutes.", "Remove from oven.", "While hot, using a spoon, push mixture which has baked out over the edge back into the pan, making tart compact.", "Cool 10 minutes before removing from pan.", "Yields 72."]

title: Pan-Fried Onion Dip
ingredients: ["1 large onion", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. oil", "1 pinch cayenne pepper", "3/4 c. sour cream", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Peel and thinly slice onions. Saute the onion in the butter and oil until the onions are caramelized, about 30 minutes. Cool. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Chill for 1 hour. Serve dip with vegetables, chips or crackers. Makes 1 3/4 cups of dip."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 lb. can diced or sliced beets, drained (reserve 1/3 c. liquid)", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. vinegar (scant)", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["In saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir in the reserved liquid, vinegar and butter.", "Cook and stir until mixture thickens and bubbles.", "Add the beets; heat through.", "Serves 4 or 5."]

title: Sweet And Sour Sausage
ingredients: ["2 lb. smoked sausage, sliced", "2 (8 1/4 oz.) cans pineapple chunks with liquid", "3 tsp. cornstarch", "6 Tbsp. brown sugar", "4 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 green pepper, chopped"]
directions: ["Brown sausage.", "Drain.", "Drain pineapple juice into 2-quart glass casserole.", "Stir in cornstarch, brown sugar, vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook in microwave oven on High for 4 minutes, or until mixture boils.", "Stir halfway through cooking time.", "Stir in green pepper and pineapple.", "Cook in microwave oven, covered, on High for about 6 minutes.", "Stir halfway through cooking time.", "Place sausage in larger dish and pour sauce over it.", "Sauce may also be used over meatballs, cocktail franks or vegetables."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. oil", "1 (14 or 16 oz.) can sauerkraut, rinsed and drained", "1/2 c. celery, chopped fine", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped fine", "1/4 c. onion, chopped fine"]
directions: ["In a bowl, combine sugar and oil.", "Mix well.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Refrigerate overnight."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. soft butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped pecans or walnuts", "1 c. crushed potato chips"]
directions: ["Beat the butter or margarine until fluffy.", "Add sugar, flour and vanilla; beat until blended.", "Add chopped nuts.", "Fold potato chips into batter.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar while cookies are still warm.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes until lightly brown."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped or grated onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained"]
directions: ["In a small bowl, mix all ingredients except pecans. Refrigerate.", "When mixture is firm, shape into ball and roll in ground pecans.", "Cover.", "Is best when made ahead.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Cookie Press Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Fill barrel of cookie press with mixture and bake at 350\u00b0 until set but not brown.", "Carefully remove from pan."]

title: My Favorite Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large cream cheese, softened to room temperature", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drain on a paper towel", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "3/4 c. chopped pecans", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "3/4 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine onions, 3/4 cup pecans and salt.", "Using a mixer, mix cream cheese with onion, nuts and salt.", "Chill in same bowl.", "When chilled, about 1 hour, shape mixture into a ball and roll in 1/2 to 3/4 cup chopped pecans.", "Refrigerate.", "Serve with whole wheat crackers."]

title: Chocolate Or Lemon Delight
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 1/2 c. stick margarine (room temperature)", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. sugar", "8 oz. cream cheese", "10 oz. Cool Whip", "1 large pkg. chocolate or lemon instant pudding mix"]
directions: ["Mix and pat flour and margarine in a 9 x 13-inch dish pan. Sprinkle 1/2 cup of nuts over crust.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until light brown, then cool."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1/2 c. green pepper, chopped", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1 small onion, chopped", "1/2 c. sugar", "salt and pepper to taste", "1/4 c. vegetable oil", "Stokely's (No. 303) 16 oz. sauerkraut, drained"]
directions: ["Drain sauerkraut and mix all ingredients in large bowl."]

title: Pineapple Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. pretzels", "1 stick margarine (1/2 c.)", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "9 oz. Cool Whip", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 medium can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Crush pretzels.", "Add margarine and 3 tablespoons of sugar. Mix together well.", "Press on bottom of pie pan.", "Cook at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes, then cool."]

title: Pineapple-Pecan Boat
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 can (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "dash of garlic powder", "dash of chives", "dash of salt", "1/2 fresh pineapple, with center cut away"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients and place in fresh pineapple.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Hungarian Squash(Serves 4 To 6)
ingredients: ["5 or 6 yellow summer squash", "1/2 onion, chopped", "1 or 2 Tbsp. oil", "3 tsp. salt or to taste", "1 tsp. black pepper (less if you don't like it spicy)", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "3 tsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Grate squash and barley cover with water.", "Add seasonings. Saut onion in oil and add to squash. Cook 15 minutes.", "Drain water. Add 1/2 cup sour cream mixed with 1 tablespoon flour. Mix all and simmer 3 to 5 minutes and serve."]

title: Ginger Marinade For Boneless Chicken
ingredients: ["1/3 c. oil", "1/3 c. soy sauce", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. dry mustard", "2 tsp. grated fresh ginger", "2 cloves garlic, minced or 2 tsp. minced jar garlic"]
directions: ["Mix together and then marinate boneless chicken in plastic bag for 2 or more hours.", "Then broil or grill.", "Delicious!"]

title: Maggie'S Roquefort Dressing
ingredients: ["1 pt. Best Foods mayonnaise", "1 small jar Kraft Roka Blue cheese (room temperature)", "1 small green pepper, chopped small", "1 onion, chopped small", "garlic powder", "celery salt"]
directions: ["At lowest speed, blend cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in garlic powder and celery salt to taste.", "Add green pepper and onion.", "Important to use Kraft Roka and Best Foods brand for that smooth taste.", "I use green onion instead of yellow onion."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. finely chopped pecans", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans (to roll cheese ball in, optional)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Refrigerate.", "Roll in nuts before serving."]

title: Chip Dip
ingredients: ["8 oz. box cream cheese", "1 small shredded onion", "1/4 shredded green pepper", "4 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "3 shredded radishes", "dash of Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in a large bowl.", "Mix at high speed until well blended.", "Serve with chips."]

title: Parmesan Twists
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 pkg. (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 egg yolk", "2 tsp. cream or milk", "1 c. grated Parmesan (fresh is best) or more if you want"]
directions: ["In an electric mixer (Cuisinart) beat butter, cream cheese and salt until smooth.", "Work in flour with fingers or fork.", "Flatten dough in tinfoil to form an 8 x 6-inch rectangle and chill overnight."]

title: Fudge
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. cream", "1/2 c. Karo (light)", "1 Tbsp. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "pecans"]
directions: ["Mix sugar and cocoa.", "Add cream and Karo.", "Boil to soft ball stage, remove from heat.", "Add butter and vanilla.", "Beat until candy clings on side of boiler.", "Add pecans.", "Drop by teaspoonful on buttered dish."]

title: Mystery Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 c. potato chips, crushed"]
directions: ["Beat butter and sugar together until fluffy. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Drop by teaspoon on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Makes 12 dozen."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In a medium bowl, cream together butter and sugar.", "Stir in vanilla.", "Add remaining ingredients, mixing well."]

title: Pecan Crescent Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/4 c. unsifted xxxx sugar", "1/4 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. almond extract", "1 1/4 c. flour", "3/4 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter until soft and smooth; add sugar and flavorings and blend until smooth.", "Stir in flour gradually, finally stir in nuts.", "Shape in small, crescent-shaped rolls, using about 1 teaspoon for each one.", "Place on a buttered cookie sheet and bake at 350\u00b0 for about 20 minutes.", "While still warm, roll in powdered sugar.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen."]

title: Pretzel Cream Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 stick margarine, melted", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "20 oz. can crushed pineapple (save juice)", "6 oz. Cool Whip", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix together first 3 ingredients and press into a glass dish 8 x 8 x 2-inches.", "Bake 10 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Cream the cream cheese, sugar, crushed pineapple and Cool Whip; set aside.", "Take pineapple juice and cornstarch; cook until thick.", "Spread on top of crust and then spread cream cheese mixture on top of second layer."]

title: Rice Balls
ingredients: ["1/2 c. carrots, shredded", "1/2 c. celery, shredded", "1/4 c. mushrooms or water chestnuts, shredded (optional)", "1/2 c. rice vinegar", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. salt", "4 to 5 c. cooked rice"]
directions: ["Stir vinegar, sugar and salt over medium heat until sugar is dissolved.", "Soak carrot and celery mixture in vinegar-sugar solution an hour or so.", "Squeeze out excess liquid.", "Pour vinegar mixture evenly over hot rice in a flat pan and mix.", "Dip hands in cold water, to ease the rice handling.", "With about 1/4 cup of rice in your hands, pat into half sphere.", "Stuff with 1/2 teaspoon carrot-celery mixture and then \"close the ball.\"", "Squeeze tightly to shape the ball and set on platter or cookie sheet to cool. Soaked salted plums or other delicacies can also be used for the centers.", "Refrigerate and serve when cooled.", "Makes about 20 rice balls."]

title: Holiday Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Drain kraut.", "Pour sugar on and let set 1 hour (overnight works good).", "Chop or grind the onion, pepper and celery.", "Add all ingredients to kraut and refrigerate.", "Can be frozen and still taste good."]

title: Crazy Crunch
ingredients: ["2/3 c. sugar", "1 stick margarine", "4 c. popped corn", "1 c. pecans", "1/4 c. corn syrup", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine sugar, margarine and corn syrup.", "Bring to boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.", "Add nuts when thermometer reaches 245\u00b0 and continue to cook and stir constantly until syrup reaches 290\u00b0.", "Add vanilla and pour over popped corn in large bowl.", "Mix with 2 large spoons until coated.", "Spread on a baking sheet or wax paper.", "Cool.", "Break apart.", "Store in a tightly covered container."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped fine", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped very fine", "1 flat can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. nuts, chopped in blender", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese soften to room temperature.", "Combine all ingredients except 1 cup nuts.", "Use this cup of nuts to roll ball in.", "Serve with Ritz crackers.", "This can be frozen."]

title: Lentil Burgers
ingredients: ["1/3 (16 oz.) pkg. lentils, cooked", "3 slices bread, broken up", "1 small onion, diced", "1 stalk celery, diced", "3 Tbsp. ketchup", "3 Tbsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in a bowl and chill.", "Form into 8 patties. Grill or fry in olive oil.", "Serve on hamburger rolls spread with butter or ghee.", "Serves 8."]

title: Copper Pennies
ingredients: ["2 lb. carrots, sliced, cooked and drained", "1 small onion", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 c. sugar", "3/4 c. white vinegar", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 green pepper, sliced", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients except carrots.", "Pour sauce over carrots that have been placed in dish.", "Refrigerate 24 hours. Serve hot or cold."]

title: Pineapple Au Gratin
ingredients: ["2 (20 oz.) cans crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 c. sugar", "6 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "20 to 25 crushed Ritz crackers", "1 stick butter, melted"]
directions: ["Mix pineapple, sugar, cheese and flour together.", "Put in buttered dish.", "Cover with crumbs. Drizzle butter on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. finely minced onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 tsp. Lawry's seasoning salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Bring cheese to room temperature. Stir in pineapple, onion, green pepper, seasoning salt and 1 cup of pecans. Chill well. Form into 2 balls. Roll in remaining cup of pecans."]

title: Fresh Cranberry Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. cranberries", "2 c. sugar", "2 1/2 lb. grapes", "2 c. pecans", "2 c. pineapple tidbits", "1 c. whipping cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/3 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Grind cranberries.", "Add 2 cups of sugar and let stand 1 1/2 hours.", "Cut", "grapes", "in", "half.", "Drain pineapple and add to grapes and", "pecans.", "Beat\tcream;\tadd", "vanilla and 1/3 cup of sugar. Drain liquid off cranberries.", "Fold fruit mixture into cream."]

title: Kraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 qt. kraut, rinsed and drained", "1 onion, chopped fine", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 c. celery, diced", "1 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. oil", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix well.", "Place covered in refrigerator overnight. This is great served with pinto beans."]

title: Russian Tea Cake Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1/2 c. 10x sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. nuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix butter, sugar and vanilla thoroughly.", "Measure and sift flour and salt together.", "Blend in.", "Mix in nuts and chill dough."]

title: Cream Cheese Fruit Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "1 c. flour", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. nuts", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 small container Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix first four ingredients and bake for 15 minutes at 350\u00b0 in a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Crumble and cook 5 more minutes.", "Save 1/4 cup of crust mixture."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 c. sliced beets", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Drain beets; save 1/3 cup liquid.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Add beet liquid, vinegar and butter.", "Cook and stir until mixture thickens.", "Add beets; heat through.", "Serve hot."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. oil", "1 qt. sauerkraut", "2 carrots, shredded", "1 onion, chopped small", "1 c. celery, chopped small", "1 green pepper, chopped small"]
directions: ["Add all ingredients together.", "Let sit for at least 2 hours."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla; cream.", "Add flour, chips and nuts; mix together.", "Drop by scant teaspoon on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Wet fork and press down each cookie.", "Bake 15 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Makes approximately 100 cookies."]

title: Rice Casserole
ingredients: ["1/2 c. slivered almonds", "1 c. rice (brown or white)", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped", "1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 lb. butter"]
directions: ["Cook together until rice turns yellow, stirring often.", "Pour into greased casserole.", "Pour 3 cups chicken broth over mixture and cover tightly.", "Bake for 1 hour in 325\u00b0 oven."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["6 medium cooked, sliced beets", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, salt and cornstarch.", "Add vinegar; boil 5 minutes, stirring constantly.", "Add butter; pour over beets.", "Better if left overnight to improve flavor."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Gradually stir in pineapple and 1/2 cup pecans.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Shape into ball and roll in pecans.", "Serves 40.", "Recipe can be cut in half for smaller groups."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "2 tsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["In a medium bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Gradually stir in pineapple, 1 cup pecans, onion, salt and green pepper. Shape into a ball.", "Roll ball in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic or foil and refrigerate until well chilled (overnight)."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1/2 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix together and roll in pecans."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["4 sticks margarine", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "1 1/2 Tbsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream margarine, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour, chips and nuts.", "Mix well.", "Dough will be very stiff.", "Shape into walnut size balls.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until lightly browned.", "Let cool on rack.", "Store in airtight container. Makes 8 dozen."]

title: Nutty Nuggets
ingredients: ["3 1/2 c. flour", "2 c. butter", "8 Tbsp. sugar", "4 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 c. chopped pecan nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar well.", "Sift flour with salt.", "Add to butter mixture.", "Then add nuts and vanilla.", "Form into small balls.", "Place on lightly greased cookie sheet and bake at 350\u00b0 about 20 minutes.", "Remove from oven, cool and roll in generous amount of powdered sugar.", "Wait 5 more minutes and roll in sugar again."]

title: Pecan Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/4 c. honey", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Mix all ingredients together, then form into balls and bake until lightly browned. Let cool and roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Blueberry Pie
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 sticks margarine", "pinch of salt", "1 small pkg. pecans", "1 large Cool Whip", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "blueberry pie filling"]
directions: ["Mix flour, margarine, salt and pecans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until golden brown."]

title: Butter Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "preserves or nuts"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add vanilla.", "Add flour and salt; mix well.", "Shape rounded tablespoonfuls of dough into balls; place on cookie sheet.", "Indent centers; fill with preserves or nuts. Dough can also be put in a cookie press and, instead of preserves, can be decorated with sprinkles or large pieces of nuts.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Makes 3 dozen."]

title: Vegetable Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. garlic salt"]
directions: ["Blend ingredients well.", "Place in container, cover and chill. Best if prepared ahead of time."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 small onion", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. or less vinegar", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "3/4 c. cream", "1 1/2 c. or more mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Mix well in blender."]

title: Russian Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "pinch of salt", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1 Tbsp. sweet cream", "1 c. chopped pecans (fine)"]
directions: ["Cream the shortening, sugar and salt all together, then add remaining ingredients.", "Stir all together and roll in hard ball by hand the size of walnuts.", "Lay on cookie sheet; press down with spoon a little.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes and roll in powdered sugar while warm."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) Philadelphia cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix and form ball.", "Roll in about 3/4 cup chopped pecans."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 (16 oz.) can sliced beets, reserve liquid", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["In a medium saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Add vinegar and reserved beet juice; simmer, stirring constantly until thickened.", "Add beets and butter.", "Serve hot."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter or margarine", "24 oz. ketchup", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 tsp. onion or garlic salt", "4 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well and heat over low heat."]

title: Pecan Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. (2 sticks) butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. almond extract", "2 c. sifted flour", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar together in a medium bowl until light and fluffy.", "Stir in salt, almond extract, flour and nuts.", "Mix well.", "Chill dough for several hours.", "Shape dough into small balls; place on an ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake in moderate oven (350\u00b0) for 12 to 15 minutes.", "Transfer to wire racks.", "While still warm, roll in confectioners sugar.", "When cookies have cooled completely, sprinkle with more confectioners sugar.", "Makes about 5 dozen."]

title: Massengill'S Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar", "1/3 c. ketchup", "dash of Texas Pete", "dash of black pepper", "juice of 1 lemon", "2 Tbsp. flour"]
directions: ["Combine and bring to a boil to thicken."]

title: Baked Pineapple
ingredients: ["1 (15 oz.) can pineapple (tidbits or chunks)", "1 c. shredded or grated cheese", "3/4 c. flour", "3/4 c. sugar", "25 Ritz crackers, crushed", "3/4 stick butter or margarine, melted"]
directions: ["Pour pineapple and juice in 9 x 9-inch baking dish.", "Combine sugar, flour and cheese.", "Mix well and spread over pineapple.", "Mix butter and crackers and pour over flour mixture.", "Bake uncovered 25 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 can sliced beets", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. margarine"]
directions: ["In pan add sugar, corn starch, and salt with 2 Tbsp. of beet liquid. Heat over medium heat and stir until smooth. Add remaining liquid from beets. Then add vinegar and margarine. Heat until thickens. Stir constantly or it will stick. Add beets. Heat thoroughly."]

title: Vanilla Balls
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "6 Tbsp. superfine sugar", "1 c. chopped walnuts or pecans"]
directions: ["Cream the butter.", "Beat in cream and vanilla.", "Sift together the flour and superfine sugar.", "Add this gradually to the creamed mixture.", "Mix in the chopped walnuts or pecans.", "Chill.", "Pinch off in pieces and roll into small balls.", "Place 2 inches apart on greased baking sheet.", "Bake in moderately slow oven, 325\u00b0, for 20 minutes.", "Take from baking sheet and roll in vanilla sugar. Yield:", "3 1/2 dozen cookies."]

title: Butter Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter (do not substitute)", "3 heaping Tbsp. sugar", "3 c. flour", "3 Tbsp. cream (do not substitute)", "1 c. nuts, chopped (optional)", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Dough will be stiff.", "Roll out on floured surface and cut with small cutter.", "These do not rise or spread, so can be placed close together on cookie sheet.", "Make small indentation and put dab of tart jelly on each before baking. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until lightly browned around edges."]

title: Pineapple Polish Or Turkey Sausage
ingredients: ["1 lb. Polish or turkey link sausage, sliced", "2 large bell peppers", "1 large onion", "1 (20 oz.) can chunk pineapple in natural juice or light syrup, drained (save juice)", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Combine brown sugar, cornstarch and pineapple juice.", "Bring to a boil to make syrup.", "Saute first 3 ingredients in oil or margarine until wilted.", "(Do not cook.)", "Put sauteed ingredients in casserole dish, 13 x 9 x 2, with pineapple chunks.", "Pour syrup over ingredients in dish."]

title: Pineapple Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans or walnuts", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese and stir in crushed pineapple.", "Add 1 cup of nuts, green pepper, onion and seasoned salt.", "Form into ball or roll and cover with remaining nuts.", "Make 1 or 2 days ahead before serving."]

title: Beets With Pineapple
ingredients: ["1 lb. can tiny whole beets, drained (reserve liquid)", "1 lb. can pineapple chunks (unsweetened), drained (reserve liquid)", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/3 c. sugar (can use a lot less)", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Cook juice drained from beets and pineapple in saucepan with cornstarch, sugar and vinegar, stirring constantly, until thickened.", "Add salt and pepper to taste, drained beets and pineapple and butter.", "Cook slowly for 20 minutes and serve hot or cold.", "Serves 8."]

title: Mom'S Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. all purpose flour", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In bowl, mix all ingredients.", "Spoon drop on cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 approximately 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Apple Crisp
ingredients: ["5 c. cored, peeled apple slices", "1 c. sugar or 1/2 c. honey", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. quick cooking rolled oats", "1/2 c. unsifted all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Combine apple slices and 1 cup sugar in bottom of 2-quart casserole.", "Mix butter, oats, flour, brown sugar and walnuts. Sprinkle butter-oat mixture over apple combination.", "Bake in preheated 350\u00b0 oven for about 1 hour or until topping is browned and apples are tender.", "Serve warm, plain or topped with a small spoonful of ice cream."]

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: ["1/2 diced green pepper", "1 medium diced onion", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 (7 oz.) can mushrooms, drained", "1/2 lb. Little Smokie sausage", "2/3 c. cooked rice (hot)"]
directions: ["In 10-inch frypan, saute green pepper and onion in 1 tablespoon of soy sauce.", "Add mushrooms and saute until they are hot.", "Add Little Smokies and stir until heated thoroughly.", "Add alternately the rice and a small amount of soy sauce.", "Stir until thoroughly heated.", "Serve hot."]

title: Lady Finger Cookies
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Melt butter; add other ingredients and mix well.", "Mold dough into fingers and bake for 20 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Roll in powdered sugar while still hot.", "Do not use mixer; mix with hands.", "Makes 2 dozen."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (5 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 or 2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Combine with the other ingredients, reserving 1 1/2 cups pecans. Form into 2 balls. Roll in remaining chopped nuts. Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm."]

title: Cherry Pie
ingredients: ["2-crust pastry", "2 (16 oz.) cans tart cherries, drained", "1 1/3 c. sugar", "1/3 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. almond extract", "2 Tbsp. margarine"]
directions: ["Prepare pastry; line 9-inch pie plate with one crust.", "Preheat oven to 425\u00b0.", "Drain cherries."]

title: Raisin Celebration Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 c. raisins", "1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 drops almond extract", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Rinse and drain raisins; cream butter and sugar together.", "Add egg yolk and flavorings and blend well.", "Sift flour and salt and blend into creamed mixture.", "Stir in raisins.", "Drop by small teaspoonfuls onto greased baking sheet.", "Bake in hot oven (400\u00b0) 10 to 12 minutes.", "Allow to cool 2 or 3 minutes.", "With spatula, remove carefully to wire rack to cool."]

title: Fruit Burst Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. almond extract", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 c. finely chopped nuts", "Simply Fruit"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Blend in almond extract.", "Combine flour and salt.", "Add to mixture and mix well.", "Shape level tablespoons of dough into balls; roll in nuts."]

title: Chex Party Mix
ingredients: ["3 Cups Corn Chex Cereal", "3 Cups Rice Chex Cereal", "3 Cups Wheat Chex Cereal", "1 Cup Mixed Nuts", "1 Cup Pretzels", "1 Cup Garlic Flavored Bagel Chips"]
directions: ["Heat oven 250.", "Melt butter in large roasting pan in oven. Stir in seasonings gradually.", "Stir in remaining ingredients until evenly coated.", "Bake 1 hour stirring every 15 minutes.", "Spread on paper towel to cool.", "Store in airtight container.", "Makes 12 cups snack mix."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Spread
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed, drained pineapple", "1/3 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix well together.", "Cover and chill several hours. Serve with crackers.", "Makes approximately 1 1/2 cups.", "Can be made into a ball and rolled in additional pecans."]

title: Celery Dressing
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "1 Tbsp. celery seed", "1 Tbsp. salt", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 onion (walnut size), minced", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 c. oil"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in blender.", "Keep refrigerated."]

title: Surprise Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["30 slices white bread", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 stick melted butter", "sugar (to roll roll-ups in)"]
directions: ["Mix together the cream cheese, 1/4 cup sugar, egg yolk and vanilla.", "Cut crusts off bread and roll flat with rolling pan. Spread cream cheese mixture over bread and roll up like jelly roll.", "Dip in 1 stick melted butter, then in sugar.", "Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes or until brown.", "Can be cut in half."]

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups rice uncooked", "4 strips bacon", "2 med. carrots", "1/2 onion", "1 teaspoon salt and pepper", "1 tablespoon soy sauce"]
directions: ["Cook rice set aside. Fry bacon; add all other ingredients except soy sauce. Cook until veggies are tender; add rice and mix. Add soy sauce. Cook 5 mins. on low."]

title: Quickie Peach Cobbler
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 large can sliced peaches", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "brown sugar"]
directions: ["Cut 1/2 stick of margarine in bottom of large Pyrex bowl or long oblong cake pan.", "Heat peaches to boiling point.", "Mix sugar, flour and buttermilk together.", "Pour fruit in Pyrex dish and then pour flour, sugar and buttermilk over peaches.", "Cut 1/2 stick margarine over peaches and then sprinkle brown sugar on top.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven until brown, approximately 30 to 45 minutes."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add vanilla and stir in flour.", "Add potato chips and nuts.", "Drop by teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet. May put fairly close together as they do not spread much.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

title: Bacon Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["1 can whole water chestnuts", "1 lb. bacon", "1 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. barbecue sauce", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Cut water chestnuts in half; cut bacon in half.", "Roll chestnuts in bacon strip; secure with a toothpick.", "Place roll-ups in a square baking pan and bake in a 425\u00b0 oven for about 20 minutes."]

title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
ingredients: ["1 c. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 (13 oz.) can pineapple", "2/3 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 green pepper", "1/2 onion"]
directions: ["Bring sugar, cornstarch, pineapple, vinegar and soy sauce to boiling, then add pepper and onion.", "Put over rice."]

title: Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Beat together first 3 ingredients; then add the next 3 ingredients.", "Mix thoroughly with hands and form into 1-inch balls. On an ungreased pan bake at 325\u00b0 for 15 minutes (do not brown). Roll in confectioners sugar while still hot.", "Cool on waxed paper."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 c. walnuts, chopped", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. fine chopped green pepper"]
directions: ["Reserve 3/4 cup nuts.", "Mix all remaining ingredients in a bowl and store in refrigerator, covered, overnight.", "Form into 2 balls.", "Roll in reserved nuts."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/2 finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Beat cheese until smooth; add other ingredients except pecans. Roll in pecans."]

title: Chex Party Mix
ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "1 1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 1/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. Wheat Chex", "2 c. Rice Chex", "2 c. Corn Chex or Crispix", "2 c. pretzels", "1 c. salted mixed nuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 250\u00b0.", "Heat margarine.", "Stir in seasoned salt and Worcestershire sauce.", "In roaster, add Chex, pretzels and nuts.", "Pour mixture of margarine, seasoned salt and Worcestershire sauce on top.", "With a wooden spoon, stir well.", "Heat for one hour, stirring every 15 minutes.", "Spread on paper towels to cool."]

title: Freezer Pickles
ingredients: ["2 qt. pickles, sliced 1/2-inch thick", "1 onion, sliced", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Combine sliced pickles, onion, green pepper and salt together; let stand 2 hours.", "Stir together sugar and vinegar; bring to a boil.", "Drain pickles and add vinegar syrup; let cool.", "Put in freezer containers or will keep in the refrigerator up to 1 month."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper (optional)", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drain well", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Place chopped peppers, onions and pineapple on paper towel to absorb moisture.", "Blend all ingredients together well.", "Refrigerate and chill at least 1/2 hour.", "Shape into ball and roll in pecans.."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz) drained crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all together except 1 cup of the nuts.", "Form into a ball and cover with the cup of nuts."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. cooked diced beets", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. butter or oleo"]
directions: ["Canned beets or fresh beets may be used.", "In a saucepan, mix sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir in vinegar.", "Allow to boil 5 minutes, stirring constantly to make a thick, smooth sauce.", "Add cooked beets, diced or sliced, and allow the mixture to stand on warm heat for 1/2 hour to blend flavors.", "Just before serving, add butter.", "Reheat and serve warm."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 1/8 c. minced onion", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "3 c. ketchup", "3/4 c. vinegar", "6 Tbsp. brown sugar", "6 Tbsp. mustard", "6 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["In large saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender, but not brown.", "Stir in ketchup, vinegar, sugar, mustard, Worcestershire sauce and salt.", "Simmer 10 minutes.", "Makes triple recipe."]

title: Goldfish Chex Mix
ingredients: ["3 c. Corn Chex cereal", "3 c. Rice Chex cereal", "1 1/2 c. Pepperidge Farm cheese goldfish", "1 1/2 c. pretzel sticks", "1 c. peanuts", "1/2 c. margarine", "3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Melt margarine in microwave.", "Stir in Worcestershire sauce. Mix together cereals, snacks and peanuts in a large bowl.", "Pour butter mixture over top and sprinkle with seasoned salt.", "Mix well. Spread on cookie sheet and bake 1 hour at 250\u00b0, stirring occasionally."]

title: Mushroom Appetizer
ingredients: ["4 slices cooked bacon, crumbled", "1/4 c. drained chopped ripe olives", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 small onion, grated", "32 cleaned mushrooms, stems removed"]
directions: ["In medium bowl, combine the first 5 ingredients.", "Stuff mushrooms with mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes, then broil 5 minutes longer, until done."]

title: Gorgonzola-Sauced Pasta
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. Blue cheese (2 oz.)", "1/2 to 3/4 c. light cream", "dash of white pepper", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "1 lb. any cooked pasta"]
directions: ["Melt butter; add Blue cheese.", "Stir in light cream, pepper and Parmesan cheese.", "Toss cheese with pasta until coated.", "Serve immediately."]

title: Pineapple Pecan Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, soft", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped fine", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix pineapple, cheese, peppers, onions and salt.", "Add 1/2 cup pecans; mix well.", "Shape and roll ball in remainder of pecans. Chill well before serving with crackers of your choice."]

title: Sauerkraut Marinated Salad
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. sauerkraut", "1 c. chopped onion", "1 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. oil", "1/4 c. vinegar", "3/4 c. sugar", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Mix vegetables together.", "In a separate bowl, mix oil, vinegar, sugar and salt.", "Pour over vegetables.", "Marinate in refrigerator overnight.", "Stir occasionally."]

title: Teriyaki Marinade
ingredients: ["1 c. soy sauce", "1/2 c. oil", "1/4 c. molasses", "1 Tbsp. ginger", "1 Tbsp. dry mustard", "4 cloves garlic, diced"]
directions: ["Marinate beef, chicken or pork for 6 to 8 hours.", "Grill or broil."]

title: Green Grape Delight
ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "dash of cayenne pepper", "dash of garlic powder (or rub bowl with fresh garlic)", "4 c. seedless green grapes, halved", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients and mix until smooth.", "Gently fold in grapes and pecans.", "Chill thoroughly about 2 hours.", "Serve on lettuce leaves.", "Serves 4 to 6 people.", "May be served as dessert or a salad."]

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: ["bacon, diced", "carrots, diced", "green pepper, diced", "onion, diced", "celery, diced", "rice", "soy sauce"]
directions: ["Brown bacon and add diced vegetables.", "Boil your rice.", "Add rice to cooked vegetables, then add soy sauce to taste."]

title: Slaw Dressing
ingredients: ["1 medium onion, cut", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/3 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Put into blender.", "Blend all ingredients.", "May be used as a dressing for tossed salad as well as slaw."]

title: Heavenly Salad
ingredients: ["1 large pkg. lime Jell-O", "2 small pkg. cream cheese", "1 large can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. celery, cut fine", "1/2 pt. whipping cream", "2/3 c. nuts, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Drain juice from pineapple and add 1 cup water.", "Heat until boiling and pour over Jell-O and stir until dissolved. Add cream cheese and other ingredients in order.", "Last, fold in whipped cream. Chill until firm."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 pound can of diced beets drain and reserve juice", "2 tbsp. sugar", "1 tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt added to beet juice", "1/4 cup vinegar", "2 tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["In sauce pan heat all of the above except the beets till thickened and then add beets and butter making sure all is heated through.", "Very good and adds color to you meal."]

title: Pecan Butter Balls
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 Tbsp. salt", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Sift together flour and salt.", "Add margarine and vanilla and mix well.", "Add nuts.", "Roll in 1-inch balls.", "Put on ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 25 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Roll in powdered sugar and place on wax paper to cool."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots", "1 medium green pepper", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks in own juice", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Cook carrots until tender (about 15 minutes).", "Add green pepper (cut in strips).", "Cook 3 minutes more.", "Drain well.", "Drain juice from pineapple and add enough water to it to make 1/3 cup liquid.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir into pineapple juice.", "Add vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook until it boils.", "Add carrots, green pepper and pineapple."]

title: Pinto Bean Soup
ingredients: ["1 pkg. dried pinto beans, soaked", "2 slices salt pork", "1 large onion", "1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 tsp. Tony's seasoning", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in boiler.", "Bring to a boil and then turn down and let simmer over low fire for 1 1/2 to 2 hours."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 medium onion, minced", "1 small green pepper, minced", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce (French's)", "1 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. ketchup"]
directions: ["Melt butter.", "Add onion and green pepper; cook slowly for 2 minutes.", "Add remaining ingredients; simmer for 10 minutes. Yields 8 servings."]

title: Red Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["3/4 cup sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 onion, chopped fine", "1 cup oil", "3/4 cup ketchup", "1/4 cup vinegar", "1 Tbsp. worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. celery seed (optional)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and use as salad dressing on your favorite gathering of veggies."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese. Gradually stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup of pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Chill well.", "Form into a ball and roll in 1 cup of pecans.", "Chill until ready to serve."]

title: Pineapple Party Rolls
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "18 slices white bread, crusts removed", "1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted", "1 c. sugar, mixed with 1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix together cream cheese, pineapple, 2 tablespoons sugar and vanilla. Set aside."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 can diced beets", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Drain beets, reserving 1/3 cup of liquid.", "In saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir in reserved liquid, vinegar and butter.", "Cook and stir until mixture thickens and bubbles.", "Add beets; heat through.", "Serves 4 or 5."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 c. drained crushed pineapple", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and place in freezer for about 15 minutes.", "Roll on waxed paper in chopped pecans and form ball. Store in refrigerator."]

title: Rhubarb Butter Crunch
ingredients: ["3 c. diced rhubarb", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 1/2 c. quick oatmeal", "1 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter"]
directions: ["Combine rhubarb, white sugar and 3 tablespoons flour.", "Place in shallow 10 x 10-inch greased baking pan.", "Combine remaining ingredients.", "Mix with pastry blender.", "Spoon over rhubarb mixture. Bake 40 minutes in a 375\u00b0 oven.", "Serve warm with whipped cream."]

title: Pineapple Au Gratin
ingredients: ["2 (No. 202) cans pineapple chunks, drain and reserve juice", "6 Tbsp. flour", "Ritz crackers", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 stick margarine, melted", "1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix pineapple and cheese.", "Mix sugar and flour and add to pineapple.", "Place in casserole dish and cover with crushed Ritz crackers.", "Pour margarine over Ritz crackers.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "If too dry, use 6 tablespoons pineapple juice."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["beets", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Drain beets, reserving 2 tablespoons beet liquid.", "Mix sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Add vinegar and beet liquid.", "Cook, stirring constantly, until thick and clear.", "Add beets and butter; heat."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies-Crunchies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine or butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream margarine, sugar and vanilla.", "Add chips and nuts; stir in flour.", "With 1 tablespoon of dough, form balls.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Press balls flat with glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. broken pretzels", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "1 large can crushed pineapple in heavy syrup", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Melt margarine and 1/2 cup sugar in a 9 x 12-inch glass pan. Cook until bubbly.", "Pat pretzels into mixture.", "Bake 10 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Cool.", "Mix well the cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar and Cool Whip.", "Spread on cooled crust.", "Mix cornstarch into pineapple in saucepan.", "Cook until thick.", "Cool and spread on mixture."]

title: Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and bake 8 to 9 minutes at 325\u00b0."]

title: Calypso Beets
ingredients: ["1/2 cup crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 tsp. cornstarch", "#2 can beets, reserve juice", "2 Tbsp. butter", "Pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Heat to boiling: pineapple, beet juice and vinegar.", "Mix cornstarch and sugar and add to liquid.", "Cook until thickened. Add drain beets, butter and salt.", "Serve hot."]

title: Delicious Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["2/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1 tsp. grated onion", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 c. oil"]
directions: ["Mix together and shake in a jar."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and form into ball; shape.", "Roll in chopped pecans (optional).", "Serve with small, round crackers."]

title: Oriental Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["seasoned salt", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "2 small cans crushed pineapple", "3/4 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter, cream cheese, pineapple, pepper, onion and salt. Mix well.", "Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm.", "Makes 2 balls. For dip, thin out with pineapple juice."]

title: Mom'S Marinated Carrots
ingredients: ["2 lb. carrots, peeled, sliced and cooked until tender and drained", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1/2 c. oil", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. black pepper", "1 Tbsp. mustard"]
directions: ["Add the rest of the ingredients to the cooked carrots and marinate in refrigerator overnight."]

title: French Dressing
ingredients: ["2 c. Wesson or Mazola oil", "2 c. sugar", "2/3 c. ketchup", "2 tsp. salt", "1 onion, finely chopped", "2/3 c. vinegar", "2 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients and beat 20 minutes with hand mixer or 5 to 7 minutes in food processor.", "Add vinegar and celery seed; beat again until well mixed.", "Put in a jar and store in refrigerator."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. margarine", "3 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 1/2 c. potato chips (4 oz.)"]
directions: ["Cream margarine in mixer.", "Add sugar and vanilla and cream again.", "Add flour and beat well.", "Roll chips fine.", "Add nuts and chips.", "Drop by teaspoon on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes or until light brown.", "Cool; sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

title: Shortcut Caramels
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 lb. brown sugar", "1 can sweetened condensed milk", "1 c. corn syrup", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Line a 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan with foil; lightly butter foil.", "In a heavy 3-quart pan, melt butter over low heat.", "Add sugar, milk and corn syrup; mix well.", "Cook over medium heat, stirring often to 248\u00b0 (firm ball stage).", "Mixture should boil at a moderate steady rate over the entire surface, about 15 to 20 minutes.", "Remove from heat; immediately add vanilla and walnuts.", "Quickly pour into pan. Use a buttered knife to cut into 1-inch squares.", "Wrap in waxed paper."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. salt"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Gradually stir in pineapple, nuts (1 cup), green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into a ball. Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in foil and refrigerate."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. green pepper, diced", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Soften\tcream", "cheese.\tMix all ingredients using 1 cup chopped pecans.", "Form", "into", "ball and roll in remaining cup of pecans, crushed."]

title: Pecan Butter Balls (Cookies)
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt; work in butter and vanilla.", "Add 2 cups of nuts; mix well.", "Shape into 1-inch balls.", "Bake cookies in a slow oven, 325\u00b0, for about 25 minutes.", "Roll warm cookies in fine granulated sugar (I prefer to use powdered sugar).", "Makes about 4 1/2 dozen."]

title: Apple Dip
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. margarine", "1 c. chopped peanuts"]
directions: ["Mix cream cheese and margarine in microwave for 1 minute on 50% power.", "Add all other ingredients and let sit overnight in refrigerator.", "Serve with sliced apples."]

title: Corn Curry
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. butter", "1 1/2 to 2 c. fresh or frozen corn", "1/4 to 1/2 tsp. curry powder", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. dairy sour cream", "salt and pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Melt butter in skillet; add vegetables and curry powder. Cover and cook over low heat until vegetables are just tender (8 to 10 minutes).", "Stir in sour cream and season to taste.", "Heat, stirring constantly.", "Yield: 4 servings.", "(I usually double it; use 3 packages frozen whole kernel corn.)"]

title: Cocoons
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. flour", "dash of salt", "1 c. pecans", "1 c. butter", "7 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift flour and salt.", "Cream butter, sugar and vanilla; beat until light.", "Mix dry ingredients and cream mixture and blend thoroughly.", "Shape.", "Let stand in refrigerator overnight.", "Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in 325\u00b0 oven.", "Roll in powdered sugar.", "Makes about 4 dozen cookies."]

title: Butter Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter (1 stick)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "good pinch salt"]
directions: ["Soften butter to room temperature.", "Mix other ingredients thoroughly into butter; use hands, if necessary.", "Pinch off small pieces of mixture; roll into balls the size of large marbles. Place on cookie sheet.", "Make a small depression in each; fill this with some tart jelly or preserves.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven.", "Watch carefully, as they burn easily.", "(Cooking time:", "20 to 30 minutes.) Yields 24."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["1/2 stick butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. cheese", "1 c. pineapple chunks", "Ritz crackers"]
directions: ["Melt butter and mix in sugar and flour. Pour mixture over pineapple chunks placed in bottom of glass casserole dish. Top with cheese and crumbled Ritz crackers. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Anita'S Chopped Eggplant
ingredients: ["1 eggplant", "1 large onion", "2 to 3 Tbsp. oil", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 garlic clove, crushed"]
directions: ["Select firm, ripe eggplant with no bruises.", "Wrap in heavy wax paper and bake as directed.", "Remove from oven, peel into chopping bowl.", "Let cool for a few minutes.", "Chop medium fine.", "Grate in onion.", "Add crushed garlic, salt and pepper. Stir in vinegar and oil.", "Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours.", "Serve with bread rounds, crackers or as a side dish.", "For a variation, use diced tomatoes. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "pinch of salt", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. butter", "2 Tbsp. sour cream", "preserves of your choice"]
directions: ["In a large mixing bowl, mix the flour, sugar and salt.", "Cut in the cream cheese and butter until it has a corn meal consistency. Stir in the sour cream until pastry holds together.", "Form into a ball.", "Wrap and refrigerate for about 1 hour.", "Roll out on floured surface and cut into 3-inch rounds.", "Place preserves on bottom half.", "Moisten edges and fold over.", "Press edges with a fork to seal.", "Prick the top with fork and bake at 325\u00b0."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. margarine, melted", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 c. beets"]
directions: ["Melt margarine, add cornstarch, sugar and salt; then add vinegar and beets and heat until thickened."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
