directions: ["Put pineapple chunks and juice in bottom of casserole dish. Mix flour and sugar.", "Pour over pineapple.", "Melt butter and crushed Ritz crackers.", "Sprinkle crackers over mixture and top with grated cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans, divided", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper (optional)", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives (dried)", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt (optional)"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese to room temperature. Cream and gradually stir in drained pineapple until smooth. Add 1 cup pecans and chives. Chill mixture well. Place on plate and form into ball. Sprinkle pecans on top. Chill until serving time."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 (16 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper"]
directions: ["In medium bowl, beat cream cheese with fork until smooth. Stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic wrap.", "Refrigerate until well chilled, overnight.", "May garnish with pineapple slices and cherries.", "May be frozen."]

title: Bacon Wrapped Water Chestnuts
ingredients: ["2 cans whole water chestnuts", "1 lb. bacon", "1/2 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 tsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Wrap chestnuts in individual strips of bacon.", "Roll up and stick a toothpick in each.", "Place on cookie sheet.", "Bake in oven at 350\u00b0 until bacon is done (not crispy).", "Take out of oven."]

title: "My Favorite" Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "dash of garlic", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Mix all with 1/2 cup pecans.", "Form 2 balls and roll in chopped pecans."]

title: Chris' Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter, very soft", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "3 1/2 c. flour", "3 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Cream until fluffy.", "Drop on ungreased baking sheet by teaspoon.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Carrot And Raisin Salad
ingredients: ["4 or 5 carrots, grated", "1/2 c. raisins", "1/3 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. sugar", "juice of 1 lemon", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl.", "Chill and serve in lettuce cups."]

title: Pecan Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. butter (1/2 lb.)", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 to 2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix in order given.", "Form dough into small round balls and bake.", "Lift the balls from the baking sheet and roll in confectioners sugar until heavily coated.", "Bake at 275\u00b0 for 30 minutes, then increase temperature to 325\u00b0 and bake for 10 minutes.", "Amount: 4 dozen."]

title: Honey Cream Carrots
ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) can sliced carrots", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1/8 tsp. ginger", "1/4 c. honey", "1/4 c. sour cream", "2 Tbsp. slivered almonds"]
directions: ["Drain carrots.", "Melt butter in pan or microwave.", "Blend in ginger.", "Add carrots, honey and sour cream.", "Cook until carrots are heated.", "Add almonds.", "Serves 4."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 stick margarine", "2 c. crushed Ritz crackers"]
directions: ["Put pineapple chunks with juice in casserole.", "Mix flour, sugar and cheese; spread over pineapple.", "Melt margarine; mix with crackers.", "Sprinkle over mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

title: Microwave Peanut Brittle
ingredients: ["1 c. raw peanuts", "1 c. sugar", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "1 tsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine raw peanuts, sugar, salt and corn syrup.", "Microwave on High for 4 minutes. Stir.", "Microwave for 3 to 4 more minutes.", "Add butter and vanilla."]

title: Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 pt. sour cream", "1/2 lb. crumbled Blue cheese", "1 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3 Tbsp. cream or milk", "1 tsp. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Pour sour cream in mixing bowl.", "Add all ingredients except cheese.", "Mix well.", "Add cheese.", "Refrigerate 1 hour, then let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes before serving.", "Add additional milk or cream if a thinner dressing is desired."]

title: Party Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. cream cheese", "1 1/2 oz. Bleu cheese", "1 (5 oz.) jar smoked or sharp cheese", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. stuffed olives, minced"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients thoroughly.", "Cover and chill in refrigerator overnight.", "Form into a ball.", "Put 2 tablespoons finely minced parsley and 1/2 cup chopped nuts on a sheet of wax paper.", "Roll ball until it is completely covered.", "Keep refrigerated."]

title: Beet Relish
ingredients: ["2 c. coarsely shredded cooked beets", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar", "1 tsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "3 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in a bowl, then blend well.", "Chill thoroughly.", "Relish keeps well stored in refrigerator for about a week."]

title: English Peas In Sauce
ingredients: ["3 slices bacon", "1 chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 pt. whipping cream", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "salt and pepper", "English peas"]
directions: ["Cook bacon and onion in skillet until done.", "Add flour, whipping cream, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper.", "Drain peas and add to sauce and cook for a few minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 1/2 c. pecans (use 1/2 for mixing and 1/2 for rolling ball in)"]
directions: ["Mix together real well all ingredients and form into large ball; then roll in remaining nuts and chill."]

title: Caramels
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. corn syrup", "1 c. butter", "1 c. chopped nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Boil sugar, corn syrup, butter and half of the cream.", "Stir in remaining cream while candy is boiling.", "When candy forms a firm ball in cold water, add vanilla and nuts.", "Put in buttered pan. When cool, cut into small squares."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "2 tsp. curry powder", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. horseradish", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 to 2 tsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Glop all together and let stand for 1 hour."]

title: Corn Casserole
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 c. canned whole corn", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. sour cream", "3 strips bacon, fried crisp and crumbled"]
directions: ["Saute onion and pepper in butter until transparent and then place in casserole dish.", "Add corn, salt and sour cream; mix thoroughly.", "Cook in moderate oven for 20 minutes.", "(Cream must not boil.)", "Sprinkle very crisp bacon over top of casserole when ready to serve."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, diagonally sliced", "1 large green pepper, seeded and cut in 1-inch squares", "1 (15 1/2 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "1/3 c. sugar (taste for sweetness)", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 tsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce (can use low-sodium type)"]
directions: ["Cook carrots, covered, in small amount of water until just tender, about 15 minutes.", "Add green pepper; cover and cook 3 more minutes.", "Drain."]

title: Easy Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix butter, brown sugar, egg yolk and vanilla until smooth. Add flour and salt. Press into the bottom of a cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes. Frost; sprinkle with nuts (while warm). Cut into squares while warm."]

title: Alfredo With Pasta
ingredients: ["1/2 cup butter", "2 cup heavy cream", "1/8 teaspoon garlic powder", "1/8 teaspoon black pepper", "1-12 ounce box pasta", "1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Melt butter in medium saucepan over medium heat.", "Add cream, garlic powder and pepper.", "Simmer for 10 minutes or until thick. At the same time, bring water to boil and add your pasta.", "When alfredo sauce has reached desired consistency stir in Parmesan cheese.", "When pasta is cooked, serve or pasta plates with alfredo poured over the top."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped walnuts (reserve 1 c.)", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Cream the cheese until softened.", "Gradually stir in pineapple. Add remaining ingredients.", "Shape into 2 balls and roll in reserved nuts.", "Refrigerate.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Sin Pudding
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "1 stick margarine", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. plus 3 to 4 Tbsp. sugar", "1 large box chocolate or vanilla instant pudding", "2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 large Cool Whip"]
directions: ["First Layer (crust):", "Mix flour, 3 to 4 tablespoons sugar, margarine and 1/2 cup nuts and press into an 11 x 7 1/2-inch Pyrex pan.", "Preheat oven to 350\u00b0; cook 10 minutes at 300\u00b0."]

title: Southern Pralines
ingredients: ["3 c. brown sugar", "1 c. whipping cream", "2 Tbsp. corn syrup", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. margarine", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 1/4 tsp. vanilla extract"]
directions: ["In a large, heavy saucepan over medium heat, bring brown sugar, cream, corn syrup, and salt to a boil.", "Stir constantly. Cook until a candy thermometer reads 234\u00b0 (soft ball stage).", "Stir occasionally.", "Remove from heat, add butter but do not stir.", "Cool to 150\u00b0, about 35 minutes.", "Stir in the pecans and vanilla.", "Stir with a wooden spoon until candy just begins to thicken but is still glossy, about 5-7 minutes.", "Quickly drop by heaping teaspoon onto waxed paper.", "Spread to form 2-inch patties.", "Store in an airtight container."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla, potato chips, nuts and flour; mix well.", "Form into small balls and place on ungreased baking sheets.", "Dip bottom of a glass in sugar and flatten cookies.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes.", "Makes about 6 dozen."]

title: Thumbprint Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening (part butter)", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Mix well the shortening, sugar, egg yolk and vanilla.", "Mix flour and salt.", "Stir in.", "Roll 1 teaspoon dough into balls.", "Dip in slightly beaten egg white and roll in finely chopped nuts.", "Place on baking sheet and press thumb into center of each.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes.", "Fill cooked thumbprints with tinted confectioners frosting or candied fruit."]

title: Beets Royale
ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) can chunk pineapple (in its own juice)", "2 cans (1 lb. each) small whole beets", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "3/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar (omit if pineapple is in heavy syrup)", "1 c. juice (juice drained from pineapple plus beet juice if needed to make 1 c.)"]
directions: ["Heat juice.", "Thicken with cornstarch.", "Add vinegar, salt, pineapple chunks, beets and sugar (only if pineapple was in its own juice).", "Heat thoroughly."]

title: Corn Slaw
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can whole corn, drained", "1 small onion, chopped", "3 to 4 grated carrots", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. sugar", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Combine corn, onion, pepper and carrots.", "Combine sour cream, mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper.", "Combine vegetables and dressing.", "Refrigerate at least 2 hours.", "Serves 6 to 8."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. softened cream cheese", "1/3 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "8 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine first 6 ingredients; blend thoroughly.", "Form into a ball.", "Roll in finely chopped pecans.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Scotch Short Bread

directions: ["Preheat oven to 325\u00b0.", "Sift flour, cornstarch and salt into medium-size bowl; set aside.", "In large bowl, cream butter and superfine sugar until light and fluffy.", "With wooden spoon, gradually work in dry ingredients until thoroughly mixed.", "Press dough into an ungreased 11 x 7-inch or 9-inch square baking pan. Prick deeply all over with a fork.", "Score surface for serving size. Bake about 40 minutes or until light brown.", "Sprinkle with granulated sugar.", "Cool and cut.", "Yields 20 (1 1/2 x 2-inches)."]

title: Snowballs

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

title: Potato Chip Cookies

title: Cream Cheese Cookies

NER: ["hot sauce", "cayenne pepper", "brown sugar", "barbecue sauce", "black pepper", "chili powder"]

title: Cheese Ball

title: Pecan Drops

title: Cheese Ball

title: Holiday Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2- 8 oz. Cream Cheese, softened", "2 Tbsp. Green Pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. Onion, chopped", "1/4 Cup Crushed Pineapple, drained", "2 Tsp. Seasoned Salt", "2 Cups Pecans, chopped, divided"]
directions: ["Mix cream cheese, green pepper, onion, pineapple, salt and 1 cup pecans.", "Shape into ball and roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill for several hours and serve with crackers or fresh vegetables."]

title: Coffee Carnival
ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. Minute tapioca", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. strong coffee", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. cream, whipped"]
directions: ["Add tapioca and salt to", "coffee", "in double boiler.", "Cook 15 minutes or until tapioca is clear, stirring frequently.", "Add sugar, chill.", "Add vanilla.", "Fold", "in", "whipped cream.", "Serve in sherbet glasses."]

title: Almond Roca Bars
ingredients: ["1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 egg yolk", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 oz. Hershey bar", "chopped almonds"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, butter, egg, flour and salt.", "Spread in a 15 x 11-inch pan.", "Bake\t25", "minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Melt chocolate and spread on top of cookies.", "Press almonds on top of cookies."]

title: Epi'S Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. Heinz apple cider vinegar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 cloves garlic", "1/3 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. sugar", "3 c. Mazola corn oil"]
directions: ["Put vinegar, garlic, sugar, salt and mayonnaise in blender. Blend on medium speed and slowly add corn oil in a thin stream. Blend well. Pour into container. Refrigerate remainder."]

title: Rhubarb Crisp
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. diced rhubarb", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 c. brown sugar", "3/4 c. flour", "1/3 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. oatmeal", "3/4 c. margarine"]
directions: ["Mix rhubarb, flour, sugar and 1/4 teaspoon salt and spread in a greased pan.", "Sprinkle with nutmeg.", "Mix together remaining ingredients until crumbly.", "Sprinkle over top of rhubarb mixture. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons water over top.", "Bake in a 375\u00b0 oven until bubbly and light brown, approximately 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. drained, crushed pineapple", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all but 1 cup pecans; roll ball in remaining 1 cup pecans."]

title: Creme Dinucci
ingredients: ["crushed peanuts", "1 box Baker's semi-sweet chocolate, melted", "2 lb. 10x sugar", "3 Tbsp. cream", "2 Tbsp. vanilla", "1/2 block cream cheese (4 oz.)", "1/2 lb. soft butter"]
directions: ["Mix the last 4 ingredients; then sift in 10x sugar.", "Mix and form into a ball.", "Roll into 1-inch balls and place in refrigerator.", "(If mixture gets too soft to work with, refrigerate for 20 minutes.)", "Remove balls from refrigerator and coat in melted chocolate; then roll in crushed peanuts."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) box cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. salt", "2 c. pecans, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese set out until soft.", "Beat with fork or mixer until smooth.", "Slowly add drained crushed pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onions and salt.", "Mix well.", "Pour half of remaining pecans on piece of wax paper.", "Roll and press half the mixture in shape of a ball.", "Repeat with other half of pecans and mixture. Makes 2 balls.", "May freeze."]

title: Rose'S Cheese Ball(Serves 10 To 25)
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained completely dry", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 1/2 Tbsp. seasoning salt", "1/2 c. green pepper, diced", "1 c. chopped pecans (save 1/4 c. for garnishing)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well.", "Roll into a ball and roll ball over pecans reserved for garnishing.", "Can be made ahead of time."]

title: Crescents
ingredients: ["2 c. margarine", "2/3 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Form into crescents (or ball). Bake at 325\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes. Roll in powdered sugar baked."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. beets", "1/3 c. granulated sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. minced onion"]
directions: ["Cook beets until tender; cool slightly.", "Peel and dice.", "Blend sugar, salt and cornstarch in another pan.", "Add vinegar; stir until mixed.", "Cook until thick and smooth.", "Stir constantly.", "Add butter and onion.", "Stir; pour over beets (heat if desired).", "Makes about 6 servings."]

title: Sweet And Nutty Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 1/2 c. nuts", "1/4 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "salt"]
directions: ["Combine and mix well.", "Form into ball and roll in crushed nuts."]

title: Artichoke Dip
ingredients: ["8 oz. can artichokes (quarters of hearts)", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. grated parmesan cheese", "8 oz. cream cheese", "3 garlic cloves, minced"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 325\u00b0.", "Mash together all ingredients in a casserole dish.", "Sprinkle cheese on top.", "Bake 30-40 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown."]

title: Sand Tarts
ingredients: ["1 c. pecans", "1 c. all-purpose flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and mix well.", "Shape into balls and bake.", "Remove and roll in confectioners sugar."]

title: Cinnamon Cookies
ingredients: ["24 slices square bread, cut off crust", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 egg yolk", "1/4 c. sugar", "dash of vanilla", "butter"]
directions: ["Mix together cream cheese, egg yolk, sugar and vanilla.", "Roll bread until flat.", "Spread mixture on each slice (small amount). Roll like a jelly roll; dip into melted butter."]

title: Cheese Ball No. 2
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 stick margarine or butter", "1 1/2 tsp. anchovy paste", "1 onion (walnut size)", "12 pimento-stuffed olives"]
directions: ["Finely chop onions and olives.\tCombine all ingredients and mix well.", "Form", "into", "ball", "and", "chill", "at least 2 hours. Serve with favorite crackers."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, grated", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "3/4 c. pecans, chopped", "Town House crackers"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese.", "Add rest of ingredients and mix well. Place in round bowl and chill overnight.", "Serve with Town House crackers.", "Yields 50 servings."]

title: Pretzel-Pineapple Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 stick margarine, melted", "2 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 (20 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained"]
directions: ["Mix 1/3 cup sugar and pretzels into melted margarine.", "Put in flat dish and bake at 400\u00b0 for 7 minutes.", "Cool.", "Cream 1/2 cup sugar and cream cheese.", "Add pineapple and 1 (8 ounce) Cool Whip. Mix well.", "Spread over pretzel crust in dish.", "Top with second 8 ounces of Cool Whip."]

title: Favorite Cookie(Makes 3 Dozen)
ingredients: ["1/4 c. sugar", "1 c. butter (no substitute)", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. pecans, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter; beat in flour, vanilla and salt.", "Then stir in pecans.", "Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased baking sheet and make a thumbprint in each."]

title: Pea Salad
ingredients: ["1 can peas", "2 slices cheese", "1 small onion", "pinch of salt", "pinch of sugar", "mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Open can of peas, drain.", "Put in bowl.", "Dice cheese in with peas.", "Dice onion and add to bowl of peas.", "Add salt, sugar and mayonnaise to taste.", "Best when served cold."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained (save juice)", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix cream cheese, pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Use a little of the juice to mix.", "Refrigerate for 1 hour.", "Shape into ball; roll in remaining chopped nuts.", "Serve with assorted crackers."]

title: Dotty'S Frozen Cranberry Salad
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 (1 lb.) can whole cranberries", "1 (No. 1) can crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. nuts", "1 (4 oz.) Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix cream cheese, sugar and mayonnaise.", "Add cranberries, pineapple and nuts.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Freeze."]

title: Carrot Sandwich Filling
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, finely shredded", "1 c. celery, finely chopped", "mayonnaise to spreading consistency", "1/2 c. pecans, finely chopped (I usually use a few more)", "garlic powder to taste", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and it is best made the night before using, in order for garlic to season well.", "Use garlic freely."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["2 c. mayonnaise", "2 tsp. garlic salt", "2 tsp. curry powder", "2 tsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. horseradish", "2 to 4 Tbsp. grated onion"]
directions: ["Mix together and refrigerate overnight.", "Serve with raw vegetables.", "Yield:", "Serves a crowd."]

title: Winter Carrot Casserole
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. carrots (4 1/2 c.), sliced", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. prepared horseradish", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. crushed saltine crackers", "2 tsp. melted margarine"]
directions: ["Cook carrots in boiling salted water 10 minutes or until tender; drain.", "Place in 1 quart casserole.", "Combine mayonnaise, onion, salt, pepper and horseradish.", "Spoon over carrots.", "Mix crumbs and butter.", "Put on top of carrots.", "Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. (8 oz) cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1/4 c. celery, chopped", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine cheese, pepper, celery, pineapple, onion, 1/2 cup pecans, and salt.", "Mix together and chill in bowl in refrigerator. Remove from fridge and form into ball and roll in remaining nuts. Can be used now or freeze."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese, softened", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix well.", "Put in refrigerator to firm for handling.", "Form ball and roll in 1 cup finely chopped pecans."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients except 1 cup pecans.", "Mold into 1 large or 2 small balls.", "Roll balls in remaining pecans. Refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours before serving (can be frozen)."]

title: Chicken Veloute Sauce
ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. butter", "6 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. white pepper", "2 c. chicken stock", "3/4 c. cream"]
directions: ["Melt butter in a heavy saucepan.", "Add flour, salt and pepper, stirring to blend well.", "Gradually add stock and cook over medium heat until thickened.", "Add cream and heat through.", "Good served over sauteed or grilled chicken."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 c. finely shredded carrots", "3/4 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Combine the first 6 ingredients, mixing well.", "Shape into one large ball or two small balls.", "Refrigerate several hours or overnight.", "Roll in nuts.", "Serve with nuts."]

title: Slaw Dressing
ingredients: ["1 qt. mayonnaise (low cal or regular)", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. prepared mustard", "6 oz. vinegar", "9 oz. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix until well blended.", "Chill and use over any type cabbage slaw."]

title: Cream Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. finely minced onion", "1/4 c. green pepper, minced", "1 lb. crushed pineapple, drained and squeezed", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Mix all together by hand.", "Chill 2 hours.", "Form into balls and roll in additional chopped walnuts."]

title: Pineapple-Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "3/4 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients, mixing well.", "Shape mixture into ball.", "Refrigerate several hours or overnight.", "Roll in chopped pecans."]

title: Russian Beets
ingredients: ["2 large cans beets, coarsely chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. sour cream"]
directions: ["Brown onion in oil.", "Mix all remaining ingredients in the skillet with the onion. Serve hot."]

title: Vinaigrette
ingredients: ["1 c. olive oil (may use light olive oil or half olive oil and half vegetable oil)", "1/3 c. red wine vinegar", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. prepared Dijon mustard", "2 garlic cloves, peeled and sliced in half"]
directions: ["Place all ingredients except the garlic cloves in a 2-cup jar and seal well. Shake the jar until the sugar and salt are dissolved and ingredients well mixed. Add the garlic cloves and refrigerate until ready to use."]

title: Yummie Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, slightly drained", "2 c. chopped walnuts", "1/4 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cheese.", "Add pineapple, onion, pepper, Lawry's seasoned salt and 1 cup of nuts.", "Chill and roll in remaining nuts.", "Serve with crackers.", "Makes 1 very large or 2 small balls."]

title: Ham Glaze
ingredients: ["1 c. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 Tbsp. lemon", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "dash of salt", "1 small can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Boil until thickens.", "Cool and spread over sliced ham."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["3 sticks margarine", "3 small pkg. cream cheese", "3 c. sugar", "3 c. flour (do not sift)", "3 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and cream cheese.", "Add sugar.", "Add other ingredients.", "Refrigerate for at least 1 hour.", "Spoon out on cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Date Loaf Candy
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 c. light cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 lb. pitted dates", "1 lb. pecans"]
directions: ["Cook sugar, butter and cream until it forms a soft ball in cool water.", "Add vanilla and dates and beat until lukewarm.", "Add pecans and roll into a loaf and store in refrigerator until the next day.", "Slice."]

title: Cereal Stuff
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "4 c. Rice Chex", "4 c. Wheat Chex", "1 c. salted nuts", "pretzels (as desired)", "dash of garlic salt", "dash of cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Melt butter first, then combine all other ingredients.", "Cook at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes.", "Makes a great snack."]

title: Cocoons
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix together.", "Roll in finger lengths in palm of hand.", "Bake until lightly browned on bottom, about 10 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Cool slightly.", "Roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. instant minced onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans (1/4 goes in mixture)"]
directions: ["Mix all together.", "Make a ball and roll in remaining nuts on wax paper."]

title: Brown Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 c. flour", "vanilla", "nuts"]
directions: ["Make dough into small balls.", "Press down with a fork.", "Place 1/2 pecan on each cookie. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["5 c. cooked beets", "3/4 c. sugar", "3/4 c. vinegar", "6 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "3 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Slice beets and drain juice.", "Save liquid.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch and salt; blend well.", "Add 1 1/2 cups beet juice and vinegar.", "Cook until juice is thickened (about 10 minutes).", "Add beets and heat thoroughly.", "Serve with butter topping."]

title: Sour Cream Penuche
ingredients: ["1 c. granulated sugar", "1 c. brown sugar, firmly packed", "2/3 c. commercial sour cream", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Combine sugar and cream; heat to boiling, stirring until sugars are dissolved.", "Add butter; cover and cook over low heat 3 or 4 minutes.", "This dissolves any sugar crystals on the sides of the pan and keeps the candy from sugaring.", "Remove cover and boil to 236\u00b0 (soft ball).", "Remove from heat and cool to room temperature.", "Add vanilla and beat until creamy.", "Stir in chopped nuts.", "Turn into greased pan and let stand until firm.", "Cut into squares.", "Makes 1 1/2 dozen large pieces or 1 1/3 pounds."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["3 c. sliced beets, cooked or canned", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. margarine"]
directions: ["Drain beets.", "Keep 1/2 cup liquid; combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Mix with beet liquid, vinegar and margarine.", "Cook until thick, stirring constantly.", "Add beets and heat well.", "Let set a few minutes.", "Serves 5."]

title: Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add potato chips and pecans. Stir in flour.", "Form into small balls.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Press flat with bottom of tumbler dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 pkg. cream cheese", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 Tbsp. finely grated onion", "1/4 c. finely chopped olives", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except pecans.", "After thoroughly mixed, form into ball.", "Roll cheese ball in chopped pecans."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1/3 c. ketchup", "1 c. oil", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "garlic powder", "Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix ketchup, oil, sugar, vinegar and salt well; add a bit of garlic powder and Worcestershire sauce to taste."]

title: Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Have cheese at room temperature.", "Stir in pineapple, 1 cup pecans, pepper, onion and salt.", "Put in refrigerator until hard enough to shape into balls.", "Divide in half.", "Shape into two balls.", "Roll in remaining pecans."]

title: Sam'S Sauteed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "4 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 pkg. mushrooms (small)", "garlic", "salt", "small onion, chopped", "1/2 stick margarine or butter"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in skillet and cook over low heat until tender."]

title: Fresh Vegetable Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. horseradish or prepared mustard", "1 Tbsp. finely grated onion"]
directions: ["Mix well and chill."]

title: 1950'S Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter until fluffy.", "With a study spoon, mix in slowly the sugar, chips, flour, vanilla and pecans, one ingredient at a time.", "Drop by spoonfuls onto ungreased sheet, about 2-inches apart.", "Flatten with a greased and sugared glass bottom to about 1/4-inch thickness.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 10 minutes.", "Yields 5 dozen cookies."]

title: Toffee Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 c. butter or margarine", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 very large Hershey's chocolate bar", "1/3 to 1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Blend together flour, egg yolk, brown sugar, softened butter and vanilla. Pat into cookie sheet. Bake on buttered cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until golden. While baking, melt chocolate bar in top of double boiler. Remove cookies and while hot spread with melted chocolate and sprinkle on pecans. Cool and cut into squares."]

title: Chex Party Mix
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. margarine", "3/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "4 c. Chex cereal", "1/2 c. peanuts", "1/2 c. pretzels"]
directions: ["You will need 1 gallon zipper bag."]

title: Chocolate Pecan Pralines(From Hershey'S 1934 Chocolate Cookbook)
ingredients: ["1 c. granulated sugar", "1/2 c. light cream", "2 sq. Hershey's baking chocolate", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine sugars, cream and salt in a large saucepan.", "Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, to 228\u00b0 on candy thermometer. Remove from heat and add baking chocolate, broken into small pieces, butter and pecans.", "Return to heat, stirring constantly and cook to soft ball stage (234\u00b0).", "Remove from heat and add vanilla; cool 5 minutes.", "Beat 10 to 15 seconds or until slightly thickened.", "Quickly drop candy by large spoonfuls onto greased plates or waxed paper.", "If mixture becomes too thick to drop, stir in a tablespoonful of hot water.", "Yields 18 to 20", "medium pralines."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 onion, finely chopped", "1/2 c. nuts, finely chopped (to cover ball)"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients well.", "Shape into a ball. Roll in the finely chopped nuts. Refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving. Serve with assorted crackers."]

title: White Fudge
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/3 c. corn syrup", "1 c. nuts", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "1/8 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine sugar, sour cream, corn syrup, margarine and salt in pan.", "Bring slowly to a boil, stirring until sugar dissolves. Boil, without stirring, covered 3 minutes.", "Uncover and", "boil on medium heat to 236\u00b0 on candy thermometer.", "Remove from heat and let stand 15 minutes, without stirring.", "Add vanilla and beat until mixture starts to lose its glossy appearance in 8 minutes. Stir in nuts and pour into greased pan.", "Cool and cut into pieces."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. unsalted butter", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts (walnuts or pecans)"]
directions: ["Cream butter", "and sugar together.", "Add the egg yolk and vanilla, blending well.", "Blend in the flour, little at a time. Fold in", "the", "crushed", "chips and nuts.", "Drop by teaspoonful on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 15 minutes."]

title: Old Fashion Cabbage Salad
ingredients: ["1 tsp. mustard", "piece of butter", "1 Tbsp. flour", "pinch of salt", "sugar (enough to make it sweet)", "2 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Cook all ingredients and pour over chopped cabbage when cool."]

title: Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 c. heavy cream", "3 Tbsp. margarine", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/3 c. packed dark brown sugar", "dash of salt", "1/2 c. cocoa"]
directions: ["In heavy saucepan, stir cream and butter until butter melts and cream barely comes to boil. Stir in sugars until dissolved. Reduce heat. Briskly whisk in salt and cocoa.", "Remove from heat. Serve immediately or store in glass jar or covered non-plastic container."]

title: Olive Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "8 oz. Blue cheese", "1/4 c. butter", "2/3 c. olives, well drained and chopped", "1 Tbsp. snipped chives", "1/3 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Blend cream cheese, Blue cheese and butter, then stir in chives and olives.", "Chill slightly.", "Form into a ball.", "Chill well.", "Press walnuts over outside of ball.", "Serve surrounded with assorted crackers.", "Makes 3 cups."]

title: Carrot And Raisin Salad
ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) bag carrots", "1 pt. sour cream or King Sour", "1 c. raisins", "1/4 tsp. salt", "4 Tbsp. sugar or 4 packets Sweet 'N Low", "1 c. crushed unsweetened pineapple, drained"]
directions: ["Peel and grate carrots fine.", "Add remaining ingredients; blend.", "Chill and serve.", "Keeps well in refrigerator."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball(Appetizers)
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/4 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, crushed pineapple, one cup of pecans, onion, green pepper and seasoned salt until mixed well.", "Chill until firm.", "Shape into ball.", "Roll ball in remaining pecans. Garnish with parsley, sliced pineapple or cherries.", "Serve with assorted crackers.", "Reshape remaining ball for use again.", "May be frozen.", "Serves 15."]

title: Asparagus Rolls
ingredients: ["12 slices white bread, crust removed", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese in container already whipped", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives", "8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled", "24 asparagus spears", "1/4 c. melted butter or margarine", "Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Use a rolling pin to flatten each slice of bread.", "Combine whipped cream cheese, chives and bacon, stirring well.", "Spread bread with cheese mixture, covering edges.", "Place 2 asparagus spears on each slice of bread.", "Roll up and place seam side down on a greased cookie baking sheet.", "Melt butter and brush each roll with butter.", "Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and crushed bacon. Cook at 350\u00b0 until brown.", "Fasten edges of bread good with cream cheese mixture.", "You may wish to use toothpicks to hold bread closed."]

title: Russian Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "10x sugar", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla until fluffy.", "Sift flour and salt; add to butter mixture.", "Blend well.", "Add nuts and mix thoroughly.", "Shape into 1-inch balls and place on baking sheet. Bake in slow oven (325\u00b0) for about 20 minutes.", "Do not brown. Cool and roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Bacon Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 lb. bacon, cooked and drained", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "few drops Texas Pete", "chili powder"]
directions: ["Crumble bacon and combine with remaining ingredients, except chili powder.", "Chill 1/2 hour.", "Shape into ball on wax paper. Sprinkle with chili powder and cover ball evenly.", "Wrap and chill thoroughly."]

title: Snowballs(Swedish)
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "4 Tbsp. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. walnuts", "1 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Place in balls on lightly greased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "(Roll in hand.", "If crumbles, it is not done.", "Pick up and test.)", "Once done, roll in powdered sugar twice, once when hot, once when cool."]

title: Sauerkraut Cold Slaw
ingredients: ["1 can sauerkraut, chopped (rinse)", "1 c. celery, chopped fine", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix all the vegetables together.", "Add the remaining ingredients.", "Mix well.", "Pimento can be added for color. Refrigerate.", "The longer it stands the better."]

title: Sweet-Sour Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/3 c. oil", "32 oz. canned sauerkraut, rinsed and drained", "1/2 c. celery, chopped", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped", "1/2 c. onion, chopped", "1/2 c. carrots, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, vinegar and oil together until sugar dissolves. Combine sauerkraut and vegetables in large container.", "Pour dressing over vegetables, cover and refrigerate.", "Serve well chilled."]

title: Nutty Fingers *
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. 10x sugar (full)", "1/4 lb. or 1 stick margarine", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. unsifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix sugar and margarine and add nuts, flour, salt and vanilla. Roll into small balls or little rolls like your finger.", "Put on ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 350\u00b0 for about 30 minutes or until done.", "Allow to cool and roll in 10x sugar."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "dash of garlic salt", "3 to 5 dashes celery salt", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. chopped olives", "chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except pecans.", "Chill and roll into ball, then roll in chopped pecans.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 c. cooked beets"]
directions: ["Melt butter.", "Add cornstarch, sugar and salt.", "Then add vinegar and cook until thick.", "Add beets last and serve while warm."]

title: Winter Carrots
ingredients: ["4 1/2 c. carrots, cut into chunks and cooked until tender", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. horseradish", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "salt and pepper", "9 to 10 soda crackers", "1 Tbsp. melted margarine"]
directions: ["Roll crackers into crumbs; mix with melted butter.", "Place carrots in buttered dish.", "Mix mayonnaise, horseradish, onion, salt and pepper; pour over carrots.", "Cover with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Serves 6 to 8."]

title: Savory Trail Mix
ingredients: ["1 oz. miniature round buttery crackers", "3/4 oz. each: miniature pretzels, bite-size crispy wheat squares cereal and toasted oat cereal", "1 Tbsp. pumpkin seeds", "1 Tbsp. margarine", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 tsp. each: garlic powder and onion powder"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 275\u00b0.", "In a medium bowl combine crackers, pretzels, cereals and pumpkin seeds; set aside.", "In a 1-quart nonstick saucepan, melt margarine over medium heat; add Worcestershire sauce and seasonings.", "Stir to combine.", "Pour margarine mixture over cereal mixture and toss to combine. Transfer to a cookie sheet and bake for 30 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes to rearrange mixture.", "Place cookie sheet on a wire rack and let cool.", "Store in resealable plastic bags."]

title: Pineapple Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "3/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "3 Tbsp. minced onion", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine all the ingredients.", "Shape into 1 large ball or 2 small ones.", "Roll into pecans.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Blue Cheese Dressing Or Dip
ingredients: ["3 oz. cream cheese", "1/3 c. Blue or Roka cheese", "1/2 c. half and half", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. Dijon mustard", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 tsp. Beau Monde seasoning or celery salt"]
directions: ["Prepare 24 hours in advance.", "Better that way.", "Makes a great veggie dip."]

title: Marilyn'S Baked Mushrooms
ingredients: ["12 to 16 fresh mushrooms (medium size)", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "3 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 1/2 c. chopped bread cubes (1/2-inch dices)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. black pepper", "1 dash cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Heat 3 tablespoons of butter in large skillet.", "Place washed mushroom caps (stems removed and set aside) in skillet, caps down, and saute 3 minutes.", "Remove and arrange in buttered baking dish, rounded sides down.", "Heat rest of butter in skillet; saute onions, green pepper and finely chopped mushroom stems about 5 minutes.", "Stir in bread cubes. Fill mushroom caps, piling high in the center.", "Bake for 15 minutes."]

title: Oil And Vinegar Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "5 tsp. salt", "celery seed", "3/4 c. oil", "1 c. vinegar", "garlic (optional)"]
directions: ["Mix", "sugar,", "salt and oil.", "Add vinegar and shake well. Add celery seed and garlic; chill."]

title: Spinach Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1/3 c. white vinegar or lemon juice", "1 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 small onion, chopped or garlic", "3/4 c. oil"]
directions: ["Place in blender and blend until creamy."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion", "1/4 c. green pepper", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all but 1 cup pecans.", "Make into ball.", "Let stand overnight in refrigerator.", "Next day, roll in remaining pecans. Great for holiday parties."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. onion, chopped finely", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. ketchup", "3/4 c. apple cider vinegar", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Place all ingredients in a boiler; bring to a boil.", "Simmer for 30 minutes.", "Use with chicken on the grill, serve on ham or use with any barbecue dishes."]

title: Nutty Caramel Corn
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 1/3 c. corn syrup", "2 qt. popcorn", "2 c. nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cook sugar, butter and corn syrup; bring to a boil.", "Boil for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Add vanilla.", "Pour over popcorn.", "Break in small pieces."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix margarine, sugar and vanilla together; add potato chips and nuts.", "Mix well.", "Then add flour and mix well.", "Roll into small balls and place on cookie sheet; crush with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Nut Butter Balls
ingredients: ["2 c. plain flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Sift dry ingredients together.", "Work in melted butter and flavoring, mix well.", "Add nuts.", "Shape into little balls and bake 20 to 25 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar while hot."]

title: Mildred'S Guess Again Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. crushed potato chips"]
directions: ["Beat butter, sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add flour, potato chips and nuts.", "Mix well. Drop by scant teaspoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 12 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "3 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix first five ingredients together and add 1/2 cup chopped nuts.", "Roll and pat into a ball.", "Then press remaining nuts onto cheese ball.", "Serve with veggies."]

title: Bacon Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 stick margarine", "5 strips bacon (crisp)", "3 Tbsp. green olives", "1 Tbsp. onion", "garlic salt", "pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cheese and margarine; mix together and add bacon, onion, olives and garlic salt.", "Cool, then roll in pecans."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 c. grated sharp cheese", "5 dashes of celery salt", "1/4 c. chopped olives", "2 Tbsp. finely grated onion", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "dash of garlic salt", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except pecans.", "Chill and make into a ball.", "Roll in pecans.", "Chill until ready to serve."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "3 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "1 c. finely chopped nuts", "2 c. finely rolled potato chips"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar together until light and fluffy. Mix vanilla and flour together and add to sugar mixture.", "Add the nuts and potato chips by hand.", "Drop by teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Roll in confectioners sugar when cooled."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. softened butter (not margarine)", "1 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Drop by teaspoon on buttered baking sheet.", "Dip fork in water and press down.", "Bake in a 325\u00b0 oven for 15 to 20 minutes.\tCool completely on cookie sheet.", "When cool, sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

title: Ma'S Lentils And Macaroni
ingredients: ["1 c. lentils (uncooked)", "1 to 2 cloves finely chopped garlic", "1 medium finely chopped onion", "1 small can tomato paste", "1 tsp. sugar", "salt and pepper to taste", "oil", "1/2 lb. spaghetti"]
directions: ["Check through lentils and discard any miscellaneous seeds or darkened lentils.", "Rinse under cold water.", "Put lentils in a pan and cover with salted water.", "Cook until tender (about 15 to 20 minutes).", "In a frypan, saute onions and garlic in oil until tender and slightly brown.", "Add tomato paste and sugar to cooked lentils and mix well.", "Add onions and garlic.", "Mix well.", "Add salt and pepper to taste and add water to desired consistency."]

title: Fudge Cake Or Brownies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. pecans", "1 scant c. flour", "2 heaping Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. (or 1 tsp.) vanilla"]
directions: ["Melt butter.", "Add sugar, flour, cocoa and eggs. Add pecans. Oven at 400\u00b0, bake 20 minutes.", "Turn off oven in 15 minutes.", "Cool and cut."]

title: Party-Time Popcorn
ingredients: ["4 c. popped corn", "4 c. slender pretzel sticks", "2 c. small cheese crackers", "1 c. unsalted dry roasted peanuts", "1/3 c. melted butter or margarine", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 250\u00b0.", "Combine popcorn, pretzels, crackers and peanuts in large roasting pan.", "Stir butter, garlic salt and Worcestershire sauce in a small cup.", "Pour over popcorn mixture, stirring to coat evenly.", "Bake 15 minutes or until heated through. Yields 10 cups."]

title: Pecan Puffs
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter (1 stick)", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 c. sifted flour", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Mix well.", "Make into balls.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 45 minutes.", "Put 10x sugar into a bag; shake the puffs in the sugar."]

title: Pecan Shortbread
ingredients: ["1 c. unsalted butter (room temperature)", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 325\u00b0.", "Combine all of the ingredients in a mixing bowl.", "Mix thoroughly.", "When well blended, pat into a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.", "Prick top with a fork.", "Bake 40 minutes. Remove and place on wire rack to cool and harden.", "Cut into squares."]

title: Peas And Bacon
ingredients: ["4 slices bacon", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 can peas, drained", "1 c. light cream", "1 c. chopped mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. butter", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Fry bacon until crisp.", "Remove bacon and saute onion.", "Add flour and blend.", "Add cream to make a white sauce.", "Saute mushrooms in butter.", "Add peas, mushrooms and bacon, broken into small pieces, to cream mixture.", "Heat and serve."]

title: Caramel Nut Crunch
ingredients: ["1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/4 c. margarine", "1/2 tsp. salt", "6 c. Cheerios cereal", "1 c. pecans or peanuts"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 325\u00b0. Butter jelly roll pan (15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1 inch). Heat brown sugar, corn syrup, margarine and salt in a 3 qt. saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in cereal and nuts until well coated. Spread in pan and bake 15 minutes. Cool until slightly firm, 5 to 7 minutes. Loosen with metal spatula. Let stand until firm, about 1 hour. Store in covered container. Makes about 8 cups."]

title: Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["2 pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. cream", "1 tsp. garlic", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Mix well and serve with potato chips."]

title: Toffee Bars
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter or margarine", "1 c. brown sugar, lightly packed", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. flour (rounded)", "6 Hershey bars (without almonds)", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients.", "Spread in a cookie sheet with a rim (spread very thin, about 1/3-inch thick).", "Bake 20 minutes at 300\u00b0.", "Remove from oven and, while hot, cover with 6 Hershey bars (no almonds).", "Spread evenly and cover with chopped pecans.", "Cut into approximately 1-inch squares (diamond design) while still warm."]

title: Cheese Spread
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. chopped pecans (I use 1 c. in mix)"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese at room temperature.", "Mix all ingredients thoroughly with spoon.", "Refrigerate until firm enough to form a ball.", "Roll in 1 cup of pecans."]

title: Caramel Popcorn
ingredients: ["4 or 5 qt. popped popcorn", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. margarine", "1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Boil for 5 minutes.", "Mix with popcorn; cook 1 hour in a 250\u00b0 oven."]

title: Sweet And Sour Dressing
ingredients: ["2 c. oil (vegetable)", "3/4 c. vinegar", "1 small finely chopped onion", "2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. prepared mustard", "2 tsp. celery seed", "1 1/3 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix together until thick, about 10 minutes. Keeps well in refrigerator."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans or walnuts"]
directions: ["Cream the butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour, chips and nuts.", "Form balls about 1 inch in diameter.", "Place on an ungreased cookie sheet.", "Press down and bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 14 minutes. Makes 2 1/2 dozen."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 c. chopped walnuts or pecans", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Gradually add all other ingredients, saving 1/2 of nuts for garnish.", "Shape into one large or two small balls.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Refrigerate until chilled.", "Serve with your favorite crackers."]

title: Cream Of Carrot Soup
ingredients: ["1 onion, chopped", "2 cloves crushed garlic", "1 Tbsp. oil", "2 1/2 c. carrots, chopped", "3 3/4 c. vegetable stock", "2/3 c. sour cream", "salt"]
directions: ["Heat oil; cook onion and garlic.", "Add carrots and stock; boil about 25 minutes.", "Add sour cream and serve.", "Do not boil after adding cream."]

title: Pecan Pralines Candy
ingredients: ["1 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. molasses", "1 c. cream", "4 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Boil the sugar, molasses, cream and butter until when a drop of cold water forms a soft ball.", "Stir in the vanilla.", "Pour mixture over the nuts and stir until it begins to sugar.", "Drop from tip of spoon in small piles on buttered pans."]

title: Cheese Ball Appetizer
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "dash of salt", "1 c. chopped walnuts or pecans"]
directions: ["Place half of the chopped nuts (1/2 cup) on a dinner plate and set aside.", "Mix the remaining nuts with all other ingredients and form a ball or log.", "Coat the outside of the cheese ball by rolling in the reserved nuts.", "Refrigerate several hours or overnight.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Chex Party Mix
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 1/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 2/3 c. Corn Chex cereal", "2 2/3 c. Rice Chex cereal", "2 2/3 c. Wheat Chex cereal", "1 c. salted mixed nuts"]
directions: ["In large 4-quart bowl or a (13 x 9 x 2-inch) glass dish, melt butter on High for 1 minute.", "Stir in seasoned salt and Worcestershire sauce.", "Gradually add cereal and nuts, mixing until all pieces are coated.", "Microwave on High for 6 to 7 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes.", "Or bake in roasting pan for 1 hour at 250\u00b0 in oven.", "Spread on absorbent paper towel to cool."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (18 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped nuts (pecans)", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper"]
directions: ["Soften cheese. Stir in pineapple, 1 cup chopped pecans, green pepper, onion and seasoned salt. Chill. Form into ball and roll in remaining chopped pecans. Makes 1 large or 2 small balls. Freezes well."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "pinch of garlic salt", "1/2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except pecans.", "Form into ball. Roll in pecans.", "Let set overnight, covered, in refrigerator.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Rhubarb Crisp
ingredients: ["2 c. rhubarb", "3/4 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. flour", "6 Tbsp. oatmeal"]
directions: ["Cut up rhubarb; put on bottom of 8 x 8-inch pan.", "Mix the 3/4 cup sugar and 2 tablespoons flour; sprinkle over rhubarb.", "Mix remaining ingredients; sprinkle on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 40 minutes."]

title: Stir-Fry Peas And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. peas", "1/2 lb. mushrooms", "1/2 tsp. salt", "soy sauce", "vegetable oil", "1 onion"]
directions: ["Mix peas, sliced mushrooms, salt and diced onions in wok or frypan with oil.", "Add soy sauce to taste.", "Fry and serve."]

title: Traditional Chex Party Mix
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 1/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 2/3 c. Corn Chex cereal", "2 2/3 c. Rice Chex cereal", "2 2/3 c. Wheat Chex cereal", "1/2 c. nuts", "2 2/3 c. pretzels"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In a 15 x 10 x 2-inch baking pan, melt margarine in oven.", "Remove from oven and stir in seasoned salt and Worcestershire.", "Add cereal and nuts gradually, mixing ingredients until all pieces are evenly coated.", "Bake 20 to 25 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes.", "Spread on absorbent paper towels to cool.", "Store in airtight container."]

title: Walnut Short Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, melted", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. walnuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 325 degrees.", "Mix all ingredients and pat into a pan.", "Bake 40 minutes."]

title: Toffee Bars
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. all-purpose flour", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream the margarine, sugar and salt.", "Stir in the flour.", "Put into an ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 until lightly browned, about 15 minutes."]

title: Butter Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Soften butter to room temperature and mix in other ingredients.", "Pinch off small pieces, roll into balls and place on cookie sheet.", "Make a small dent in center and fill with a dot of jelly.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 20 minutes."]

title: Breakaway Vegetable Bread
ingredients: ["3 (10 oz.) cans refrigerated buttermilk biscuits", "1/2 c. margarine, melted", "1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "1/2 c. onion, chopped", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped"]
directions: ["Cut biscuits into quarters; dip each into melted margarine and layer 1/3 in a lightly-greased 10-inch Bundt pan.", "Sprinkle with half of the bacon, cheese, onion and green pepper.", "Repeat layer until all ingredients are used, ending with biscuits.", "Bake in a preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 40 to 45 minutes or until brown."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 tsp. grated onion", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix well and refrigerate.", "Serve with raw vegetables."]

title: Apple Crisp
ingredients: ["5 c. apple slices, cored and peeled", "1 c. sugar or 1/2 c. honey", "1 stick butter or oleo", "1 c. quick-cooking rolled oats", "1/2 c. unsifted all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Combine apple slices and 1 cup sugar in bottom of a 2-quart casserole.", "Mix butter, oats, flour, brown sugar and nuts. Sprinkle mixture over apples.", "Bake in preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 1 hour until topping is browned and apples are tender.", "Serve warm, plain or with ice cream."]

title: Welca Slaw Dressing
ingredients: ["1 medium onion, chopped", "1 c. or 1/2 c. vegetable oil", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix well, then add 1/3 cup of mayonnaise.", "This is also good on fruit."]

title: Holiday Cookie Recipe
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and sugar together, then add flour and cream together.", "Add nuts.", "Roll in balls.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar.", "Great at Christmastime!"]

title: Party Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "4 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Beat cheese until smooth.", "Stir in other ingredients and 1 cup of pecans.", "Shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill well before serving."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Cream the cream cheese until smooth.", "Add pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into a ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic wrap.", "Refrigerate until chilled (overnight).", "Let set out of refrigerator before serving, if too hard.", "Serve with assorted crackers."]

title: Pineapple-Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, pineapple, green pepper, onion and seasoned salt; mix well.", "Chill; shape into a 4-inch ball and roll in pecans.", "Yield:", "about 2 1/2 cups."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 c. all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter; add vanilla.", "Add chips and nuts and stir in flour.", "Form into balls and place on cookie sheet.", "Press flat with sugar coated glass.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 18 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese (room temperature)", "1 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream cheese until smooth; add pineapple, onion, green pepper and salt.", "Mix well.", "Add nuts and continue to mix.", "Shape into ball and refrigerate overnight.", "May roll in extra nuts before serving, if desired.", "Serve with assorted crackers."]

title: 1 Minute Fudge Frosting

directions: ["Place ingredients into saucepan.", "Bring slowly to full rolling boil.", "Stir constantly and boil 1 minute.", "Add 1 teaspoon vanilla and beat until thick enough to spread.", "If frosting becomes too thick, add approximately 1 tablespoon cream."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick butter or margarine", "1 c. crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 medium Cool Whip", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "8 oz. cream cheese"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Mix first 2 ingredients and spread in a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake for 5 minutes.", "Mix Cool Whip, cheese and sugar.", "Spread on crust.", "Drain pineapple.", "Add cornstarch to juice and cook until thick and clear.", "Add pineapple to cooked juice, spread on top of Cool Whip.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped fine", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients with half the nuts, then roll the cheese ball in the rest of the nuts."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except for 1 cup pecans.", "Shape and roll into 2 balls.", "Roll balls in 1 cup pecans.", "Refrigerate 6 hours."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Combine first five ingredients in a mixing bowl and shape into a ball. Roll cheese ball in nuts. Serve with your favorite crackers."]

directions: ["Let cream cheese soften.", "Mix cream cheese and pineapple with a fork.", "Add pepper, onion and pecans.", "Mix well.", "Shape into a ball and roll in remaining pecans.", "Wrap in plastic wrap; chill overnight.", "The longer it chills the better."]

title: Walnut Cheese Sticks

directions: ["Blend cottage cheese and 1/2 pound butter with a fork.", "Add flour and blend until dough holds together.", "Roll to 1/2-inch thick on lightly floured board.", "Spread dough with melted butter, then sprinkle with brown sugar and nuts.", "Cut into triangles 3-inches wide at base.", "Beginning at base, roll dough into sticks. Place point side down onto greased baking sheet.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until golden brown.", "Makes 3 dozen."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 1/2 c. chopped pecans", "dash of seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together except for 1/2 cup pecans.", "Shape into ball and roll in chopped pecans.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Dressing For Fruit Salad

directions: ["Beat until sugar is thoroughly dissolved and mixture is syrupy."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/4 c. diced green pepper", "1 Tbsp. onion, diced", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "2 c. nuts (1 c. mixed in and 1 c. rolled on outside)", "1 (8 oz.) pineapple, crushed and drained"]

directions: ["Make into small balls and bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes. Cool 5 minutes.", "Roll in powdered sugar.", "Cool 5 minutes more and roll in powdered sugar again."]

title: Cheese Ball

title: Gulliver'S Corn (Restaurant In L.A.)

Melt butter in another pan and stir in flour (do not burn).", "Stir butter and flour; pour into corn until slightly thickened.", "Place into oven-proof dish.", "Sprinkle with grated cheese and dot with butter.", "Melt under broiler.", "Makes 4 servings."]

title: Thumbprints

Dip", "in", "slightly", "beaten", "egg whites.", "Roll in finely chopped nuts.", "Place", "1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheet. Bake\tfor", "5 minutes at 375\u00b0.", "Remove from oven; place thumbprint in", "center. Bake for 8 more minutes.", "Cool.", "Thumbprint may be filled with jam."]

title: Guess Again Cookies

Bake in moderate oven, 350\u00b0, for 10 to 11 minutes.", "Remove to racks to cool.", "Makes about 5 dozen."]

title: Toffee Bars

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Mix ingredients together, adding pineapple last and using only 1 cup of nuts.", "Form into ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts. Refrigerate."]

title: Pineapple Nut Ball

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Mix the cream cheese, pineapple, onion, green pepper,", "and seasoned salt.", "Roll in chopped pecans."]

title: Rhubarb Pie

directions: ["Combine rhubarb, sugar, flour and salt.", "Let stand while making pastry.", "Line 9-inch pie pan with pastry.", "Fill with rhubarb mixture; dot with butter.", "Adjust top crust and seal edges.", "For sparkling top, brush with milk and sprinkle with sugar.", "Bake in very hot oven (450\u00b0) for 10 minutes; reduce heat to moderate (350\u00b0) and bake for 35 to 40 minutes more."]

title: Honey Popcorn Balls

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Let cream cheese soften to room temperature (it should be very soft to the touch). Add all ingredients, except pecans, and mix with portable electric mixer. Let chill and shape into 2 balls. Roll in finely chopped pecans."]

directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except ice cream.", "Press 1/2 of mixture into bottom of 9 x 13 pan.", "Spread with ice cream.", "Sprinkle remaining mixture over the ice cream.", "Freeze for 4 to 6 hours. Serves 12."]

title: Smothered Steak(From The Parsonage Kitchen)

title: Popcorn Balls

directions: ["Always\tmake", "the", "meringue", "with", "powdered", "sugar", "not regular white sugar and, this is the \"never fail\" part:", "add a couple of tablespoonfuls", "of marshmallow cream to the mixture. It doesn't", "affect", "the", "taste", "at", "all but guarantees a high fluffy meringue that doesn't fall or weep."]

title: Karo Crunch

title: Popcorn Balls

title: Russian Tea Balls

directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Combine ingredients in large bowl.", "Stir by hand until well blended.", "Add 1 cup flour to cream cheese mixture, stirring by hand until dough forms a ball.", "Knead in bowl or on floured surface 1 to 2 minutes, adding additional flour until smooth, pliable and not sticky.", "(Dough is easier to shape the more it is handled.)", "Shape or use cookie cutters to form cookies."]

title: Curry Vegetable Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. sour cream", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. horseradish"]

directions: ["Mix all together.", "Let meat marinate for at least 1/2 to 1 hour; longer if necessary.", "Great for beef:", "kabobs, chuck steaks, family steaks.", "Also good for chicken."]

title: Potato Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "3 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. oil", "2 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "salt"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and whip until all are blended.", "Pour over potato salad."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped nuts", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, except 1 cup nuts.", "Shape into ball.", "Roll cheese ball in 1 cup of the nuts.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Party Pecans
ingredients: ["1 lb. shelled pecans", "1 stick margarine, melted", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3 drops hot sauce", "garlic salt", "salt"]
directions: ["Spread pecans in an 8 x 8-inch square baking dish.", "(They should overlap each other.)", "Combine melted margarine, Worcestershire and hot sauce.", "Pour over pecans.", "Sprinkle with garlic salt and salt and stir well.", "Bake 45 minutes at 350\u00b0, stirring every 15 minutes.", "Spread on paper towels and sprinkle lightly with salt.", "Cool and store in an airtight container."]

title: Roquefort Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 tsp. celery salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 pt. sour cream", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 lb. Roquefort or Blue cheese"]
directions: ["Mix well.", "Store in refrigerator in covered container.", "Makes about 8 servings."]

title: Pepper Nut Spread
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 medium green pepper, chopped", "1/4 onion, chopped", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/4 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients thoroughly.", "Makes a great sandwich spread for parties."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 to 2 tsp. curry powder (try 1 tsp. and increase to taste)", "1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 tsp. prepared horseradish", "2 tsp. grated onion", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients until well blended and chill.", "Use as vegetable dip.", "Good alternative to Spinach or Dill Dip."]

title: Noel Nut Balls
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 cubes margarine", "1 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. pecans or walnuts"]
directions: ["Mix butter or margarine, sugar, salt and vanilla.", "Add flour. Mix in 2 cups nuts.", "Roll into balls.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 until done. Roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Rhubarb Or Apple Crunch
ingredients: ["3 c. rhubarb or apples", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. oatmeal", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Combine fruit, sugar and flour.", "Put into a greased 8 X 8 pan.", "Combine brown sugar, oatmeal, flour, butter and salt. Sprinkle over fruit and work in.", "Bake at 370 degrees for 40 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Frosting
ingredients: ["1 box 10x sugar", "5 heaping Tbsp. cocoa", "1 stick butter", "1 large can cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 pinch salt"]
directions: ["Mix sugar and cocoa together.", "Add cream, butter, vanilla and salt and stir well.", "Cook until thickened, stirring constantly."]

title: Oil And Vinegar Dressing
ingredients: ["2 c. oil", "2 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. salt", "2 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1 tsp. black pepper"]
directions: ["Mix, shake well and pour over greens."]

title: Popcorn Balls
ingredients: ["1/2 c. corn syrup", "1/2 c. molasses", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. corn"]
directions: ["Pop corn.", "Put the well popped kernels in a large bowl, discarding unpopped kernels.", "Salt.", "Combine corn syrup, molasses and vinegar in a saucepan.", "Boil to 270\u00b0; remove from stove.", "Add butter.", "Pour slowly over popped corn; mix with a spoon.", "Press lightly into balls as soon as it is cool enough to handle."]

title: Mexican Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. butter", "pinch of salt", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream the butter, sugar and flour.", "Add salt, vanilla and nuts.", "Form into small balls.", "Bake on lightly greased cookie sheet at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Roll in powdered sugar; repeat again when cold.", "Makes 2 1/2 dozen."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. potato chips, crushed", "1/2 c. walnuts, chopped finely"]
directions: ["Cream margarine, sugar and vanilla together. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can pineapple", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 1/2 c. pecans, chopped fine (1/2 c. in cheese mixture, 1 c. to roll ball)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients thoroughly.", "Let chill for 1 hour.", "Form ball and roll in remaining cup of nuts.", "Make 2 to 3 days ahead of serving and keep in refrigerator."]

title: Pam'S Carrot Soup
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 small onion, chopped fine", "1 medium potato, diced", "1 lb. carrots, chopped", "3 c. vegetable stock", "1 pinch sugar", "2/3 c. half and half", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Melt butter in pan.", "Add onion, potato and carrots.", "Cover and cook on low heat for 10 minutes.", "Add stock and sugar.", "Boil, then simmer for 30 minutes.", "Puree in blender.", "Return to pan and stir in half and half and heat (do not boil)."]

title: Date-Nut Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. margarine", "1/2 lb. cream cheese", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 lb. dates, cooked with 1 c. water", "1 c. nuts", "3/4 c. sugar"]
