directions: ["Heat oven to 375\u00b0.", "Mix margarine, cream cheese and flour to make dough.", "Cook dates with 1 cup water, stirring until thick, to make filling.", "Add nuts and sugar to date mixture.", "Roll out dough and cut with biscuit cutter.", "Place filling on circle.", "Fold in half and seal with fork.", "Dip in sugar.", "Bake on middle shelf for 20 minutes."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, saving 1 cup of pecans. Chill and form into a ball. Roll in extra pecans."]

title: Strogie
ingredients: ["1 small porterhouse steak", "3 Tbsp. oil (peanut)", "3 tsp. black pepper", "1 c. flour", "2 c. chopped white/yellow onion", "Worcestershire sauce", "sour cream"]
directions: ["Cut porterhouse into small strips (bite sized).", "Heat oil and black pepper in skillet (hot).", "Toss steak pieces in flour.", "Remove and shake off excess flour.", "Brown in hot oil.", "Reserve steak. Cool skillet slightly (add more oil or liquid, Worcestershire). Add slowly and cook chopped onion.", "When onion is transparent, return steak to skillet, add a big dollop of sour cream over all and warm slightly."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion or flakes", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. fine nuts (inside)", "1/2 c. nuts (outside)"]
directions: ["Mix.", "Form ball and refrigerate.", "Roll in nuts after 2 hours."]

title: Boiled Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "3 c. oatmeal", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Bring to a boil the first 4 ingredients. Cook for 2 minutes. Remove pan from fire; add the remaining ingredients. Stir well, then drop mixture from a spoon onto waxed paper, allowing cookies to cool. Makes 30 to 40 cookies. Try adding peanut butter; try 1/4 cup at the end of the cooking time."]

title: Shortbread Drops
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 c. raisins"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Blend in egg yolk, vanilla and salt. Mix well.", "Stir in flour.", "Mix in raisins.", "Drop by small teaspoons onto greased baking sheets.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown.", "Makes 4 dozen."]

title: Holiday Blue Cheese Spread
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese", "2 (4 oz.) pkg. Blue cheese, crumbled", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 1/2 tsp. prepared mustard", "1/8 tsp. black pepper"]
directions: ["Beat together cheeses until smooth.", "Blend in remaining ingredients.", "Chill overnight."]

title: Brown Eyed Susan Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine, half melted", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together except nuts.", "Roll into balls. Place on cookie sheet and press down in middle with your thumb. Bake at 325\u00b0 until light brown.", "Cool and fill with your choice of frosting.", "Top with nuts."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drain well on paper towels", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all, except pecans, chill and form in a ball.", "Roll in pecans.", "Serve with Wheat Thins or buttery crackers."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies(Low Sugar)
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine or butter", "1/2 c. sugar or 4 packs sweetener", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "3/4 c. ripple potato chips, crushed", "2 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Melt margarine, add sugar and vanilla.", "Stir until fluffy. Add flour, potato chips and nuts; mix well.", "Drop by teaspoon 2-inches apart.", "Flatten cookies by back of spoon.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 to 350\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes.", "Cool before removing from pan. Note:", "When you substitute sugar for sweetener, cookies are softer."]

title: Lentils And Rice (Imjadara)
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. lentils", "3/4 c. rice, rinsed (Riceland, short grain)", "1 small onion, diced", "1 small onion, diced and fried in butter", "4 Tbsp. butter", "salt"]
directions: ["In 4 cups of water, boil lentils, diced onion and 4 tablespoons butter for 30 minutes.", "Add fried onion in butter to lentil mixture.", "Add rice and cook slowly until rice is done.", "Add salt to taste.", "Serves 6.", "Very good with cabbage salad with Lebanese Salad Dressing."]

title: Red Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "minced onion", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Place all ingredients into shaker jar.", "Shake until blended. Serve chilled over tossed greens."]

title: Chocolate And Peanut Butter Truffles(Makes About 3 Dozen)
ingredients: ["1 c. Reese's peanut butter cups", "3/4 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. Hershey's cocoa", "1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk (not evaporated milk)", "1 Tbsp. vanilla extract", "finely chopped nuts, unsweetened cocoa, graham cracker crumbs or confectioners sugar"]
directions: ["In heavy saucepan, over low heat, melt chips with butter. Stir in cocoa until smooth.", "Add sweetened condensed milk and vanilla; cook and stir until thickened and well blended, about 4 minutes.", "Remove from heat.", "Chill 2 hours or until firm enough to handle.", "Shape into 1-inch balls.", "Roll in any of the listed coatings.", "Chill until firm, about 1 hour.", "Store, covered, in refrigerator."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped bell peppers", "1 small onion, chopped", "2 c. chopped pecans, divided 1 c. for inside, 1 c. for outside", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "Lawry's seasoned salt to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Shape and roll in chopped pecans.", "Chill until ready to serve.", "Serve with assorted crackers."]

title: Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. 10x sugar", "6 sticks margarine", "6 c. flour", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "6 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Blend sugar with margarine that is at room temperature.", "Add flour, salt and vanilla.", "Mix in walnuts. Roll dough into 1/2-inch diameter balls. Bake at 325\u00b0 for approximately 20 minutes per tray.", "Shake cookies in a plastic bag with 10x sugar."]

title: Crackly Corn
ingredients: ["4 qt. popped corn", "1 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Put popped corn in large greased pan.", "Combine sugar, butter, corn syrup, salt and vanilla.", "Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until mixture boils.", "Boil 5 minutes.", "Pour over corn. Stir to coat well.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Stir every 15 minutes while baking.", "Store in tightly covered container."]

title: Pecan Fingers(Makes  4 To 5 Dozen)
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "4 Tbsp. sugar", "2 c. plain flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Melt butter and add all other ingredients; mix thoroughly. Mold into finger-shapes or balls.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Remove and roll in confectioners sugar twice.", "Enjoy!", "Mmm!"]

title: Leona'S Nut Caramels(Margaret Wagner)
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. corn syrup", "1 c. whipping cream", "1 c. half and half", "1 c. butter", "1/2 c. nuts (optional)", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Put sugar, syrup, whipping cream and butter in pot; stir until boils.", "Then add half and half.", "Place immediately in buttered pan.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 c. pretzels", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 (10 oz.) can pineapple, drained", "1 small tub Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix melted butter, 1/3 cup sugar and pretzels together and bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes. When you remove it from the oven, let it cool."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese soften to room temperature; cream until smooth.", "Mix thoroughly with the pineapple, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Roll in the pecans; serve at room temperature.", "Makes 2 cup size balls."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1/4 c. sugar", "2 tsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. margarine", "1 (No. 2) can cut or small whole beets"]
directions: ["Mix in a saucepan sugar, cornstarch, salt, vinegar, margarine and 1/3 cup liquid, drained from beets.", "Bring to a boil, stirring constantly.", "Add beets.", "Let simmer 10 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Casserole
ingredients: ["2 cans chunked pineapple (undrained)", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "6 tsp. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 stick margarine", "1 c. crushed Ritz crackers"]
directions: ["Mix flour and sugar.", "Add other ingredients, except margarine and cracker crumbs.", "Put in baking dish.", "Top with crushed crackers.", "Pour melted butter on top.", "Bake for 30 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks margarine", "3/4 c. sugar", "2 c. plain flour", "1/2 c. pecans", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add rest of ingredients.", "Spoon onto cookie sheet by teaspoonful.", "Flatten out.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. small fresh mushrooms", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "dash of salt", "dash of Worcestershire sauce", "black pepper to taste", "1 c. grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Rinse mushrooms and pat dry.", "Remove stems (stems may be used in other recipes).", "Place caps on a greased baking sheet.", "Combine remaining ingredients, except 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.", "Mix well.", "Spoon mixture into mushroom caps.", "Sprinkle each with reserved cheese.", "Bake mushrooms at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Serve warm."]

title: Asparagus Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["1 can asparagus, drained", "1 slice bread (for each spear)", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 onion, chopped fine", "dash of Lawry's seasoned salt", "10 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled", "dash of garlic powder"]
directions: ["Trim crust of bread and roll flat.", "Mix cheese, onion, bacon and spices.", "Spread small amount on each slice of bread.", "Roll around asparagus spear and wrap in plastic wrap.", "Freeze."]

title: Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/4 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except 1 cup pecans.", "Shape into 2 large balls and roll in 1 cup pecans."]

title: Refrigerator Pickles
ingredients: ["4 c. sugar", "4 c. vinegar", "1 1/3 tsp. turmeric", "1 1/3 tsp. celery seed", "1 1/3 tsp. mustard seed", "1 1/3 tsp. salt", "onion slices"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, vinegar and spices.", "Stir until dissolved.", "Have pickles washed and sliced.", "Pack cold in jars with onions on top. Fill with cold liquid, seal and store in refrigerator.", "Will be ready to use in 1 week."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. walnuts, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Cream butter, then add sugar, egg and vanilla. Blend well. Add flour, chips and nuts; mix well.", "Drop off teaspoon on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Spinach Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. vegetable oil", "1/3 c. ketchup", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Put sugar, vinegar, oil, ketchup and salt in a pint jar; shake until all the sugar is dissolved.", "Pour over salad and serve immediately.", "Any variety of fresh vegetables can be used."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1 c. potato chips, crushed (5 c. uncrushed)", "sugar"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In large mixer bowl, beat butter on medium speed until softened (about 30 seconds).", "Add 1/2 cup sugar and vanilla.", "Beat until fluffy.", "With mixer on low speed, gradually add flour and potato chips, beating until well mixed.", "Drop by rounded teaspoons about 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten dough with fork dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes or until golden.", "With pancake turner lift the cookies onto a cooling rack.", "Makes 36 cookies."]

title: Brownies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. cocoa", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add eggs, one at the time, beating well.", "Sift flour and cocoa together and blend with creamed mixture.", "Add vanilla and pecans. Pour in square pan and bake 45 to 50 minutes at 325\u00b0."]

title: Chewy Cheesecake Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 cup butter", "3 oz cream cheese", "1 cup sugar", "1/2 cup chopped pecans", "1 tsp vanilla", "1 cup flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter and cream cheese together.", "Add sugar.", "Beat well.", "Add other ingredients and mix."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 qt. (4 c.) sauerkraut", "1 c. diced green pepper", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. diced onion", "2 c. diced celery", "1 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Boil sugar and vinegar for 5 minutes; cool.", "Add remaining ingredients; refrigerate."]

title: Best Chilled Beets
ingredients: ["3 cans (16 oz. each) sliced beets", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 c. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "3 Tbsp. ketchup", "1 tsp. vanilla", "25 whole cloves, tied in a cheesecloth bag"]
directions: ["Drain the beets, reserving 1 1/2 cups of juice in a large saucepan.", "Add cornstarch to juice and mix well.", "Add beets and remaining ingredients; bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat and simmer until the sauce is slightly thickened, stirring often.", "Remove spice bag.", "Cover and refrigerate overnight.", "Yield: 10 to 12 servings."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can sauerkraut, drained", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. chopped green pepper", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Squeeze juice out of sauerkraut; add celery, pepper and onion. Combine sugar, oil and vinegar.", "Toss well with sauerkraut mixture.", "Marinate 24 hours.", "Drain well and serve."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks Parkay margarine (room temperature)", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. potato chips, crushed"]
directions: ["Cream together margarine and sugar.", "Add remaining ingredients and blend well.", "Form into small balls or drop from teaspoon and place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake 13 to 15 minutes at 325\u00b0."]

title: Pineapple-Nut Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. (8 oz. each) cream cheese", "1/2 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained well", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients except 1 cup chopped nuts.", "Form into ball and chill.", "Reform ball and roll in the remaining nuts, covering the ball with nuts.", "Chill several more hours before serving.", "This makes a large cheese ball.", "I would suggest dividing it into 2 cheese balls."]

title: Snap Crackle Popcorn And Nuts
ingredients: ["16 c. popped corn", "1/2 c. pecans", "1 1/2 c. walnuts", "1 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. margarine", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 250\u00b0.", "Put corn and nuts in large open roasting pan.", "Prepare caramel coating.", "In heavy 2-quart saucepan over medium heat, heat sugar, margarine, syrup and salt to boiling. Boil 5 minutes, stirring frequently.", "Remove saucepan from heat and stir in vanilla.", "Pour hot mixture over popcorn and nuts, stirring to coat well.", "Bake 1 hour, stirring occasionally.", "Spoon onto waxed paper to cool, stirring occasionally to separate.", "Store in tightly covered containers to use within 1 week."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 large can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion, fine", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper, fine", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together and roll into a ball.", "Ball can be rolled in additional pecans for garnish if desired.", "Chill."]

title: Mushroom Bjahi(Indian)
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "1 large onion, sliced", "1 stick butter or margarine", "1 tsp. chili powder", "1 tsp. turmeric", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Melt butter.", "Saute onion until clear.", "Add spices and salt. Add mushrooms.", "Cook until done."]

title: Walnut Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. fine, ground walnuts", "1 tsp. vanilla", "sugar or confectioners sugar (optional)"]
directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt together.", "Cut in butter with dough blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.", "Add walnuts and vanilla; blend.", "Work dough with hands to form a ball using 1 teaspoon dough.", "Place on greased cookie sheet and bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes.", "Cookies may be rolled in sugar or confectioners sugar while still warm."]

title: Crispix Mix
ingredients: ["7 c. Crispix cereal", "1 c. salted nuts", "1 c. pretzels", "3 Tbsp. margarine, melted", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Combine pretzels, cereal and nuts in a large microwave bowl. Stir remaining ingredients together and pour over the cereal mixture.", "Gently mix to coat the cereal mixture.", "Microwave on High for 4 minutes, stirring after 2 minutes.", "Spread on paper towels to cool.", "Eat or store in an airtight container."]

title: Pecan Crescents
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "2 c. sifted flour", "6 Tbsp. powder sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Make into balls and bake at 350\u00b0 for 10-15 minutes.", "Roll in powder sugar."]

title: Water Chestnut Hors D'Oeuvres
ingredients: ["1 lb. pkg. bacon", "1/3 c. brown sugar", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "2 (8 oz.) cans water chestnuts", "1 tsp. mustard", "2 tsp. margarine"]
directions: ["Wrap each water chestnut in 1/2 strip of bacon and secure with toothpick.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 40 minutes or until bacon is done. Remove to chafing dish.", "In a small saucepan, combine remaining ingredients over low heat to make sauce.", "Pour over chestnuts. Keep warm."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple.", "Chop the green peppers and onions fine.", "Mix all ingredients, saving 1 cup pecans.", "Chill for 1 hour or unti firm.", "Form into ball and roll in last cup of pecans."]

title: Sweet 'N Sour Sauce
ingredients: ["15 oz. can pineapple chunks, drained (reserve juice)", "1/3 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 green pepper, cut up"]
directions: ["In large saucepan, combine pineapple juice, vinegar, cornstarch, brown sugar and soy sauce.", "Stir until well mixed. Add pineapple and green pepper.", "Cook over medium heat until thickened, about 5 minutes.", "Stir frequently.", "Use whenever Sweet 'N Sour Sauce is needed."]

title: Nana'S Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick melted butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 large can crushed pineapple", "8 oz. cream cheese", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["First Layer:", "Mix and press into dish, butter, sugar and pretzels."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["2 lb. bag sauerkraut", "1 c. diced onion", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. diced celery", "1/2 c. diced green pepper", "2/3 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Heat sugar and vinegar together until sugar is dissolved. Pour over other ingredients.", "Stir well.", "Will keep in refrigerator for weeks."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["In medium bowl, with fork, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Gradually stir in crushed pineapple.", "(The secret to this ball is to drain pineapple and squeeze between paper towels until it is so dry as to have no moisture at all.)", "Stir in 1 cup of pecans, then green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into a ball; roll in remaining nuts (1 cup). Wrap in plastic wrap or foil.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Garnish with pineapple slices, cherries and parsley."]

title: Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. soft butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients well.", "Chill dough for 1 hour.", "Shape into small balls.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Roll at once in confectioners sugar.", "Cool and roll again.", "Makes approximately 4 dozen."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (2 lb.) pkg. sauerkraut, drained", "1 green pepper", "1 medium onion, cut fine", "1 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. Mazola oil", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and let stand in bowl at room temperature for 1 hour.", "Put in covered container and refrigerate. Will keep good", "in refrigerator."]

title: Sweet And Sour Dressing
ingredients: ["2 c. oil", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. white vinegar", "1 Tbsp. mustard", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 large onion, grated", "2 Tbsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Pour all ingredients into blender and blend.", "Put into a quart container and use as needed."]

title: Scalloped Pineapple
ingredients: ["2 (20 oz.) cans chunk pineapple *", "6 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. sugar", "3 c. grated Cheddar (sharp or mild) cheese", "Ritz crackers", "1 stick melted margarine"]
directions: ["*Save out 6 tablespoons juice.", "Use rest of juice."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. chopped or crushed potato chips", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add pecans, flour, vanilla and potato chips.", "Roll in small balls.", "Take a small glass rolled in sugar and mash cookies.", "Bake on ungreased pan at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes.", "Makes 3 dozen cookies."]

title: Fruit Christmas Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. almond extract", "2 c. flour", "3/4 c. chopped peanuts or walnuts", "Kraft strawberry or red raspberry preserves"]
directions: ["Beat margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Blend in extract.", "Add flour.", "Mix well. Shape level measuring tablespoonfuls of dough into balls.", "Roll in nuts.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Flatten slightly.", "Indent centers.", "Fill with preserves. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes or until browned.", "Yields 3 dozen."]

title: Rice Salad
ingredients: ["4 c. cooked rice (not instant)", "9 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "3 Tbsp. vinegar", "6 Tbsp. corn oil", "1 1/2 c. mayonnaise", "2 tsp. salt", "3 c. chopped celery", "1 1/2 tsp. curry powder", "1 pkg. cooked frozen peas"]
directions: ["Cook rice.", "While rice is hot, stir in onion, vinegar, oil, curry powder and salt.", "Gently add peas.", "Chill.", "After rice mixture is completely cool, add celery and mayonnaise."]

title: Pecan Ball Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 c. butter", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour, salt and chopped pecans.", "Mix thoroughly and form into small balls.", "Bake in 325\u00b0 oven for 20 to 25 minutes.", "(Make the balls as small as possible)."]

title: Sweet Southern Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. Dijon mustard", "2 tsp. salt", "3 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2/3 c. apple cider vinegar", "2 c. vegetable oil", "3 Tbsp. poppy seed or chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Place the sugar, mustard, salt, onions and vinegar in a blender or food processor; blend until smooth.", "In a steady stream, pour in vegetable oil and continue to blend until thick. Add poppy seed or pecans.", "Keep covered in refrigerator.", "Makes about 4 quarts.", "(This dressing will keep indefinitely.)"]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. Blue cheese, crumbled", "1/4 c. soft butter", "2/3 c. drained chopped ripe olives", "1 Tbsp. minced chives", "1/3 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients, except nuts.", "Roll in ball and chill. Remove and roll in chopped nuts."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "2/3 c. chopped nuts", "2 c. finely rolled potato chips"]
directions: ["Cream the butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Mix in flour and nuts. Drop by teaspoon on ungreased sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes.", "Cool on paper towels dusted with powdered sugar.", "When cool, sprinkle powdered sugar on top."]

title: Barbecue Steak Marinade
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soy sauce", "1/2 tsp. ginger, ground", "1/4 c. oil", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 c. honey", "2 tsp. garlic salt or powder"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Place steaks in marinade and refrigerate 24 hours.", "Turn meat after 12 hours.", "Grill to desired doneness."]

title: Bleu Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["1/3 c. mayonnaise", "1/3 c. sour cream", "1 1/2 oz. Bleu cheese, crumbled", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "dash of Tabasco to taste", "dash of garlic powder to taste", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and chill."]

title: Steak And Gravy
ingredients: ["1 lb. cubed steak", "1 c. ketchup", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 medium onion, sliced", "garlic flakes", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, salt and pepper for sauce.", "Place serving size pieces of steak in greased casserole dish.", "Pour sauce over steak.", "Top with onion slices. Sprinkle with garlic flakes.", "Cover with foil and bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Creamy Rice And Pineapple
ingredients: ["1 tsp. salt", "1 c. rice", "2 c. sugar", "3 tsp. vanilla", "1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple with juice", "1 (16 oz.) Cool Whip", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened"]
directions: ["Cook rice in salted water until done. Drain water if there is much left.", "Add 1 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons vanilla & pineapple to rice. Let cool. Combine cream cheese, remaining cup of sugar & remaining teaspoon of vanilla until smooth. Fold in Cool Whip. Add to cold rice mixture."]

title: Party Mix
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 1/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 2/3 c. Corn Chex cereal", "2 2/3 c. Rice Chex cereal", "2 2/3 c. Wheat Chex cereal", "1 c. roasted salted mixed nuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In 15-inch by 10-inch by 2-inch baking pan melt butter in oven.", "Remove.", "Stir in seasoned salt and Worcestershire sauce.", "Gradually add cereal and nuts, stirring until all pieces are evenly coated.", "Bake 20-25 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes.", "Spread on absorbent paper to cool.", "Serve immediately or store in air-tight container."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or oleo", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Drop by teaspoon on a cookie sheet. Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Sour Cucumbers Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "dash of black pepper", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1/3 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients together and refrigerate.", "Pour over cucumbers about 1/2 hour before serving. Salt cucumbers and refrigerate.", "Pour off water."]

title: Maple Pie
ingredients: ["1 c. heavy cream", "1 c. maple syrup", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. butter", "dash of black pepper"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and cook on top of stove, stirring constantly, until mixture begins to thicken.", "Pour into pie shell and cover with crust. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 3/4 hour."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. softened cream cheese (8 oz.)", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/4 chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. nuts (walnuts, pecans)"]
directions: ["Mix cheese with salt.", "Add pineapple, 1 cup of nuts, peppers and onion.", "Chill mixture well, then shape into ball.", "Roll in 1 cup of nuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Unique Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. drained crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Save some nuts to roll the cheese ball in.", "Mix all ingredients; shape into 1 or 2 balls.", "Roll in the remaining nuts and chill."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped walnuts or pecans (use 1 c. for inside of ball, the remaining is used to cover the outside of ball)", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all together (use only 1 cup of nuts).", "Shape into ball. Roll in remaining cup of nuts. Wrap in Saran Wrap and refrigerate overnight. Serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped nuts (walnuts)", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all, 1 cup nuts, together.", "Chill and roll in remaining nuts after shaping.", "Refrigerate well."]

title: Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["4 c. finely chopped carrots", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. sour cream", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. raisins", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Place carrots and some water in blender; chop and drain in colander.", "Add raisins and mix.", "Let stand 30 minutes.", "I mix from time to time.", "Mix mayonnaise with sugar and sour cream; stir into carrots and raisins.", "Serve on salad plate lined with lettuce leaf.", "Sprinkle with chopped walnuts.", "Do not add walnuts to salad until ready to serve as they will become soggy and spoil the salad!", "Wait until the last minute.", "Stores well in refrigerator. Tastes great!"]

title: Curried Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 tsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Mix well.", "Serve with assorted raw vegetables."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 scant Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix well and shape into a ball.", "Chill."]

title: Kate'S Party Mix
ingredients: ["3 c. Cheerios cereal", "3 c. Crispix cereal", "1 c. pretzels", "1 c. peanuts", "1 cube butter, melted", "3/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 tsp. Lawry's seasoning salt", "3/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix cereals, pretzels and peanuts together. Mix salts and Worcestershire sauce into melted butter. Pour over cereal and mix well. Bake at 200\u00b0 for 2 hours, stirring every 30 minutes. Store in a tight container."]

title: Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter, softened", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg yolk (save white)", "2 3/4 c. flour"]
directions: ["In large bowl, combine all ingredients, except flour; blend well.", "Stir in flour.", "Chill.", "Preheat oven to 375\u00b0.", "On lightly floured surface, roll out 1/8-inch thick.", "Cut into shapes.", "Bake for 7 to 10 minutes, until brown.", "Frost."]

title: Flaky Pineapple Squares
ingredients: ["4 c. flour", "1 lb. butter or margarine", "1 c. sour cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. drained crushed pineapple", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Cut margarine or butter into flour with pastry blender.", "Add sour cream and vanilla.", "Mix well; refrigerate for 2 hours.", "Cook pineapple, sugar and cornstarch over medium heat, stirring constantly until thick and clear.", "Cool."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 tsp. celery salt", "1 tsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. curry powder"]
directions: ["Mix together in small bowl until well blended.", "Serve chilled."]

title: Cold Pickles
ingredients: ["3 1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. turmeric", "2 Tbsp. salt", "3 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1 large onion, sliced", "1 tsp. mustard seed"]
directions: ["Put all in gallon jar and mix well.", "Add sliced pickles.", "Put in refrigerator for 3 days.", "Shake once a day."]

title: Guamanian Fried Rice
ingredients: ["3 c. cooked rice, long grain", "1 medium onion, cut into crescents", "2 garlic cloves, chopped", "2 tsp. Mrs. Dash Garlic 'N Herb", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 bag frozen mixed vegetables of any style", "1 small can mushrooms", "1/4 c. soy sauce (more or less)"]
directions: ["In a large frypan, saute onion and garlic in butter.", "(My wife prefers nonfat cooking spray, which she uses if she's preparing this recipe.)", "Add mushrooms and frozen vegetables.", "I use the Oriental style.", "Sprinkle Mrs. Dash over vegetables."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 c. crushed pretzels", "1/3 c. sugar", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "20 oz. crushed, drained pineapple", "16 oz. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["In a 9 x 13-inch pan, put first 3 ingredients.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 7 minutes; let cool.", "Mix together cream cheese, sugar, pineapple and Cool Whip.", "After baked pretzels have cooled, add to cream cheese mixture.", "Serve immediately (pretzels get soft if not served within an hour or so)."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients, using only a little of the pecans. Chill. Shape into a ball and roll in remaining pecans. Serve with crackers. Makes 2 1/2 cups."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Add pineapple to cream cheese. Mix pepper, onion and salt. Add 1/2 cup nuts. Form into two balls.", "Roll in remaining nuts."]

title: Butter Pecan Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. packed brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "4 tsp. cornstarch", "3/4 c. whipping cream", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugars and cornstarch. Gradually stir in cream until smooth; bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Cook and stir for 2 to 3 minutes or until slightly thickened. Remove from heat; stir in butter until melted. Add pecans. Serve warm over ice cream or pound cake."]

title: Sweet-Sour Italian Dressing
ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. red wine vinegar", "1 c. olive oil", "2 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Blend in electric blender.", "Serve at room temperature."]

title: Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Add all ingredients in order as listed.", "Mix until dough forms a ball.", "Form into one inch balls.", "Bake in oven at 400\u00b0 for 14 to 17 minutes.", "While hot, roll in confectioner sugar.", "Cool and roll in sugar again."]

title: Sara'S Dressing
ingredients: ["3/4 tsp. curry powder", "juice from 1/2 lemon", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. mustard", "3 Tbsp. oil"]
directions: ["You will need jar with lid."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (No. 2 1/2) can sauerkraut", "1 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 medium size chopped green pepper", "1 c. grated carrots", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Cook vinegar and sugar until syrupy and pour boiling hot over ingredients slowly.", "Let stand 12 to 24 hours.", "Mix occasionally. Good with beef or pork."]

title: Mom'S Macaroni Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. macaroni *", "3/4 c. celery, chopped", "few slices onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. oil", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 c. mayonnaise (add more as needed)"]
directions: ["Cook macaroni. Add remaining ingredients.", "Mix together and refrigerate.", "Best to do 1 day ahead and refrigerate to let flavors permeate."]

title: Basic Herb Vinaigrette
ingredients: ["4 cloves garlic, finely minced", "3 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "3/4 c. red wine vinegar", "2 c. olive oil", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "3 tsp. dried Italian herb blend", "salt and pepper, freshly ground to taste"]
directions: ["Combine in a blender and let stand at room temperature for several hours to allow the flavors to mellow.", "Store covered in the refrigerator, but return to room temperature before using. Makes 4 cups.", "Use this in Pasta Salad A La Greque."]

title: Peachy Chutney
ingredients: ["1 medium onion, chopped", "1 clove minced garlic", "1 c. seedless raisins, chopped", "2 Tbsp. mustard seed", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "1 c. crystallized ginger, chopped", "8 lb. peeled and chopped peaches", "1 tsp. salt", "1 qt. vinegar", "2 1/4 c. dark brown sugar"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in Dutch oven.", "Bring to a boil and simmer uncovered for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until mixture is thickened and deep brown.", "Pour into hot canning jars, leaving 1/2-inch space at top.", "Remove air bubbles.", "Process for 10 minutes in boiling water.", "Remove jars from water and let cool, 12 to 24 hours.", "Yields 6 pint jars."]

title: Microwave Pralines
ingredients: ["16 oz. box light brown sugar", "1 (1/2 pt.) whipping cream", "2 c. pecans", "1/4 c. margarine", "pinch of salt", "1/4 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine sugar and whipping cream in bowl.", "Microwave on High for 13 minutes.", "Remove and quickly add butter, pecans, salt and vanilla.", "Beat the mixture, then spoon out by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper.", "Allow to cool."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. minced onion", "3 c. diced beets"]
directions: ["Blend sugar, salt and cornstarch in double boiler.", "Stir in vinegar, then cook until smooth and thick, stirring constantly. Add butter, onion and beets.", "Heat an additional 20 minutes."]

title: Homemade Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. cream cheese", "1/4 lb. Blue cheese", "3/4 c. sour cream", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "salt and pepper", "celery salt"]
directions: ["Mash cream cheese and Blue cheese together.", "Blend in sour cream and mayonnaise.", "Add salt, pepper and celery salt to taste. Thin with milk, if needed."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. crushed pineapple, drained well", "1/3 c. green pepper, grated", "1 Tbsp. onion, grated", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's salt", "2 c. peanuts or walnuts (save 1/2 to roll cheese ball in)"]
directions: ["Leave cream cheese at room temperature.", "Make sure pineapple is well drained.", "Mix all ingredients well.", "Roll in nuts.", "Place in refrigerator until time to serve.", "Serve on crackers."]

title: Vinegar And Oil Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 c. vegetable oil", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. ketchup", "1 tsp. finely chopped onion"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in a small jar with a tight lid.", "Shake until well mixed.", "Makes about 1/3 cup of salad dressing."]

title: Carrot Soup
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "3/4 c. onion, chopped", "3 c. carrots, chopped", "4 c. chicken stock", "2 Tbsp. tomato paste", "2 Tbsp. plain raw rice", "salt and white pepper", "1/2 c. heavy cream", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["In a heavy saucepan, melt butter over moderate heat.", "Stir in onion and cook five minutes until soft, but not brown.", "Add carrots, stock, tomato paste and rice.", "Simmer 30 minutes.", "Puree the soup through a food mill or blender until smooth.", "Season and stir in cream.", "Reheat before serving.", "Add butter and garnish with carrot curls.", "Serves 6."]

title: Toffee Nut Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "2 cups flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 6 oz. pkg. choc. chips", "1/2 -1 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Mix together all ingredients. Put in a 9x13 cake pan. Bake 25 minutes at 350 degrees. Cut while hot."]

title: Thumbprint Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft shortening (half butter)", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar, egg yolk and vanilla thoroughly.", "Sift together the flour and salt and stir in.", "Roll into 1-inch balls. Dip in slightly beaten egg whites.", "Roll in finely chopped nuts (3/4 cup).", "Place 1-inch apart on ungreased baking sheet.", "Press center with spoon or thumb.", "Bake until set, about 10 to 12 minutes at 375\u00b0.", "Cool.", "Place jelly in center."]

title: Stephen'S Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. oil", "1/2 lemon (juice)", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. mustard", "3/4 tsp. curry powder", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Mix all together in a jar with a lid.", "Shake up very well."]

title: Nutty Fingers
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter, softened", "pinch of salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "3 c. flour", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients thoroughly.", "Pinch off and shape in fingers.", "Bake in moderate oven on a greased cookie sheet.", "When cold roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Waldorf Salad
ingredients: ["1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. honey", "1 1/2 c. peeled, cored and diced green apples", "1/2 c. walnuts", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1 c. diced celery", "1/2 c. halved seeded green grapes"]
directions: ["Mix together and chill."]

title: Mexican Cakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. margarine", "1 c. chopped nuts", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix well and roll in small balls, size of walnut.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for about 12 to 15 minutes.", "Roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Zucchini Salad
ingredients: ["2/3 c. vinegar", "1/3 c. oil", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1 onion, chopped fine", "1/2 c. celery", "1/2 green pepper"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients and pour over thinly sliced zucchini.", "Let set at least 1 hour before serving."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 can beets", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Use 1/2 of liquid in can.", "Pour in saucepan.", "Mix together vinegar, cornstarch, sugar and salt.", "Bring to a boil; add beets and butter.", "Heat until hot all the way through."]

title: Cranberry Butter
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 lb. margarine", "1 c. honey", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. frozen chopped cranberries", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Whip the butter and margarine until smooth. Add honey and sugar. Add cranberries and nuts. Whip until smooth. Add red food coloring if not dark enough."]

title: Party Mix
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. butter or oleo", "4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 c. Corn Chex cereal", "2 c. Rice Chex cereal", "2 c. Wheat Chex cereal", "3/4 c. salted mixed nuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 250\u00b0.", "Heat butter in 9 x 13-inch pan in oven until melted.", "Remove.", "Stir in Worcestershire sauce.", "Add all cereals and nuts; mix until all pieces are coated.", "Heat in oven for 45 minutes; stir every 15 minutes.", "Spread on paper towels to cool.", "Makes about 7 cups."]

title: Bill Curry'S Favorite Bama Dining Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 lemon, cut (use juice)", "1/2 c. chopped onion (optional)", "1/2 c. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Saute onion in 1 tablespoon of oil.", "Add other ingredients, mixing well.", "Simmer for 20 minutes."]

title: Slaw Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. buttermilk", "1 heaping tsp. mustard", "1/2 c. sugar", "5 heaping Tbsp. mayonnaise", "5 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix with mixer or blender."]

title: Roasted Bell Pepper Appetizer*
ingredients: ["6 bell peppers (any combination of red, green, yellow and orange)", "3 Tbsp. olive oil", "3 garlic cloves, minced", "1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar or cider vinegar", "1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese", "1 Tbsp. bottled capers, drained"]
directions: ["Cut bell peppers in half and discard seeds.", "Flatten halves with palm of your hand and place skin side up on a cookie sheet. Broil peppers until charred, then place in a Ziploc bag for 15 minutes.", "Peel peppers and slice into 1/2-inch strips.", "Place pepper strips in a bowl with remaining ingredients and mix.", "Serve at room temperature or store in refrigerator.", "Serve on individual plates on a bed of lettuce or as an hors d'oeuvre from the bowl with thin slices of French bread or crackers."]

title: Asparagus With Parmesan Vinaigrette
ingredients: ["3 lb. asparagus", "1/2 c. olive oil", "1/4 c. red wine vinegar", "1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "1 tsp. salt", "3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/4 c. minced Prosciutto, about 2 oz. (optional)"]
directions: ["Cook asparagus until just tender.", "Mix everything (oil, vinegar, mustard, salt and 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese) together.", "Put the asparagus into a baking dish, pour the vinaigrette over the asparagus. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.", "Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese and Prosciutto just before serving."]

title: Cranberry Salad
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing", "1 can whole cranberries", "1 c. crushed pineapple, drained (15 1/4 oz. can)", "1/2 c. pecans or walnuts", "1 small carton Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add sugar and mayonnaise and blend well. Add pineapple, cranberries and nuts.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Freeze."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar together.", "Add vanilla, then remaining ingredients.", "Roll dough into balls; place on a cookie sheet and flatten with a fork dipped in sugar.", "Bake 10 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Pecan Crispies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream the butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add crushed potato chips and pecans.", "Stir in flour.", "Roll into small balls.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet and press ball flat with bottom of tumbler dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes or until lightly browned.", "Makes 3 dozen cookies."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can sauerkraut", "1/4 c. celery", "1/4 c. onion", "1/4 c. green pepper", "1/4 c. shredded carrots", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Drain sauerkraut, reserving liquid.", "Rinse sauerkraut under cold water.", "Drain well.", "Combine sauerkraut, celery, carrot and onion.", "In saucepan, combine reserved liquid, sugar and vinegar; bring to a boil, stirring constantly.", "Remove from heat; pour over vegetable mixture.", "Chill overnight."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies(Makes 3 Dozen Cookies)
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream shortening until fluffy.", "Gradually work in cream cheese and sugar.", "Make sure mixture is creamy and smooth.", "Beat in egg yolk, vanilla and flour.", "Drop onto a greased sheet and bake for 15 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/4 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped macadamia nuts", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Gradually stir in pineapple, 1/2 cup nuts and remaining ingredients.", "Shape into ball and roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight or until well chilled.", "Makes 1 cheese ball.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Honey French Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. honey", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 c. oil"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients in mixing bowl; beat at medium speed until well blended.", "Pour into bottle or jar and refrigerate.", "Shake well before using on combination salad, plain lettuce or cabbage slaw.", "This dressing is particularly good on spinach salad."]

title: Chippers
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine, softened", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. coarsely crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "sugar"]
directions: ["In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar and vanilla. Stir in flour to form stiff dough.", "Stir in chips and pecans. Cover and chill 1 hour."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "3 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 tsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt (or less, to taste)"]
directions: ["Beat cheese with a fork until smooth.", "Gradually stir in pineapple, 1 cup of nuts, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Form into a ball and roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic wrap and chill. May garnish with pineapple rings, maraschino cherries and parsley."]

title: Sauerkraut Relish
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) can drained sauerkraut", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. shredded carrots", "2 or 3 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 tsp. celery seed", "smoked sausage, links or franks"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients except sausages or franks into small bowl.", "Let stand 1 hour or overnight for flavors to blend.", "Serve with grilled smoked sausage or franks.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups.", "Good also with barbecue or fowl, holiday times or family gatherings."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped fine", "2 tsp. onion, chopped fine", "dash of Worcestershire sauce", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Cream cheese to soften.", "Drain pineapple.", "Mix all ingredients together and shape into ball.", "Roll in finely chopped pecans. Chill in refrigerator."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (10 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Soften cheese and mix with rest of ingredients except 1 cup pecans.", "Chill for 45 minutes or until you can form a ball.", "Roll in reserved pecans.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Penuche
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. corn syrup", "2 Tbsp. margarine or butter", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. packed brown sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Butter loaf pan (9 x 5 x 3-inch).", "Cook sugar, milk, syrup and salt in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly until sugar is dissolved.", "Cook, stirring occasionally to 234\u00b0 on candy thermometer or until small amount of mixture dropped into very cold water forms a soft ball and flattens when removed from water.", "Remove from heat.", "Add margarine.", "Cool mixture to 120\u00b0 without stirring.", "(Bottom of saucepan will be lukewarm.)", "Add vanilla.", "Beat vigorously and continuously for 5 to 10 minutes or until candy is thick and no longer glossy (mixture will hold its shape when dropped from spoon).", "Quickly stir in nuts.", "Spread in pan.", "Cool until firm.", "Cut into 1-inch squares."]

title: Fried Corn With Bacon
ingredients: ["4 or 5 slices bacon", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "5 or 6 ears corn, cut from cob", "1/4 tsp. sugar", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Fry bacon and put on paper towel to drain.", "Crumble and set aside."]

title: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
ingredients: ["1 box Butter Recipe yellow cake mix", "1 stick butter", "3/4 box brown sugar", "pineapple rings", "cherries", "1/4 c. whole pecans", "1/2 c. chopped nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Grease and flour pan (I use a Bundt pan).", "Melt butter.", "Add brown sugar and mix together.", "Pour into Bundt pan.", "Add pineapple rings on top of this mixture. Top with cherries and pecans. Prepare cake as directed except use 1/2 pineapple juice instead of full amount of water.", "Chopped nuts may be added to mix.", "Cook as directed on box and enjoy."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. soft margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Blend margarine, vanilla and sugar.", "Add flour, potato chips and chopped nuts; mix well.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes on ungreased cookie sheet."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks margarine or butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips (not too fine)", "1 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Bake at 350\u00b0 about 14 minutes."]

title: Nut Balls(Great For The Holidays)
ingredients: ["1 c. butter (1/2 lb.)", "4 Tbsp. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. pecans, broken", "2 c. flour", "3/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients in order given (add pecans last).", "Form dough into small balls.", "Bake at 275\u00b0 for 30 minutes, then increase heat to 325\u00b0 and bake for an additional 10 minutes.", "Cool slightly; roll in powdered sugar.", "Usually requires two rollings to coat them thoroughly.", "Makes about 4 dozen."]

title: Rhubarb Crisp
ingredients: ["8 c. rhubarb, cut in chunks", "1/4 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. oatmeal", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 1/4 c. softened margarine"]
directions: ["Mix rhubarb, 1/4 cup flour and sugar together and place into 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Mix flour, oatmeal, brown sugar and margarine with pastry blender until crumbly.", "Put on top of rhubarb mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes."]

title: Cooked Pineapple
ingredients: ["2 large cans crushed pineapple", "3/4 c. sugar", "5 Tbsp. self-rising flour", "3/4 c. crushed Ritz crackers", "1 stick melted butter", "1 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese"]
directions: ["Grease pan.", "Mix flour and sugar.", "Pour over pineapple.", "Add cheese, top with crackers and drizzle with butter over all.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Cutout Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. almond extract", "1 egg yolk", "2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Soften butter and cream cheese. Add sugar, almond extract, egg yolk and flour. Chill. Roll out. Bake at 325\u00b0 about 10 minutes. Adjust temperature and time as needed. Frost with Betty Crocker cream cheese frosting."]

title: Pineapple Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. crushed pretzels", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. margarine", "8 oz. cream cheese", "8 oz. or larger Cool Whip", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple and juice"]
directions: ["Mix together crushed pretzels, 1/2 cup sugar and margarine and spread in a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake for 10 minutes in oven preheated to 325\u00b0.", "Allow to cool.", "Then mix together the cream cheese, rest of sugar and Cool Whip.", "Pour this mixture over top of pretzel mixture and refrigerate for 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 c. nuts, chopped", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoning salt"]
directions: ["If onion is too strong, cut back a little.", "I use pecans with this recipe.", "Mix all ingredients in bowl except 1 cup nuts. Chill before forming into ball.", "Form into ball and roll in remaining nuts.", "Garnish and serve."]

title: Warm Blue Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["7 slices bacon, diced", "8 garlic cloves, minced", "8 oz. cream cheese, room temperature", "1/4 c. half and half", "4 oz. Blue cheese, crumbled", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives", "3 Tbsp. chopped smoked almonds"]
directions: ["Cook bacon 7 minutes; drain.", "Add garlic and cook until bacon is crisp.", "Beat cream cheese with electric mixer until smooth. Stir in bacon, Blue cheese and chives.", "Transfer to baking dish. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Thumbprints
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together; roll into balls.", "Dip in slightly beaten egg white.", "Roll in finely chopped nuts.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake 5 minutes at 375\u00b0.", "Remove from oven; press thumb into the middle of cookie ball.", "Return to oven for 8 more minutes.", "Fill with jelly when done."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 (16 oz.) cans sliced beets", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. butter"]
directions: ["Drain beets, reserving 1/2 cup beet liquid.", "In 2-quart saucepan, mix vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, salt and liquid until smooth.", "Add butter.", "Cook over low heat until thickened."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients.", "Add 1 cup chopped pecans and mix.", "Refrigerate until firm and shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans before serving.", "Garnish as desired.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Pretzel Delight
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick butter", "1 1/4 c. sugar, divided", "1 small carton Cool Whip", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 can crushed pineapple, drained (save juice)", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Melt butter in square pan.", "Add pretzels and 1/2 cup sugar and press to bottom of pan.", "Mix Cool Whip, 1/2 cup sugar and cream cheese and spread into pan.", "Cook juice, 1/4 cup sugar and cornstarch, just to heat up.", "Add pineapple and spread on top. Refrigerate."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["1 can chunk pineapple, drained", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. cheese, grated", "3 Tbsp. flour", "2 c. Ritz crackers", "1 c. butter, melted"]
directions: ["Take juice, mix flour and sugar; pour over pineapple and cheese.", "Mix crackers with melted butter; sprinkle on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0.", "Put cherries on top."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 bottle Kraft barbecue sauce", "1/2 bottle ketchup", "1 large chopped onion", "1 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. mustard", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. hot sauce", "1 Tbsp. Heinz 57", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Put meat in oven and bake at 400\u00b0 for 40 minutes.", "Add sauce mixture and reduce heat; bake until tender."]

title: Sand Tarts
ingredients: ["1 c. soft butter", "5 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "2 3/4 c. flour, sifted", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar together.", "Add vanilla, flour, nuts and salt.", "This will be rather dry, but you just work it with your fingers until blended.", "Roll into small balls and bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes, but not too brown."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. Mazola oil", "1 Tbsp. dry mustard", "1/8 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix in blender or large jar and shake vigorously.", "Store in refrigerator."]

title: Caramel Candy
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. molasses (Old Barrel)", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter", "2 c. cream", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Boil together sugar, molasses and salt to 245\u00b0.", "Add butter and cream; boil to 242\u00b0.", "Remove from heat.", "Add vanilla.", "Be careful to stir often while cooking, especially near the end.", "Pour into a well buttered 5 x 10-inch pan.", "Cool until cold.", "Cut in small squares and wrap in wax paper."]

title: Party Sandwich Spread
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped olives", "1 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add other ingredients and mix.", "Use your favorite chips to serve."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Reserve 1 cup pecans.", "Blend remaining ingredients with the softened cream cheese.", "Chill mixture, then shape into a ball. Roll cheese ball in remaining 1 cup pecans."]

title: Water Chestnuts And Bacon
ingredients: ["3 cans whole water chestnuts", "bacon", "1 1/3 c. brown sugar", "4 tsp. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "pinch of dry mustard"]
directions: ["Wrap the water chestnuts in bacon and secure with toothpick. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes. Drain fat.", "Mix the remaining ingredients and bring to a boil.", "Pour over the water chestnuts. Bake at 300\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. green pepper", "dash of salt", "2 Tbsp. onion"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple.", "Finely chop the green pepper and onion. Combine all ingredients, mixing well.", "Make a ball.", "Chill."]

title: Caramelized Chex Mix
ingredients: ["1 (12 oz.) box Rice Chex", "1 (12 oz.) box Corn Chex", "1 (12 oz.) box Crispix", "1 lb. pecans", "1 lb. peanuts or raisins", "1 lb. butter or oleo", "2 lb. brown sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. corn syrup"]
directions: ["Mix the first 5 ingredients.", "Melt the rest of ingredients in pan.", "Bring to a boil; simmer 5 minutes.", "Remove from heat and add 2 teaspoons vanilla.", "Pour over cereal mix.", "Bake at 200\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Stir every 15 minutes.", "Cool on wax paper."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 stick melted butter", "1/3 c. sugar", "20 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix first three ingredients. Spread on cookie sheet and bake 375\u00b0 for 4-6 minutes; watch closely. Let cool. Mix cream cheese and sugar; add pineapple. Fold in Cool Whip and chill. Just before serving, fold in pretzel mixture."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 c. pecans or walnuts, chopped", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and chill in a bowl.", "Roll in chopped nuts. Chill and serve with crackers."]

title: Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 1/4 c. flour", "3/4 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Combine butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Separately combine flour and salt.", "Combine all ingredients and chill for an hour. Roll into 1-inch balls.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes. When cool enough to touch, roll in powdered sugar, then again when cooled. Makes 4 dozen."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and roll in balls; press with spoon.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes."]

title: Pecan Butterballs
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/4 c. honey", "2 c. sifted flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter and gradually add honey. Add flour, salt and vanilla. Add chopped nuts. Mix well. Form into small balls. Place on a greased baking sheet. Bake in a moderate 300\u00b0 oven for 40 to 45 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["8 oz. pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 -3 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["With fork, beat cream cheese until smooth. Stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup of the pecans and rest of ingredients. Shape into ball and roll in remaining cup of nuts."]

title: Toffee Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. whole wheat flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. chocolate", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Grease 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Mix butter, sugar, egg yolks and vanilla.", "Stir in flour and salt.", "Press evenly in bottom of pan.", "Bake until delicately browned, 25 to 35 minutes (crust will be soft).", "Remove from oven; immediately sprinkle chocolate chips on top.", "Let stand until soft; spread evenly.", "Sprinkle with nuts.", "While warm, cut into 2 x 1 1/2-inch bars.", "Yields 32 bars."]

title: Kraut-Kidney Bean Dish
ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. Crisco or oil", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 tsp. finely chopped onion", "2 c. (No. 2 tin) sauerkraut", "1 c. (No. 2 tin) kidney beans", "Polish sausage (optional)"]
directions: ["Put Crisco or oil in pan.", "Add flour and cook until dark brown.", "This is a roux.", "Add onion and sauerkraut.", "Add kidney beans.", "Cook 1 hour; serve hot.", "Serve as side dish or cook with Polish sausage."]

title: Quick Curry Dressing
ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. oil", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "3/4 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. mustard", "juice of 1/2 lemon", "1 Tbsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Put all ingredients into a jar with lid.", "Stir well."]

title: English Toffee Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. dark brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "6 to 8 oz. Hershey chocolate bars (plain)", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together (except the chocolate and nuts). Spread onto a greased cookie sheet.", "Bake 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes. While still hot, place chocolate bars on top to melt.", "When melted, sprinkle nuts over.", "Let cool and slice into bars."]

title: Pecan Fingers
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 c. plain flour", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Mix flour, pecans, sugar and vanilla together.", "Melt margarine and add to mixture.", "Add salt.", "Shape like fingers and bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until light brown."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. celery, chopped", "1 Tbsp. onion (no more)", "crushed pecans"]
directions: ["Cream cheese needs to be very soft. Mix ingredients by hand thoroughly. Chill overnight then form ball and roll in chopped pecans.", "Can be served on lettuce leaf."]

title: Peachy-Praline Pie
ingredients: ["1 raw pie crust", "1/2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2/3 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. raw oatmeal", "1/2 c. soft butter", "1 (29 oz.) can sliced peaches, drained (reserve 1/4 c. juice)"]
directions: ["Arrange half of peaches in crust.", "Mix remaining ingredients, except reserved juice and rest of peaches.", "Crumble 1/2 of mixture over peaches in crust.", "Repeat with remaining peaches and crumb topping and reserved juice.", "Bake 20 minutes at 375\u00b0; then reduce heat to 325\u00b0 until golden brown and set (about 30 more minutes)."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 small can pineapple, well drained", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "3/4 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Open can of pineapple and drain for 1 hour.", "Beat cream cheese until smooth. Mix by hand the other ingredients into the cream cheese and the pineapple.", "Chill in bowl several hours or overnight.", "Roll in crushed pecans.", "You may make 2 large balls or several small balls.", "You may also freeze the balls."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. mild vinegar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "2 c. beets"]
directions: ["Melt butter; add cornstarch, sugar and salt.", "Blend.", "Add vinegar; cook until thick.", "Add beets; heat thoroughly.", "Makes 6 to 8 servings."]

title: Horseradish-Mustard Sauce
ingredients: ["1 (6 oz.) bottle horseradish, drained", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/4 c. Dijon mustard", "2 tsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. turmeric (optional)"]
directions: ["In medium bowl, mix above ingredients until blended. Refrigerate.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups."]

title: Spinach-Cheese Mushroom Caps
ingredients: ["24 large fresh mushrooms", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained", "1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. shredded Parmesan cheese, divided", "1/2 c. crumbled Feta cheese", "1 bacon strip, cooked and crumbled", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms. Set aside. Finely chop the stems. In a skillet, saute the chopped mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, Feta cheese, bacon, salt and mushroom mixture. Spoon into mushroom caps. Sprinkle with the remaining Parmesan cheese. Place on a baking sheet. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until golden brown."]

title: Creamy Sweet Corn
ingredients: ["2 c. fresh or frozen corn", "1/4 c. half and half cream", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. black pepper (optional)"]
directions: ["In a saucepan, combine corn and half and half. Stir in the butter, salt and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce heat and let simmer, uncovered, 8 to 10 minutes or until heated thoroughly. Sprinkle on black pepper and serve."]

title: Clara'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 Tbsp. onion, minced", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Form into two balls.", "Top with additional chopped pecans if you like.", "It can be frozen."]

title: Kraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can or 2 lb. bag sauerkraut", "1 c. diced celery", "1 c. diced green pepper", "1 medium onion, diced", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. oil (vegetable)", "1/2 c. vinegar (white)"]
directions: ["Mix well and chill overnight.", "This keeps for days.", "Great for potluck dinners."]

title: Rice Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1 c. cooked rice (cold)", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix well and shape into ball.", "Roll in chopped pecans."]

title: Pecan Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and vanilla.", "Sift 2 cups flour and salt.", "Blend thoroughly.", "Add pecans; shape into a 1-inch ball. Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Cool.", "Roll in powdered sugar.", "Makes 6 dozen."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. shortening", "4 oz. cream cheese (soft)", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. plain flour"]
directions: ["Cream together butter and shortening.", "Add sugar and cream cheese; mix well.", "Add salt and vanilla; beat well and add flour. Divide dough into rolls and wrap in wax paper.", "Chill and slice thin.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 10 minutes or until light brown. Remove from pan.", "Cookies become crisp as they cool.", "Top with a pecan half or cinnamon sugar, if desired, before baking.", "You may also drizzle chocolate over them after baking."]

title: Kookie Brittle
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 (6 oz.) pkg. (1 c.) butterscotch morsels"]
directions: ["Combine margarine, vanilla and salt; blend well.", "Gradually beat in sugar.", "Add flour, then morsels.", "Mix well.", "Press evenly into ungreased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 25 minutes. Cool, then break in irregular pieces and drain on absorbent paper."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped nuts, divided in half"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients with one half of nuts.", "Roll into a ball. Coat ball with remaining nuts."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped nuts", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese, mix in pineapple, pepper, 1/2 of the nuts, salt and onion.", "Chill overnight. Form into ball and roll in remaining nuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Aunt Mildred'S 7-Up Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lemon or lime Jell-O", "1 c. 7-Up (Wink or Sprite)", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 tsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup hot water.", "Add cream cheese and beat with mixer.", "Mix in other ingredients, adding 7-Up drink last. Chill.", "Serves 9."]

title: Keebler Pecan Sandies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter (not oleo)", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "2 c. flour", "1/4 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add potato chips and pecans. Stir in flour.", "Form into small balls (use tablespoon).", "Put balls on cookie sheet and press flat with glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes."]

title: Blue Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["12 oz. Blue cheese", "1 c. oil", "1 c. buttermilk", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. vinegar", "salt, pepper and cayenne"]
directions: ["While mixing cheeses and seasonings, add vinegar and buttermilk; blend well.", "Slowly pour in oil; chill and serve."]

title: Creamy Nut Fudge
ingredients: ["1 c. Hershey's cocoa", "2 c. (14 oz.) each sweetened condensed milk or 2 2/3 c. milk", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 c. coarsely chopped walnuts", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine", "cocoa and sugar in 4 quart saucepan.", "Blend in condensed milk and add butter.", "Cook, stirring constantly over medium", "heat", "until", "mixture", "comes to a boil and becomes very thick.", "Boil", "and stir 10 minutes, remove from heat.", "Blend in nuts and vanilla; spread mixture evenly in a foil lined 9-inch square pan.", "Refrigerate 30 minutes."]

title: Caramel Creams
ingredients: ["2 c. whipping cream", "1 c. granulated sugar", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "2 tsp. margarine", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Place first 4 ingredients in a large, heavy saucepan.", "Heat over medium flame until mixture comes to a full boil.", "Turn down flame to high simmer and continue to cook to 236\u00b0 on candy thermometer (or soft ball in cold water) stirring constantly (about 15 to 20 minutes).", "Remove from heat; add vanilla and nuts (if wanted) and mix thoroughly.", "Pour hot mixture into foil-lined pan (8 x 8 or 6 x 9-inch).", "Cool.", "When cold, remove from pan. Peel off foil and cut into 64 squares.", "Wrap in squares of wax paper.", "Store in covered container."]

title: Potato Chip Munchies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "sugar for rolling dough in"]
directions: ["Turn oven to 350\u00b0.", "In a large mixer bowl, beat butter with electric mixer on medium speed until softened.", "Add the 1/2 cup sugar and vanilla and beat until fluffy.", "With mixer on low speed, gradually add potato chips until well blended.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls about 2-inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten dough with a fork dipped in sugar.", "Bake 12 to 15 minutes or until golden brown."]

title: Rosie'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. room temperature cream cheese", "1/4 c. finely diced green pepper", "1 tsp. grated onion", "1 (8 oz.) well drained crushed pineapple", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/4 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["When cream cheese is very soft, add all ingredients except walnuts.", "You may find that the green peppers are diced easily with a food processor or blender.", "Mix ingredients well with a spoon or hand.", "Shape into a large ball and roll in crushed walnuts.", "Chill approximately 1 hour.", "Place on platter with crackers."]

title: Hot Olive Cheese Puffs
ingredients: ["1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1/2 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "24 stuffed olives", "3 Tbsp. soft butter", "1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Wrap 1 teaspoon cheese mixture around olive.", "Freeze in single layers separated with wax paper.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 on ungreased cookie sheet 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Celery Seed Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2/3 c. white vinegar", "2 tsp. celery seed", "2 tsp. mustard", "2 tsp. grated onion", "2 c. oil"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, vinegar, celery seed, mustard and onion with mixer. Add oil until mixture is thick.", "Refrigerate.", "Makes 1 quart."]

title: Dressing For Cabbage Slaw
ingredients: ["3/4 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. celery seed", "1 1/2 tsp. prepared mustard", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients well.", "This is enough for a 3 pound cabbage."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 (No. 2) can beets (whole or sliced)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
