directions: ["Mix sugar, vinegar, salt and cornstarch together.", "Cook until thick.", "Add butter and beets and cook until beets are heated through."]

title: Microwave Boardwalk Taffy
ingredients: ["2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/4 c. strong coffee", "2 sq. (1 oz. each) unsweetened baking chocolate", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Generously grease 8-inch square baking pan.", "In a 2-quart glass measure, combine corn syrup, coffee, chocolate and salt and mix well.", "Cook (micro) on High for 12 to 18 minutes or until microproof candy thermometer registers at 255\u00b0 (or until small amount of mixture forms a ball hard enough to hold its shape but is still pliable when dropped into very cold water)."]

title: Kolachy
ingredients: ["1 cup (2 sticks) butter", "4 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 1/2 cups all purpose flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. sugar", "1/2 cup preserves"]
directions: ["Put butter in bowl of electric mixer.", "Beat on medium speed until butter is fluffy.", "Add cream cheese, beat until well incorporated.", "Beat in flour, sugar, and salt until most of flour is mixed.", "Finish mixing by hand. (Do not overbeat or kolachy will be tough.)", "Flatten dough into a disk; wrap in plastic wrap. Chill 4 hours or overnight."]

title: Thumb Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix well with mixer.", "Add 1 cup of flour and 1/4 teaspoon salt.", "Roll into 1-inch balls in slightly beaten egg whites.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 5 minutes.", "Press center down with thumb and bake 8 minutes longer.", "When cool, fill center with favorite icing."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add potato chips and pecans. Stir in flour.", "Form into balls.", "Put on ungreased cookie sheet. Grease bottom of glass and dip it in sugar and use to flatten cookies. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes. Yields 3 1/2 dozen."]

title: Cocktail Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter or margarine", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Make dough into a ball.", "Chill (overnight if possible).", "Roll thin and cook on greased sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 minutes or until edges are slightly browned.", "Let cool on sheet before moving."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["3/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. barbecue sauce (any kind)", "1 small onion", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "3/4 to 1 c. sugar", "1 small bottle ketchup (14 oz.)", "1 Tbsp. mustard"]
directions: ["Chop", "onion and combine all ingredients.", "Bring to boil and then simmer at least one hour.", "(Great with hamburgers.)"]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. potato chips, crumbled and heaped", "1 c. walnuts, chopped", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream together margarine and sugar.", "Add potato chips, nuts and vanilla.", "Sift in flour; mix well.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 minutes.", "Cookies should look rough, chips remain crunchy."]

title: Walnut Crescents
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2/3 c. walnuts"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and flavoring.", "Add dry ingredients; mix well, then chill.", "Form into small crescents.", "Place on ungreased baking sheet.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes.", "Cool slightly.", "Roll in confectioners sugar.", "Serves 5 dozen."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 can beets and juice", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "salt to taste", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Add all ingredients together.", "Mix cornstarch with 1/4 cup beet juice to make it thicker."]

title: Louisiana Fudge Candy
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "2 c. cream", "1/2 c. flour", "1 c. corn syrup", "1/4 c. butter", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Butter a 13 x 9-inch pan and set aside.", "Blend together thoroughly in a 3 quart pan the sugar, syrup and cream.", "Bring to a", "boil,", "stirring until sugar is dissolved.", "Cook to soft ball (234\u00b0);", "remove", "from", "heat", "and", "let cool five minutes. Blend in flour and beat until it is creamy and thick, about 15 minutes. Stir", "in", "pecans", "and pour in pan.", "Let cool and cut into squares."]

title: Penuche(Butterscotch Fudge)
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. sugar", "pinch of salt", "3/4 c. sour cream", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts or pecans (optional)"]
directions: ["Melt butter or margarine in heavy pot over medium-low heat. Add brown sugar; heat to boiling.", "Add sugar, pinch of salt and sour cream.", "Cook over low heat, stirring, until sugar dissolves and mixture reaches soft ball stage (236\u00b0).", "Cool at room temperature until lukewarm (110\u00b0).", "Do not stir.", "Beat until mixture holds its shape.", "Add vanilla and nuts."]

title: Pineapple Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick melted margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 (20 oz.) crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix pretzels, margarine and 1/2 cup sugar.", "Press in 8 x 8-inch dish.", "Cream Cool Whip, cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar.", "Spread 1/2 on pretzel crust (reserve other 1/2 for top).", "Drain pineapple. Cook pineapple juice and 2 tablespoons cornstarch, stirring constantly; boil until thick.", "Let cool.", "Add 1/4 cup sugar and pineapple.", "Spread on Cool Whip mixture and top with remaining Cool Whip mixture."]

title: Granny'S Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["3 sticks margarine", "1 c. ketchup", "1/4 c. vinegar", "12 Tbsp. brown sugar", "12 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together in a saucepan. Add water as needed to thin down sauce or make more. Stir until hot. Great over chicken!!!"]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Add all ingredients, except chopped nuts to cream cheese; mix well.", "Form into ball.", "Chill until ready to serve.", "Before serving, roll in chopped nuts."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 small can pineapple, drained"]
directions: ["Remove 1 cup pecans.", "Mix remaining ingredients together. Make a ball and roll in reserved pecans.", "Chill."]

title: Glazed Beets
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can sliced or diced beets", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3 to 4 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Drain beets, reserving 1/3 cup juice,", "In a saucepan, combine the sugar, cornstarch and salt. Stir in beet juice and vinegar. Cook and stir over medium-high heat until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir 2 minutes more. Add beets and butter.", "Heat through. Yields 4 servings."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "8 oz. crushed pineapple, drain very well", "1/2 c. diced green pepper", "2 Tbsp. diced onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 to 2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese with electric mixer.", "Stir in remaining ingredients with a fork.", "Chill mixture overnight for at least 4 to 5 hours.", "Form into a ball or log and roll in chopped nuts. Garnish with red cherries or parsley."]

title: Mr. Hirschi'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 c. chopped bell peppers", "1 tsp. chopped onion", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese soften.", "Mix all ingredients (except nuts). Shape into a ball and chill.", "Roll in the cup of nuts.", "If possible, make at least a day ahead to allow flavors to blend."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Spread
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. minced green pepper", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Can be made into a roll and rolled in an additional cup of chopped pecans."]

title: Hot Mushroom Canapes
ingredients: ["9 slices sandwich bread, crusts removed", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "3 Tbsp. onion, minced", "15 medium mushrooms, minced", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 egg yolk, beaten", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Cut each slice of bread into quarters; place on cookie sheet and bake at 250\u00b0 until browned lightly.", "Set \"toasted\" bread aside.", "Saute the mushrooms and onion in melted butter; drain."]

title: Beets Polynesian
ingredients: ["2 (16 oz.) cans sliced beets, drained", "1/4 c. packed brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. raisins", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["In a saucepan, combine the brown sugar, flour and salt; stir in vinegar and 3/4 cup water.", "Add the undrained pineapple, raisins and butter or margarine.", "Cook, stirring constantly, until bubbly.", "Stir in drained beets.", "Heat through.", "Makes 10 servings."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. minced onion", "3 Tbsp. margarine", "1 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/8 c. vinegar", "2 tsp. mustard", "1/8 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Saute onion in margarine.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Simmer 10 minutes on low heat.", "Great on chicken, pork chops and venison."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. minced onion", "3 c. sliced beets", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Blend sugar, salt and cornstarch.", "Heat.", "Add vinegar.", "Mix. Cook on low heat until smooth; stir constantly.", "Add butter, onion and beets.", "Let heat for 20 minutes."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "1 small onion, chopped", "dash of garlic", "1/4 lb. sausage", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 slices cheese"]
directions: ["Wash mushrooms in salt water.", "Fry sausage in skillet; add salt, onion and a dash of garlic.", "Cut up mushroom stems and fry along with sausage; add cheese.", "Stuff mushrooms with filling ingredients; bake 12 to 15 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven."]

title: Easy Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz) pkgs cream cheese, softened", "1 (16 oz) can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1 Tbsp minced onion", "3 tsp seasoning salt", "1 cup chopped green pepper", "1 cup chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix all above (except nuts) and form into ball.", "Roll in chopped nuts and refrigerate overnight.", "Very good and inexpensive to make."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter (do not use margarine)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour, chips and pecans. Form balls about 1-inch in diameter.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet; press down with lightly floured bottom of small glass and bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 14 minutes until edges are golden.", "Makes approximately 2 1/2 dozen."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 large can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix first three ingredients and press in bottom of dish.", "Mix next three and spread on pretzels.", "Drain juice from pineapple. Mix with sugar and cornstarch and cook until thick.", "Cool.", "Add pineapple to mixture and spread on cream cheese mixture."]

title: Almond Crescents
ingredients: ["1 c. soft shortening (half butter)", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1 2/3 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "10x sugar (for coating)"]
directions: ["Cream", "shortening, sugar and almond extract.", "Add flour and salt and mix well.\tChill overnight.", "Roll with hands into a pencil shape about 2 1/2-inches long.", "Put on a cookie sheet and shape like a crescent.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 14 to 16 minutes. Cool, then roll in 10x sugar."]

title: Nut Cups
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "3 sticks butter", "3 c. flour", "2 1/4 c. brown sugar", "3 Tbsp. soft butter", "3 tsp. vanilla", "dash of salt", "5 c. walnuts"]
directions: ["To make dough, cut cream cheese and butter in flour and cream. Mix brown sugar, butter, vanilla, salt and nuts together for filling.", "Place dough in the small miniature muffin pans shaping dough to sides.", "Add the mix 3/4 full.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/4 c. honey", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 c. pecans, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Cream butter and honey.", "Mix well with flour, salt and vanilla.", "Add nuts and form into small (3/4-inch) balls.", "Place on cookie sheet and bake at 300\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes.", "Roll in powdered sugar while warm and again when cool.", "Flavor improves with age."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese set until at room temperature, then mix all ingredients except pecans.", "Roll", "into ball, then roll ball in pecans until outside is covered."]

title: Oriental Salad
ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 c. oil", "1/3 c. ketchup", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "dash of salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Blend thoroughly and set aside."]

title: Raisin-Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["8 c. carrots", "2 c. raisins", "1/2 c. sugar", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "4 c. carrots", "1 c. raisins", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Grate carrots; add remaining ingredients and mix.", "Use fat-free mayonnaise."]

title: French-Style Peas
ingredients: ["4 c. cooked peas", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. light cream or milk", "1 (6 oz.) can mushrooms, drained", "salt, oil, bacon yeast or Smokene"]
directions: ["Saute onion in 1 tablespoon fat, then blend in flour and seasoning.", "Add cream gradually and cook until thickened, stirring constantly.", "Add peas and mushrooms and heat.", "Serve over toast triangles."]

title: Spinach Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1 c. oil", "1/3 c. ketchup", "1/4 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 medium onion, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and shake well.", "Pour on salad and add croutons, hard-boiled eggs, bacon and sliced water chestnuts."]

title: Bread And Butter Pickles
ingredients: ["pickles", "3 c. white vinegar", "1 1/2 tsp. celery seed", "4 1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. turmeric", "1 1/2 tsp. mustard seed", "1 c. salt"]
directions: ["Cut pickles in slices in large canning can.", "Pour in salt, cover with ice and let stand 3 hours.", "Drain off water and add remaining ingredients.", "Heat until pickles are good and hot.", "Put into ready jars."]

title: Stir-Fry Potatoes
ingredients: ["1 medium sized potato", "butter or margarine", "chili powder", "black pepper", "onion powder", "garlic powder", "salt"]
directions: ["Peel and dice potato.", "Stir in butter or margarine.", "Season to taste with generous sprinklings of seasonings.", "Cook until golden brown.", "Makes 1 serving."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1 lb. soft butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. chopped walnuts", "1 smaller bag potato chips", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients, except flour, then add flour.", "Shape cookies onto a nonstick cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes.", "Cool on a paper towel."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans, divided"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients with 1 cup chopped pecans. Refrigerate until firm.", "Roll into ball and roll out remaining nuts until coated.", "Refrigerate until firm."]

title: Cream Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["2 (9 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/4 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese and mix all ingredients."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 c. pecans or walnuts, chopped", "1/2 c. finely chopped, drained green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1/2 to 1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "8 oz. crushed pineapple, well drained"]
directions: ["Reserve 1 1/2 cups chopped nuts.", "Combine all other ingredients and mix well.", "Form into a ball and roll in reserved nuts.", "Refrigerate several hours."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "1 tsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "3 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Blend ingredients and chill about 20 minutes. Form into 1 or 2 balls and roll into nuts.", "Best if left overnight before serving."]

title: Toffee Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 large Hershey bar, grated", "nuts"]
directions: ["Cream the butter and sugar. Add beaten egg yolk, flour and vanilla.", "Pat mixture into a 10 x 15-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Sprinkle grated chocolate over top. Top with nuts.", "Cut into squares."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "3/4 c. potato chips, crushed", "1/4 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar well.", "Add vanilla, flour, chips and pecans.", "Mix well and chill.", "Drop by teaspoon.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 5 to 15 minutes."]

title: Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add crushed potato chips and nuts.", "Stir in flour.", "Form into balls about 1 teaspoon each. Press flat with bottom of small water glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0", "for 16 to 18 minutes until lightly browned.", "Yields 3 1/2 dozen."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["In bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Stir in pineapple, pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into ball and roll in nuts.", "Wrap and refrigerate until chilled (overnight)."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can pineapple, well drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped fine", "1/2 green pepper, diced fine", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "dash of garlic"]
directions: ["Add all ingredients except 1 1/2 cups nuts.", "Roll into 2 balls, then roll balls in remaining nuts.", "Place cherry on top. Chill.", "Serve on crackers."]

title: Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Save 1 cup pecans for rolling.", "Combine remaining ingredients. Chill before rolling into 2 balls."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese (cream)", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "dash of cayenne pepper (if desired)"]
directions: ["Place chopped peppers, onion and pineapple on paper towel to absorb liquid.", "Blend ingredients well.", "Chill at least 1/2 hour. Shape into ball.", "Roll in chopped nuts.", "Refrigerate until ready to serve."]

title: Nuts And Bolts
ingredients: ["1 stick butter or oleo", "1 1/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 box Crispix cereal", "1 c. salted mixed nuts", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. M&M's", "1 c. Chee-tos", "1 c. pretzels"]
directions: ["Melt butter; mix with salt and Worcestershire sauce.", "Mix the remaining ingredients, except M&M's.", "Stir in sauce.", "Mix until all pieces are coated.", "Bake 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Spread on absorbent paper to cool.", "Then add M&M's."]

title: Polynesian Beets
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can sliced beets", "1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "1 or 2 Tbsp. cornstarch*", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 Tbsp. margarine"]
directions: ["*One tablespoon cornstarch for thickening equals 2 tablespoons flour."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. salt (seasoned)", "1 c. nuts, finely chopped", "5 drops Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except nuts.", "Form into a ball, then roll in nuts.", "Chill for 30 minutes."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 c. pretzels, crushed", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained"]
directions: ["Melt margarine in pan.", "Stir in pretzels and 1/3 cup sugar. Bake in 400\u00b0 oven for 7 to 8 minutes.", "Re-stir pretzels taking out of oven."]

title: Toffee Squares
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 c. flour", "pinch of salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar, egg yolk and vanilla.", "Add flour and salt.", "Spread into well-greased with butter cookie sheet pan. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Ice with melted sweet chocolate and cut while warm."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 stick butter", "2 c. crushed pineapple", "2 c. Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugars; add vanilla, then flour, a little at a time, until all flour is used.", "Add nuts and chips; stir.", "Roll into small balls and flatten on an ungreased cookie sheet with a glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 16 minutes."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1/2 or 1 c. potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/4 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients.", "Roll out and cut with cookie cutter dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Italian Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "3/4 c. vinegar", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "3/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 Tbsp. dry mustard", "1/4 c. onion", "1/2 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix salt, mustard, onion and half of vinegar.", "Add other ingredients alternately.", "Add celery seed last.", "Chill."]

title: Bacon Wrapped Water Chestnuts
ingredients: ["1 lb. bacon", "2 cans water chestnuts", "2/3 c. brown sugar (dark)", "1 tsp. mustard, dry", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 tsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. ketchup", "1 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 375\u00b0.", "Wrap each chestnut in 1/2 strip of bacon, secure with toothpick.", "Bake for 45 minutes or until bacon is done.", "Make sauce with remaining ingredients and pour over chestnuts.", "Serve in chafing dish and keep warm as sauce gets too thick when it is cold."]

title: Steak Marinade For Grilling
ingredients: ["1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. soy sauce", "1/2 c. ketchup", "4 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 Tbsp. black pepper", "2 cloves crushed garlic", "1 onion, sliced into rings"]
directions: ["Mix together in large pan and marinade overnight.", "Enough for a large steak or 8 pork chops."]

title: Chocolate Delight
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. softened butter", "1/2 c. pecans", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. Cool Whip", "2 small boxes instant pudding", "2 Tbsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix flour, butter and pecans. Mix up and pat out in baking dish (like a crust).", "Bake 15 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Cool. Whip the cream cheese and sugar until fluffy and soft.", "Add 1 cup Cool Whip and mix.", "Spread on top of crust."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter, softened", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "3/4 c. finely crushed potato chips", "3/4 c. finely chopped pecans", "granulated sugar for dipping", "whole pecans"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 375\u00b0.", "In large mixer bowl, cream butter, sugar, egg yolk and vanilla until fluffy.", "Add flour, potato chips and nuts.", "Mix well.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonful on ungreased cookie sheets.", "Grease bottom of glass and dip into sugar and use to flatten dough.", "Top with nut and bake for 8 to 10 minutes. Cool slightly before removing from cookie sheet.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. (2 sticks) butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter.", "Add sugar; cream until light and fluffy.", "Add vanilla.", "Add flour, potato chips and nuts.", "Chill dough for several hours.", "Roll into balls the size of walnuts.", "Put on baking sheet, 2 inches apart.", "Flatten balls with bottom of glass covered with damp cloth dipped in sugar.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 10 to 12 minutes (watch closely), until lightly browned."]

title: Macaroni Salad
ingredients: ["3 c. macaroni", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. shredded carrots", "1/2 c. bell peppers", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1 Tbsp. mustard", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. Mrs. Dash"]
directions: ["Cook and rinse macaroni.", "In a large bowl combine all ingredients.", "Refrigerate at least 3 hours."]

title: Chocolate Chunk Butter Pecan Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. (2 sticks) butter, softened", "1 c. packed light brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 3/4 c. (10 oz.) pkg. Hershey's semi-sweet chocolate chunks", "1/2 to 1 c. coarsely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Grease 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.", "In large mixer bowl, stir together butter, brown sugar, egg yolk and vanilla.", "Blend in flour and salt.", "Press mixture onto bottom of prepared pan.", "Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from oven.", "Immediately sprinkle chocolate chunks on crust. Let stand until softened, about 5 minutes.", "Spread evenly over crust.", "Sprinkle pecans over top.", "Cool completely in pan on wire rack.", "Cut into bars.", "Yields about 36 bars."]

title: Swedish Nut Balls
ingredients: ["1/2 c. pecans", "1 c. flour", "1 stick butter", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well.", "Form into balls.", "Bake at 275\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Let cool and roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Red Rice
ingredients: ["tomato paste", "green pepper, finely chopped", "onion, finely chopped", "celery, finely chopped", "bacon ends", "smoked rib tips", "smoked sausage", "rice", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Cook meats (bacon and rib tips) until done.", "Add tomato paste, onion, celery,", "green pepper, salt and pepper to taste. Partly cook rice, drain and mix with all ingredients including sausage (diced).", "Put in", "baking dish and cook in oven at 300\u00b0 until rice is done."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (No. 2) can sauerkraut", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 large green pepper, chopped", "1 medium onion, chopped", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. white vinegar"]
directions: ["Stir together the sauerkraut, celery, pepper and onion.", "Mix together the sugar, oil and vinegar.", "Combine with the sauerkraut mixture; marinate for 24 hours before serving."]

title: A Fruit Dip
ingredients: ["1 8 oz. cream cheese soften", "1/2 cup sour cream", "1/4 cup brown sugar", "1/4 sugar", "2 tablespoons maple syrup", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract"]
directions: ["With a blender beat cream cheese and sour cream. Then add all other ingredients and mix well; chill."]

title: Cracker Dip
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients, chill and serve with vegetables and crackers."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. pecans (optional)", "5 Tbsp. margarine", "1 large pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 medium Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sugar", "15 oz. crushed pineapple (unsweetened), drained (save juice)", "2 tsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Melt margarine and add to pretzels.", "If using pecans, do not use 1/2 cup of the pretzels.", "Press mixture in oblong dish.", "Mix together cream cheese, Cool Whip and sugar.", "Pour on top of pretzels.", "Put pineapple juice in boiler and add 2 teaspoons cornstarch and 1/2 cup sugar and let cook until thick.", "Cool completely.", "Add pineapple and spread on top of second layer. Keep in refrigerator."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/4 c. crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all except 1 cup pecans.", "Roll with 1 cup of pecans."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "2 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "dash of garlic powder"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese with fork until smooth. Stir in pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green peppers, onion and seasonings; roll in nuts. Garnish plate with pineapple rings and parsley sprigs. Refrigerate overnight."]

title: Pineapple Au Gratin
ingredients: ["2 (20 oz.) cans pineapple chunks, unsweetened and drained", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. flour", "1 pkg. Ritz crackers, crushed", "1 stick melted margarine"]
directions: ["Mix first 4 ingredients together.", "Place in baking dish. Cover with Ritz crackers and pour margarine over top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Whole Baked Garlic
ingredients: ["4 whole heads garlic", "4 Tbsp. butter", "1/4 c. olive oil", "salt to taste", "warm French bread", "cream cheese"]
directions: ["Remove the outer layer of skins from the heads, exposing the cloves.", "Place them in a small baking dish and pour the oil and butter over the bulbs.", "Bake, uncovered in a 225\u00b0 oven for 1/2 hour.", "Baste; add 1/2 cup water to the dish.", "Cover and bake another 1 1/2 hours or until bulbs are soft.", "Serve with French bread and cheese; spread cheese on bread.", "Break off a few bulbs of garlic and squeeze them out of their skins.", "Lay on top of cheese."]

title: Boiled Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cream or milk", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "pinch of salt", "2 c. oatmeal", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Boil together 1 minute the butter, sugar, cream or milk, cocoa and salt.", "Remove from heat.", "Add oatmeal and vanilla.", "Drop from spoon to wax paper."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. pkg. carrots", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "4 or 5 slices bacon"]
directions: ["Slice, cook and drain carrots.", "Bring sugar and vinegar to a boil.", "Dissolve cornstarch in small amount of water.", "Add this to sugar and vinegar mix.", "Cook until clear and thick.", "Fry bacon; drain and crush.", "Pour sauce over carrots and add bacon."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/4 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple.", "Mix cream cheese, pineapple, green pepper, salt, onion and 1 cup pecans.", "Form in ball; roll in other cup of pecans.", "Refrigerate overnight wrapped in wax paper.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Mom'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "2 c. finely chopped pecans (1 c. to mix in; 1 c. to roll ball in)"]
directions: ["Mix well with hands.", "Roll in pecans.", "Chill and serve with crackers.", "This is wonderful for a party."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["3 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "20 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick butter", "1/3 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Place crushed pretzels on a cookie sheet. Bring to a boil the butter and 1/3 cup sugar. Spread over pretzels. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 5 minutes. Watch closely.", "Cool; break up."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 /4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix together all ingredients, except nuts.", "After mixing well, roll in chopped nuts.", "Chill well."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 c. chopped nuts (pecans)"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients except nuts together well (can use electric mixer).", "Form into a ball and roll ball into chopped nuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 c. chopped pecans and 1 c. finely chopped pecans", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Gradually stir in pineapple, green pepper, onion, 1 cup of pecans and seasoned salt.", "Form mixture into ball or log and roll into 1 cup of finely chopped pecans. Chill in refrigerator.", "Serve with favorite crackers."]

title: Refrigerated Sweet Pickles
ingredients: ["2 c vinegar", "1/4 c. salt", "1 tsp celery seed", "2 c sugar", "1 tsp turmeric", "1 tsp mustard seed", "1 small onion"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients in a pan, stir till mixed well.", "Slice enough cucumbers to fill a large jar.", "In large jar put thinly sliced pickles and 1 small sliced onion.", "Pour cold solution over pickles and put in refrigerator.", "Will be ready to eat in 2 or 3 days. Will keep for a long time..............very good."]

title: Mushroom Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["3 doz. medium size mushrooms", "1/4 c. butter", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. light cream", "1 Tbsp. minced onion"]
directions: ["Wipe mushrooms with a damp cloth, remove stems and reserve caps.", "Finely chop stems to make about 2 cups.", "Saute in butter with onion in a large skillet.", "Stir in flour and salt.", "Add cream and cook, stirring, until thick."]

title: Kraut Salad
ingredients: ["16 oz. kraut, drained", "1/2 c. green pepper", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. diced onion", "1/2 c. shredded carrots", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/3 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 (11 oz.) can whole corn"]
directions: ["Mix together; let stand in refrigerator.", "Will keep for some time."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple drained", "2 c. chopped pecans (reserve 1 c. for coating)", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese at room temperature.", "Mix all ingredients and make a ball.", "Roll in reserved nuts.", "Leave in the refrigerator at least 4 hours before serving."]

title: No-Bake Chocolate Oatmeal Drops
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 stick butter", "1/2 can cream", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. nuts", "2 1/2 c. quick oats"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and boil 1 1/2 minutes.", "Cook and stir until thick enough to drop on waxed paper."]

title: Curried Fruit
ingredients: ["3/4 stick margarine", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. curry powder", "pineapple chunks", "peaches", "pears", "cherries"]
directions: ["Bring first 3 ingredients to a boil.", "Pour over fruit.", "Bake 30 to 40 minutes.", "Serve hot."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can drained crushed pineapple", "1 pkg. pecans", "1/3 c. chopped green pepper", "1/3 c. onion, chopped", "dash of Lawry's salt"]
directions: ["By hand, mix softened cream cheese, onion, green pepper and 1/3 cup pecans.", "Add drained pineapple.", "Season to taste with Lawry's seasoned salt.", "Roll into a ball.", "Roll ball in remainder of nuts."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. (8 oz. each) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "3 oz. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Stir in remaining ingredients.", "Chill 45 minutes.", "Divide into 2 balls and shape. Chill overnight before using."]

title: Betty Jane Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1 c. brown sugar", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. celery seed", "bacon, chopped", "1/3 c. ketchup", "1 tsp. salt", "1 grated onion", "grated garlic"]
directions: ["Use over spinach greens, lettuce, bean sprouts and hard boiled eggs."]

title: Crescent Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. vanilla", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and vanilla.", "Sift flour with salt and add to shortening mixture.", "Blend thoroughly.", "Add nuts.", "Shape into crescents.", "Bake in pan at 325\u00b0 about 20 minutes.", "Do not brown."]

title: Ham Rolls
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/4 large finely chopped onion", "1/2 c. drained and chopped green olives", "1 1/2 tsp. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. mustard", "1/2 Tbsp. horseradish (white)", "1 1/2 handfuls crushed potato chips"]
directions: ["Mix together; spread on thinly sliced boiled ham.", "One-half pound of ham makes about 35 Ham Rolls.", "Chill and slice."]

title: Pecan Pie(Southern)
ingredients: ["1 c. corn syrup", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. dark brown sugar", "1/3 c. melted butter", "1 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Mix syrup, sugar, salt, butter and vanilla together.", "Add slightly beaten eggs.", "Pour into 9-inch unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle pecans over filling and bake in oven at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Oatmeal Shortbread
ingredients: ["10 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. oatmeal", "1/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 325\u00b0.", "Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch pan. In mixing bowl, cream together the butter or margarine, sugar and vanilla.", "Add oatmeal, flour and salt and mix together.", "Use your hands if you have to; spoon mixture into prepared pan and press down firmly.", "Bake about 30 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from oven.", "Cut into squares."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (No. 303) can sauerkraut", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. chopped carrots", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. green pepper", "1/2 c. onion"]
directions: ["Let sauerkraut and sugar stand 1/2 hour, covered in refrigerator.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Refrigerate overnight."]

title: Elsa'S Brown Sugar Delights
ingredients: ["3/4 c. brown sugar", "3/4 c. butter", "1 egg yolk", "2 c. flour (scant)", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pecans"]
directions: ["Mix well and form into small balls.", "Flatten with a fork. Place 1/2 pecan on each.", "Bake in moderate (350\u00b0) oven for 10 to 12 minutes."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. finely crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. finely chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Cream together butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add crushed potato chips and pecans.", "Stir in flour.", "Form into small balls, about 1 tablespoon of dough for each.", "Place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Press balls flat with bottom of a tumbler dipped in sugar.", "Place pecan half on top, if desired.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes, until cookies are lightly browned.", "Makes 3 1/2 dozen."]

title: Beets In Honey Sauce
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 c. honey", "1 Tbsp. butter", "2 c. cooked or canned beets"]
directions: ["Mix cornstarch and salt.", "Blend in water; add vinegar, honey and butter.", "Cook slowly, stirring constantly until thickened. Add sauce to beets.", "Let stand 10 minutes.", "Serve.", "Yields 4 servings."]

title: Thumbprint Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening or butter, softened", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. flour, sifted", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together thoroughly.", "Roll into 1 inch balls.", "Dip in slightly beaten egg white.", "Roll in nuts.", "Place a about 1 inches apart on ungreased baking sheet.", "Bake 5 minutes in 375\u00b0 oven.", "Remove from oven, quickly press thumb gently on top of each cookie.", "Return to oven and bake 8 minutes longer.", "Cool. Place in thumbprints, a bit of candied fruit, sparkling jelly or tinted confectioners sugar icing."]

title: Caramel Nut Corn
ingredients: ["2/3 c. popcorn", "2 c. dry roasted peanuts", "1 stick butter", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. Karo", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Pop", "popcorn.", "Divide", "into", "two parts. Put into two 9 x 12-inch pans.", "Add 1 cup peanuts into each pan. Into pot on top", "of", "stove", "over", "medium heat, melt butter, sugar, Karo, vanilla and salt.", "Cook until boils; boil 5 minutes, stirring constantly.", "Pour", "on", "top", "of popcorn and peanuts, halving between two pans.", "Put", "pans", "into oven for 1 hour, stirring every 15", "minutes.", "Pour", "out", "onto", "wax paper, stirring to keep from sticking together.", "Cool.", "Store."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 8 oz pkg cream cheese", "1 lg can crushed pineapple (Drain well)", "1/4 green pepper (finely diced) about 3 - 4 tbsp.", "3 tbsp onion chopped finely", "1 c walnuts finely chopped", "1 tsp salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well and shape into 2 balls."]

title: Caramel Sauce
ingredients: ["1 box brown sugar", "1 can cream", "1/2 stick butter", "heaping Tbsp. flour or more", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix flour with brown sugar; mix a little cream with egg yolk. Beat well.", "Mix in milk and butter.", "Cook in double boiler until thick.", "Add vanilla at end of cooking."]

title: Frozen Date Salad
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/4 c. maple syrup (pure maple)", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. chopped dates", "1 1/2 c. drained crushed pineapple", "1 carton Riches Whipping cream (whipped)"]
directions: ["Whip together cream cheese and syrup.", "Add nuts, dates and pineapple.", "Add whipped cream.", "Mix together in a serving bowl and freeze.", "Take out of freezer 3 hours before serving."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 stick margarine", "8 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Cream butter and margarine (I use all butter).", "Add rest of ingredients, beating after each addition. Stir in nuts.", "Drop by half teaspoon on cookie sheet sprayed with Baker's Secret or lined with tin foil.", "Bake 15 minutes or less at 350\u00b0 until edges are brown."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. minced green pepper", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt (Lawry's or your favorite brand)", "1 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple well.", "Set aside nuts.", "Add all ingredients to softened cream cheese and chill.", "When well chilled, shape into a ball or log and roll in chopped nuts.", "Keep chilled until served."]

title: Vinaigrette Dressing For Spinach Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. red wine vinegar", "1/3 c. ketchup", "3 Tbsp. worcestershire sauce", "1/2 to 1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and mix well."]

title: Cranberry Dessert
ingredients: ["cranberries", "sugar", "2 c. oatmeal", "1 1/2 c. flour", "2/3 c. shortening", "1 c. brown sugar"]
directions: ["Cook cranberries down and add the amount of sugar you like. Mix together the remaining ingredients.", "Use a cake pan.", "Put 1/2 the mixture in bottom of pan, pour cranberries in, then put the other half of mixture on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until brown."]

title: Wedding Cookies
ingredients: ["4 c plain flour", "8 Tbsp 10X sugar", "1 Tsp salt", "1 lb margarine", "1 Tbsp vanilla", "2 c pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix flour, sugar, margarine, vanilla and salt.", "Add pecans. Roll into balls and bake in 350 degree oven for 15 minutes.", "Roll in 10X sugar while hot."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large sauerkraut", "1 c. onion, chopped", "1 c. carrots, shredded", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Bring 1/3 cup oil and 1/2 cup vinegar to a boil. Pour over other ingredients. Refrigerate overnight."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. pecans, chopped and divided"]
directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients; add one cup pecans and mix well. Refrigerate until firm and shape into a ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans before serving.", "Serve with assortment of crackers."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["2 c. canned sauerkraut, drained", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1/2 c. onion, chopped", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Combine vegetables; mix well.", "Heat sugar and vinegar to boiling.", "Pour over vegetables.", "Cool.", "Place in covered container.", "Refrigerate at least 8 hours before serving."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. finely chopped nuts", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together and form into balls.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Press balls flat with glass dipped in sugar. Bake 12 to 15 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Fruit Burst Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. almond extract", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. finely chopped nuts", "Smucker's Simply Fruit (any flavor)"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Blend in extract. Combine flour and salt. Add to butter mixture and blend well.", "Shape tablespoon of dough into balls. Roll in nuts.", "Place 2-inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten slightly.", "Indent centers.", "Fill with fruit spread. Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until light brown.", "Cool on wire racks. Makes 2 1/2 dozen."]

title: Celery Seed Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. mustard", "2/3 c. vinegar", "1 small onion", "1 pt. oil"]
directions: ["Blend in blender for", "5 minutes.", "Then add 1 tablespoon celery seed."]

title: Butter Ball Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. walnuts", "1 c. sifted flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 c. soft butter", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.", "Roll batter into balls, about 3/4-inch in diameter.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes.", "When cold, roll in confectioners sugar.", "Makes 3 dozen cookies."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese; add pepper, onion, pineapple, seasoned salt and 1 cup nuts.", "Mix well and shape into ball.", "Roll in 1 cup nuts.", "Chill for several hours.", "Serve with crackers.", "Serves 10 to 15."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. dried onion", "1 Tbsp. salt (optional)"]
directions: ["In a bowl, beat cream cheese smooth with fork. Stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper and salt.", "Chill. Shape into a ball and roll in remaining 1 cup pecans.", "Chill again."]

title: Strawberry Pizza
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "1 1/2 sticks margarine or butter, melted", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 c. finely chopped walnuts", "8 oz. cream cheese", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix flour, sugar and nuts.", "Pour melted butter over all and mix until you can pat it out in a pizza pan. Bake at 370\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes or until slightly brown.", "Cool."]

title: Prize Butter Bars
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter or oleo", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. butter", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Combine butter, sugar, salt and vanilla; mix well.", "Add flour and beat on low speed until fine particles form.", "Reserve 1 cup. Press remaining crumbs in ungreased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Cream together cream cheese, butter and brown sugar.", "Spread over bottom layer as evenly as possible.", "Sprinkle chopped nuts over top. Sprinkle with reserved crumbs.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: ["1 lb. rice, cooked and cooled", "2 Tbsp. butter", "Worcestershire sauce or soy sauce", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1/2 green pepper, chopped", "fried and crumbled bacon or ham"]
directions: ["Take the butter and Worcestershire and place in electric skillet.", "Add onion and green pepper.", "Fry rice in this mixture. Add bacon.", "Be creative; may add water chestnuts, mushrooms, bean sprouts, celery, etc."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "large dash of black pepper", "hot sauce to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in a shaker bottle."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. seasoning salt", "2 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Soften cheese at room temperature. Cream and gradually stir in drained crushed pineapple until smooth. Add 1 cup of pecans, green pepper, onion and salt. Chill mixture well. Form into a ball and roll in remaining cup of pecans. Chill until serving time. Garnish with maraschino cherries and parsley. Serve with assortment of crackers."]

title: Barbecue Sauce(Club Member: Amanda Speed)
ingredients: ["1 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "2 Tbsp. dry mustard", "6 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "6 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 tsp. butter"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in heavy pan; simmer to a slow boil. Store leftover in refrigerator."]

title: Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 c. flour", "3/4 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and cream cheese.", "Stir in flour, nuts and vanilla.", "Roll dough into tube shape (to be sliced) and roll into damp cloth.", "Place in refrigerator overnight.\tSlice thin and bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans, divided in half"]
directions: ["Combine the first 5 ingredients.", "Add 1 cup of pecans and mix well. Refrigerate until firm, then shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans before serving and garnish as desired.", "Serve with a variety of crackers.", "Delicious!"]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["2 c. sauerkraut (cut short)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. grated carrots", "1/4 c. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Sprinkle sugar over sauerkraut and allow to stand 1/2 hour. Stir in remaining ingredients.", "Cover well and allow to set 24 hours in refrigerator before serving.", "Makes 6 servings.", "Keeps well for up to 2 weeks in refrigerator."]

title: Honey Mustard Sauce
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. turmeric", "1/2 c. honey", "1/4 c. vinegar", "3 Tbsp. mustard"]
directions: ["Melt margarine in small saucepan; remove from heat.", "Add cornstarch and turmeric and mix.", "Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well.", "Return to stove and bring to boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.", "Boil for 1 minute.", "Use as a basting sauce or a dip."]

title: Cream Cheese Thumbprint
ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 2/3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Shape into balls.", "Roll in slightly beaten egg whites, then in finely chopped nuts.", "Place on greased cookie sheet and press thumb into dough to make slight indentation.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes.", "When cool, fill dent with frosting, cherries or jelly."]

title: Chocolate Snowballs
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. butter", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. cocoa", "2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter until fluffy.", "Add vanilla and sifted dry ingredients.", "Blend in 2 cups finely chopped nuts. Refrigerate, covered, at least several hours.", "Form into 1-inch balls.", "Place 1/2-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 20 minutes.", "Cool and roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Hazel'S Chocolate Icing
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. canned cream", "3/4 c. oil", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, cocoa and salt together in large saucepan.", "Pour in oil and cream.", "Cream together with whisk.", "Bring to boil and boil for 2 minutes.", "Remove from heat.", "Pour in mixing bowl and beat with mixer for 4 to 5 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. cocoa", "1 c. whipping cream", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix and cook on medium heat.", "After it starts to boil, do not stir.", "Bring to a soft ball.", "(Use a thermometer or place a drop or two into a cup of cold water.", "If it forms a soft ball, then remove from heat.)", "Add butter and vanilla.", "Do not stir.", "Let it cool for a while, then beat with a strong spoon until consistency is thick and hard to stir.", "Also, the color will turn dull.", "Pour into a greased platter.", "Cut into pieces when cooled."]

title: Honey Mustard Sauce And Dip
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. turmeric", "1/2 c. honey", "1/4 c. vinegar", "3 Tbsp. mustard"]
directions: ["Melt margarine in small saucepan.", "Remove from heat and add cornstarch and turmeric.", "Mix well.", "Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well.", "Return to medium heat and bring to a boil, stirring constantly.", "Boil for 1 minute.", "Yield: 1 cup."]

title: Raisin Cream Pie(2 Crusts)
ingredients: ["1 c. raisins, softened in boiling water (drain)", "1 1/2 c. half and half", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. flour"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Mix flour and sugar together before adding to other mixture.", "Put in unbaked pie shell.", "Cover with crust.", "Brush lightly with mixture left in bowl.", "Bake about 45 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Beet Salad
ingredients: ["1 can sliced beets", "1 medium mild onion, sliced into rings", "1/4 c. vegetable oil", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Approximately 1 to 2 hours before serving, mix and refrigerate."]

title: Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["4 c. grated, fresh carrots", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. raisins", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 c. diced celery", "3/4 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Mix carrots, sugar and salt; let stand 1 hour.", "Place in large strainer or colander.", "Add celery and raisins.", "Mix and let stand for 30 minutes.", "Stir in mayo and mix well.", "Let stand over sink for 15 to 20 minutes so extra mayo can drain.", "Serve in scoops on bed of lettuce.", "Refrigerate to store.", "Serves 6 to 8."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add vanilla and mix well.", "Add dry ingredients and mix well.", "Make walnut size balls.", "Press flat with glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes."]

title: Fudge
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1 c. cream *", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cook first four ingredients over medium heat to soft ball stage.", "Remove from heat, do not stir.", "Add vanilla and butter. Cool about an hour, add nuts and beat until it starts to lose its gloss.", "Spread onto buttered plate.", "Score while hot and cut when cool."]

title: Spinach And Artichoke Casserole(Serves 6)
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, cook and drain", "1 large can artichokes (water packed), drain and cut in quarters", "1 pt. sour cream", "1/2 c. chopped onion, sauteed in butter", "1/2 c. Parmesan", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients and put in 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Sue'S Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["1 Cracker Barrel sharp cheese", "2 large cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 Tbsp. horseradish", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. grated onion", "garlic powder (sprinkle over entire mixture)", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix grated cheese and cream cheese with mayonnaise, horseradish, Worcestershire and onion.", "Sprinkle garlic powder over mixture.", "Mix and roll into 2 balls.", "Roll in chopped nuts and chill.", "Will serve about 40 people on Triscuits or Ritz."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 1/4 c. sugar, divided", "1/2 c. margarine", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (9 oz.) carton whipped topping", "1 (16 oz.) can pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["First Layer:", "Combine pretzels, 1/2 cup sugar and margarine."]

title: Party Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. reduced fat cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add other ingredients.", "Chill well; form into a ball.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Marinade For Barbecue Chicken
ingredients: ["2 cloves garlic, chopped or minced", "1/2 onion, chopped", "1/4 tsp. m.s.g.", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Marinate for at least 2 hours before barbecuing.", "This same marinade can be used for ribs.", "This will \"do\" 1 fryer.", "Add more for more chicken."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["12 small beets, cooked and sliced", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. cornstarch", "1/2 c. mild vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Mix salt, sugar and cornstarch and add vinegar.", "Heat in the top of a double boiler over direct heat, stirring constantly. When mixture boils, place it over hot water and cook, stirring often for 5 minutes.", "Add beets, stir and cover.", "Let heat over hot water for at least 30 minutes.", "Add butter and serve."]

title: Sweet Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["32 oz. sauerkraut, rinsed and drained", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 green pepper, chopped (optional)", "1 small onion, finely chopped", "3/4 to 1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. oil"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, vinegar and oil well.", "Pour over remaining ingredients; toss.", "Cover and chill 3 to 24 hours.", "Makes 6 to 8 servings.", "Great side dish with brats or Polish sausage."]

title: Easy Cherry Pie
ingredients: ["1 1/3 c. sugar", "1/3 c. flour", "2 (16 oz. each) cans pitted red tart cherries, drained", "1/4 tsp. almond extract", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "pastry for 9-inch two crust pie"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 425\u00b0.", "Prepare pastry.", "Mix sugar and flour. Stir in cherries. Turn into pastry lined pie plate.", "Sprinkle with almond extract and dot with margarine.", "Cover with top crust that has slits cut in it. Seal and flute.", "Cover edge with 2 to 3-inch strips of foil to prevent excessive browning. Remove foil during the last 15 minutes of baking. Bake until crust is brown and juice begins to bubble through the slits in crust, 35 to 45 minutes."]

title: Caramel Corn
ingredients: ["1 1/2 to 2 c. unpopped corn", "2 c. brown sugar", "1 c. melted butter", "1/2 c. lite corn syrup", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cook popcorn.", "Place in large brown bag.", "Shake old maids to bottom.", "Remove popped corn.", "In saucepan mix brown sugar, melted butter, syrup and salt; stir together and bring to boil.", "Boil 5 minutes.", "Add vanilla, then add soda.", "Pour and stir together over popped corn.", "Spread popped corn over cookie sheet or bread pan. Place in 200\u00b0 oven for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes.", "Remove."]

title: Corn Relish
ingredients: ["2 (12 oz.) cans corn", "3 Tbsp. oil", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/4 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. minced dried onion"]
directions: ["In a bowl, combine drained corn and oil.", "In small saucepan, combine sugar, vinegar, onion, salt and celery seed.", "Cover and bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes.", "Add to corn mixture.", "Cover and cool.", "Refrigerate several hours.", "Drain to serve.", "Makes 3 cups."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["3 c. cooked, sliced beets", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. mild vinegar", "4 Tbsp. cream"]
directions: ["Cook and stir last 4 ingredients until clear.", "When clear, add beets and place pan, covered, over hot water for 1/2 hour.", "Just before serving, heat beets again and add 2 tablespoons butter."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["In a bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Stir in pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape cheese mixture into ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in plastic wrap or foil. Refrigerate 6 hours."]

title: Angel Pie
ingredients: ["1 c. chopped nuts (pecans)", "1 c. flour (plain, all-purpose)", "1 stick butter", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sugar (confectioners)", "2 boxes instant butter pecan pudding with only 3 c. milk", "8 oz. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix nuts, flour and butter and then press in 9 x 13-inch pan and bake for 15 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Let cool.", "Mix cream cheese, Cool Whip and sugar, then spread on top of first layer.", "Spread on instant butter pecan pudding.", "Place Cool Whip on top, then sprinkle nuts on."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "2 1/4 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream the butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla, chips, nuts and flour.", "Roll dough into balls and press flat with spoon or fork on greased cookie", "sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 18 minutes."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, peeled and cut", "1 medium green pepper, chopped", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cornstarch", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "2 tsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cook carrots in small amount of water and salt until tender. Add green pepper; cook 3 minutes and drain.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch and salt in medium saucepan.", "Drain pineapple.", "Reserve juice.", "Add water to pineapple juice to make 1/2 cup liquid.", "Stir into sugar mixture.", "Stir in vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook over low heat until bubbly.", "Stir constantly.", "Mix all ingredients; heat and serve.", "Do not boil."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/3 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 tsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Drain pineapple.", "Mix all ingredients, except 1 cup pecans, by hand.", "Form ball; roll in pecans.", "Chill until firm."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar. Add yolk and stir. Then add flour and vanilla. Fold into potato chips and nuts, if desired. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 15 minutes in 350\u00b0 oven. Do not let cookies brown. While still warm, sprinkle with confectioners sugar, approximately 4 dozen."]

title: Avocado Lime Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lime Jell-O", "1 avocado, mashed", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 small can crushed pineapple (reserve juice)", "1 small pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Use pineapple juice as part of liquid for jello.", "Mix all ingredients together, then let congeal in refrigerator.", "Good and different!!"]

title: Hawaiian Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. chopped fine green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped fine onion", "1 large can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped nuts (if desired; 1 c. mix in and 1 c. to roll ball in)"]
directions: ["Cream together cheese, salt, pepper, onion, pineapple and 1 cup nuts.", "Mix well and shape into ball.", "Roll in 1 cup nuts. Refrigerate at least 1 day before serving."]

title: Nut Ball Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter, softened (do not use margarine)", "5 heaping Tbsp. 10x sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "approximately 1 c. pecans or walnut pieces, crushed", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients together.", "Shape into balls.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 to 325\u00b0 for 45 minutes.", "Let cookies cool completely (even overnight).", "Shake in 10x sugar.", "Yields 76."]

title: Sweet And Crunchy Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["2 cans (16 oz. each) sauerkraut, drained and rinsed", "1 c. celery, finely chopped", "1/2 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "1/4 c. onion, finely chopped", "3/4 to 1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. olive oil"]
directions: ["In bowl, combine sauerkraut, celery, green pepper and onion.", "Mix sugar, vinegar and oil, stir until sugar dissolves.", "Pour over kraut mixture, toss, cover and chill 3 to 24 hours.", "Makes 6 to 8 servings."]

title: Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ["3/4 stick margarine", "1 c. brown sugar", "2 tsp. cream", "1 c. or more powdered sugar", "dash of salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cook and stir constantly over medium heat until it thickens."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. celery salt", "1/2 green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Gradually stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup nuts, onion and salt.", "Mold into ball; chill well.", "Roll in chopped nuts.", "Chill and serve with party rye and crackers."]

title: Spicy Pecans
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "6 drops hot sauce", "1 lb. shelled pecans", "Salt"]
directions: ["Melt butter and mix in Worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, and hot sauce.\tPour over pecans.", "Stir and salt lightly.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes."]

title: Patio Party Mix
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. butter or oleo", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 1/2 tsp. soy sauce", "1/4 tsp. onion or garlic powder", "2 c. Corn Chex", "2 c. Rice Chex", "2 c. Wheat Chex", "1 c. broken pretzels or salted nuts"]
directions: ["Melt butter in electric frypan at 200\u00b0.", "Stir in seasonings. Blend well.", "Add Chex, pretzels and nuts.", "Mix until coated. Cover skillet, leaving lid vent open.", "Heat at 250\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Stir midway.", "Cool on absorbent paper."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can pineapple, drained well", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all the ingredients.", "Roll mixture in 1 cup chopped pecans."]

title: Pink Salad
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 can whole cranberries", "1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Drain pineapple.", "Chop the can of whole cranberries.", "Blend or stir all ingredients together.", "Pour into 9 x 12-inch Pyrex dish.", "Freeze.", "Cut into serving squares. Serve on lettuce leaf or alone."]

title: Party Mix
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 c. Corn Chex cereal (bite size squares)", "2 c. Rice Chex cereal (bite size squares)", "2 c. Wheat Chex cereal (bite size squares)", "3/4 c. salted nuts"]
directions: ["Melt butter in shallow pan over low heat.", "Stir in seasoned salt and Worcestershire sauce.", "Add Chex and nuts.", "Mix until all pieces are coated.", "Heat in a 250\u00b0 oven for 45 minutes.", "Stir every 15 minutes. Spread out on an absorbent paper towel to cool."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped fine", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine", "1 flat can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped fine", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese soften to room temperature.", "Combine all ingredients, except 1 cup nuts.", "Use this cup of nuts to roll ball in.", "Serve with crackers.", "Can be frozen.", "Decorate with pineapple ring and cherries."]

title: Cheese Roll
ingredients: ["1 jar Roka cheese", "1 large pkg. cream cheese", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 tsp. minced onion", "chopped chives", "crushed pecans"]
directions: ["Mix cheeses with Worcestershire sauce and minced onion.", "Add chives, then roll in crushed pecans to form a log roll.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, pineapple, green pepper, onion and salt; mix well.", "Chill.", "Shape into a 4-inch ball and roll in pecans. Yields about 2 1/2 cups."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Soften cheese; stir in drained pineapple, 1 cup pecans and remainder of ingredients.", "Form into a ball and roll in 1 cup nuts.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Gorp
ingredients: ["1 c. quick cooking rolled oats", "1 c. dry roasted peanuts (no salt)", "1/4 c. wheat germ", "1/2 c. honey", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 c. M&M's candies", "1/2 c. chopped mixed dried fruit", "1/2 c. raisins"]
directions: ["In a bowl, combine oats, peanuts, nuts and wheat germ. Combine honey and oil.", "Stir into oat mixture.", "Spread in a jelly roll pan.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until light brown, stirring every 15 minutes.", "Remove from the oven.", "Let cool. Break into pieces.", "Stir in candy, dried fruit and raisins.", "Store in tightly covered container."]

title: Jeanne'S Favorite Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix together cream cheese and pineapple.", "When smooth, add green pepper, onion, salt and 1 cup of the pecans.", "Chill mixture (overnight is best).", "Form into 2 balls and roll in remaining cup of pecans."]

title: Green Grape Delight
ingredients: ["1 3 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1 Tbsp. Mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "Dash cayenne pepper", "Dash Garlic Powder (or rub bowl with fresh garlic)", "2 lbs. (4 cups) seedless green grapes, halved", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine first five ingredients and mix until smooth.", "Gently fold in grapes and nuts.", "Chill thoroughly, about two hours. Serve on lettuce leaves.", "Serves 4 - 6."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) Philadelphia cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped walnuts or pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Use 1/2 nuts.", "Mix ingredients and form into ball. Refrigerate overnight.", "Roll in rest of nuts in a.m."]

title: Maple Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. maple syrup", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 egg yolk", "2 c. 10x sugar, sifted", "1/2 c. maple syrup"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar. Add syrup and egg yolk. Mix in flour and salt. Divide in half and chill 2 hours. Roll out to 1/8-inch and cut into shapes. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 8 minutes. Cool and glaze."]

title: Pineapple Salad (Dessert)
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. crushed pretzel sticks", "2 c. Cool Whip", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "20 oz. can crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix the margarine, sugar and pretzel sticks and put in the bottom of a 9 x 12-inch pan."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. soft cream cheese", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together except for 3/4 cup pecans.", "Roll into a ball.", "Roll ball in remaining pecans."]

title: Pineapple Au Gratin
ingredients: ["2 large cans chunk pineapple, drained", "1 c. sugar", "6 Tbsp. flour", "1 stick margarine", "2 c. cheese, grated", "Ritz crackers"]
directions: ["Mix pineapple, flour, sugar and 1 1/2 cups cheese together. Pour into greased casserole.", "Crush enough Ritz crackers to cover mixture.", "Sprinkle remaining cheese over crackers.", "Melt butter; drizzle over top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 25 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Crunch-Lancaster County Style
ingredients: ["3 c. rhubarb", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. oatmeal", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter"]
directions: ["Mix together rhubarb, sugar and flour.", "Put this in 6 x 10 greased casserole.", "On top of this mixture, put brown sugar, oatmeal, flour and butter which has been mixed together!", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 40 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, except 1/2 cup pecans.", "Make into a ball; refrigerate until firm.", "Roll ball in remainder of pecans."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots", "1 medium green pepper", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Peel carrots and slice.", "Cook until tender.", "Add green pepper. Cook 3 more minutes; drain (reserve water).", "Drain pineapple; add water to juice to make 1 cup.", "Combine sugar, cornstarch, salt, vinegar and soy sauce to liquid.", "Cook until bubbly.", "Stir in vegetables and heat.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Carrot-Raisin Salad
ingredients: ["2 c. grated carrots", "1/2 c. raisins", "8 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. brown sugar"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple and reserve the juice.", "Mix the pineapple, carrots, nuts and raisins together; set aside.", "Take the pineapple juice and cream cheese and blend them together, add the brown sugar and mix well.", "Pour over the salad and mix well."]

title: Pecan Tassies
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. flour", "crushed pecans", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. soft margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Dough:", "Combine 1 stick margarine, cream cheese and flour.", "Mix well.", "Take marble-sized amount of dough and press evenly into tart pans.", "Put 1 teaspoon of crushed pecans in bottom of each pan."]

title: Potato Chip Cookie
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, melted", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. pecans", "2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Mix butter, sugar, vanilla, potato chips, and pecans well. Add flour and mix.", "Drop by tablespoon and bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes."]

title: Beets With Pineapple
ingredients: ["1 lb. can tiny whole beets (reserve liquid) or cut up larger beets", "1 lb. can pineapple chunks (reserve liquid)", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/3 c. sugar or substitute", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Cook juice drained from beets and pineapple in small saucepan with cornstarch, sugar and vinegar, stirring constantly until thickened. Add salt and pepper to taste, drained beets, pineapple and butter. Cook slowly for 20 minutes. Serve hot or cold. Makes 8 servings."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) bag or can sauerkraut", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Stir well.", "Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours.", "Makes enough for 6 people."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
