ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. firmly chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans, divided"]
directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients; add 1 cup pecans.", "Mix well. Refrigerate until firm and shape into a ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans."]

title: Pecan Rounds
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/8 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 c. crushed pecans"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Mix butter, sugar and vanilla until creamy.", "Add flour and salt; mix well.", "Last, add pecans and mix. Make in rolls and freeze.", "When you need these, take out and slice, then bake at 350\u00b0 until set."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Beat butter or margarine, sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add flour, chips and pecans. Mix well. Drop about 1 teaspoonful of batter about 2-inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten each drop by pressing with the bottom of a greased and sugared drinking glass. Bake in preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 10 to 12 minutes. Makes about 5 dozen."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 can beets", "1/2 c. vinegar", "pinch salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Mix salt, cornstarch, sugar and vinegar.", "Bring sauce to a boil, stirring constantly.", "Lower heat and let simmer several minutes.", "Add butter to the sauce.", "Drain beets,", "add to the sauce and cook slowly until the beets are hot.", "Serve at once.", "Yields about 6 servings."]

title: Venison And Lentils
ingredients: ["1/2 c. lentils", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. green pepper", "1/4 c. celery", "1/4 c. garlic", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Simmer ingredients for 1 1/2 hours.", "Add slices of venison steak and simmer for 1 1/2 hours more."]

title: Mrs. Myrtle'S Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. mustard", "1/4 bottle Worcestershire sauce (medium size bottle)", "dash of Tabasco", "1/2 grated onion or chopped (very small)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 bottle ketchup"]
directions: ["Whisk altogether.", "Great on chicken, beef, pork or venison."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped pecans (1/2 c. included in ball and 1/2 c. reserved to roll on the outside of ball)", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and shape into ball. Chill. When firm, roll in reserved 1/2 cup pecans. Store, covered, in refrigerator. May be reshaped and used again and again.", "Keeps indefinitely."]

title: Fudge
ingredients: ["2/3 c. Hershey's cocoa", "3 c. sugar", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. canned cream", "1/4 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix cocoa, sugar, salt and milk in saucepan.", "Bring to a hard boil stirring constantly.", "Turn down heat to low and continue to cook until it forms a ball in cold water or 234\u00b0 on candy thermometer.", "Remove from heat and add butter and vanilla.", "Mix well and transfer to platter.", "Let cool and cut."]

title: The Hour Glass Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, at room temperature", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. finely chopped pecans", "1/4 c. minced green pepper", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt (Durkee)"]
directions: ["Mix cream cheese until smooth; add pineapple, one cup of the pecans, green pepper, onion and seasoned salt.", "When well mixed, form into a ball and roll in the remaining cup of nuts to coat. Wrap in Saran Wrap and refrigerate overnight.", "May be frozen."]

title: Celery Seed Dressing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. mustard (dry)", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 c. oil", "1 tsp. grated onion", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix first 4 ingredients.", "Slowly add 1 cup salad oil, beating on low speed constantly.", "Add 1 teaspoon of grated onion and 1 teaspoon of celery seed.", "Mix well; refrigerate until needed."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["With a fork, cream the cream cheese.", "Add remaining ingredients, reserving 1 cup pecans.", "Mix well by hand.", "Let the mixture harden in the refrigerator for about 45 minutes.", "Remove and shape into a ball.", "Roll in reserved pecans."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. potato chips, crushed", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Form into balls, 1 teaspoon dough in each.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Press flat with small glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake 16 to 18 minutes or until slightly brown, in preheated 350\u00b0 oven.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen cookies."]

title: Horseradish Cream Sauce
ingredients: ["3/4 c. heavy or whipping cream", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. prepared horseradish, drained", "2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "pinch of sugar", "salt and freshly ground pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Whip heavy cream until it forms soft peaks.", "Combine mayonnaise, horseradish and mustard in another bowl.", "Using a rubber spatula, fold in the whipped cream.", "Add the sugar, salt and pepper.", "Stir well.", "Excellent with prime rib or corned beef."]

title: Chip Dip
ingredients: ["1 large pkg. cream cheese", "3 Tbsp. horseradish", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/4 tsp. mustard", "1 tsp. garlic salt"]
directions: ["Put in bowl and mix."]

title: Hot Artichoke Dip
ingredients: ["1 can artichokes, drained", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. Parmesan cheese", "8 oz. grated/shredded Mozzarella", "pinch of garlic salt", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "Worcestershire sauce to taste"]
directions: ["Chop artichokes and mix with other ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Serve with crackers and chips."]

title: Cream Ball
ingredients: ["1 large cream cheese", "1 Tbsp. green pepper, grated", "1 Tbsp. onion, grated", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. walnuts, chopped", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together; form ball and roll in the walnuts. Refrigerate."]

title: Nutty Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 oz. crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "6 oz. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Drain pineapple.", "Mix cream cheese, pineapple, pepper, onion, salt and 1/2 of the pecans.", "Chill overnight.", "Make into a ball and cover with remaining pecans."]

title: Rick'S Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["2 c. ketchup", "1/4 lb. butter", "1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. garlic, chopped", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. black pepper", "1 lemon", "1 Tbsp. ginger"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients.", "Great on ribs and chops!"]

title: London Broil Marinade
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soy sauce", "4 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. oil", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1 small onion, chopped", "4 Tbsp. sesame seeds", "pinch of garlic powder"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients; pour over London broil.", "Allow meat to marinate overnight in refrigerator.", "Grill on barbecue approximately 20 minutes on each side, depending on size of beef."]

title: Tangy Vegetable Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. minced onion"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.", "Good with all vegetables."]

title: Cocktail Chestnuts
ingredients: ["1 lb. bacon, cut into thirds", "3 cans whole water chestnuts", "1/2 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. molasses", "2/3 c. brown sugar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Heat ketchup, molasses, brown sugar and soy sauce on burner top until well mixed."]

title: Holiday Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion", "1/4 c. drained crushed pineapple", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add green pepper, onion, pineapple, seasoned salt and one cup chopped pecans; mix well.", "Shape into ball and roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill for several hours; serve with crackers or fresh vegetables.", "Keeps for a week or more in the refrigerator or one can be frozen."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 large cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1 small can pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "garlic salt to taste"]
directions: ["Mix cream cheese, green pepper and onion.", "Add 1 cup chopped pecans.", "Mix well.", "Shape into a ball.", "Roll in 1 cup chopped pecans.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Pound Cake Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "1 stick margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "3 c. plain flour"]
directions: ["Cream sugar, butter and margarine.", "Add egg yolk and vanilla. Add flour, one cup at a time.", "Roll into balls and top with pecan. Bake at 325\u00b0", "for 10 minutes."]

title: Caramel Fudge Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. walnuts", "1/4 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. sour cream", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Chop 1/2 of walnuts to medium pieces and rest to fine pieces for coating.", "Melt butter in pan and add sugars, salt and sour cream.", "Cook to a boil and boil 5 minutes, covered.", "Uncover and without stirring cook to 236\u00b0.", "Remove and cool.", "Add vanilla. Beat until creamy.", "Add nuts and drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper.", "Shape into balls and roll in finely chopped walnuts."]

title: Carrot-Raisin Salad
ingredients: ["3 c. carrots and juice", "cream", "vanilla", "sugar", "salt", "1 c. raisins"]
directions: ["Make 3 cups carrots and juice in the blender.", "Add a little cream, vanilla, and sugar to taste, a little salt and raisins."]

title: Cocktail Wieners
ingredients: ["1 onion, diced", "green pepper, diced", "1 c. ketchup", "3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. mustard", "3 Tbsp. brown sugar"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and simmer for 20 minutes. Stir occasionally. Add your wieners and simmer 30 to 40 minutes longer, then put into crock-pot."]

title: Granny'S Hush Puppies
ingredients: ["1 c. cornmeal", "1 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "chopped onion (as desired)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls into hot oil.", "Puppies will float when done."]

title: Crazy Crunch
ingredients: ["2/3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. margarine", "1/4 c. Karo corn syrup", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "4 c. popped corn", "2/3 c. toasted pecans", "1/3 c. toasted almonds"]
directions: ["Combine sugar, margarine and Karo syrup.", "Bring to boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.", "Continue boiling, stirring occasionally, about 10 to 15 minutes or until mixture turns light caramel color (290\u00b0); stir in vanilla.", "Pour syrup over popped corn and nuts on baking sheet; toss with two large spoons until popcorn and nuts are coated.", "Spread out to dry.", "Break apart and store in tightly covered container.", "Makes about 1 pound."]

title: Pineapple Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 heaping c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 stick margarine, melted", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small carton Cool Whip", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Mix pretzels, margarine and 1/2 cup of sugar; spread into a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake 5 minutes."]

title: Russian T Cakes(Cookies)
ingredients: ["1 c. soft butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix butter, sugar and vanilla; add mix of flour, salt and nuts. Chill; then roll in 1-inch balls.", "Bake until set.", "Roll in powdered sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Popcorn
ingredients: ["12 c. popped popcorn", "1 c. unsalted peanuts", "1 c. sugar", "2/3 c. corn syrup", "2 Tbsp. margarine or butter", "6 sq. Baker's semi-sweet chocolate", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 250\u00b0.", "Mix popcorn and peanuts in large shallow roasting pan.", "Cook sugar, corn syrup and margarine in heavy 2-quart saucepan over medium-heat until mixture boils, stirring constantly."]

title: Wacky Cake Frosting
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. sugar", "1/3 c. condensed milk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. margarine"]
directions: ["In", "large", "saucepan add all ingredients except vanilla. Stir over", "a", "low", "heat until sugar dissolves.", "Gradually increase heat to a rolling boil.", "Boil for 1 minute, remove from heat and", "add vanilla.", "Set", "pan in cold water and stir until thick pouring consistency.", "Pour over cake and set aside until frosting resembles fudge."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can sauerkraut, drained and chopped (or one 1 lb. pkg.)", "1 c. celery, diced", "1/2 c. green pepper, diced", "1 c. onion, diced", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "1/4 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Mix all together; let set for at least 24 hours in refrigerator."]

title: Sauerkraut Slaw
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. celery", "1/2 c. onion", "1/2 c. green pepper", "1 bag or large can sauerkraut", "1/3 c. oil"]
directions: ["Chop vegetables and drain sauerkraut.", "Cover sauerkraut with water and drain again, well.", "Put all ingredients together and mix well."]

title: Chex Party Mix
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 2/3 c. Corn Chex", "2 2/3 c. Rice Chex", "2 2/3 c. Wheat Chex", "1 c. salted peanuts", "1 c. pretzels"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 250\u00b0.", "Melt butter; stir in seasoned salt and Worcestershire.", "Pour mixture in roasting pan.", "Gradually add cereals, nuts and pretzels, stirring until all pieces are evenly coated.", "Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.", "Stir every 20 minutes."]

title: Refrigerator Pickles
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. white vinegar", "1 Tbsp. celery seed", "2 Tbsp. salt", "7 c. sliced, unpeeled pickles", "1 c. thinly sliced onion", "1 green pepper, sliced"]
directions: ["Bring to boil sugar, white vinegar, celery seed and salt. Pour over pickles, onion and pepper.", "Keep in refrigerator one day before serving.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Chat 'N' Chews
ingredients: ["4 c. oats", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. brown sugar", "3/4 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. honey or corn syrup", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Press into 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch jelly roll pan, well-greased.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes. Cut into squares when slightly warm."]

title: Sour Cream Fudge
ingredients: ["3 c. brown sugar", "1 c. sour cream", "dash of salt", "1/4 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Combine sugar and sour cream.", "Cook to 240\u00b0 (soft ball). Remove from heat.", "Add salt and butter.", "Beat until mixture begins to grain (thicken).", "Add vanilla and nuts and pour into buttered 8 x 8-inch pan."]

title: Pineapple Dip
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. pecans, crushed", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese set out of refrigerator to get to room temperature.", "Blend all ingredients together by spoon for thicker, chunkier dip or with mixer for creamier more smooth dip.", "Serve as appetizer with favorite crackers (Wheat Thins are great)."]

title: Gulliver'S Creamed Corn
ingredients: ["8 ears corn, cooked", "1 c. whipping cream", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "2 tsp. butter", "2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. m.s.g.", "1 tsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour"]
directions: ["Cut corn from cob and place in saucepan with whipping cream. Bring to boil, then reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes.", "Stir in salt, sugar and m.s.g.", "Melt butter in a small pan and stir in flour; do not brown.", "Stir butter and flour mixture into corn and cook until slightly thickened.", "Turn corn into ovenproof dish. Sprinkle with Parmesan and dot with butter.", "Brown under browning unit."]

title: Different Celery Sticks
ingredients: ["1 large bunch celery", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Clean celery well.", "Cut each stick into 2 1/2-inch pieces. Mix together cream cheese, pineapple, nuts, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Chill for several hours or overnight.", "Fill celery pieces with mixture and arrange on platter."]

title: Sour Cream Fudge
ingredients: ["3 c. brown sugar", "1 c. sour cream", "pinch of salt", "1/4 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Combine sugar", "and", "cream.", "Cook", "to 240\u00b0.", "Remove from heat and add", "salt and butter.", "Beat until it begins to grain. Stir in vanilla and nuts and pour into buttered pan."]

title: Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["3 c. raw carrots, grated", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "3 tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. horseradish", "2 tbsp. vinegar", "2 tbsp. sugar", "2 tbsp. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients. Chill and serve."]

title: Poppycock
ingredients: ["10 c. popped popcorn", "1 1/2 c. whole pecans", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "1 c. margarine", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Toast pecans on buttered cookie sheet at 325\u00b0 for 12 minutes."]

title: Creamy Fudge
ingredients: ["1 (28 oz.) pkg. Eagle Brand chocolate or vanilla flavored candy coating", "2 Tbsp. margarine or butter", "1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk (not evaporated)", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. vanilla extract"]
directions: ["In a heavy saucepan, over medium heat, melt candy coating and butter with sweetened condensed milk and salt.", "Remove from heat; stir in nuts and vanilla.", "Spread evenly onto wax paper-lined 9 or 13 x 9-inch baking pan.", "Chill 3 hours or until firm.", "Turn fudge onto cutting board; peel off paper and cut into squares.", "Store tightly covered at room temperature or in refrigerator.", "Makes about 3 pounds."]

title: Peanut Popcorn Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. molasses", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. roasted peanuts", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "10 c. popped popcorn, salted"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, molasses, vinegar and butter in saucepan.", "Cook, stirring, until sugar dissolves.", "Continue to cook without stirring until syrup forms a brittle ball in cold water.", "Remove from heat.", "Add vanilla, stirring only enough to mix it through the hot syrup.", "Have corn and peanuts mixed well in a large bowl. Pour cooked syrup slowly over corn, mixing well.", "Wet hands slightly and shape corn into balls.", "Makes 12 balls."]

title: Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["2 oz. Blue cheese", "1 oz. buttermilk", "pinch of garlic powder", "1 drop hot sauce", "1 drop Worcestershire sauce", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. sour cream"]
directions: ["In blender, mix thoroughly 1 ounce Blue cheese, buttermilk, garlic and both sauces.", "Add mayo and sour cream.", "Stir in remaining cheese."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 c. pretzels, crushed", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "20 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained (reserve juice)", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["1st Layer:", "Melt in saucepan 1 stick of margarine.", "Add 1 cup of crushed pretzels and 1/2 cup sugar.", "Press in a 9 x 13 pan."]

title: Walnut Balls
ingredients: ["2 c. all-purpose flour, sifted", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. walnuts, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt together.", "Work in butter, at room temperature and vanilla.", "Add 2 cups nuts, mix well.", "Shape in 1-inch balls.", "Roll balls in remaining nuts.", "Bake on ungreased sheets 25 minutes or until delicately brown."]

title: Buttermilk Pie Crust Dough
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 stick butter", "1/2 c. shortening", "1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Mix dry ingredients. Add butter, shortening and buttermilk"]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "4 1/2 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Gradually add all the other ingredients, but only adding 1/2 of nuts.", "Mix together and chill well.", "Form into a ball and roll in the remaining nuts.", "Chill until served."]

title: Catalina French Dressing
ingredients: ["2/3 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. sugar (amount to taste)", "2/3 c. vegetable oil", "1/2 c. red wine vinegar", "salt to taste", "1 to 2 cloves garlic", "2 Tbsp. finely minced onion"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in a jar with a tight-fitting lid and shake.", "This can also be mixed in a blender, although the color becomes creamier rather than translucent.", "If preparing in a blender, mix all ingredients, except onion.", "Stir in finely minced onion by hand.", "Refrigerate.", "Makes 2 cups."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. sliced carrots", "1 small green pepper, chopped", "1 (20 oz.) can chunk pineapple", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Cook carrots for 15 minutes. Add green pepper to carrots and cook 5 minutes.", "Combine remaining ingredients.", "Cook until thick. Pour over carrots."]

title: Simple, Easy Fudge
ingredients: ["3 c. chopped chocolate or chocolate morsels (sweet, semi-sweet or a combination)", "1 c. sugar", "1 can sweetened condensed milk", "pinch of salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in the top of a double boiler over hot, not boiling, water.", "Remove from heat and stir in remaining ingredients.", "Spread in a generously buttered 8-inch square pan. Chill 2 hours or until firm.", "Turn fudge out onto a cutting board; cut into squares.", "Store in tightly covered containers.", "Makes 49 pieces."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Cream margarine, sugar and vanilla together and add potato chips and pecans.", "Stir in the flour.", "Form into small balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheet and flatten with bottom of a glass which has been dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 16 to 18 minutes."]

title: Toffee Squares
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sifted flour", "1 (8 oz.) Hershey bar", "1 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter, add brown sugar and mix until light and fluffy. Add beaten egg yolk, vanilla and sifted flour.", "Spread thinly on jelly roll-size pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 15 to 20 minutes or until light brown.", "Melt chocolate in top of double boiler, spread on cookie surface while still warm.", "Sprinkle nuts on top.", "Cut in squares while warm and let cool."]

title: Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["1 large can cream", "1 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "5 Tbsp. cocoa", "dash of salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix well and bring to a boil, stirring constantly.", "Boil about 3 minutes.", "Serve hot over chocolate cake, covered with vanilla ice cream.", "\"Good hot fudge cake.\""]

title: St. Nicks Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter (use real butter)", "1/2 c. sifted xxx sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 c. enriched flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. chopped nuts (have pecans chopped fairly fine)"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add vanilla.", "Sift flour and salt; add to mixture.", "Add nuts.", "Chill dough.", "Shape into balls on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Cook until set, not brown.", "Roll in xxx sugar while hot."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch"]
directions: ["Mix pretzels, 1/2 cup sugar and margarine and press into dish (I use an 8 x 8-inch dish).", "Mix 1/2 cup sugar, Cool Whip and cream cheese very well.", "Spread on first layer and chill.", "Mix 1/4 cup sugar, cornstarch and pineapple juice together.", "Cook over low to medium heat, stirring until clear.", "Cool.", "Add pineapple and spread over second layer."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cheese; mix 1 cup of the pecans and all other ingredients with the softened cheese.", "Mold into ball.", "Roll in the other cup of pecans.", "(This cheese ball will freeze well.)"]

title: Easy Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. chopped nuts, chopped fine", "1 medium size can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 small pkg. grated sharp cheese"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together after the cheese has softened. Shape into a ball and pat on nuts.", "Add more pineapple juice if stiff.", "Refrigerate until ready to serve."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all together except half of the nuts.", "Shape into 2 balls and roll in the rest of the nuts.", "Chill overnight.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Soy Marinade
ingredients: ["1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder flakes", "1/2 c. oil", "1/4 c. soy sauce", "2 Tbsp. honey or sugar", "2 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and mix well.", "Makes enough for 3 pound steak.", "Put in plastic bag or non-metal container.", "Turn meat occasionally.", "Marinate overnight in refrigerator or 2 to 3 hours at room temperature. Remove from plastic bag. Pat dry. Fix as you like."]

title: Creamy Fudge(Makes About 3 Pounds)
ingredients: ["1 (28 oz.) pkg. chocolate or vanilla flavored candy coating", "2 Tbsp. margarine or butter", "1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. vanilla extract"]
directions: ["In heavy saucepan, over medium heat, melt candy coating and margarine with sweetened condensed milk and salt.", "Remove from heat; stir in nuts and vanilla.", "Spread evenly into wax paper-lined 9 or 13 x 9-inch baking pan.", "Chill 3 hours or until firm.", "Turn fudge onto cutting board; peel off paper and cut into squares.", "Store tightly covered at room temperature or in refrigerator."]

title: French Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1/2 c. ketchup", "1/4 c. white vinegar", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 small onion"]
directions: ["Grate onion in blender.", "Blend remaining ingredients in blender."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. margarine", "1 1/3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream the cream cheese, margarine and vanilla. Add dry ingredients.", "Divide into 3 parts.", "Chill 1/2 hour.", "Roll out and cut with cookie cutters. Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. mild vinegar", "2 c. cubed canned or cooked beets"]
directions: ["Melt butter. Add cornstarch, sugar and salt; blend. Add vinegar. Cook until thick. Add beets. Heat thoroughly. Serves 4 to 6."]

title: Sour Cream Fudge
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. nuts", "2 Tbsp. butter", "6 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. sour cream", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cook to soft ball stage; add sugar, cocoa, salt and sour cream.", "Remove from heat.", "Add butter, nuts and vanilla.", "Beat until creamy.", "Pour into buttered pan."]

title: Veg-All Casserole
ingredients: ["1 large can Veg-all", "1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts", "1 onion, chopped", "1 c. mayonnaise", "Salt to taste", "Ritz crackers", "Melted butter"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients and put in buttered casserole dish. Top with crushed crackers which have been mixed with butter. Bake at 350\u00b0 until top is brown."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 C. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 tsp. minced onion"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and chill.", "Good for dipping celery, cauliflower, carrots, etc."]

title: Buttermilk Biscuits
ingredients: ["4 c. self-rising flour", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. oil", "1 Tbsp. shortening", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 3/4 c. buttermilk or heavy whipping cream"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 500\u00b0.", "Mix all dry ingredients with shortening. Cut in shortening.", "Add all moist ingredients, knead on hard, floured surface.", "Bake for 10 to 15 minutes until golden."]

title: Horseradish Sauce
ingredients: ["1/4 c. horseradish, drained", "1 Tbsp. white vinegar", "1 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. prepared mustard", "1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped"]
directions: ["In small bowl, mix first 5 ingredients; fold in whipped cream. Serve on roast, broiled beef, baked ham, corned beef or fried or poached fish."]

title: Mustard Sauce For Ham
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. cream, half and half or milk", "1 egg yolk", "1 1/2 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. dry mustard", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Mix all dry ingredients.", "Beat egg yolk slightly; add cream. Add to dry ingredients slowly.", "Add vinegar slowly.", "If added too fast, it will curdle.", "Bring to boil over low heat, stirring constantly, until thickened (soft custard).", "Serve warm."]

title: Dressing For Spinach Salad
ingredients: ["1 small onion, chopped", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vinegar", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. ketchup", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix thoroughly and serve chilled over fresh spinach."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Let cream cheese stand at room temperature to soften.", "Cream the cheese and gradually stir in crushed pineapple.", "When smooth, add remaining ingredients, reserving 1 cup pecans.", "Chill mixture well.", "Form into ball and roll in remaining cup of pecans.", "Chill until serving time."]

title: Rice Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 pkg. (8 oz.) each cream cheese, softened", "1 (6 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 c. cooked rice, cooled", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, pineapple that has been drained and rice.", "Add pepper, onion, rice and seasoned salt.", "Mix well and chill.", "With wet hands form into a ball.", "Roll in chopped pecans. Serve with celery and carrot sticks or party crackers."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["3 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. flour", "1 egg yolk, beaten", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream the cream cheese and butter together.", "Add sugar, egg yolk, flour and vanilla.", "Roll thin; cut with cookie cutter and bake at 350\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes or until brown."]

title: Rhubarb Or Apple Crisp
ingredients: ["4 c. rhubarb or apples", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 c. oatmeal", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. margarine"]
directions: ["Combine rhubarb pieces or apple slices with 1 1/2 cups sugar and 3 tablespoons flour.", "Place in greased 9 x 13-inch baking dish."]

title: Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["4 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. small curd cottage cheese", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. salt", "4 oz. Roquefort or Blue cheese, crumbled"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl, except crumbled cheese.", "Mix with an electric mixer.", "Stir in crumbled cheese with a fork.", "Refrigerate.", "Makes 1 1/2 quarts.", "(This is very strong flavored.", "If you're not a diehard Blue cheese lover, pass this by!)"]

title: Onion Spread
ingredients: ["1 small loaf rye bread", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "1/3 c. chopped onion", "dash of Worcestershire sauce", "1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together.", "Spread on small pieces of rye bread.", "Put under broiler for 3 minutes."]

title: Festive Cherryettes
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. shortening", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. 10x sugar", "1 c. flour", "1/4 to 1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix a soft dough.", "Take 1 teaspoon of dough and form a ball. Press flat.", "Place 1/4 to 1/2 cherry on top.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Double recipe:", "30 small cookies.", "Very good and rich!"]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. green pepper", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 tsp. finely chopped onion"]
directions: ["Mix everything but 1/2 cup pecans.", "Form in ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans."]

title: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. top round or sirloin steaks", "1 large onion, chopped", "8 oz. mushrooms, sliced", "2 c. sour cream", "butter", "salt and pepper", "flour", "Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Trim all fat, then cut in 1/2-inch strips (easiest to do if meat is partially frozen).", "Dredge meat strips in flour and brown in butter on all sides, a few at a time.", "Remove meat from pan; keep warm."]

title: English Toffee Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c butter", "1 t salt", "2 c flour", "1 c brown sugar", "1 egg yolk, beaten", "1 t vanilla", "9 Hershey's plain chocolate bars", "1 c crushed pecans or peanuts", "1 1/2 t vegetable oil", "dash salt"]
directions: ["Cream together butter, sugar and salt.", "Add beaten egg yolk, flour and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Scrape batter into an ungreased 12 x 17 jelly roll pan and pat out evenly.", "Baked on the lowest shelf of oven, 15-20 minutes at 350 F.", "Remove from oven and while still hot, lay squares of Hershey bars on top.", "Spread the chocolate with spatula to cover and sprinkle with topping (pecans, oil and salt mixed together).", "Put back in the oven for 5 minutes at 350 F.", "Cut into squares.", "Keep in refrigerator."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks margarine", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix in order given.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.", "When cool, sprinkle with confectioners sugar."]

title: Coffee Punch
ingredients: ["1 gal. strong coffee", "1 gal. cocoa", "1 qt. whipping cream", "1 gal. ice cream", "5 tsp. vanilla", "5 lb. sugar"]
directions: ["Make coffee and cocoa the day before and let sit in refrigerator overnight. Whip cream; add sugar and vanilla. Put coffee and cocoa in punch bowl. Slice ice cream and put in punch. Add whipped cream."]

title: Caramels
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. light cream", "1/2 c. finely chopped nuts", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Butter sides of a heavy 2-quart saucepan.", "In it, combine sugar, corn syrup, butter and 1/2 cup of the cream.", "Bring to a boil over low heat, stirring constantly.", "Slowly stir in the remaining 1/2 cup of cream.", "Cook over low heat to medium ball stage, stirring almost constantly.", "Remove from heat; add nuts and vanilla.", "Pour in the buttered 9 x 5 x 3-inch pan.", "Mark into 32 squares, when partially cool.", "When cold, cut and wrap.", "Store in an airtight container."]

title: Cheese Dip Or Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. crushed or chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix together.", "If making a ball, roll in another 1/2 cup chopped nuts."]

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: ["1 can beets", "1 to 1 1/2 Tbsp. flour", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Mix flour, sugar and salt.", "Slowly add vinegar and beet juice. Stir well and heat until thickened; add beets and butter.", "Heat through."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, cut diagonally", "1 medium green pepper, cut in squares", "8 oz. can pineapple chunks (in own juice)", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cook carrots 15 minutes. Add pepper and cook 3 more minutes. Drain off water. Drain pineapple and keep juice.", "Add water to make 1/3 cup liquid.", "Combine pineapple juice, vinegar, soy sauce, salt, sugar and cornstarch.", "Add carrots and peppers.", "Mix together and warm."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1/4 c. drained crushed pineapple", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth; add green pepper, onion, pineapple, salt and 1 cup of pecans.", "Mix well.", "Cool until it can be rolled into a ball.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Chill at least 1 hour.", "(Flavor increases if chilled overnight.)", "Serve with crackers or party rye."]

title: Butterfingers
ingredients: ["1 c. soft shortening (half butter)", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 2/3 c. sifted flour (plain)", "2/3 c. chopped nuts", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together thoroughly.", "Drop by tablespoon onto floured board.", "Roll with hand.", "Cut into finger lengths and bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 300\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until brown. Remove from pan with a spatula and roll in sifted confectioners sugar.", "Be careful when you take the cookies from the oven as they will break easily."]

title: French Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. vegetable oil", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. ketchup", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients in an electric blender; process until smooth.", "Cover and chill thoroughly."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (No. 303) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped pecans (1 c. for roll)", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoning salt"]
directions: ["Combine and roll in nuts.", "This", "is soft so I refrigerate before I try to roll in ball."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "4 oz. Cool Whip", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 c. sugar", "juice drained from 15 oz. can crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Mix.", "Heat until thick, then mix in crushed pineapple.", "Add this to first two layers and chill.", "Top with more Cool Whip and garnish with pretzels."]

title: Taffy Chips
ingredients: ["1 c. molasses", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "4 oz. chocolate"]
directions: ["Boil molasses, sugar, vinegar and butter slowly until mixture hardens when tested in cold water.", "Stir gently as syrup thickens. Add vanilla.", "Pour on a buttered plate and cool.", "Cut in 1-inch squares.", "When cool, melt chocolate over warm water and dip the pieces in it.", "Cool on waxed paper."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 1/2 tsp. instant onion"]
directions: ["Mix.", "Refrigerate until you can shape it. Then roll in pecans."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, leaving out half of the nuts. Shape into 2 balls.", "Roll each ball in the rest of the nuts. Chill overnight.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "1/2 lb. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. potato chips, broken in dime size pieces"]
directions: ["Cream butter, margarine, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour gradually and mix well.", "Stir in potato chips.", "Drop by tablespoons onto cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 stick margarine", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "20 oz. can pineapple", "8 oz. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Crush pretzels and add 1/3 cup sugar and margarine. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 5 to 7 minutes. Set aside to cool. Cream together cream cheese (room temperature) and 1/2 cup sugar until sugar is not grainy. Stir in pineapple. Fold in Cool Whip and pretzels."]

title: Radish, Chives Canapes
ingredients: ["1 c. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. softened butter", "1/2 c. radishes", "1/2 c. chopped chives", "1/2 tsp. salt", "thinly sliced rye or wheat bread"]
directions: ["Bring cheese to room temperature.", "Combine butter and cream with fork.", "Add chopped radishes, chives or scallions and salt; mix.", "Spread 1/4-inch of mixture on bread.", "Makes 2 dozen small sandwiches."]

title: Caesar Dressing
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. olive oil", "2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 cloves garlic", "1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard", "1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Blend ingredients on high until well mixed.", "Pour over Pepperoni Caesar Salad."]

title: Snowballs
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. plain flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. nuts, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla until fluffy.", "Add flour. Blend thoroughly and add nuts. Mix well.", "Shape into 1-inch balls. Put on baking sheet and bake at 325\u00b0 about 20 minutes.", "Do not brown.", "Cool.", "Roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Doretta'S Spread
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1/3 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 to 3 Tbsp. grated onion", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "green grapes, cut in half"]
directions: ["Blend", "cream", "cheese", "with", "brown", "sugar, green pepper, Worcestershire", "sauce,", "grated onion and walnuts.", "After thoroughly\tblended,", "add green grapes.", "Use your own judgement as to amount of green grapes.\tServe as a spread for crackers."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "nuts (if desired)"]
directions: ["Cream sugar, butter and vanilla.", "Add flour and chips.", "Form 1-inch balls and press down with floured glass bottom.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 14 minutes until golden.", "Serve at \"Tea Time\"!"]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1/2 onion, chopped fine", "1/2 green pepper, chopped fine", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "crushed walnuts (fine)"]
directions: ["Shape all ingredients, except nuts, into a ball.", "Cover outside with crushed walnuts."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. onion, minced", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Save 1/2 cup pecans to roll ball in."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. cheese", "Ritz crackers, crushed", "1 stick butter, melted"]
directions: ["In casserole dish, combine sugar and flour.", "Pour in pineapple with juice; cover with cheese.", "Cover with crackers and butter. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Beet Relish
ingredients: ["4 medium size beets", "1 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. prepared horseradish", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cook beets 35 to 40 minutes.", "Remove skins.", "Chop coarsely. In saucepan, heat vinegar, sugar and salt; stir until dissolved. Add other ingredients; boil 10 minutes, covered.", "Best if kept in refrigerator until used.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups relish."]

title: Butterscotch Nut Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. softened margarine", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 c. butterscotch morsels", "1 c. chopped nuts or slivered almonds"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except the butterscotch morsels and nuts. Press", "dough", "into a 10 1/2 x 15 1/2-inch pan. Sprinkle butterscotch", "morsels", "and chopped nuts over the top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes. Cool and cut into 2-inch squares."]

title: Hello Dolly'S
ingredients: ["1 cup butter", "1/2 cup sugar", "1/2 cup crushed Lays potato chips", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 cups sifted flour", "1/2 cup chopped walnuts or pecans"]
directions: ["Cream together butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add chips, nuts and flour."]

title: Spinach Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1/3 c. ketchup", "1 onion, diced", "1/4 c. white vinegar", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Will keep in refrigerator for a couple of weeks."]

title: Sharon'S Macaroni Salad
ingredients: ["16 oz. box macaroni", "1/4 c. oil", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 bottle olives, chopped", "celery", "onion", "a little bit of mayonnaise (2 Tbsp.)"]
directions: ["Cook the macaroni for the maximum time.", "Rinse macaroni with cold water as soon as finished cooking.", "Add all ingredients."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix softened cream cheese with other ingredients, using only 1 cup nuts.", "Shape into 2 balls and roll in other cup of chopped pecans.", "Chill."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 Tbsp. all seasoning salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together, reserving 1 cup pecans.", "Roll in reserved pecans.", "Refrigerate overnight."]

title: Cheesecake Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1 egg yolk", "1/4 c. sugar", "16 slices white bread, crusts removed", "margarine", "sugar and cinnamon to taste"]
directions: ["Mix together cream cheese, egg yolk and sugar.", "Spread over bread.", "Roll up jelly roll style.", "Dip in melted butter, then into cinnamon and sugar mixture.", "Freeze overnight.", "Cut each roll in half and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Yields 32 rolls."]

title: Canadian Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. pretzels, crunch in small pieces", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 stick soft butter", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "8 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 (15 oz.) can drained pineapple"]
directions: ["Mix pretzels, sugar and oleo and bake on cookie sheet 7 minutes at 350\u00b0. Cool and crunch up."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball(Holiday Recipe)
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped walnuts", "1/2 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Blend everything together except 1 cup of walnuts. Chill for 2 hours and form into ball. Roll into other cup of walnuts. Chill."]

title: Smothered Venison Cube Steak
ingredients: ["1 pkg. cubed venison (about 4 pieces)", "flour", "black pepper", "olive oil", "Worcestershire sauce", "onion", "soy sauce"]
directions: ["Heat olive oil in large frying pan.", "Use just enough oil to cover bottom of pan.", "Mix flour and black pepper to taste.", "Dredge meat in flour-pepper mix and brown on both sides in hot oil. After browning, reduce heat and put sliced onion, soy and Worcestershire sauces on top of meat and add enough water to cover meat.", "Turn heat to low; cover pan and allow to simmer for about 1 hour."]

title: Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. potato chips, crushed", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 c. sifted-all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Cream together butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add crushed potato chips and chopped nuts.", "Stir in flour.", "Form into small balls (about the size of a walnut).", "Place on ungreased baking sheet. Press down with a glass dipped in sugar.", "Decorate with half a candied cherry or a pecan half.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 12 to 15 minutes."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1 egg yolk", "1 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "canned frosting"]
directions: ["Cream the shortening, cream cheese and sugar. Add vanilla to egg yolk and add both to creamed mixture. Add flour and salt.", "Mix well. Drop by teaspoonfuls on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 12 minutes. Cool and frost."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can sauerkraut", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Refrigerate for several hours before serving."]

title: Potato Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. mayonnaise", "2 tsp. sugar (optional)", "2 tsp. celery seed", "2 tsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix well. Pour over potatoes and mix well."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) bottle ketchup", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "2 scant Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. mustard", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and rinse out ketchup bottle with 3/4 c. water and add to mixture. Put", "in saucepan and simmer about one hour."]

title: Holiday Shortbread Drops
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Blend in egg yolk, vanilla and salt. Mix well.", "Stir in flour.", "Mix in raisins and walnuts.", "Drop by small teaspoonfuls onto greased baking sheets.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes or until delicately brown on bottom.", "Makes about 4 dozen."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. margarine", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream together margarine, cream cheese and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Add the egg yolk and vanilla; mix until blended.", "Add flour and blend.", "Chill overnight.", "Drop by teaspoonful onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Cook each batch at 375\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients well; shape into ball.", "Roll in finely chopped pecans.", "Chill 24 hours and serve."]

title: Thumbprint Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. finely chopped nuts", "1/4 c. shortening", "1/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix", "shortening, butter, brown sugar, egg yolk and vanilla.", "Sift in flour and salt.", "Roll in walnut size balls. Mix 1 egg white slightly.", "Dip balls in egg white and roll in nuts.", "Bake 1 inch apart for 5 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven.", "Take from oven.", "Press thumbprint and bake 8 minutes longer.", "Fill with strawberry preserves."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "2 sticks softened butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour slowly.", "Add potato chips and nuts.", "Roll into small balls and press down with wet fork.", "Bake in a 325\u00b0 oven on ungreased cookie sheet for 10 to 15 minutes or until edges are lightly browned."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped very fine", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped very fine", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients using only 1 cup of pecans in the mixture.", "Roll the ball in the other cup of pecans."]

title: Nutty Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped (squeeze out water after chopping)", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix together the first 5 ingredients until well blended.", "Stir in 1 cup of chopped nuts into the mixture.", "Shape into a ball and place in a covered container.", "Refrigerate.", "Store in refrigerator for 24 hours to blend flavors."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "1/2 lb. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "3 3/4 c. flour", "1 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. walnuts, crushed", "3 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix together all ingredients.", "Drop by teaspoon onto cookie sheet.", "Bake 10 minutes in 350\u00b0 to 375\u00b0 oven.", "When cool, sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained well", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix first five ingredients with one cup of nuts, then roll \"ball\" in one cup of nuts.", "Make in different designs, like \"snowman\" etc."]

title: Mushroom Dip(Double Or Triple)
ingredients: ["1 small onion", "3 Tbsp. butter", "8 to 10 oz. chopped mushrooms", "8 oz. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. sour cream", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Saute onion in the butter; add mushrooms, salt and pepper. Saute on low heat.", "Add cream cheese, sour cream and Worcestershire sauce.", "Stir until melted."]

title: Hot Pineapple Salad
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained, save juice", "1/2 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1/2 c. crushed Ritz crackers", "1/4 c. butter, melted"]
directions: ["Combine sugar and flour; stir in 3 tablespoons pineapple juice; add pineapple and cheese. Mix well and place into 1 quart baking dish. Combine butter and cracker crumbs; sprinkle on top of pineapple mixture. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese. Carefully stir in pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Chill well and then form into a ball. Roll in remaining cup of pecans.", "Makes 8 servings."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 can (16 oz.) sauerkraut, drained and chopped", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 medium green pepper, chopped", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Place sauerkraut, onion, pepper and celery in large bowl. Combine sugar and vinegar; bring to a boil.", "Pour over vegetables. Mix well.", "Chill."]

title: Best Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. nuts, finely chopped", "1 small green pepper, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and form in ball.", "Mince pecans extra fine and roll ball in them."]

title: Celery Seed Dressing
ingredients: ["1 medium onion", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. oil", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. celery or poppy seed", "1 Tbsp. mustard"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients in blender. Pulse 3 times in blender. Makes 1 pint."]

title: Macaroni Salad
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) pkg. macaroni", "4 or 5 large carrots, scraped and grated", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 large green pepper, chopped", "2 c. mayonnaise", "1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. white vinegar", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain.", "Rinse with cold water; drain well.", "Combine macaroni, carrots, onion and green pepper in a large bowl; toss gently, and set aside."]

title: Refrigerator Pickles
ingredients: ["7 c. cukes or pickles", "1 c. onion, sliced", "1 green pepper, sliced", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Combine cukes, onions and green peppers in a bowl.", "Add sugar, vinegar, salt and celery seed; mix well.", "Cover and store in refrigerator.", "Wait 24 hours before enjoying.", "Pickles will last for about 3 months."]

title: Easy Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. green pepper", "2 Tbsp. margarine or butter", "3/4 c. Heinz ketchup", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Saute first 3 ingredients until light brown.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Add pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt.", "Shape into ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans."]

title: Vegetable Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "2 tsp. horseradish", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. minced onion"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and chill overnight.", "Serve with raw vegetables."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. butter", "1 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. potato chips, crushed", "10 x sugar"]
directions: ["Beat butter and sugar together until creamy.", "Add gradually, the remaining ingredients.", "Form into small balls.", "Place 1 inch apart on lightly greased cookie sheet.", "Press down with spoon. Bake 10 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Cool and sift 10x sugar on each."]

title: Easy Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Whip cream cheese.", "Add pineapple, pepper, onions, salt and 1 cup chopped pecans.", "Chill for 2 hours.", "Form into a ball and roll in the rest of the nuts."]

title: Pecan Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. (2 sticks) butter or oleo", "1/2 c. granulated sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. almond extract", "2 c. sifted flour", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.", "Stir in salt, extract, flour and pecans.", "Mix well.", "Chill several hours.", "Shape dough into small balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake in moderate oven at 300\u00b0 to 325\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes.", "While still warm, roll in powdered sugar.", "When completely cooled, roll in confectioners sugar again.", "Makes 5 dozen."]

title: Vegetable Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. fine curd cottage cheese", "1 c. real mayonnaise", "1 small onion, grated", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Blend in blender.", "Chill and serve with cut up veggies."]

title: Corn And Olives
ingredients: ["3 or 4 strips bacon, fried crisp", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 cans corn", "1 c. chopped, ripe olives", "8 oz. sour cream", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Fry bacon, remove from grease.", "Saute onion and add drained corn and olives.", "Cook 5 to 10 minutes."]

title: Hawaiian Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["In medium bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually stir in crushed pineapple, pecans (1 cup), green pepper, onion and salt. Shape into two balls and roll in remaining nuts. Wrap in plastic wrap and foil. Refrigerate overnight. Serve with assorted crackers. Makes two balls."]

title: My Favorite Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "3 to 5 dashes celery salt", "2 Tbsp. finely grated onion", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "dash of garlic salt"]
directions: ["Mix together.", "Form into a ball.", "Roll in chopped pecans and parsley.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Holiday Cheese Balls
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese (room temperature)", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and refrigerate until cool.", "Mold into balls and roll in chopped nuts. Mix with hands."]

title: Holiday Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2---8 oz cream cheese (room temperature)", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. green pepper", "1 small can crushed pineapple (drained)", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 cups chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Put one cup of pecans in mixture and shape into ball. Roll ball in one cup of pecans. Store in refrigerator."]

title: No Cholesterol Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "6 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 tsp. salt", "1 c. no cholesterol oil", "2 tsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift dry ingredients together.", "Add oil, vinegar, vanilla and 2 cups water.", "Mix well. Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes or until done.", "Cool in pan and frost with white icing."]

title: Party Mix
ingredients: ["1/4 c. margarine", "1 1/4 tsp. seasoned salt", "4 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "8 c. Chex (corn, rice or wheat)", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. pretzels"]
directions: ["Melt margarine in a roaster pan.", "Stir in seasonings. Gradually add cereals, nuts and pretzels.", "Stir to coat.", "Bake 1 hour at 250\u00b0.", "Stir every 15 minutes."]

title: Men-Love-It Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1 c. diced celery", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 pkg. lime Jell-O with 1 Tbsp. gelatin", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Mash cream cheese; blend with pineapple.", "Add nuts and celery. Dissolve gelatin in water.", "When cool, mix with cheese.", "Pour into individual molds; place in refrigerator until congealed. Serve with favorite salad dressing on lettuce leaf."]

title: Hoe-Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. cornmeal", "1/2 c. plus 1 tsp. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk (approximately)", "shortening"]
directions: ["Combine meal, flour, salt and sugar.", "Add buttermilk to make batter right consistency to fry.", "Have griddle or skillet hot with plenty of shortening.", "Fry until golden brown on both sides as you would for pancakes.", "Serve hot with butter."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["4 sticks butter", "1 1/2 Tbsp. vanilla", "2 c. crushed potato chips (not powdered)", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 c. sugar", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour, then chips and pecans; makes a stiff dough.", "Drop by tablespoon or shape into balls the size of a walnut.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes on ungreased cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 just until edges brown.", "When slightly cool, roll in powdered sugar.", "Makes about 90 cookies."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick margarine", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 can crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "8 oz. cream cheese"]
directions: ["Mix together pretzels, margarine and 1/2 of sugar.", "Layer as crust on bottom of pan.", "Mix together Cool Whip, cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar.", "Layer on pretzel crust.", "Drain pineapple; cook juice, remaining sugar and cornstarch until thick.", "Add pineapple; pour over top."]

title: Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "4 Tbsp. honey", "3 c. flour", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter and honey until fluffy.", "Add vanilla, salt and flour.", "Mix in nuts.", "Roll into balls the size of a walnut.", "Bake on lightly greased cookie sheet at 325\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes until lightly browned.", "Let cool 10 minutes and roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Microwave Sweet Crispix Mix
ingredients: ["2 c. brown sugar", "2/3 c. margarine", "1/2 c. honey", "6 c. Crispix cereal", "1 small bag little pretzels", "6 c. peanuts or cashews"]
directions: ["Boil first 3 ingredients for 5 minutes, without stirring.", "Pour Crispix, pretzels and peanuts in turkey pan.", "Pour boiling mixture over top.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Stir every 15 minutes."]

title: Hawaiian Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. sliced carrots", "1 medium green pepper, cubed", "1 (8 oz.) chunk pineapple", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["Cook carrots 15 minutes, then add green pepper and cook 3 minutes longer.", "Drain.", "Drain pineapple, reserving liquid to make 1/3 cup and pour into saucepan.", "In saucepan, combine rest of ingredients and cook until bubbly.", "Pour over carrots and pineapple and heat through.", "Serves 6."]

title: Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 Tsp. cocoa", "1 c. light cream", "dash of salt", "3 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In heavy pot, mix all the ingredients except the vanilla. Stir frequently until butter is melted. Boil until a soft ball is formed in glass of ice water. Do not get impatient and remove from stove before this happens. Remove from stove and add the vanilla and mix well. Place the pot in a larger pan of ice cold water and let set until the mixture is cooled. Pour into a buttered baking pan. When hard, cut into squares. Add nuts if you wish."]

title: Walk To School Cookies
ingredients: ["1 1/4 lb. butter", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "5 c. flour", "3/8 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar. Add vanilla, flour, salt and nuts to creamed mixture. Drop cookies on sheet pan and flatten with fork. Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven until lightly browned.", "Makes 5 dozen."]

title: Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "dash of salt", "3/4 c. cream", "1/2 stick butter", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In a saucepan, combine sugar, flour, cocoa and salt.", "Then add cream, butter and vanilla.", "Mix and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until it thickens.", "Then pour over cake or ice cream."]

title: Butternut Snow Balls
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour and salt.", "Mix together.", "Then add nuts. When cool, roll in powdered sugar twice. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Thumbprint Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 egg yolk", "1 c. sifted flour", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix together shortening, brown sugar, egg yolk and vanilla. Gradually add flour and salt to mixture.", "Chill dough a little. Roll in 1-inch balls.", "Dip in slightly beaten egg white and roll in finely chopped nuts or coconut.", "Place 1-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake for 5 minutes.", "Remove from oven. Press thumb gently on center of each cookie.", "Return to oven and bake 8 minutes more.", "When cool, fill center with tinted powdered sugar icing.", "Bake at 375\u00b0.", "Yields 2 dozen."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 (26 oz.) ketchup", "1 (5 oz.) Worcestershire sauce", "3/4 c. vinegar", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. celery seed"]
directions: ["Mix together and store in refrigerator.", "Makes about 1 quart."]

title: Pineapple Cream Cheese Pastries
ingredients: ["1 pkg. cream cheese (8 oz.)", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple", "2 heaping Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 sticks butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Cream butter and cream cheese together, then add flour.", "Add vanilla and mix well.", "Shape dough into a ball and chill.", "Roll out 1 part at a time and cut into squares.", "Place 1/2 teaspoon filling in center and fold over to seal.", "Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Cool and sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

title: Pretzel Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed pretzels", "1 stick melted butter or margarine", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Mix together crushed pretzels, melted butter and sugar. Spread on cookie sheet and bake at 400\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes.", "Let cool."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 large can kraut (drained)", "1 c. celery", "1 c. onion", "1 c. green pepper", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. oil"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and refrigerate.", "Keeps several weeks. Good on hot dog and bun."]

title: Pressed Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift together the flour and salt; set aside.", "Blend margarine and sugar.", "Beat in egg yolk and vanilla.", "Add to flour mixture. Put through cookie press.", "Bake for 10 minutes at 375\u00b0.", "Makes 50 cookies."]

title: Polynesian Beets
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can sliced beets", "1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Drain beets and pineapple, saving liquid.", "Cook liquid over medium heat to boiling point.", "Mix last 5 ingredients into a smooth paste.", "Stir a small amount of hot juices into paste, then mix with the rest of the juices, stirring until thickened.", "Add beets and pineapple, mixing well.", "Add butter or margarine. Simmer 20 minutes.", "Serves 8 to 10."]

title: Wild Rice With Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. white rice", "1 stalk celery, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "1/2 stick margarine", "2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms"]
directions: ["Brown chopped celery, green pepper and onion in margarine. Add mushrooms and their liquid.", "Combine with cooked rice; season to taste.", "Bake in greased baking dish at 350\u00b0 for about 30 minutes."]

title: Teriyaki Marinade(For Steak)
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soy sauce", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "5 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["In shallow bowl or plastic bag, combine all ingredients.", "Add the steak, coating with the marinade.", "Cover tightly and refrigerate for 6 to 24 hours.", "Turn occasionally.", "Broil or grill."]

title: Taffie Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, brown sugar, egg and vanilla. Add flour and salt. Press into a 9 x 13 inch cake pan and bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees."]

title: Pecan Crunch Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. sifted all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Cream together butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add crushed potato chips and pecans.", "Stir in flour.", "Form into small balls, using 1 tablespoon dough for each.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Press balls flat with bottom of a tumbler dipped in sugar.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until cookies are lightly browned, about 16 to 18 minutes. If desired, sprinkle with red or green sugar crystals, or top with pecan or cherry half.", "Makes 42."]

title: Hot Pineapple Salad
ingredients: ["20 oz. can pineapple, drained (keep 3 Tbsp. juice)", "1/2 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1 tube Ritz crackers"]
directions: ["Combine sugar and flour. Stir in 3 tablespoons juice. Add pineapple and cheese. Pour into 1-quart casserole. Combine butter and crackers. Sprinkle over top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 30 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Casserole(Salad Or Dessert)
ingredients: ["1 large can crushed pineapple", "1 large can pineapple chunks", "1 c. cheese, grated", "6 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. Ritz crackers, crushed", "1/2 stick butter, melted"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Add cheese to pineapple and stir."]

title: Raw Veggie Dip
ingredients: ["1/2 c. creamed cottage cheese", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "2 tsp. prepared mustard", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 onion, grated fine", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Combine ingredients.", "Chill at least 1 hour.", "Contains 40 calories per tablespoon."]

title: Old South Pralines
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. firmly packed light brown sugar", "3/4 c. light cream or half and half", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. coarsely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Butter sides of heavy 2-quart saucepan.", "Place sugars, cream and salt in saucepan.", "Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until sugar is dissolved.", "Turn heat to medium and cook until mixture boils.", "Reduce heat and continue cooking to 234\u00b0 on a candy thermometer.", "Remove from heat.", "Add butter and vanilla; do not stir.", "Cool 5 minutes.", "Stir in nuts.", "Beat until candy loses gloss and becomes thick (about 300 strokes or 2 minutes).", "Quickly spoon candy mixture, by teaspoonfuls, onto buttered cookie sheets. If mixture gets too thick to drop from spoon, add hot water, a teaspoonful at a time.", "Yield:", "36 pieces."]

title: Chocolate-Dipped Almond Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. unsalted butter", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 large egg yolk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/3 c. finely chopped almonds", "1 bag chocolate candy coating"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add next 5 ingredients and mix well. Shape the dough into 2 rolls.", "Wrap rolls and refrigerate until firm, about 2 hours.", "Preheat oven to 350\u00b0 and line baking sheets with parchment paper.", "Cut dough into 1/4-inch slices.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes.", "Cool on rack.", "Melt chocolate candy coating.", "Dip one end of cookie into chocolate, coating about halfway and lay on wax paper.", "Sprinkle with almonds.", "Makes approximately 6 dozen."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream together first 3 ingredients.", "Add remaining ingredients and mix together well.", "Roll into small balls.", "Drop on cookie sheet and press down with fork.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 to 350\u00b0 for about 10 minutes.", "Makes 4 dozen."]

title: Port Diner French Dressing
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. oil", "1 1/2 c. ketchup", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. mustard", "1 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Put in a jar and shake until mixed.", "Can be stored in refrigerator for weeks."]

title: Cheese Cookies

directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Combine flour, cornstarch and salt in a bowl.", "Add and stir in the butter, egg yolk and grated Parmesan cheese.", "Mix all the ingredients to get a dough.", "Let it stand for 10 minutes, then roll it to 1/4 inch thick.", "Cut into shapes with metal cookie cutters."]

title: Morton'S Salad Dressing

directions: ["Mix all ingredients and store in refrigerator.", "Dried onion and dried garlic may be used."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. drained crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Have cream at room temperature.", "Mix all ingredients together. Chill about 1 hour.", "Form a ball and roll into pecans.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Best Ever Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can well drained crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients well.", "Make balls desired shape and roll in fine chopped pecans."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Soften cheese.", "Stir in pineapple, 1 cup of nuts and other ingredients.", "Chill.", "Roll into ball and cover with the rest of the nuts.", "Serve chilled."]

title: Dressing For Spinach Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1/3 c. ketchup", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 small onion"]
directions: ["Mix in blender.", "Refrigerate.", "May alter salt and sugar content according to taste."]

title: Christmas Pickles
