directions: ["Combine all ingredients in jar; shake well.", "Refrigerate for 5 to 7 days."]

title: Nut Butterballs
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt together.", "Mix in butter, vanilla and nuts, mixing well.", "Shape into 1/2-inch balls.", "Roll half of the balls in nuts.", "Place the plain balls and those rolled in nuts on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 35 minutes.", "Roll plain cookies in powdered sugar."]

title: Our Sand Tarts
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 lb. butter", "3 tsp. vanilla", "sugar"]
directions: ["Combine flour and pecans.", "Set aside.", "Mix butter, 2 tablespoons sugar and vanilla; now add flour/pecan mixture.", "Roll dough on lightly floured surface.", "Either cut in strips or use biscuit cutter to make round ones.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 on greased cookie sheet for 15 minutes.", "While still warm, sprinkle with sugar."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. chopped nuts", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese until smooth.", "Gradually stir in pineapple, 1/2 cup nuts, green pepper, onions and salt.", "Shape into ball. Roll in remaining nuts.", "Wrap in clear plastic or foil and refrigerate overnight or unti well chilled.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Peach Crisp
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "1/2 c. walnuts", "4 lb. ripe, unbruised peaches", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 stick butter, at room temperature", "1 1/2 Tbsp. flour"]
directions: ["To make the topping, mix the flour and sugars in a bowl.", "Cut the butter into small pieces; mix it into the flour by rubbing it into the mixture with fingertips.", "Add walnuts.", "Preheat oven to 375\u00b0.", "Cut peaches in half, peel and remove pits.", "Cut into slices.", "Mix with flour and sugar (to taste).", "Spread peaches in a 2-quart glass or ceramic ovenproof dish.", "Sprinkle topping over peaches.", "Bake until topping is brown and peaches are bubbly. You can serve with heavy cream."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1 bottle ketchup", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 stick margarine", "a little hot sauce (Texas Pete)", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "sugar to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients and simmer."]

title: Squash Relish
ingredients: ["12 c. squash, shredded", "4 c. onion, chopped", "4 bell peppers (red or green or mix), chopped", "5 Tbsp. salt", "2 1/2 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. turmeric", "2 Tbsp. mustard seed", "6 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix shredded vegetables.", "Add 5 tablespoons salt.", "Store in refrigerator overnight.", "Then drain thoroughly.", "Rinse with cold water.", "Drain thoroughly.", "Then add boiled vinegar, sugar, mustard seed and turmeric.", "Bring to boil.", "Pour over squash mixture.", "Mix thoroughly.", "Pack in jars; put in hot water bath for 10 minutes."]

title: Sesame Pearl Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. brown sugar", "3/4 c. (1 1/2 sticks) butter or margarine", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. flour", "dash of salt", "5 to 6 Tbsp. sesame seeds"]
directions: ["Cream together sugar, butter and vanilla. Stir in flour and salt. Mix well. Shape into balls. Roll in sesame seeds. Place 2-inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Makes 3 dozen."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "8 1/2 oz. can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely minced", "2 Tbsp. onion, minced", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. pecans, chopped (use more if needed)", "1 box crackers"]
directions: ["Mix together cream cheese and pineapple. Add green pepper, onion and seasoned salt. Mix well and shape into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans until outside is coated. Chill before serving. Serve with crackers."]

title: Mild Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 large can crushed pineapple, well drained", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Mix all ingredients well and roll into ball.", "After ball gets firm (refrigerate), then roll in chopped nuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["2 large (20 oz.) cans pineapple", "2 c. sugar", "6 Tbsp. flour", "2 c. grated sharp cheese", "3 c. Cheese Tid-Bits crackers", "2 sticks butter, melted"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple, leaving just a little juice.", "Stir in sugar, flour and cheese.", "Pour into large casserole dish (13 x 9-inch). Cover with crushed Tid-Bits crackers.", "Pour melted butter over top.", "Bake, uncovered, approximately 35 to 40 minutes at 350\u00b0, or lightly browned."]

title: Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ["3 c. brown sugar", "1 c. granulated sugar", "1 c. sour cream or milk", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "cream or Top milk"]
directions: ["Combine the sugars and sour cream in a large saucepan and cook slowly until sugars are dissolved.", "Cook until a little of the mixture dropped in cold water forms a soft ball.", "Remove from heat.", "Add butter and vanilla and cool to 145\u00b0 or until the outside of the saucepan feels warm to the touch.", "Beat until quite stiff, then add enough cream while beating to make of a spreading consistency."]

title: Bacon Cream Cheese Ribbon Sandwiches
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 lb. bacon, cooked crisp", "1/2 small jar olives, chopped fine", "mayonnaise or Miracle Whip", "garlic salt to taste", "sliced bread"]
directions: ["Cream cheese, bacon (crumbled) and chopped olives together. Add enough mayonnaise to make mixture spread easily.", "Add garlic salt to taste.", "Spread onto bread.", "Cut into ribbon sandwiches."]

title: Microwave Fudge
ingredients: ["1 box 10x sugar", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["In 1 1/2-quart casserole, stir sugar, cocoa, salt, milk and vanilla together until partially blended (mixture is too stiff to thoroughly blend in all of dry ingredients).", "Put butter over top in center of dish.", "Microwave at High 2 minutes; remove, stir fast until smooth.", "Blend in nuts.", "Can add chunky peanut butter, about 3/4 cup.", "Pour in pan 8 x 4 x 3-inch.", "Chill 1 hour; cut into squares."]

title: Dark Chocolate Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1/3 c. granulated sugar", "3/4 c. unsweetened cocoa powder", "3/4 c. heavy cream (6 oz.)", "3 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["In a 1-quart glass bowl, combine brown sugar, granulated sugar, cocoa and cream.", "Mix well.", "Add butter.", "Heat well.", "Stir in top of double boiler or heat in microwave for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes, stirring once, until well mixed and sugars are dissolved. Stir in vanilla and salt.", "Serve hot over ice cream, cake or fruits.", "Can cool and store in refrigerator up to 2 weeks.", "Reheat in microwave on Low for 1 to 2 minutes until of good pouring consistency.", "Makes 1 3/4 cups."]

title: Hot Fruit Compote

directions: ["Drain fruit and put in casserole.", "Combine brown sugar and curry powder.", "Sprinkle over top of fruit.\tDot with butter. Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies

directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Blend in flour and vanilla. Carefully fold in potato chips.", "Add pecans.", "Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake 15 to 20 minutes just until barely browned.", "Dust with confectioners sugar if desired."]

title: Beth'S Rhubarb Pudding
ingredients: ["3 1/2 c. chopped rhubarb", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. oatmeal", "1/2 c. butter"]
directions: ["Mix the first 3 ingredients together and place in a 6 x 9-inch baking dish. Mix the brown sugar, flour, shortening, oatmeal and butter together.", "Sprinkle over the rhubarb mixture. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 40 minutes. Serve with milk or cream."]

directions: ["Cook carrots in salted water until tender.", "Cut carrots in strips and arrange in baking dish.", "Combine liquids, salt, pepper and onion.", "Pour over carrots.", "Sprinkle crumbs on top.", "Bake for 30 minutes at 375\u00b0.", "Serves 8."]

title: Hamburg Barbecue

directions: ["Brown meat.", "Mix together with other ingredients and simmer."]

directions: ["Mix all ingredients", "well and roll into 3/4-inch balls. Push thumb into each ball and fill with desired jam.", "Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Makes about 3 dozen cookies."]

title: Bacon-Horseradish Dip

directions: ["Combine all ingredients, mixing well.", "Chill overnight.", "Serve with crisp, raw vegetables.", "Makes 1 1/4 cups."]

directions: ["Cream the butter and honey.", "Mix in flour and salt.", "Add vanilla and nuts.", "Bake on greased cookie sheet in oven at 325\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Roll in powdered sugar.", "Makes about 3 dozen."]

ingredients: ["1/3 jar capers", "2 oz. horseradish", "3 oz. cream cheese, softened", "3/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. onion, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Mix capers in blender.", "Add other ingredients and mix well. Makes small amount, about 1 cup."]

title: Kraut Salad

directions: ["Combine all.", "Cover and refrigerate 8 hours.", "Serve with hot dogs, vegetable or meat dish.", "Yields 1 quart."]

title: Chocolate Delight Bites

directions: ["Heat chocolate in large microwave bowl at High speed for 2 minutes.", "Stir until completely melted.", "Beat in cream cheese and vanilla.", "Cool to room temperature.", "Gently stir in Cool Whip and refrigerate one hour.", "Shape into balls about 1-inch size and gently roll in nuts, coconut or chocolate.", "Store in covered dish in refrigerator."]

title: Potato Chip Bars

directions: ["Cream butter, margarine and sugar.", "Add vanilla and flour; mix until it forms a ball.", "Work in potato chips and nuts.", "Pat into 9 x 9-inch greased pan.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 15 minutes.", "Cut before cooled too much.", "Makes 36 squares."]

title: Cube Steak Casserole

title: Sweet And Sour Salad Dressing

title: Carrot Salad

title: Tea Time Sandwich
ingredients: ["2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped fine", "1/4 tsp. onion, grated", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Add all ingredients.", "Mix well.", "Chill. Makes 10 sandwiches.", "Cut to desired shapes."]

directions: ["Combine in a large pot and cook over medium heat until it forms a soft ball (in cold water).", "Stir constantly.", "Remove from heat and add vanilla, butter and pecans.", "Drop on waxed paper."]

title: Barbecue Sauce

directions: ["Melt margarine; add minced onion and minced green pepper. Cook slowly 2 minutes.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Simmer 10 minutes.", "Yield:", "8 servings.", "Great for hot dogs or hamburgers."]

title: Pineapple Nut Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 large bag pecans, chopped", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients, saving some of the chopped pecans to place on outside of roll.", "Roll in ball and chill overnight.", "Roll in remaining nuts before serving."]

title: Pretzel Salad

directions: ["Melt butter; stir in chopped pretzels and 1/2 cup sugar. Place in oven and bake for 3 to 5 minutes.", "Cream 1/3 cup sugar and cream cheese.", "Add crushed pineapple and baked ingredients (when cooled) together.", "Combine Cool Whip and pecans with mixture and place in bowl.", "Cool in refrigerator."]

title: Harvard Beets

directions: ["Blend sugar, salt and cornstarch in double boiler; stir in vinegar, then cook until smooth and thickened, stirring constantly. Add butter, onion and beets, and heat 20 minutes longer.", "Makes 5 servings."]

title: Gooseberry Pie

directions: ["Roll out half of pastry for bottom crust.", "Line a 9-inch pie plate.", "Crush 1/2 cup of the berries.", "Combine with sugar, tapioca and salt.", "Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.", "Add remaining berries.", "Pour into pastry shell; dot with butter or margarine.", "Roll out remaining pastry; adjust top crust.", "Seal and flute edges; cut slits for steam to escape.", "Bake in 400\u00b0 oven for 30 to 40 minutes or until browned.", "Serve pie warm."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball

directions: ["Place green pepper, onion and pineapple on paper towel to absorb liquid.", "Blend ingredients well.", "Refrigerate and chill at least 1/2 hour.", "Shape into ball.", "Roll in chopped pecans, if desired.", "(I made it into 2 balls.)", "Great for parties."]

title: Ruth'S Pecan Balls

title: Harvard Beets

directions: ["Mix sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Add vinegar and beet liquid. Cook and stir constantly until thickened and clear.", "Add beets and margarine.", "Heat and serve."]

title: Red Dressing

directions: ["Mix together; shake well.", "Makes 1 quart."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 lg. can sauerkraut", "1 c. chopped celery", "2 c. grated carrots", "1 c. fine chopped onion", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. white vinegar", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. sugar"]

title: Vegetable Cheese Ball

directions: ["Mix all ingredients except pecans.", "Shape in ball and roll in pecans.", "Serve with crackers.", "Can also make finger sandwiches."]

title: Pineapple Ball

title: Barbecued Spareribs

directions: ["Mix all ingredients and pour over ribs and bake at 300\u00b0 at least 2 hours."]

title: Basic Tart Crust

directions: ["In a small bowl, beat sugar and butter until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and egg yolk.", "Stir in flour and salt.", "Mix well.", "Add extract.", "Mix again.", "Chill 1 hour.", "Shape into 2 dozen one-inch balls.", "Place in tiny ungreased muffin cup.", "Can use small paper cups.", "Press dough on bottom and sides of cup.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes.", "Cool slightly in pan.", "Remove carefully and cool well.", "Fill with desired filling."]

title: Easy Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in medium bowl.", "Form into ball and wrap in Saran Wrap.", "Refrigerate for 4 to 5 hours or overnight.", "Roll in 1/2 cup chopped walnuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients and add nuts to mixture or make a ball and roll in chopped nuts."]

title: Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter", "4 sq. chocolate (baking)", "2 1/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. condensed milk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Melt together butter and chocolate.", "Add alternately the sugar, condensed milk and salt.", "Bring to boil in double boiler and add vanilla."]

title: Pineapple-Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. chopped nuts", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped finely", "2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix cheese, crushed pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and seasoned salt.", "Shape into ball; roll into remaining nuts.", "Wrap in foil.", "To serve, place on serving plate, using kale for greenery.", "Arrange slices of pineapple and cherries.", "Serve with assorted crackers.", "Refrigerate.", "Reshape and can be used several times."]

title: Celery And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, cut into T shapes", "1 small bunch celery, sliced diagonally 1/2-inch thick", "1 tsp. sugar", "2 tsp. soy sauce", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Heat oil in wok.", "Stir-fry mushrooms.", "Add celery, sugar and soy sauce.", "Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes or until celery becomes bright green.", "Serve hot."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Soften cream cheese.", "Mix all ingredients well; shape into ball.", "Sprinkle with paprika, or roll in chopped pecans.", "Spread on crackers."]

title: Terry'S Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["2 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. white vinegar", "2 tsp. chili powder", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 c. Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["To begin, you need something big enough to cook a hog in (ours is made from a 250 gallon butane gas tank; a cooker made from concrete blocks, stacked up to form the walk, and a make shift grill to hold the meat and laid on top, will also work)."]

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. oil", "1/2 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. vinegar", "dash of garlic salt", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients and shake well until sugar is dissolved.", "Use on tossed lettuce salad."]

title: Aunt Lil'S Sweet And Sour Beets
ingredients: ["1 (28 oz.) can sliced beets (undrained)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Do not drain beets.", "Heat to boiling point.", "Mix sugar and stir in cornstarch and when smooth, add to hot beets.", "Cook slowly for 5 minutes.", "Add butter just before serving."]

title: Scrunch
ingredients: ["fruit (peaches, pears and apples)", "sugar and cinnamon to taste", "1/2 c. butter", "3/4 c. sugar", "3/4 c. oatmeal", "1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Put cut up fruit in baking dish.", "Mix sugar and cinnamon to taste.", "Add to fruit.", "Mix butter, sugar, oatmeal and flour together.", "Spread over fruit.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until fruit is tender."]

title: Almond Crescent
ingredients: ["1 c. soft butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. grated almonds", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. almond extract"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Bake on top shelf of oven at 300\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Sugarless Cherry Chews
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1 c. cottage cheese, drained and sieved", "1/4 c. dairy sour cream", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "whole red glaze cherries or thick jam or fruit filling"]
directions: ["Beat butter until light and fluffy.", "Blend in cottage cheese and sour cream.", "Stir in flour and salt until thoroughly mixed. Chill dough if it's too soft to handle.", "Using rounded teaspoons of dough, shape into balls.", "Flatten center with fingers and place whole cherry or fruit filling in indentation.", "Place on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake in preheated 400 degree oven for 12 to 15 minutes, or until lightly browned.", "Remove and cool completely."]

title: Russian Tea Cakes(Like Wedding Cookies)
ingredients: ["1 c. soft butter or 2 sticks margarine", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 c. plain flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix butter, corn syrup and vanilla well.", "Stir in flour and salt.", "Add chopped nuts.", "Mix all ingredients real well.", "Chill dough.", "Roll into small balls and place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for 10 minutes or until set but do not burn, then reduce temperature to 225\u00b0 and bake 20 to 30 minutes longer."]

title: Nicole'S Favorite Chip Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives", "1/2 pt. whipping cream", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1 shake garlic salt", "1 tsp. onion, grated"]
directions: ["Mix all together.", "Add cream in thirds.", "May not need the whole half-pint.", "Serve with chips."]

title: Spinach Salad Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. ketchup", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 grated onion"]
directions: ["Mix with spinach, mushrooms, hard-cooked eggs, bacon and croutons."]

title: Black-Eyed Peas Casserole
ingredients: ["leftover peas", "1 c. honey", "garlic powder to taste", "onion powder to taste", "1 Tbsp. mustard seed", "3/4 c. ketchup", "strip of bacon (not cooked)"]
directions: ["Combine everything together.", "Put in casserole dish and lay bacon", "over top.", "Bake, uncovered, at 400\u00b0 for about 20 to 30 minutes."]

title: Brown Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter or margarine", "3/4 c. packed light brown sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "2 c. flour", "1/4 c. chopped nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter.", "Add the rest.", "Press with hands into an ungreased 10 x 15-inch pan.", "Sprinkle with colored sugar or chopped nuts.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 15 minutes or until dough springs back when lightly touched with fingers.", "Cut while warm in pan."]

title: Pepperoni Dip
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) container sour cream", "1 small jar Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. pepperoni", "1 medium onion", "1 medium green pepper"]
directions: ["Mix first 3 ingredients together; chop the other ingredients. Add it all together and mix.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: German Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour"]
directions: ["Set oven for 375\u00b0.", "Work butter and cheese together until blended.", "Gradually stir in sugar; beat until fluffy.", "Beat in egg yolk and vanilla; stir in flour and mix well.", "Put through a pastry tube (star, etc.).", "Decorate with red or green sugar for Christmas look.", "Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, until lightly browned. Makes about 4 dozen."]

title: Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. granulated sugar", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg yolk", "2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Beat butter and cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sugar, vanilla and egg yolk. Add flour, 1/2 cup at a time, beating good after each 1/2 cup.", "Chill 1 hour or overnight.", "Roll and cut. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 7", "to 10 minutes.", "Makes 4 1/2 dozen."]

title: Apple Dip
ingredients: ["3 green apples, sliced in wedges", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "3/4 c. brown sugar, not packed", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 jar Hershey's or Smucker's butterscotch caramel", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Soak sliced apples in 2 cups water, 1 tablespoon vinegar and 1 tablespoon salt; cover.", "Mix cream cheese, sugar and vanilla until blended.", "Place on serving dish.", "Top with caramel and nuts.", "Pat apples dry and arrange around dip."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. butter", "1/2 lb. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 1/2 c. flour", "3 1/2 oz. crushed potato chips"]
directions: ["Cream butter, margarine and sugar until fluffy.", "Add vanilla and mix well.", "Gradually beat in flour.", "Then add chips and mix well.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonful on ungreased cookie sheet and flatten with a fork.", "Bake for 15 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar when cool."]

title: Celery Seed Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. oil", "1/2 c. sugar or 12 packets Sweet 'N Low", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. celery", "1 tsp. prepared mustard"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients; beat at high speed with mixer."]

title: Sweet And Sour Carrots
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots, diagonally sliced", "1 medium green pepper, cut in 1-inch squares", "1 (8 oz.) pineapple chunks in juice", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 tsp. soy sauce"]
directions: ["In saucepan, cook carrots until tender.", "Add peppers; cook slightly.", "Drain pineapple.", "Keep juice.", "Add water to juice to make 1/3 cup liquid.", "Remove carrots and peppers.", "Discard water. In pan, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt.", "Stir in pineapple liquid, vinegar and soy sauce.", "Cook until bubbly.", "Add vegetables and pineapple."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["8 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 or 2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Soften butter and cheese.", "Add sugar, salt, vanilla and flour. Cream all together.", "Make small balls; press thumb down in center. Grease pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes.", "Cool and then place icing in center."]

title: Pecan Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained well", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "4 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. finely chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Combine cream cheese, pineapple, onion, green pepper, seasoned salt and 1 cup pecans in a bowl.", "Mix well. Shape into a ball. Roll in remaining pecans to coat.", "Wrap in waxed paper and store in refrigerator.", "Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour before serving.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. can sauerkraut, drained", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. celery, diced", "1/2 c. green pepper, diced", "1/2 c. carrots, shredded", "1/2 onion, chopped"]
directions: ["Cur sauerkraut strips into short pieces.", "Stir in sugar and let stand 30 minutes.", "Add remaining ingredients and toss."]

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 c. minced onion", "1/2 c. minced green pepper", "2 Tbsp. butter", "3/4 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Saute onion and pepper in 2 tablespoons butter.", "Stir in remaining 5 ingredients.", "Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.", "Great on chicken, ribs and pork."]

title: Buttermilk Fudge
ingredients: ["1 stick butter or margarine", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1/4 Tbsp. salt", "1 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Cook sugar and milk for 30 minutes after it starts boiling on low heat.", "Take from stove; add butter and beat."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Danish
ingredients: ["1 - 3 ounces package cream cheese (softened)", "2 tablespoons sugar", "1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1 package refrigerated buttermilk biscuits", "1 - 8 ounce can crushed pineapple (drained)", "1/4 cup slivered almonds"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 375 degrees.", "In medium bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and vanilla.", "Separate biscuits; place on baking sheet and flatten to 4 - inches in diameter.", "Spread cream cheese mixture evenly over biscuits.", "Distribute pineapple evenly over cream cheese.", "Top with almonds.", "Bake 12 to 15 minutes until biscuits are browned."]

title: Mary'S Garlic Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) packages cream cheese, softened", "2 Tbsp. Mayonnaise", "4 cloves garlic, minced", "1/8 tsp. garlic salt", "1 c. pecans, finely chopped", "3/4 c. pecans, coarsely chopped"]
directions: ["Place a piece of foil wrap about 18 inches long onto counter top; place a piece of plastic wrap the same size over the foil. Leave these in place while you prepare the cheese ball."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "3/4 c. pecans", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla together.", "Mix in chips and nuts.", "Mix in flour.", "Roll in small balls, place on a cookie sheet, then mash down with fingers.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Honeyed Walnut Squares
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. honey", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. unsifted flour", "1 c. finely chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Beat together the first 4 ingredients until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes.", "At low speed, blend in flour until dough forms. Blend in walnuts.", "Spread evenly in greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan. Bake at 325\u00b0", "until golden brown, about 30 to 35 minutes.", "Cool 5 minutes.", "Cut into 25 squares.", "Dust with confectioners sugar."]

title: Venison On Rice
ingredients: ["1/2 lb bacon, crisp well & crumble", "1 c onion chopped", "2 cloves garlic minced", "1 c ketchup", "1/2 c red wine vinegar", "1/4 c worcestershire sauce", "1/2 c brown sugar", "2 lb venison, cut into 1-inch cubes"]
directions: ["Crisp bacon, set on paper towels to drain then crumble. Place the venison in the hot bacon grease and brown quickly.", "Add everything to the venison and simmer 1 hour.", "Then serve over rice."]

title: Pineapple And Cheese Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) can chunk pineapple", "3 Tbsp. flour", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/4 c. cheese, grated", "Ritz crackers (about 30)", "3 Tbsp. melted butter"]
directions: ["Drain pineapple.", "Save 3 tablespoons juice; arrange pineapple on the bottom of greased 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.", "Stir together flour and sugar; sprinkle over pineapple.", "Drizzle pineapple juice over top with cheese.", "Mix crushed crackers and butter.", "Pour over cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes, covered. Uncover and bake for 10 minutes."]

title: Curry Dip For Vegetables
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "3 Tbsp. ketchup", "1 small onion, minced", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. curry powder", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients together and serve with assorted vegetables."]

title: Gooseberry Pie
ingredients: ["3 1/2 c. gooseberries", "2 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. grated orange peel", "2 Tbsp. butter, melted", "pastry for 2 crust 9-inch pie"]
directions: ["Mix together berries, tapioca, sugar, salt, orange peel and butter.", "Let stand for 215 minutes.", "Pour into pastry shell. Cover with top crust and slit to vent.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Reduce the temperature to 350\u00b0 and bake for 30 minutes."]

title: Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. carrots", "1/2 c. raisins or more", "1 small can crushed pineapple, undrained", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Peel and grate carrots.", "Mix with raisins, pineapple, celery, mayonnaise and sugar.", "Cover and store in refrigerator.", "This will keep a week or more."]

title: Potato Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. crushed potato chips", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter together.", "Mix all other ingredients in large bowl.", "Pour into creamed mixture.", "Mix.", "Roll into balls; flatten with glass bottom dropped in sugar.", "Top with a pecan half.", "Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 18 minutes."]

title: Russian Tea Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. sifted 10x sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour, sifted", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2/3 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Blend together the butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add flour, salt and nuts; mix well.", "Chill dough.", "Roll into 1-inch balls.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "While still warm, roll in confectioners sugar.", "Cool and roll again."]

title: Scott'S Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 Tbsp. salt, seasoned", "1 c. pecans (to roll ball in)"]
directions: ["Leave cheese at room temperature.", "While preparing other ingredients, drain pineapple but not moistless.", "Mix everything together.", "Roll ball in nuts.", "Refrigerate.", "Add 1 cup pecans, if desired, and mix into ball."]

title: Beets(Over 50 Years Old)
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. mild vinegar or 6 Tbsp. vinegar and 1/4 c. cream", "3 c. cooked sliced beets", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Cook and stir the first 4 ingredients in the top of a double boiler.", "When clear, add the beets and place the pan, covered, over hot water for 1/2 hour.", "Just before serving, heat the beets again and add the butter.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Easy Dip
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1 tsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise"]
directions: ["Mix together and chill.", "Can be served with veggies or chips."]

title: Cream Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chopped green pepper", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 c. crushed pineapple", "dash of salt", "1 c. chopped nuts, divided in half"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except 1/2 of the pecans.", "Form a ball and roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill.", "Serve at room temperature."]

title: Caramel Candy
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 (14 oz.) can condensed milk", "1 c. nuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Melt sugar and butter over low heat until caramelized to a golden brown.", "Add salt and milk; stir constantly until a hard ball can be formed in water.", "Add nuts and vanilla.", "Beat until cool.", "Pour into pan and let stand in refrigerator at least 30 minutes before cutting.", "Yields about 20 (1-inch) squares."]

title: No Bake Butterballs
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. oats", "2 Tbsp. cocoa (optional)"]
directions: ["Mix well.", "Form balls the size of walnuts and refrigerate.", "Or, if dough is too sticky, refrigerate first and then form the balls."]

title: Thumbprint Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening (1/2 margarine)", "1/4 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 egg yolk (use white later)", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix thoroughly the first 4 ingredients.", "Sift and stir in flour and salt.", "Roll into 1-inch balls; dip in slightly beaten egg white and roll in finely chopped nuts (3/4 cup).", "Place 1-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Press thumb in center of each.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Cool.", "Fill centers with candied fruit, jelly or tinted confectioners sugar icing. Makes about 2 dozen (1 1/2-inch) cookies."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/4 green pepper, chopped fine", "2 tsp. onion, chopped fine", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "8 1/2 oz. crushed pineapple, drained", "2 c. pecans, chopped fine"]
directions: ["Soften and cream the cream cheese.", "Add green pepper, onion and salt and cream together.", "Squeeze juice from pineapple, then blot with paper towel.", "Add pineapple and pecans to rest of mixture.", "Form in a ball and chill about 1 hour.", "Then roll in chopped pecans."]

title: Apricot Candy Roll
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "1 c. cream", "1 c. dried apricots, chopped", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cook the first 4 ingredients in a heavy skillet to soft ball stage (236\u00b0).", "Cool to lukewarm.", "Add vanilla and nuts.", "Beat by hand until stiff enough to knead.", "Put on board; knead until smooth.", "Shape into roll.", "Chill; cut in slices."]

title: Carrot Salad
ingredients: ["1/3 c. heavy cream", "1 lb. carrots, shredded", "1/3 c. raisins", "1 (8 oz.) can pineapple tidbits or crushed pineapple (packed in natural juice)", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "1/3 c. mayonnaise"]
directions: ["In small bowl, with electric mixer on high, beat cream until stiff peaks form; set aside.", "In large bowl, combine remaining ingredients; toss to blend.", "Fold in whipped cream.", "Serve immediately or cover and chill to serve later.", "Serves 8."]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 qt. kraut, drained", "2 c. celery, chopped", "1 c. onion, chopped", "1 c. sugar", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1/2 tsp. salt (optional)", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 c. vinegar"]
directions: ["Boil sugar and vinegar for 1 minute.", "Cool and pour over rest of ingredients."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 small can pineapple", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "2 tsp. finely chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix in order.", "Make into a ball.", "Garnish with pineapple slices, parsley or nuts."]

title: Sweet Cole Slaw Dressing
ingredients: ["1/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. celery salt", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. celery seed", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Use 1/4 cup dressing to 1 cup shredded cabbage."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese", "1 small green pepper, minced", "1 medium onion, minced", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. pecans, chopped fine", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together with only 1/2 cup nuts.", "Form into a ball and refrigerate.", "When chilled, roll ball in remaining nuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Merry Christmas Balls
ingredients: ["2 large pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 c. nuts", "1/3 c. onion (green)", "1/3 c. green pepper", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Mix well!", "Roll in ball.", "Mash 1/2 cup or 1 cup of nuts and roll ball in nuts.", "Serve with crackers."]

title: Great Party Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. drained, crushed pineapple", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Reserve 1/2 cup nuts . Mix all other ingredients well.", "Take a small bowl and line with wax paper.", "Pour mixture in bowl.", "Cover also with wax paper.", "Chill several hours.", "Remove onto a serving dish.", "Press the reserved walnuts onto ball.", "Arrange crackers around outside."]

title: Pattie'S Pineapple Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1/4 c. melted margarine", "1 c. Ritz crackers, crushed"]
directions: ["Mix 3 tablespoons pineapple, flour and sugar.", "Drain pineapple and add to mixture and cheese.", "Crush Ritz crackers on top.", "Pour over melted margarine.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Pralines
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. canned cream", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "2 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Cook sugar, cream and salt to soft ball stage (236\u00b0), stirring to keep from burning.", "Add butter, pecans and vanilla.", "Beat until stiff.", "Drop on wax paper by spoonfuls."]

title: Broil Special
ingredients: ["1 nice sized London Broil steak (whatever preferred)", "onion powder", "garlic powder", "soy sauce (teriyaki)", "melted butter", "seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Place the temperature of the oven at broil.", "Place broil in an aluminum pan and slice about 10 slits into it.", "First season it with the onion, garlic and seasoned salt on top and under.", "Now poke holes into the broil with a fork.", "Then take a 1/4 to 1/2 cup of soy sauce and a 1/2 cup of melted butter and marinate the London Broil.", "Flip it once or twice so the seasoning gets through the whole steak.", "Let the steak set for about 15 to 25 minutes."]

title: Nut Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 c. soft margarine", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla or 1 tsp. almond", "2 c. sifted flour", "2 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix margarine and sugar until creamy.", "Add salt, vanilla, flour and nuts; mix well.", "Chill dough.", "Shape into 1-inch balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes.", "While warm, roll in powdered sugar."]

title: Oatmeal Quick Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. cream", "2 or 3 c. oatmeal", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Boil together first 4 ingredients for 2 to 3 minutes.", "Remove from heat and add 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla, and 2 or 3 cups oatmeal (and peanut butter, if desired).", "Stir until oatmeal is covered. Spoon and drop onto waxed paper.", "Cool before serving."]

title: Aunt Ginny'S Frozen Cranberry Salad
ingredients: ["2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 can whole cranberries", "1/2 c. chopped English walnuts (optional)", "2 c. Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Beat cream cheese, mayonnaise and sugar.", "Add pineapple, cranberries and nuts.", "Stir thoroughly, then fold in Cool Whip. Put in a 9 x 9-inch or 12 x 9-inch Pyrex baking dish and freeze overnight.", "Take out and cut in squares when needed."]

title: Russian Teacakes
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. 10x sugar, sifted", "2 1/4 c. flour", "3/4 c. nuts, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Mix butter, sugar and vanilla thoroughly.", "Blend sifted flour and salt; stir in.", "Add nuts.", "Chill dough."]

title: Pineapple Delight Pie
ingredients: ["1 medium size can crushed pineapple and same amount of water", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. flour", "3 Tbsp. margarine"]
directions: ["In a big pan mix all ingredients together and cook until thickened.", "Let cool, then spread in pie crust and add Cool Whip on top (or as you cut it).", "This is enough pie filling to fill 2 medium pie shells.", "Regular shells or graham cracker shells can be used!"]

title: Sauerkraut Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. chopped onion", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. chopped green pepper", "1 c. shredded carrots", "1 (31 oz.) can sauerkraut", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. corn oil"]
directions: ["Mix vegetables in bowl.", "Bring sugar, vinegar and oil to a boil in a saucepan.", "Pour over vegetables; mix well.", "Chill overnight.", "Keeps well in refrigerator."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple, well drained", "1/3 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "1 1/2 c. finely chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix in order, except for 2/3 cup chopped nuts.", "Shape into ball or put in nice dish.", "Roll or pat remaining nuts.", "This can easily be made in a food processor."]

title: Great Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. mayonnaise", "juice of 1 lemon", "garlic salt to taste", "1 medium onion, chopped", "8 oz. Blue cheese", "salt to taste", "1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients. Refrigerate several hours. Shake well before serving. Keeps for months."]

title: Hot Broccoli Sauce
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine or butter", "1 1/2 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. horseradish", "1 onion, grated", "1/2 tsp. mustard", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Place ingredients in a china bowl over steam and stir until margarine is melted.", "May use sauce over broccoli, English peas, cauliflower or other vegetables.", "Store in covered jar in refrigerator."]

title: Praline Grahams
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 to 3/4 c. finely chopped pecans", "35 graham crackers"]
directions: ["Line cookie sheet with foil.", "Break crackers in sections and place on foil.", "Melt butter, margarine and sugar.", "Cook for 3 minutes.", "Add vanilla. Pour evenly over crackers.", "Sprinkle with nuts.", "Bake 10 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Let cool.", "Peel off foil.", "Store in container."]

title: Susan'S Cranberry Ice Cream
ingredients: ["6 oz. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 can whole cranberries", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 (6 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "1 container Cool Whip"]
directions: ["Cream together cream cheese, sugar and mayonnaise.", "Fold in can of cranberries and crushed, drained pineapple.", "Mix in Cool Whip and walnuts until thoroughly mixed.", "Either spread ingredients in a flat cake sheet or put two teaspoons each in cupcake papers.", "Keep frozen until you are ready to eat.", "Goes great with turkey."]

title: Duck Braised
ingredients: ["2 ducks, cut up", "1 c. flour", "1/2 c. cream", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Season the duck; melt butter in large skillet.", "Flour duck and fry until brown on each side.", "Remove from pan and cook onion and celery in drippings until tender.", "Return duck to pan and add cream.", "Cover.", "Cook over low heat about 1 hour or until tender."]

title: Butter Pecan Balls
ingredients: ["1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "sifted xxx sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 c. nuts", "2 c. sifted flour"]
directions: ["Gradually add sugar to butter, mixing well after each addition. Stir in nuts and then flour, 1/3 cup at a time.", "Chill dough until stiff enough to handle, about 2 or 3 hours.", "Shape into 1-inch balls and place 1-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 250\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes or until brightly brown on bottom.", "Place on wire rack to cool. Roll in xxx sugar and then again. Makes 4 dozen."]

title: Squash Pickles
ingredients: ["8 c. squash, thinly sliced", "2 c. onion, thinly sliced", "2 c. vinegar", "4 bell peppers, chopped", "2 tsp. celery seed", "2 tsp. mustard seed", "3 c. sugar", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Mix squash and onions. Sprinkle with salt. Let sit for 1 hour; drain. Mix vinegar, sugar, celery and mustard seeds. Add peppers. Bring to a hard boil. Add squash and onions to mixture. Bring to a hard boil and cook for approximately 15 minutes. Fill jars and seal."]

title: Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ["1 qt. Best Foods mayonnaise", "1 (4 oz.) wedge Blue cheese", "1 button garlic", "1 c. buttermilk", "raw onion as desired", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Put Blue cheese, buttermilk, onion and garlic in blender and blend.", "Add mayonnaise."]

title: Marinated Carrots
ingredients: ["3 1/2 c. cooked carrots, sliced", "1 small onion, cut round", "1 green pepper, cut round", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 c. oil", "2/3 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Cook carrots until tender.", "Drain.", "Combine all ingredients with the drained carrots and refrigerate overnight.", "This keeps well 3 to 4 weeks in the refrigerator."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 glasses Kraft Roka cheese", "2 glasses Kraft Old English sharp cheese", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 tsp. grated onion", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "crushed pecans"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients, except pecans.", "Shape into ball. Roll in pecans.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. pecans, chopped fine (reserve 1/2 c.)", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "1 Tbsp. garlic seasoning salt"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients, saving 1/2 cup pecans.", "Chill slightly. Shape into ball on plate.", "Cover outside of ball with chopped pecans."]

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (not the soft kind)", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple (drain juice)", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped fine", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine", "1 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. finely chopped pecans (set 1 c. aside)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients except for the 1 cup pecans.", "Roll into a ball.", "Roll ball over the remaining nuts until coated.", "Chill. Let set 24 hours before serving.", "Set out an hour or so before serving.", "Great on Triscuits.", "Keeps well."]

title: Toffee Squares
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 egg yolk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 lb. melted chocolate (large Hershey bar)", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream the butter; add sugar gradually. Blend in egg yolk, vanilla, salt and flour. Press into greased 10 x 15 x 1-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 about 20 minutes. Spread while hot with melted chocolate. Sprinkle with nuts. Cool, but cut while warm."]

title: Pecan Butter Balls
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. soft butter or margarine", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. minced pecans"]
directions: ["Sift the dry ingredients.", "Add butter or margarine and vanilla and work with spoon or hands until well blended.", "Add 2 c. pecans.", "Mix well.", "Form into 1 inch balls.", "Roll the balls in 1 c. pecans. Put on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 25 minutes or until pale brown.", "Cool on wire rack.", "Makes 4 1/2 dozen."]

title: Cheese-Pineapple Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped", "1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped"]
directions: ["Soften cheese and stir in drained pineapple.", "Add 1 1/4 cups pecans and\tremaining", "ingredients.", "Chill.", "Roll", "into a ball, then roll in remaining pecans."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/4 c. drained crushed pineapple", "2 tsp. seasoned salt", "2 c. chopped pecans, divided"]
directions: ["Beat the cream cheese until smooth.", "Add pepper, onion, pineapple, salt and 1 cup pecans.", "Shape in ball.", "Roll in remaining pecans.", "Chill 1 or 2 hours.", "Garnish with fruit and serve with crackers."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["16 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 small onion, chopped fine", "1 small green pepper, chopped fine", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. seasoned salt"]
directions: ["Mix all of the ingredients together. Chill overnight. Roll in chopped pecans."]

title: Hot Cheese Puffs
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 1/2 tsp. grated onion", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives", "1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper", "1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1 small loaf thinly sliced bread"]
directions: ["In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except bread.", "Blend well.", "Cut bread into 1 1/2-inch rounds with a small biscuit cutter.", "Spread each round with cheese mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Serve hot from the oven."]

title: Sour Cream Fudge
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. sour cream", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, salt and sour cream.", "Cook over medium heat to a soft ball stage.", "Add margarine and vanilla.", "Cool without stirring.", "Beat.", "Add nuts and pour into greased 8-inch square pan."]

title: Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. margarine, softened", "3 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg yolk", "2 3/4 c. flour"]
directions: ["In large bowl, combine all ingredients except the flour.", "Blend well.", "Stir in flour.", "Chill.", "Preheat oven to 375\u00b0.", "On lightly floured surface, roll out dough, a third at a time, about 1/8-inch thick.", "Cut into desired shapes.", "Place 1-inch apart on ungreased baking sheet.", "Bake 7 to 10 minutes until golden brown.", "Cool and frost, if desired.", "Delicious!"]

title: Sardines And Pineapple Sandwich Toast
ingredients: ["4 slices bread", "1 tablespoon mayonnaise", "1 pinch salt and ground black pepper", "2 teaspoons marmalade", "4 potato chips, crushed", "2 pieces pineapple, thinly sliced", "4 sardines, drained, or to taste"]
directions: ["Preheat your sandwich maker according to manufacturer's instructions.", "Spread mayonnaise over 2 slices of bread. Cover with marmalade. Spread potato chips over marmalade. Lay pineapple over chips.", "Break apart sardines in a bowl using a fork. Spread on top of the pineapple slices. Season with salt and pepper; cover with the remaining 2 slices of bread.", "Toast in the preheated sandwich maker until brown and crispy, about 5 minutes."]

title: The Best Steak Marinade
ingredients: ["1/4 cup olive oil", "1/4 cup balsamic vinegar", "1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 cup soy sauce", "2 teaspoons Dijon mustard", "2 teaspoons minced garlic", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix olive oil, balsamic vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, Dijon mustard, and garlic in a small bowl. Season with salt and pepper."]

title: Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies
ingredients: ["1 cup butter", "3/4 cup packed brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, sifted", "2 tablespoons butter", "1 1/4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar", "1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract", "4 tablespoons heavy cream"]
directions: ["Cream 1 cup butter or margarine. Gradually add brown sugar, creaming well. Add egg yolk and blend. Add flour, stirring until the mixture forms a dough. Chill slightly for easier handling.", "Roll dough into small balls, about the size of a marble. Place on an ungreased baking sheet and flatten to 1/8 inch thickness with the palm of the hand. Press with fork in one direction to make a design.", "Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 9 to 12 minutes until cookies just begin to brown very lightly. Remove from sheet while warm. Place flat sides of two cookies together with frosting, sandwich-style.", "To Make Browned Butter Frosting: Brown 2 tablespoons butter slightly in saucepan. Remove from heat and blend in 1 1/4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar. Gradually add 1/2 teaspoon vanilla and 4 to 5 teaspoons cream until it becomes a spreading consistency."]

title: Gnocchi With Garlic Scapes And Walnuts
ingredients: ["3/4 cup walnuts", "1 pound potato gnocchi", "4 garlic scapes, chopped", "5 tablespoons unsalted butter", "salt and fresh coarsely ground black pepper to taste", "1 1/4 cups grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Roast walnuts in a pan over medium heat until nuts start to turn golden brown and become fragrant. Allow to cool and roughly chop.", "Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking dish.", "Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook gnocchi in the boiling water until they float to the top, 2 to 4 minutes. Drain well. Put in prepared baking dish in one layer. Sprinkle walnuts over gnocchi.", "Trim garlic scapes if needed by cutting off ends and tips. If you have very fresh and young stalks you can use the entire stalk. Finely chop.", "Melt butter in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic scapes and saute for 1 minute. Don't brown butter. Season with salt and pepper and layer over gnocchi. Sprinkle evenly with Parmesan cheese.", "Bake in the preheated oven until heated through, about 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Perry Family Barbeque Sauce
ingredients: ["1 quart apple cider vinegar", "1/2 cup margarine", "1 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 cup ketchup", "1/4 cup brown sugar", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["In a large saucepan, mix together apple cider vinegar, margarine, cayenne pepper, Worcestershire sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 1 hour."]

title: Honey Butter Balls
ingredients: ["1 cup salted butter, softened", "1/4 cup honey", "2 teaspoons vanilla extract", "2 cups all-purpose flour", "1/2 cup chopped walnuts (optional)", "1 cup confectioners' sugar, or as needed"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).", "Combine butter, honey, and vanilla extract in a bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy. Mix in flour 1/2 cup at a time. Stir walnuts into the dough.", "Form dough into 1-inch balls. Arrange on an ungreased baking sheet.", "Bake in the preheated oven until very light golden, 30 to 45 minutes. Cool briefly, about 5 minutes.", "Pour confectioner's sugar into a shallow bowl. Roll warm cookies in confectioners' sugar to coat."]

title: Pecan Crescents
ingredients: ["1 cup butter", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "2 cups chopped pecans", "1 tablespoon vanilla extract", "2 cups all-purpose flour", "1/2 cup confectioners' sugar"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C).", "Cream butter or margarine, gradually adding confectioners' sugar and salt. Cream until light and fluffy.", "Stir in pecans and vanilla. Add flour gradually. Mix well. Shape dough into crescents using a teaspoon full for each crescent. Place on ungreased cookie sheet and bake 15-30 minutes. Do not brown. Let cool slightly, then roll cookies in additional confectioners' sugar."]

title: Lemon Star Bursting Cookies
ingredients: ["1 cup all-purpose flour", "1/2 cup cornstarch", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "1/2 cup confectioners' sugar", "3/4 cup butter", "1 teaspoon lemon extract", "1 cup confectioners' sugar", "1 (.25 ounce) package unsweetened lemonade flavor drink mix (such as Kool-Aid(R))"]
directions: ["Sift the flour, cornstarch, and salt in a bowl. In a larger bowl, beat 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar with butter using an electric mixer until the mixture is creamy and free of lumps. Beat in the lemon extract, then mix in the flour mixture to make a smooth dough. Chill the dough for 1 hour.", "Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Mix 1 cup of confectioners' sugar with the lemonade drink mix in a plastic zipper bag. Close the zipper, and shake the bag to blend.", "Scoop up about 1 1/2 teaspoon of dough per cookie, and roll into balls. Place the cookies onto ungreased baking sheets.", "Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are set, about 20 minutes. Remove from oven, and let cool on sheets for 2 minutes.", "Drop the warm cookies into the bag of lemon sugar, about 5 or 6 at a time, and shake to coat with the mixture. Shake off excess sugar, and allow the cookies to finish cooling on wire racks. When cool, shake them in the lemon sugar one more time."]

title: Prosciutto Parmesan Pasta
ingredients: ["1 (8 ounce) package bow tie pasta", "1/2 pound prosciutto, sliced", "2 cups heavy cream", "1 1/2 cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese", "1 (10 ounce) can peas, drained", "salt to taste", "1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook until al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes; drain.", "Lightly grease a skillet with cooking spray. Cook the prosciutto in the skillet over medium heat until just brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat, drain excess fat and set prosciutto aside on paper towels.", "Meanwhile, heat the cream in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Slowly stir in 1 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese in small amounts. When all the cheese has been melted, stir in the peas and prosciutto. Allow to heat for 2 minutes more. Pour over drained pasta and toss lightly. Season with salt to taste and sprinkle with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese."]

title: Chef John'S Christmas Miracle Fudge
ingredients: ["1/2 cup good-quality unsweetened cocoa (such as Guittard Cocoa Rouge), not packed", "1/2 cup real maple syrup", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1 pinch salt", "1/2 cup refined coconut oil, melted", "1/2 cup chopped walnuts", "1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder for dusting, or as needed"]
directions: ["Place 1/2 cup cocoa powder into a mixing bowl and stir in maple syrup, vanilla extract, and salt. Pour in melted coconut oil and stir until thoroughly combined. Continue to stir until coconut oil hardens and the mixture looks grainy and thick.", "Place walnuts into a dry skillet over medium heat; shake skillet until walnuts are hot and smell nutty and fragrant, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Turn off heat and let walnuts cool slightly, about 1 more minute.", "Stir warm walnuts into fudge; mixture will soften from the walnuts' heat. Stir fudge until smooth and glossy.", "Pour fudge into a silicone mold for making small ice cubes. Scrape any excess fudge back into the mixing bowl. Smooth the tops of the fudge pieces.", "Wrap mold in plastic wrap and freeze until fudge is firm and set, at least 30 minutes. Remove plastic wrap and pop each fudge piece out of the mold. Dust pieces lightly with 1 teaspoon cocoa powder before serving or packaging as gifts. Serve cold; freeze leftovers."]

title: Praline Strips
ingredients: ["16 graham crackers, or more as needed", "1/2 cup butter", "1/2 cup margarine", "1 cup packed light brown sugar", "1 cup chopped pecans", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).", "Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and cover bottom of pan with graham crackers.", "Bring butter, margarine, and brown sugar to a boil for 2 minutes. Add pecans and vanilla.", "Pour brown sugar-pecan mixture over crackers; spread evenly.", "Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Cut while warm or break into small pieces."]

title: Easy Pickled Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 onion, thinly sliced", "1/3 cup red wine vinegar", "1/3 cup vegetable oil", "1 tablespoon brown sugar", "1 teaspoon Dijon mustard", "2 (12 ounce) cans whole mushrooms, drained"]
directions: ["Bring onion, vinegar, oil, sugar, and Dijon mustard to a boil in a saucepan. Add mushrooms and simmer until liquid is slightly reduced, 5 to 6 minutes. Transfer mixture to a covered container and chill. Drain before serving."]

title: Maple Fudge With Maple Syrup
ingredients: ["2 cups maple syrup", "1 cup heavy cream", "3/4 cup dark brown sugar", "2 tablespoons butter", "1 pinch salt", "2/3 cup chopped walnuts (optional)", "1 tablespoon vanilla extract"]
directions: ["Line an 8x8-inch baking pan with waxed paper. Butter the paper.", "Bring maple syrup, heavy cream, and brown sugar to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat. Continue to boil, without stirring, until mixture starts to bubble and registers 240 degrees F (166 degrees C) on a candy thermometer.", "Remove from heat. Add butter and salt but do not mix. Let sit until mixture reaches 105 degrees F (41 degrees C).", "Add walnuts and vanilla; beat until mixture loses its gloss. Pour into the prepared pan and let cool to room temperature. Cut, wrap, and store in the refrigerator."]

title: German Walnut Shortbread Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature", "2 tablespoons unsalted butter, room temperature", "3/4 cup confectioners' sugar", "4 teaspoons confectioners' sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 pinch salt", "2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour", "2 tablespoons all-purpose flour", "3/4 cup chopped walnuts", "2 tablespoons chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Beat 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons butter in a large bowl using an electric mixer until creamy. Add 3/4 cup plus 4 teaspoons confectioner's sugar, egg yolk, and salt; beat until smooth. Knead in 2 1/4 cups plus 2 tablespoons flour and 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons walnuts.", "Shape dough into 2-inch thick rolls and press them into rectangles using a flat item like a cutting board. Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour.", "Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).", "Cut dough into thin slices and lay them on an ungreased baking sheet.", "Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C) and bake until very lightly browned, about 5 more minutes.", "Remove from the baking sheet and cool on a wire rack, about 20 minutes."]

title: Brazilian Collards
ingredients: ["1/2 pound peppered bacon, diced", "1 onion, chopped", "2 pounds collard greens - rinsed, stemmed and torn into 3x6 inch pieces", "1 cup chicken stock", "1 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "2 tablespoons red wine vinegar"]
directions: ["Place bacon in a large heavy-bottomed pot over medium-high heat. Cook until browned and most of the grease has been released. Stir in onion and cook until tender and glistening, about 4 minutes.", "Place collards into the pot and stir to coat with the bacon drippings. Pour in the chicken stock. Season with cayenne pepper. Reduce heat to low and cook for 1 hour and 15 minutes.", "Stir red wine vinegar into the pot. Continue cooking 15 minutes, until liquid is reduced by about 1/2."]

title: Garlic And Brown Sugar Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 1/4 teaspoons garlic powder", "1 (8 ounce) package reduced fat cream cheese, softened", "1/4 cup butter, softened", "1/4 cup brown sugar", "5 dashes Worcestershire sauce", "2 tablespoons chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix the garlic powder into the softened cream. Form into a ball, and refrigerate 30 minutes.", "Place the butter and brown sugar in a microwave-safe bowl. Cook 1 minute on High in the microwave, or until butter and brown sugar are melted. Mix in Worcestershire sauce and pecans. Chill 1 hour in the refrigerator, stirring often so that the butter and sugar do not separate.", "Spread butter mixture over the cheese ball, and refrigerate until ready to serve."]

title: Bacon Risotto
ingredients: ["1/2 pound bacon, diced", "5 cups chicken stock", "2 tablespoons butter", "1/2 onion, diced", "4 cloves garlic, minced", "1 1/2 cups Arborio rice", "2 tablespoons butter", "1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese", "salt and black pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Cook and stir the diced bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until browned, about 10 minutes. Drain the bacon and reserve.", "Bring the chicken stock to a boil in a saucepan over high heat; reduce heat to low to keep the chicken stock hot.", "Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onion and garlic; cook and stir until the onion begins to turn golden brown at the edges, about 2 minutes. Pour in the rice and stir until the rice is coated in butter and has started to toast, 2 to 3 minutes. Reduce heat to medium; stir in one-third of the hot chicken stock and continue stirring until the rice has absorbed the liquid and turned creamy. Repeat this process twice more, stirring constantly. Stirring in the broth should take 15 to 20 minutes in all. When finished, the rice should be tender, yet slightly firm.", "Remove the risotto from the heat and stir in the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter, the Parmesan cheese, and the reserved bacon. Season to taste with salt and pepper before serving."]

title: Glazed Brussels Sprouts With Bison Bacon
ingredients: ["8 slices bison bacon", "2 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved", "1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed", "1 tablespoon butter", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "1/2 cup balsamic vinegar", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "1/8 teaspoon black pepper"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Cook bison bacon over medium heat in a large skillet for 5 to 6 minutes or until crisp, turning occasionally. If necessary, drain on paper towels. Cool slightly. Cut into bite-size pieces; set aside.", "Spread Brussels sprouts in a single layer in a 15x10x1-inch baking pan. Drizzle with oil. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until crisp-tender, stirring once or twice.", "Meanwhile, for glaze, melt butter over medium heat in a large skillet. Cook garlic in hot butter for 30 seconds. Add balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper. Cook and stir for 5 to 7 minutes or until sauce is thickened and reduced to about 1/4 cup. Add Brussels sprouts to skillet; stir to coat.", "To serve, sprinkle bison bacon pieces over Brussels sprouts."]

title: Caramel Pecan Kringle
ingredients: ["3/4 cup Marzetti's(R) Old Fashioned Caramel Dip, or more if needed", "1 cup pecans, divided", "1 sheet puff pastry, divided", "For Icing:", "1/2 cup confectioners' sugar", "1 tablespoon cream or milk", "1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract", "Pinch of salt"]
directions: ["For Kringle, preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place all pecans on a sheet pan and toast for 8 minutes. Cool, chop and set aside.", "Increase oven temperature to 400 degrees F. Line a baking pan with parchment paper.", "Unfold puff pastry in center of prepared pan. Evenly spread 1/2 of Marzetti Old Fashioned Caramel Dip onto center section of dough. Sprinkle with 1/3 cup pecans.", "Fold one-third section of dough over to cover caramel and pecans.", "Spread that dough layer with remaining Marzetti Old Fashioned Caramel Dip and 1/3 cup pecans. Fold remaining section of dough over all, trying to completely cover caramel and pecans.", "Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until pastry is golden brown.", "For icing: Whisk together all ingredients, adding additional cream if necessary.", "Cool Kringle slightly and drizzle icing over top. Sprinkle with remaining pecans.", "Cool completely. Slice and serve."]

title: Beet, Walnut And Prune Salad
ingredients: ["5 medium beets, scrubbed", "1/2 cup chopped walnuts", "1/2 cup mayonnaise", "20 pitted prunes, chopped", "3 cloves garlic, pressed", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Place the beets into a saucepan and fill with just enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, then simmer over medium heat until tender enough to pierce with a fork, about 20 minutes. Drain and rub off peels. Run under cold water until cool enough to handle, then grate using the largest setting. Place in a serving bowl.", "Stir the walnuts, prunes and garlic into the beets, then mix in the mayonnaise and season to taste with salt."]

title: Shaved Brussels Sprouts With Bacon And Almonds
ingredients: ["4 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and thinly sliced", "6 slices bacon, chopped", "1/3 cup sliced almonds", "2 tablespoons minced garlic", "2 tablespoons red wine vinegar", "salt and pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Fry bacon in a large deep skillet over medium heat until browned and crisp, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove bacon with a slotted spoon and set aside on paper towels.", "Add the garlic and almonds to the fat in the skillet and cook briefly over medium heat until toasted. Add the Brussels sprouts and quickly toss to coat with the hot oil. Sprinkle the red wine vinegar over the sprouts and toss again to coat. Cook, stirring frequently, until sprouts are wilted. Remove from the heat, stir in the bacon and season to taste with salt and pepper."]

title: Scrumptious Penuche Frosting
ingredients: ["1/2 cup butter", "1 cup dark brown sugar", "1/4 cup half-and-half cream", "1 pinch salt", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract", "2 cups confectioners' sugar", "1/3 cup chopped pecans (optional)"]
directions: ["Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in brown sugar and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat and continue to simmer for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Stir in half-and-half cream and salt and return to a boil, continuing to stir. Remove the caramel from the heat and allow to cool to lukewarm, then add vanilla.", "Gradually beat in confectioners' sugar with an electric mixer until smooth, being careful not to over-beat. If the frosting becomes too thick, hot water can be added to thin it out. Spread over a cooled cake and sprinkle with pecans. Allow the frosting to set before serving, about 15 minutes."]

title: Russian Beet Salad With Sour Cream
ingredients: ["3 beets", "1/4 cup sour cream", "3 cloves garlic, crushed", "1 cup grated Havarti cheese", "1/2 cup finely chopped walnuts", "5 tablespoons pitted prunes, cubed", "salt to taste"]
directions: ["Place beets in a saucepan, cover with water, and cook until tender yet firm to the bite, 20 to 40 minutes depending on their size. Drain, peel, and coarsely grate.", "Combine sour cream and garlic in a large bowl. Add beets, Havarti cheese, walnuts, and prunes; stir to combine. Season with salt."]

title: Mocha Icing
ingredients: ["1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder", "1/3 cup strong, hot, brewed coffee", "3 cups confectioners' sugar", "1/3 cup melted butter", "1/8 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1/4 cup chopped walnuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Combine coffee and cocoa in small bowl of electric mixer. Beat until blended. Add sugar, butter or margarine, salt, and vanilla. Beat until blended. Scrape bowl, and beat icing until it has a spreading consistency.", "Frost the cake, and sprinkle with chopped walnuts if desired."]

title: Baked Brie And Mushroom Sourdough Appetizer
ingredients: ["2 tablespoons butter", "1 teaspoon minced garlic", "12 ounces sliced fresh mushrooms", "1 (8 ounce) wedge Brie cheese, rind removed, cubed", "1 (1 pound) loaf round sourdough bread", "2 1/2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Preheat the broiler.", "In a saucepan over low heat, melt the butter. Saute the garlic and mushrooms until tender. Mix in the Brie. Cook and stir until melted and well blended.", "Remove the top of the sourdough bread, and hollow out the center. Spoon the Brie mixture into the bread. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.", "Place the filled bread on a baking sheet, and broil 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top is lightly browned. Cool slightly, and slice into wedges to serve."]

title: Candied Bacon And Curry Cashew Mix
ingredients: ["1/3 cup chopped bacon", "1 tablespoon raw sugar", "1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil", "1/2 cup roasted and salted whole cashews", "1 tablespoon yellow curry powder", "1 teaspoon garlic powder"]
directions: ["Cook and stir bacon and sugar in a skillet over medium-high heat until bacon is crisp and sugar has caramelized, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat.", "Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; add cashews, curry powder, and garlic powder. Cook and stir until fragrant and warmed, 4 to 5 minutes.", "Mix bacon and seasoned cashews together in a bowl."]

title: Easy Spicy Ketchup Dip For Sweet Potato Fries
ingredients: ["1 cup ketchup", "1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce", "1 tablespoon spicy horseradish", "2 teaspoons brown sugar", "1 1/2 teaspoons cayenne pepper", "1/2 teaspoon garlic salt"]
directions: ["Mix ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, brown sugar, cayenne pepper, and garlic salt together in a bowl."]

title: Easy Vegan Pasta With Kale And Chickpeas
ingredients: ["1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti", "1/4 cup olive oil", "5 cloves garlic, minced", "1 bunch kale, chopped", "2 tablespoons nutritional yeast", "1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas", "salt and freshly ground black pepper"]
directions: ["Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes. Drain, reserving about 1 cup of cooking water.", "Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and cook garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add kale and cook, stirring constantly, until wilted, about 3 minutes.", "Stir cooked spaghetti into the skillet. Add nutritional yeast. Add enough of the reserved cooking water to create a thick sauce. Stir well. Add chickpeas and heat until warmed, 2 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper."]

title: Gram'S Snow Balls
ingredients: ["1 cup all-purpose flour", "1/2 cup butter", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1 teaspoon superfine sugar", "1 cup chopped walnuts", "1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).", "Mix together all ingredients except the confectioner's sugar. Roll dough into small balls and place on cookie sheets.", "Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. Roll in confectioner's sugar while cookies are still warm."]

title: Best Ever Salmon Sauce
ingredients: ["1 cup butter", "1/4 cup soy sauce", "2 tablespoons Dijon mustard", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "2 teaspoons ketchup", "1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Heat butter, soy sauce, mustard, garlic, ketchup, and Worcestershire sauce in a saucepan over medium heat until butter is melted and sauce comes to a gentle simmer, about 10 minutes. Serve warm."]

title: Homemade Yummy Fudge
ingredients: ["6 ounces cream cheese, softened", "1/8 teaspoon salt", "1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract", "4 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted", "4 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, melted and cooled", "1 cup chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Line an 8x8 inch dish with foil.", "In a medium bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Beat in salt and vanilla. Beat in confectioners' sugar, a little at a time, until smooth. Stir in melted chocolate. Fold in walnuts. Spread into prepared pan. Chill 1 hour, until firm. Cut into one inch squares."]

title: Garlic Steak With Garlic
ingredients: ["8 cloves garlic, minced", "1 tablespoon olive oil", "1 pinch salt and ground black pepper", "2 (12 ounce) New York strip steaks", "12 cloves garlic, peeled", "1 cup olive oil for frying", "1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste", "1 1/2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar"]
directions: ["Whisk minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and black pepper in a bowl, then pour into a resealable plastic bag. Add the steaks, coat with the marinade, squeeze out excess air, and seal the bag. Marinate in the refrigerator for 8 hours or overnight.", "Combine 12 garlic cloves and 1 cup olive oil in a small saucepan over low heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, until garlic is golden and tender, about 30 minutes. Set aside.", "Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, and lightly oil the grate. Remove steaks from bag, wiping off excess marinade with paper towels. Generously season steaks with salt and black pepper.", "Cook the steaks on the prepared grill until they start to firm and are reddish-pink and juicy in the center, about 5 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 130 degrees F (54 degrees C). Remove steaks to a plate and let rest for 5 minutes.", "Drizzle balsamic vinegar over steaks, then spoon a few cloves of oil-roasted garlic on top."]

title: Fried Farfalle Chips
ingredients: ["2 cups bow tie pasta", "4 tablespoons vegetable oil", "2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese", "1 teaspoon chili powder", "1 teaspoon garlic powder", "1 teaspoon dry mustard"]
directions: ["Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and rinse pasta under cold water. Pasta should be drained thoroughly of water.", "In a large skillet, heat oil to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and fry about 1 cup of pasta at a time until golden. Drain on paper towels.", "In large bowl, combine Parmesan, chili powder, garlic powder and dry mustard. Toss with drained pasta. Serve."]

title: Roasted And Pickled Beets
ingredients: ["12 small beets", "3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar", "2 tablespoons honey", "1 tablespoon red wine vinegar", "salt and ground black pepper to taste", "1/2 cup thinly sliced onion"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Place beets in a shallow pan.", "Roast beets in the preheated oven until tender, about 1 hour. Remove pan from oven and cool beets until easily handled, at least 15 minutes.", "Peel beets and cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices.", "Beat balsamic vinegar, honey, and red wine vinegar together with a whisk in a bowl until dressing is smooth.", "Mix beets and onion in a bowl. Drizzle dressing over beet mixture and toss to coat; refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour."]

title: Russian Tea Cakes Iii
ingredients: ["1 cup butter", "1/2 cup confectioners' sugar", "2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour", "3/4 cup chopped walnuts", "1/4 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients, mix well.", "Refrigerate dough until chilled.", "Roll dough into 1 inch balls and bake for 15 minutes in a preheated 350 degree F (175 degrees C) oven.", "Once baked, roll while still hot in confectioners' sugar until coated. Let cool. Lightly dust with more confectioners' sugar."]

title: Mother'S Moon Cookies
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour", "3/4 cup confectioners' sugar", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "1/4 cup sweetened condensed milk", "1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1/2 cup butter, softened", "1 cup chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Sift together flour, 1/2 cup powdered sugar and salt. Stir in condensed milk, vanilla and soft butter. Blend well and fold in chopped nuts. Chill well.", "Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with foil.", "Roll the dough pencil thin and form in crescent shape. Arrange cookies on the cookie sheet.", "Bake on top rack of the oven for 12 minutes until set, do not brown. Let the cookies cool on pan. While still warm roll the cookies in leftover powdered sugar."]

title: Mexican Bride Cookies
