title: (Web Exclusive) Round 2 Recipe: Edamame with Pasta
ingredients: ["1/2 pound bow tie pasta", "4 slices bacon, diced", "1 cup leftover Sauteed Edamame", "Salt and freshly ground black pepper", "2 tablespoons grated Parmesan, optional", "2 tablespoons canola oil", "1 medium onion, diced", "2 teaspoons chopped garlic", "Salt and freshly ground black pepper", "1 (10-ounce) bag frozen shelled edamame, thawed"]
directions: ["Click here to see how she does it.", "Cook pasta according to box instructions.", "While pasta is cooking saute bacon in a medium skillet over medium-low heat until bacon is brown and crispy.", "Pour off half the excess bacon fat from the pan.", "Add the leftover soybeans and saute for 2 minutes.", "Add cooked pasta, season with salt and pepper and stir so that the pasta is thoroughly coated with the bacon fat.", "Transfer to serving bowl and top with Parmesan cheese, if desired.", "Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.", "Add onions and garlic, season with salt and pepper, to taste and saute for 2 minutes.", "Add edamame and saute for 4 minutes until edamame are heated through and onions are tender.", "(Reserve leftover Sauteed Edamame for online Round 2 Recipe \"Bowtie Pasta with Edamame.)", "Use the leftovers from this recipe to make (Web Exclusive) Round 2 Recipe: Edamame with Pasta."]

title: Crispix Teriyaki Mix Recipe
ingredients: ["7 c. Kellogg's Crispix cereal", "1 c. Sun-Maid raisins", "1/2 c. slivered almonds", "1/4 c. sesame seeds", "3 tbsp. butter, melted", "3 tbsp. soy sauce", "3 tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar", "1 teaspoon ginger", "1/2 teaspoon garlic pwdr"]
directions: ["In 9 x 13 x 2 inch baking pan, combine cereal, raisins, almonds, sesame seeds, set aside.", "Stir together remaining ingredients, gently stir in cereal mix till proportionately coated.", "Bake at 250 degrees about 45 min, stirring every 15 min.", "Spread on paper towels to cold.", "Store in airtight container.", "Yields: 8 c..", "Can also use optional recipe - 2 c. cereal, 1 c. mixed nuts, 3 Tbsp.", "butter (melted), 1/4 tsp.", "garlic salt, 1/4 tsp.", "onion salt, 2 tsp.", "lemon juice, 4 tsp.", "Worcestershire sauce and 1 c. raisins."]

title: Blue Cheese Ball Recipe
ingredients: ["8 ounce. blue cheese", "8 ounce. cream cheese", "1/4 pound butter (4 ounce.)", "2/3 c. minced olives", "1 tbsp. chives", "Pecans (roast in oven at 350 degrees for 6 min, then chop)"]
directions: ["Cream above ingredients except nuts; roll in nuts and chill for 1 day."]

title: Seasoned Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients: ["2 cups hulled pumpkin seeds", "1 tablespoon olive oil", "2 tablespoons soy sauce", "2 teaspoons chili powder", "1/4 teaspoon garlic powder", "1/4 teaspoon salt"]
directions: ["Preheat the oven to 350F.", "In a bowl, mix the seeds with the olive oil and soy sauce, stirring well.", "Sprinkle on the chili powder, garlic powder, and salt; stir again.", "Roast the seasoned seeds on a baking sheet about 10 minutes or a little longer, stirring a couple of times.", "The seeds are done when they smell toasty and are golden brown."]

title: Peas In Cream Recipe
ingredients: ["1 c. dry whole peas", "2 slices bacon", "1 tbsp. butter", "1 med. onion", "1 tbsp. flour", "1 c. lowfat sour cream", "1 sm. can mushrooms"]
directions: ["Soak peas overnight.", "Boil in same water till done.", "Don't overcook, peas should be whole, not mushy.", "(There should be about 2 c. of boiled peas).", "Strain.", "In separate pan fry bacon that has been cut in small pcs, add in minced onion, saute/fry till onion is cooked.", "Add in butter.", "Stir in flour, then blend in the lowfat sour cream and liquid from mushrooms, and cook till thickened.", "Add in mushrooms and cooked peas.", "Heat.", "Mix should be quite thick.", "If you like, it may be thinned with a little lowfat milk.", "1 package frzn green peas can be substituted for dry peas."]

title: Dad's Winter Warmer
ingredients: ["1 12 kg clarified butter", "1 kg chickpea flour", "12 kg semolina", "12 kg almonds", "12 kg pistachios", "12 kg cashews", "12 kg walnuts", "12 kg raisins", "1 kg sugar"]
directions: ["Heat 0.5 Kg clarified butter and roast gram flour.", "When you can smell the aroma remove from stove and keep aside.", "Take 0.25 Kg Clarified butter and roast semolina in it do the same as above.", "Roast all the nuts.", "Mix all the items including sugar and keep mixing it on slow heat till sugar is dissolved.", "Remove from heat.", "Put in small muffin cups while its hot."]

title: Barbecued Corn With Roasted Garlic Butter - BBQ
ingredients: ["2 ears corn", "olive oil (for basting)", "2 tablespoons butter", "1 tablespoon roasted garlic (I use Roasted Garlic Paste)", "12 teaspoon salt", "1 dash Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Bring a pot of water to a boil, then simmer corn for 15 minutes.", "Drain, then baste each cob with olive oil.", "Place directly on hot grill for 10 minutes, turning every few minutes.", "Meanwhile, nuke the roasted garlic, salt, Worcestershire and butter for about 12 seconds.", "This will enable the ingredients to gravitate to the bottom of your blender instead of clinging to the sides.", "Blend well.", "I use my Magic Bullet -- love it!", "Spoon roasted garlic butter (you might have a little extra) over corn and enjoy!"]

title: Hot Fudge Sauce - so Good!
ingredients: ["12 cup granulated sugar", "1 12 tablespoons butter", "12 cup corn syrup", "14 cup cream (light or coffee cream)", "12 teaspoon vanilla", "14 cup cocoa"]
directions: ["In a saucepan over a medium heat, melt the butter and sugar together with the corn syrup, cream, vanilla and a pinch of salt, stirring constantly.", "When it's smooth add the cocoa.", "Continue to stir constantly, letting it come to a boil.", "Cook 2 minutes.", "Serve over most anything!"]

title: Oriental Asparagus Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb asparagus", "2 tablespoons soy sauce", "1 minced garlic clove", "14 teaspoon sugar", "2 tablespoons sesame oil", "1 tablespoon rice vinegar", "sesame seeds"]
directions: ["Break asparagus into bite size pieces.", "Blanch in boiling water for 3-4 minutes.", "Drain and chill.", "About 1 1/2 hour before serving, combine all ingredients except the sesame seeds and asparagus.", "Pour over the asparagus and chill.", "Just before serving, sprinkle with the sesame seeds."]

title: PINK PEPPERCORN VOLADORES
ingredients: ["1 cup all-purpose flour", "1 cup all-purpose flour", "12 cup confectioners' sugar", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 12 cups dark chocolate, chopped", "1 cup heavy cream", "2 tablespoons butter, unsalted"]
directions: ["ift flour in salt.", "Make a well in the center and add egg yolks.", "Combine egg yolks and flour mixture, until dough is formed.", "Knead the dough until elastic and dough no longer sticks to fingers.", "Knead into a ball, cover with plastic wrap or put in a plastic bag and let sit at room temperature, about 20 minutes.", "Preheat oven to 350°F Sprinkle table with flour and roll a portion of the dough with a rolling pin, until very thin.", "Cut in 1 inch circles.", "Place circles on a baking sheet with parchment and prick several times with a fork.", "Bake for 8 minutes- cookies will still be pale.", "Allow to cool on wire racks, about 8-10 minutes.", "Combine chocolate, cream and butter in a heavy saucepan.", "Cook over very low heat until all the chocolate is melted and the mixture is smooth.", "Remove sauce from heat.", "lace layer of cookies on a plate and put 1/2 teaspoon chocolate sauce on each.", "Sprinkle lightly with RawSpiceBar's Pink Peppercorn Blend.", "Top with another cookie and sift with confectioners sugar.", "Serve and enjoy!"]

title: Campaign Trail Mix
ingredients: ["8 cups air popped popcorn", "1 cup roasted peanuts", "1 cup pumpkin seeds, toasted", "7 tablespoons butter", "14 cup dark brown sugar", "14 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Preheat the oven to 200.", "In a large bowl, toss together the popcorn, peanuts and pumpkin seeds.", "In a medium saucepan, melt the butter over medium-high heat.", "Whisk in the brown sugar and cayenne until bubbling and thickened, 2 to 3 minutes.", "Pour over the popcorn mixture; toss to coat.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "Transfer to a foil-lined baking sheet.", "Form small clumps of the popcorn mixture and bake until toasted, about 40 minutes.", "Let cool completely before serving."]

title: Toffee Squares
ingredients: ["34 cup butter, softened", "34 cup packed brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 12 cups all-purpose flour", "14 teaspoon salt", "1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk", "2 tablespoons butter", "2 teaspoons vanilla", "1 (12 ounce) package semisweet chocolate pieces", "1 cup almond brickle chips"]
directions: ["Grease a 13x9 inch baking pan; set aside.", "To make the crust, in a bowl, beat 3/4 cup butter and brown sugar using electric mixer on medium speed until combined.", "Beat in the egg yolk; stir in the flour and salt with a wooden spoon until well mixed.", "Using floured hands, press dough into bottom of prepared baking pan.", "Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until light brown; cool on a wire rack.", "To make the filling: in a saucepan, heat and stir the sweetened condensed milk and 2 tablespoons butter over medium heat until bubbly; cook and stir 5 minutes more (mixture will thicken and become smooth).", "Stir in vanilla; spread filling over baked crust.", "Bake 12-15 minutes more or until top layer is golden brown.", "Sprinkle chocolate pieces evenly over the top; bake for 1-2 more minutes or until chocolate pieces melt.", "Remove from oven; set on a wire rack.", "Using a flexible spatula, immediately spread chocolate evenly over baked layers; sprinkle with almond brickle pieces.", "Cool completely on a wire rack; cover and chill until chocolate is set; cut into squares or triangles."]

title: Baked Lima Beans Deluxe Recipe
ingredients: ["1 can Tomato paste, (4 ounce.)", "3 lrg Onions Margarine", "1/2 c. Brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. Dry mustard Salt and pepper", "3 can Butter beans Bacon bits Seasoned dry bread crumbs", "1/2 c. Grated Parmesan cheese"]
directions: ["Brown 3 large onions in margarine (about 1/4 c.).", "Add in 1 can of tomato paste and 1 can water.", "Mix 1/2 c. brown sugar with 1 Tbsp.", "dry mustard and add in salt and pepper to taste.", "Add in to the tomato-onion mix.", "Let simmer till thick.", "Place 3 cans of liquid removed butter beans in a casserole.", "Pour the tomato mix over the beans and mix with 2 Tbsp.", "bacon bits or possibly crumbled bacon and seasoned with bread crumbs", "(about 1/2 c. crumbs).", "Sprinkle with 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese over top and dot with butter or possibly margarine.", "Use lots of butter.", "Bake at 350 degrees for about 30 min.", "Can microwave for about 10 min on High."]

title: Creamy Chocolate Butter
ingredients: ["12 lb butter, unsalted, softened", "3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder", "3 tablespoons confectioners' sugar", "1 tablespoon coffee, cold", "1 teaspoon chocolate extract", "14 teaspoon salt"]
directions: ["Using a stand mixer, mix all ingredients on medium-high speed until all ingredients are well combined, about 2 minutes.", "Remove butter from bowl and spoon onto parchment paper.", "Roll into a log, using edge of baking sheet to for a tight log.", "Chill for 2 hours before serving."]

title: Sweet and Sour Tofu
ingredients: ["1 (20 ounce) container tofu", "1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks or 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple tidbits", "14 cup packed brown sugar", "2 tablespoons cornstarch", "14 cup vinegar", "1 tablespoon soy sauce", "1 medium onion, sliced thin", "1 medium onion, sliced thin", "rice or chinese noodles"]
directions: ["Drain tofu in a colander, then weigh down tofu with something heavy.", "Let it sit in the sink while preparing the sauce.", "Combine brown sugar, cornstarch, vinegar, soy sauce and juice from the pineapple in a saucepan.", "Bring to a boil until thick and clear.", "Slice tofu into cubes and add to sauce; marinate while rice cooks or 1 hour.", "Slice onion and pepper into thin strips.", "Combine with tofu and sauce and pineapple chunks.", "Heat until vegetables soften, then serve over rice or Chinese noodles."]

title: Cream Cheese Butter Cookies
ingredients: ["1 cup all-purpose flour", "34 cup extra finely granulated sugar", "14 teaspoon salt", "1 cup butter, cut in 1-inch pcs, softened", "2 tablespoons cream cheese, softened", "12 teaspoon vanilla"]
directions: ["In large mixing bowl, stir flour, sugar and salt.", "with mixer on medium, add butter pcs till crumbly -- add cream cheese and vanilla -- beat just until dough forms a ball.", "divide dough on floured surface into a ball.", "divide in to 2 pcs -- flatten into discs.", "wrap and chill 30 minutes.", "roll to 1/8\" thick.", "cut into shapes.place 1\" apart on ungreased sheet.", "bake at 375* for 7-9 minutes.", "transfer to racks to cool completely --", "to prepare cream cheese icing.", "3 oz cream cheese, softened.", "1/2 cup softened butter.", "1/2 tsp vanilla extract.", "beat till light and fluffy --", "gradually add 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar.add small amount of milk till desired consistency.may add gel colors as desired."]

title: Gina's Beet and Goat Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["4 medium candy stripped beets", "1/4 cup olive oil", "2 ounces balsamic vinegar", "Salt and freshly ground black pepper", "4 cups arugula", "1/4 cup chopped pecans", "1/2 cup goat cheese, crumbled"]
directions: ["In a pot of cold water, place beets and then bring to a boil.", "Allow pot to simmer until the beats are tender but still have slight resistance in the centers.", "This will take 8 minutes.", "Peel the beets and slice.", "In a small bowl whisk together olive oil and balsamic.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "In a separate larger bowl, toss arugula, beets, pecans and goat cheese.", "Drizzle them with dressing and serve."]

title: Perfect Picnic Salad Recipe
ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1/3 c. vegetable oil", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1 (1 lb.) can sauerkraut", "1 c. minced onion", "1 c. minced green pepper", "1 c. minced celery"]
directions: ["Add in pimento or possibly red pepper for color.", "Combine first three ingredients.", "Set aside.", "Drain sauerkraut.", "Mix all of the above and chill."]

title: Pecan Sandies Or Mexican Wedding Cakes Recipe
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla", "2 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1 c. finely minced pecans", "About 1 c. confectioners' sugar for coating"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees.", "Cream butter till fluffy.", "Add in sugar and continue beating, add in vanilla.", "Gradually blend in flour and nuts.", "Batter should be stiff, not sticky.", "Chill if it is too sticky.", "Form into small crescent or possibly ball shapes, about a heaping tsp.", "of dough.", "Bake 12 to 15 min till slightly browned.", "Cold about 3 to 5 min then remove to a large bowl where cookies are rolled in confectioners' sugar.", "Cold on brown paper.", "Makes 4 dozen."]

title: Macrobiotic Almond Jam Cookie
ingredients: ["100 ml Maple syrup", "100 ml Canola oil", "1 tsp Vanilla extract", "1/4 tsp Coarse salt", "200 ml Almond flour", "400 ml Whole wheat cake flour", "1 Jam"]
directions: ["Add the maple syrup, canola oil, vanilla extract, and salt to a bowl and use a whisk to mix well.", "Add the almond powder to a separate bowl and sift in the cake flour.", "Mix well.", "Pour Step 1 into Step 2, and use a rubber spatula to mix well.", "# Use 2 spoons to scoop the dough out onto a baking pan covered with a baking sheet.", "Shape your cookies.", "Use your thumb or the end of a wooden pestle to create a small well in the dough and fill with jam.", "Bake in the preheated oven at 180C for 11 minutes.", "Turn the pan around and bake for another 5 minutes.", "Let cool on a rack and they're complete!"]

title: Simple Curry Sauce
ingredients: ["2 tablespoons butter", "1 12 tablespoons flour", "1 tablespoon curry powder", "14 teaspoon salt", "1 cup chicken stock", "1 egg yolk", "2 tablespoons heavy cream"]
directions: ["melt butter.", "blend in flour, curry powder, and salt.", "slowly add hot stock and bring to boiling.", "boil 2 minutes.", "remove from heat", "add egg yolk lightly beaten with cream."]

title: Healthy Grilled Peach Crisp Foil Packs
ingredients: ["1/4 cup packed light brown sugar", "2 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into small pieces", "Pinch kosher salt", "4 ripe peaches", "4 tablespoons granola", "Four 1/4-cup scoops low-fat vanilla frozen yogurt, optional"]
directions: ["Special equipment: heavy-duty foil", "Prepare a grill for medium-high heat.", "Cut four 12-inch square pieces of heavy-duty foil.", "Toss together the sugar, butter and salt in a small bowl.", "Cut the peaches in half and remove the pits.", "Stuff each half with some of the brown sugar-butter mixture.", "Put two peach halves, stuffed-side down, in the center of each piece of foil.", "Gather up the sides of the foil and crimp the edges tightly to make 4 purse-shaped packets.", "Put the packets on the grill, close the lid and cook for 15 minutes, changing the position of the packets on the grill about half way through.", "(You can remove and open the packets to check their progress at any time.", "Be careful of the steam.)", "Remove from the grill and let rest for a few minutes.", "Carefully open each packet (hot steam will escape) and use a spoon or fork to flip the peach halves over, they should be tender with a caramelized sauce.", "Top each serving with 1 tablespoon of granola and a scoop of frozen yogurt, desired."]

title: Grapes With Butterscotch Sauce
ingredients: ["34 cup heavy cream", "18 teaspoon salt", "12 cup packed brown sugar", "2 tablespoons sour cream", "12 teaspoon vanilla", "3 cups tart seedless grapes", "2 tablespoons toasted slivered almonds"]
directions: ["Bring cream, salt and sugar to a boil and boil 10 minutes, stirring frequently.", "Remove from heat and stir in sour cream and vanilla.", "Place grapes into four serving dishes.", "Pour over sauce and sprinkle with almonds."]

title: Bacon-Wrapped Water Chestnuts
ingredients: ["2 (10 ounce) cans water chestnuts, drained", "1 -2 lb bacon (enough to be able to cover the 2 cans of water chestnuts)", "1 cup mayonnaise", "1 cup brown sugar", "2 teaspoons vinegar", "2 teaspoons soy sauce", "toothpick"]
directions: ["Fry bacon until partially cooked.", "Roll water chestnuts with bacon and secure with toothpicks.", "Put in 9x13 dish.", "For the Mixture: Combine mayonnaise, brown sugar, vinegar, and soy sauce - mix well and heat in microwave until warm - about 2-3 minutes.", "Pour over the bacon wrapped chestnuts and let soak in the fridge for 5-8 hours or overnight.", "Prior to serving, take the bacon-wrapped chestnuts out of the mixture and put on a rack with the pan underneath to catch the dfrippings.", "Bake the chestnuts in the oven at 350F until bacon is cooked (approximately 15-20 minutes).", "Heat sauce in microwave until hot (3-5 minutes).", "Put the chestnuts back in the sauce and serve."]

title: Grilled Carrots with Ginger
ingredients: ["1 tablespoon vegetable oil, plus more for wok", "2 pounds carrots, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces", "Coarse salt and ground pepper", "4 garlic cloves, thinly sliced", "1 piece (1 inch) fresh ginger, peeled and sliced", "2 tablespoons soy sauce"]
directions: ["Coat a grill wok with oil; preheat on grill over high heat.", "Toss carrots with 2 teaspoons oil; season with salt and pepper.", "Add to wok, cover grill, and cook until tender, shaking wok frequently, 20 minutes.", "If carrots brown too quickly, move wok to cooler part of grill.", "Toss garlic and ginger with remaining 1 teaspoon oil.", "Add to hot wok; cook until garlic is golden, 3 minutes.", "Toss with soy sauce.", "Transfer to serving dish.", "(Per Serving)", "Calories: 129", "Fat: 3.9g (0.3g Saturated Fat)", "Protein: 2.8g", "Carbohydrates: 22.7g", "Fiber: 6.5g"]

title: Almond Roca Bars
ingredients: ["1 cup butter, room temperature", "12 cup sugar", "12 cup brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "12 teaspoon salt", "1 cup flour", "1 -4 ounce hersheys milk chocolate candy bar, cut into chunks", "12 cup almonds, finely chopped"]
directions: ["Cream butter with a mixer, add both sugars, mix to combine.", "Add egg yolk, salt and flour.", "Pat mixture into a 9 by 13\" pan.", "Bake at 325 for 20-25 minutes, until lightly browned.", "Put chocolate bar on top of hot crust, once it begins to melt spread over the entire crust.", "Top with the chopped almonds.", "Let chocolate harden and set up before cutting into bars."]

title: Pineapple Cheese Ball Recipe
ingredients: ["1 (8 ounce.) can crushed pineapple, liquid removed", "2 (8 ounce.) Packages cream cheese, softened", "1 1/4 c. green pepper, finely diced", "2 tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 1/2 teaspoon salt", "1 1/2 c. nuts, minced"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients and half of nuts till well blended, shape in two equal balls.", "Roll in remaining nuts.", "Refrigerate24 hrs.", "Serve with crackers or possibly toast.", "Can be frzn.", "(You can reduce nuts to 3/4 c., putting all into mix and roll balls in parsley - very pretty at Christmas.)"]

title: Carrot Pretzel Sticks
ingredients: ["60 grams Grated carrots", "100 grams Cake flour", "3 tsp Grated cheese", "1 and 1/2 tablespoon Vegetable oil (or butter)", "1 dash Salt and pepper", "1 dash Krazy salt (as a substitute for the above)"]
directions: ["Put the cake flour, grated cheese, salt and pepper in a bowl and mix well with a whisk.", "Add the grated carrot and vegetable oil (butter), and knead it with your palms.", "It looks dry first but it will form easily as you knead it like this picture.", "Put this in the plastic bag and roll 2 mm thick with a rolling pin.", "Rest in the fridge for about 15 minute then move them to the freezer for about 5 minutes to cut them more easily.", "They should be about 10-15 cm long and 2-3 mm thick.", "Line the baking tray with parchment paper and place the sticks on it.", "Bake in a toaster oven for about 10 minutes until they turn crispy.", "If they start scorching, cover with an aluminium foil and adjust the temperature.", "(The ends scorch easily.)", "If you use an oven, bake at 200C for about 20 minutes.", "Please adjust the time and temperature according on your own oven.", "These are potato pretzel sticks which I recently made.", "It was easier to cut into thin pieces compared to the carrot sticks."]

title: Roasted Beet Salad With Feta Cheese
ingredients: ["4 -6 tablespoons olive oil", "2 12 tablespoons red wine vinegar", "1 tablespoon garlic, finely minced", "3 tablespoons capers, drained, rinsed and chopped", "34 cup feta cheese (aout 85 g)", "7 large beets", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["BEETS: Preheat oven 400.", "Wrap beets individually in tin foil.", "Cook in oven for 1 hours or until tender.", "Remove, open foil (carefully) and let sit until cool enough to handle (10 - 15 minutes).", "Wearing gloves, cut off top and bottom of beet.", "Take a fork and place it in one end of beet.", "Take a knife and run down lengthwise of the beet to remove the skin.", "Cut into cubes.", "(Make ahead: this can be done to this point and chilled, up to 24 hours).", "In a small bowl, combine dressing and add carefully to beets.", "Chill for at least 3 hours for flavours to blend.", "Season according to personal taste."]

title: Pineapple Pecan Cheese Ball Recipe
ingredients: ["2 (8 ounce.) Packages cream cheese", "1 can crushed pineapple, liquid removed", "1/4 c. green pepper, minced", "1/4 c. onion, minced", "1 teaspoon seasoned salt", "2 c. pecans, minced"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Form into a large ball and refrigeratewell."]

title: Plutonium-Free Thermonuclear Seasoning Mix
ingredients: ["4 tablespoons cayenne pepper", "1 tablespoon chili powder", "1 tablespoon Lawry's Seasoned Salt", "1 teaspoon dark brown sugar or 1 teaspoon light brown sugar", "34 teaspoon black pepper", "12 teaspoon dry hot mustard powder", "12 teaspoon white pepper", "12 teaspoon salt-free lemon pepper"]
directions: ["In a bowl, mix the cayenne, chili powder and seasoning salt; mix thoroughly.", "In another bowl, mix the remaining ingredients.", "Transfer this mixture to the first bowl and blend thoroughly.", "Use immediately or store in a cool dark place.", "Keeps for several months."]

title: Celeriac Remoulade
ingredients: ["12 celeriac, cut into thin strips", "12 lemon, juice of", "2 tablespoons double cream", "3 tablespoons mayonnaise", "2 teaspoons Dijon mustard", "salt", "white pepper"]
directions: ["Place the celeriac strips into a bowl along with the lemon juice and toss to combine.", "Mix the double cream, mayonnaise and mustard together then stir into the celeriac.", "Season with salt and white pepper.", "Place in the fridge for a couple of hours for the flavours to develop before serving."]

title: Sesame Tofu
ingredients: ["2 lbs firm tofu", "1 cup sesame seeds, ground in blender", "23 cup all-purpose flour", "13 cup soy sauce", "14 cup oil", "14 teaspoon garlic powder", "14 teaspoon ginger", "2 teaspoons granulated sugar"]
directions: ["Cut tofu into 3/4-inch cubes or 1/4-inch thick slices and marinate 2 hours in Marinade mixture.", "Roll tofu in a mixture of sesame seed and flour.", "Brown in oil and serve hot with rice.", "****Optional: I like to add steamed broccoli when I brown the tofu."]

title: Caper Sauce
ingredients: ["1 cup mayonnaise", "14 cup capers (Chopped Dill Pickle can be substituted for Capers.)", "14 cup sour cream", "1 tablespoon dijon-style mustard", "1 tablespoon horseradish", "1 tablespoon white vinegar", "12 teaspoon sugar"]
directions: ["Combine mayonnaise, capers, sour cream, mustard, horseradish, vinegar and sugar.", "Mix well.", "Serve with Beef With Caper Sauce or with any roast beef."]

title: Broccoli Rabe
ingredients: ["1 lb broccoli rabe", "14 cup extra virgin olive oil", "3 garlic cloves, finely chopped", "1 pinch salt", "12 lemon", "1 pinch salt"]
directions: ["Wash broccoli rabe and remove thick stems.", "Add olive oil to 2 quart pot and heat.", "Add garlic and let cook 1 minute.", "Add broccoli rabe and salt and cover.", "Cook 10 minutes, stiring often.", "Serve with 1/4 lemon, the juice offsets the bitter taste of the greens."]

title: Wendy's Grandmother Cheesy Bread
ingredients: ["2 large cream cheese", "1 cup mayonnaise", "2 -3 garlic cloves, minced", "1 butter, cube", "1 cup parmesan cheese, grated", "2 14 ounces green olives", "2 large French bread, loaves cut in half"]
directions: ["Cream first four items together.", "Spread on top of the french bread that has been halved.Top with parmesean cheese and slices of olive.", "Bake in 400 degree oven until warm about 25 minutes.", "You can put foil over top if it starts to get too dark.", "Once out of oven, let it set and slice."]

title: Comeback Sauce
ingredients: ["1/4 cup sour cream", "2 tablespoons mayonnaise", "2 tablespoons buttermilk", "2 tablespoons Neelys BBQ sauce (see page 37)", "Juice of 1/2 lemon", "1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper"]
directions: ["Mix all the ingredients together in a small bowl.", "Let the sauce sit in the refrigerator as long as possible to let the flavors marry, or make the day ahead."]

title: Macrobiotic Black Tea Flavoured Almond Cookies
ingredients: ["60 grams Cake flour", "60 grams Whole wheat flour (or Cake flour)", "1 tbsp Black tea leaves", "15 grams Crushed almonds", "1 pinch Salt", "3 tbsp Canola oil", "3 tbsp Maple syrup"]
directions: ["Put all the ingredients in a bowl and mix with a whisk.", "Preheat the oven to 160C.", "Add the canola oil and maple syrup and mix evenly until everything is combined.", "Piece the dough on the kitchen bench top, and roll it over to 5 mm thick.", "Cut into around 2 x 3 cm pieces.", "Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes first and turn them over.", "Then bake another 15 minutes."]

title: Shortenin' Bread Cookies
ingredients: ["1 cup sifted all-purpose flour", "2 tablespoons sifted all-purpose flour", "12 cup cornstarch", "12 cup firmly packed light brown sugar", "34 cup unsalted butter, at room temp (not margarine)", "1 tablespoon sugar"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees; butter an 8 inch square baking pan.", "Onto a piece of wax paper, sift the flour and cornstarch.", "In a medium sized bowl, with an electric mixer on high, cream the brown sugar and butter until light and fluffy.", "Using a wooden spoon, stir in the flour mixture.", "Spread the dough in the pan; chill for 20 minutes.", "Using the back of a kife, mark the dough into 2x1 1/4 inch bars, prick gently with a fork and sprinkle with granulated sugar.", "Bake for 40 minutes or until golden and crisp.", "Let cool in pan for 10 minutes; cut into 24 bars and transfer to racks to cool.", "These cookies keep well in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks or in the freezer for up to 3 months.", "Recipe can be doubled."]

title: Rhubarb Crumble
ingredients: ["1 kg rhubarb, chopped", "1 lemon, grated rind and juiced", "15 ml crystallized ginger, finely chopped (or stem ginger)", "75 g brown sugar", "150 g plain flour", "1 -1 12 g salt", "65 g butter, diced", "50 g granulated brown sugar (or Demerara sugar)"]
directions: ["Heat the oven to 190C.", "Grease a 1.15L pie dish with butter.", "To make the crumble, sift the flour and salt into a large mixing bowl.", "Rub in the butter until the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.", "Stir in sugar.", "Put the rhubarb in a bowl and add the lemon rind, juice, ginger and sugar.", "mix well and spoon into the prepared dish.", "Cover the rhubarb with the crumble toppings and bake for 25-30 minutes.", "Serve hot or cold."]

title: Dates Toffees
ingredients: ["200 g dates", "25 g sesame seeds", "flour, as required (maida)", "oil, as required", "1 tablespoon butter", "almonds, as required", "pistachios, as required"]
directions: ["Remove the seeds from the dates.", "Add butter to the dates and using your hands, crush the dates as much as possible, until it becomes paste-like.", "Now, make small round balls out of this mixture.", "Add 1 tablespoons of hot oil to the flour to make the dough crispy.", "Mix well.", "Add water, as required, and knead well to make the dough.", "Now, carefully make rectangular leaves/covers of the dough.", "Fill these covers with the dates paste, almonds and pistachios.", "Twist the covers to give the shapes of toffee.", "Dip the toffee in sesame seeds.", "Heat oil in a wok.", "Fry the toffees' in the hot oil.", "Drain excess oil on clean paper towels and serve."]

title: Sweet and Sour Dressing
ingredients: ["13 cup sugar", "2 12 tablespoons white vinegar", "1 tablespoon finely minced onion", "14 teaspoon salt", "14 teaspoon garlic salt", "18 teaspoon black pepper", "12 cup vegetable oil"]
directions: ["Whisk ingredients together or combine in blender, adding oil slowly.", "Use on salads as desired."]

title: Oat-Y Nut Bars
ingredients: ["12 cup butter", "12 cup honey", "14 cup packed brown sugar", "14 cup corn syrup", "2 34 cups uncooked quick oats", "23 cup raisins", "12 cup salted peanuts"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 300F.", "Grease 9-inch square baking pan.", "Melt butter with honey, brown sugar, and corn syrup in a medium sauce pan over medium heat, stirring constantly.", "Bring to a boil; boil 8 minutes or until mixture thickens slightly.", "Stir in oats, raisin and peanuts until well blended.", "Press evenly into prepared pan.", "Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until golden brown.", "Place pan on wire rack; score top into 2-inch squares.", "Cool completely.", "Cut into bars."]

title: Steak Rub/Marinade
ingredients: ["1 teaspoon ginger", "1 teaspoon seasoning salt", "12 teaspoon salt (optional)", "12 teaspoon black pepper", "12 teaspoon garlic powder", "2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce"]
directions: ["Lightly sprinkle first side of 3 or 4 steaks (prefer boneless ribeyes, but your choice) with dry seasonings.", "Sprinkle worcestershire sauce over steaks and lightly rub in with finger tips.", "Flip steak and repeat.", "Allow to sit for 10 to 15 min while grill warms up."]

title: Crunchy Bacon Water Chestnuts
ingredients: ["1 lb bacon", "2 (8 ounce) cans water chestnuts", "34 cup packed brown sugar", "1 tablespoon mayonnaise", "1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce", "34 cup ketchup"]
directions: ["Soak 35 wooden toothpicks in water.", "Preheat oven to 375 degrees.", "Cut bacon in half.", "Wrap one half strip of bacon around each water chestnut then securing it with a toothpick.", "Bake wrapped water chestnuts in a a shallow dish or baking sheet for 20 minutes.", "While water chestnuts are baking, in a bowl mix brown sugar, mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce, and ketchup.", "When wrapped water chestnuts are done baking, remove from oven but do not turn off heat.", "Transfer the water chestnuts to a paper towel covered plate to soak up bacon grease.", "Carefully clean up baking dish by wiping down with paper towels.", "Place the water chestnuts back on the baking sheet and pour sauce all over them.", "Bake for an additional 30-40 minutes or until bacon is crispy."]

title: Pot Macaroni, bacon and cheese
ingredients: ["2 tbsp Butter", "1 pinch Salt and pepper", "1 cup Mushrooms", "1 cup Bacon", "750 ml Cheese sauce", "250 grams Penne Rigate Macaroni", "1 cup Onion"]
directions: ["Prepare Macaroni as per direction on packet.", "Saute onions and Mushrooms in butter till soft.", "Add bacon and cook till bacon is cooked", "Add cheese sauce in the Bacon mixture.", "Season with salt and pepper to taste", "Add Macaroni in the mixture."]

title: Candied Orange Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["2 sticks (1/2 pound) unsalted butter, softened", "1 cup sugar", "1 large egg yolk", "1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract", "2 cups all-purpose flour", "1/8 teaspoon salt", "2 tablespoons julienned candied orange peel (see Note)"]
directions: ["In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat the butter until creamy.", "Add 3/4 cup of the sugar and beat at medium speed until fluffy.", "Beat in the egg yolk and vanilla.", "At low speed, beat in the flour and salt.", "Gather the dough into a ball and shape it into 2 logs, each about 1 1/2 inches in diameter.", "Roll the logs in the remaining 1/4 cup of sugar.", "Wrap in plastic and refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour.", "Preheat the oven to 350.", "Using a thin, sharp knife, slice the logs 1/4 inch thick.", "Arrange the slices on 2 large baking sheets and press a few slivers of candied orange peel in the center of each.", "Bake the cookies on the upper and lower racks of the oven for about 22 minutes, until golden around the edges and on the bottom; shift the pans from front to back and top to bottom halfway through baking.", "Let the cookies cool for 10 minutes on the baking sheets, then transfer them to wire racks to cool completely."]

title: Braised Tofu
ingredients: ["2 packages (14 Oz Package) Medium Firm Tofu", "3/4 cups Soy Sauce, Low Sodium", "1/4 cups Brown Sugar", "1 Tablespoon Minced Garlic", "1 teaspoon Sesame Oil", "1 whole Chili Pepper, Sliced", "1 Tablespoon Honey", "2 Tablespoons Oil", "Optional Garnish: Chopped Chives Or Green Onions"]
directions: ["Drain tofu and then set in a strainer to remove excess liquid.", "While tofu is straining, work on the sauce.", "In a bowl whisk together soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, sesame oil, chili pepper and honey.", "Coat a large frying pan with oil and turn heat to medium high.", "Pat tofu dry with a paper towel and cut each block of tofu into 12 pieces.", "Carefully place cut tofu in a single layer into the hot pan, cook for about 5-6 minutes or until slightly brown.", "Carefully flip tofu and cook the other sides until slightly brown, about another 6-10 minutes.", "Add marinade and carefully coat the tofu with the marinade.", "Turn heat down to medium and let cook for another 5-10 minutes to allow the sauce to absorb into the tofu.", "Serve tofu and sauce with rice.", "You can garnish the dish with chives or green onions."]

title: Old-Fashioned Butterscotch Sauce
ingredients: ["4 ounces (1 stick) unsalted butter", "1 cup dark brown sugar, not too firmly packed", "1 cup heavy cream", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract", "2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar", "1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste"]
directions: ["In a heavy-bottomed saucepan or an enameled cast-iron pot, combine butter and sugar over medium heat and cook until sugar has melted completely and mixture has taken on a thick frothy appearance, 5 to 10 minutes.", "Turn off heat.", "Thoroughly whisk in cream.", "Let cool for 10 minutes, then add vanilla, vinegar and salt.", "Taste and adjust seasonings."]

title: Fig Vinaigrette
ingredients: ["1 small shallot, finely diced", "1 tablespoon red wine vinegar", "1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar", "Salt and pepper", "1 teaspoon Dijon mustard", "4 ripe figs, peeled and mashed", "3 tablespoons olive oil"]
directions: ["Put shallot in a small bowl.", "Cover with vinegars and season with salt and pepper.", "Macerate for 5 minutes.", "Stir in mustard and mashed figs and mix well.", "Whisk in olive oil."]

title: Potatoe Chip Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 cup margarine", "1/2 cup sugar", "1 1/2 cup sifted flour", "1/2 cup crushed potato chips", "1/2 cup nuts, chopped med-fine", "1 tsp vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream together margarine and sugar.", "Add flour, chips, and nuts.", "Stir in vanilla.", "Drop from teaspoon onto ungreased cookies sheet and bake at 350 for about 15 minutes.", "Makes about 2 1/2 dozen."]

title: Baked Stilton Pastries
ingredients: ["4 ounces stilton blue cheese", "2 ounces cream cheese", "1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce", "1 pinch cayenne pepper", "2 tablespoons butter, melted (or more, if needed)", "6 phyllo pastry sheets"]
directions: ["Place the cream cheese in a mixing bowl and crumble the stilton on top; add the Worcestershire sauce and cayenne pepper and beat together with a wooden spoon until well blended.", "Lightly brush a phyllo sheet with melted butter, then lay another on top; keep doing that until you have five or six sheets done.", "Spread the cheese mixture over the surface of the phyllo sheets, then roll up lengthways (like a swiss roll); chill until firm, about 30 minutes.", "Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.", "Cut the chilled roll into 1/4-inch slices and place, spaced apart, on baking sheets.", "Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden brown; let cool on wire racks."]

title: A Crunchy Confection Chocolate Crickets
ingredients: ["2 cups sugar", "23 cup cream", "2 ounces unsweetened chocolate", "Salt to taste", "18 tablespoon butter", "1 teaspoon vanilla", "1/2 cup dry-roasted crickets, chopped (see note)"]
directions: ["In a saucepan, mix sugar, cream, chocolate and salt.", "Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is melted and sugar is dissolved.", "Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until candy thermometer reads 234 degrees, or until a small amount of mixture forms a ball when dropped into ice water.", "Remove mixture from heat and add butter.", "Cool mixture to 120 degrees without stirring.", "Add vanilla and beat vigorously with a wooden spoon until candy is thick and no longer glossy -- about 7 to 10 minutes.", "Stir in insects.", "Spread evenly in a buttered loaf pan.", "Cool until firm.", "Cut into 2-inch squares."]

title: Jam & Buttercream Sandwich Cookies
ingredients: ["160 grams Cake flour", "40 grams Almond flour", "100 grams Butter", "70 grams Sugar", "1 Egg yolk", "1 Vanilla essence"]
directions: ["Sift together the cake flour and almond flour.", "Put the softened butter and sugar in a bowl and mix.", "Add the egg yolk to the bowl in Step 2 and mix.", "Add the dry ingredients from Step 1 to the bowl in Step 3 and mix with a spatula to bring the dough together.", "Wrap in plastic wrap and rest in the refrigerator for about 2 hours.", "You can make the dough the day before.", "Sandwich the dough between two sheets of plastic wrap and use a rolling pin to roll it out to about 2 mm thick.", "Using cookie cutters, first cut shapes from the center of the cookies, then cut out the edges.", "If the dough is too soft, dust with flour.", "Bake for about 15-17 minutes in an oven pre-heated to 355F/180C.", "The photo shows cookies that I stacked after baking.", "You can refer to this recipe to make the buttercream.", "Spread the buttercream on the bottom cookie and then put some of the jam on top.", "Add another cookie to make a sandwich and it's done...these make cute presents."]

title: Best Baked Beans
ingredients: ["4 slices OSCAR MAYER Bacon, finely chopped Rite Aid 2 For $7.00 thru 02/06", "1 large onion, chopped King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "4 cans (15 oz. each) pinto beans, rinsed", "3/4 cup KRAFT Original Barbecue Sauce", "1/4 cup molasses"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 375 degrees F.", "Cook and stir bacon, onions and garlic in large skillet on medium-high heat 5 min.", "or until bacon is cooked and onions are crisp-tender; drain.", "Stir in remaining ingredients.", "Pour into 1-1/2-qt.", "casserole; cover.", "Bake 45 min.", "or until hot and bubbly, stirring occasionally."]

title: Border Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["8 ounces (2 sticks) unsalted butter, softened", "1/2 cup sugar", "3/4 teaspoon salt", "1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract", "1/2 cup chopped pecans", "1/2 cup crushed potato chips", "2 cups unbleached all-purpose flour", "Sugar for dipping", "4 ounces semisweet chocolate, for garnish (optional)"]
directions: ["Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.", "Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper.", "Cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Beat in the salt and vanilla.", "Then add the pecans and potato chips and mix well.", "With a wooden spoon, stir in the flour just until it disappears.", "Roll the batter into balls about the size of a large walnut and place on the parchment-lined cookie sheet, allowing plenty of room for spreading.", "Coat the bottom of a heavy glass with butter and then dip in sugar.", "Press and twist to flatten each ball into a 3-inch circle.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until the edges turn lightly golden brown.", "Transfer to racks to cool.", "For optional garnish, melt the chocolate in a bowl over a pot of simmering water.", "Let cool slightly.", "When cool enough to handle, dip your fingertips, or the tines of a fork, in the chocolate and drizzle over the cookies.", "Refrigerate to set."]

title: Fabulous Fettuccine Alfredo
ingredients: ["12 lb fettuccine pasta", "1 teaspoon olive oil", "1 cup cream", "1 egg yolk", "2 ounces unsalted butter", "12 cup parmesan cheese", "salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Add the oil to your pot of water and cook the noodles as directed by the package.", "In a small bowl beat together the egg yolk and cream.", "DO NOT WHIP!", "In a large skillet over a medium flame heat the butter.", "Add the cream mixture to the skillet and warm but DO NOT BOIL.", "Add your drained pasta to the mixture in the skillet while adding your cheese tablespoon by tablespoon.", "Toss the pasta so that noodles are evenly cooked and serve immediately.", "Bon Apetite!"]

title: Roasted Squash with Nib Vinaigrette
ingredients: ["One 4-pound butternut squash, peeled, cut in half lengthwise, and seeded", "1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil", "Salt and freshly ground black pepper", "1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar", "1 1/2 teaspoons cacao nibs, coarsely chopped", "1 shallot, finely minced", "3 ounces thinly sliced pancetta"]
directions: ["Position the racks in the lower and upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 450F.", "Line two baking sheets with Silpats or parchment paper.", "Trim the ends of the squash and cut off the neck portions from the bulbs.", "Place the 4 pieces of squash cut side down on a board, and cut into 1/4-inch slices.", "Toss with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil and sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.", "Lay the slices on the prepared baking sheets and roast for about 20 minutes, until golden brown and soft.", "Rotate the baking sheets halfway through cooking.", "Meanwhile, prepare the vinaigrette and cook the pancetta.", "Combine the remaining 1/2 cup olive oil, the vinegar, nibs, and shallot in a small bowl.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "In a large skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crisp, 10 to 15 minutes, turning to brown evenly.", "Drain on paper towels.", "When it is cool, chop or crumble into small pieces.", "Place the squash in a large bowl, add about 1/4 cup of the vinaigrette, and toss gently to coat.", "Arrange the slices on individual plates or a large platter.", "Drizzle with remaining vinaigrette and top with the pancetta.", "Serve warm."]
NER: ["butternut squash", "extra virgin olive oil", "Salt", "balsamic vinegar", "cacao nibs", "shallot", "pancetta"]

title: Balsamic Vinaigrette
ingredients: ["2 teaspoons garlic, crushed (2 large cloves)", "14 cup balsamic vinegar", "1 teaspoon salt", "2 tablespoons sugar", "12 teaspoon black pepper", "1 cup olive oil"]
directions: ["Whisk together first five ingredients.", "Continue whisking, while drizzling the oil into the mixture.", "Set aside the dressing.", "Allow 30 minutes for the flavors to meld."]

title: Beet salad
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb Beets", "3 tbsp Red wine vinegar", "3 tbsp Olive oil", "1 Salt", "1 cup Greek yogurt", "1/3 cup Walnuts, coarsely chopped", "2 3 garlic cloves, minced"]
directions: ["Cut beets into chunks or slices", "pour half the vinegar and half the olive oil over top", "season with salt", "cover & let marinade 1hr at room temp", "combine yogurt, rest of vinegar and oil, garlic & pinch of salt in bowl", "mix", "pour sauce over beet slices & stir", "chill in fridge 1hr", "add walnuts just before serving"]

title: You Gotta Be Kidding Fudge
ingredients: ["2-1/2 cups (600 ml) sugar", "1/2 cup (125 ml) sour cream", "1 tbsp (15 ml) light corn syrup", "salt", "2 tbsp (30 ml) butter", "1 tsp (5 ml) vanilla"]
directions: ["Put sugar, sour cream, milk, corn syrup and salt in sauce pan.", "Bring to a boil, stirring constantly.", "Cover and boil 3 min.", "DO NOT STIR.", "Remove cover and continue cooking til thermometer reads 234 degrees (100 C.).", "DO NOT STIR.", "Pour into bowl, let cool.", "Beat in butter and vanilla.", "Continue to beat til fudge loses glossy appearance.", "Pour into 8x8 inch buttered pan.", "Cool and cut into 9 squares or make smaller squares to get more."]

title: Best Chocolate Cake Frosting
ingredients: ["1 16 oz (448 grm). box confectioner's sugar", "1 cup (225 ml) toasted chopped nuts", "1/4 cup (60 ml) unsweetened cocoa", "1/2 cup (125 ml) (1 stick) unsalted butter", "1/3 cup (80 ml) buttermilk", "1 tsp (5 ml) vanilla extract"]
directions: ["Combine confectioner's sugar, nuts and in mixing bowl.", "Remove cake from oven.", "Melt butter in small saucepan over medium heat.", "Add to confectioner's sugar mixture with remaining buttermilk and vanilla extract; blend thoroughly.", "Immediately pour frosting over the cake, spreading evenly to edges.", "Let cake cool completely in pan."]

title: The Ospidillo Cafe Honey-Mustard Dressing
ingredients: ["23 cup mayonnaise", "2 tablespoons Dijon mustard", "14 cup honey (Tupelo honey is best)", "1 teaspoon rice vinegar", "116 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "18 teaspoon salt"]
directions: ["Blend all ingredients.", "Refrigerate for at least 1 hour prior to serving."]

title: Caramel chooo ( chewy caramel fudge balls)
ingredients: ["1 can sweetened condensed milk (400gms)", "1 cup demerara/brown sugar (220 gms)", "125 grams butter salted", "1 tbsp vanilla extract (less if u want it less vanilla and more caramel)", "2 tbsp corn syrup/ liquid glucose", "2 tbsp fine crystallized sugar for sprinkles (optional)"]
directions: ["Line a baking tray/ bread pan with parchment paper/butter paper, lightly grease it with butter, keep it aside.", "Get one bowl of water and keep it nearby at easily accessible distance (this recipe doesn't require candy thermometer so you will need water bowl to check the consistency of hot caramel )", "Take a heavy bottom, nonstick pan add butter, and keep it over low heat.", "Let the butter melt.", "Add entire can of sweetened condensed milk to the molten butter, stir for 1 minute.", "Add corn syrup/liquid glucose, keep stirring till well mixed or slightly thickened", "Add demerara sugar/ brown sugar to the mixture in pan and keep stirring till all combines and becomes smooth.", "Let the mixture come to the boil while you stir it continuously.", "Add vanilla extract at this point.", "And keep stirring.", "Dont let it stick to the sides, else it will crystallize and lose its texture.", "The best way to keep the mixture moving and for even cooking , hold your spatula right in the middle of the mixture and go in clockwise circles, without touching the sides.", "You will feel the mixture thickening as it boils away.", "Keep stirring till the spatula starts leaving a trail when u cut through the mixture.", "This part is very crucial now, as the mixture may burn quick after this point.", "So quickly drop a small amount of mixture in bowl of water and within 2 seconds, lift it from the water with your fingers, press it between your fingers and see the thickness it has reached.", "If its still runny or soft, you need to cook the mixture for few more minutes before you do the same test again.", "Once its satisfactorily chewy, remove it from the heat and spread it on the baking sheet we have prepared in advance.", "Let it cool off for an hour or so (depending upon the thickness of the layer).", "caramel when hot, can give u bad burns, so be careful with hot fudge, check the baking sheet from outside to get the idea of how hot the fudge is.", "Once cool, cut it to the bite size chunks, and just have it like that, or make small balls and roll them in some crystallized sugar.", "Refrigerate if you want them to harden further.", "I personally love them chewy.", "Store in airtight contener.", "enjoy"]

title: "jeans Lazy Perogi's"
ingredients: ["1 lb spiral shaped pasta", "12 cup butter", "1 (8 ounce) can mushrooms (need one cup)", "1 (8 ounce) can sauerkraut (need one cup)", "1 small onion", "Lawry's Seasoned Salt, garlic salt, onion salt, pepper and packet of brown gravy powder mix"]
directions: ["in oven proof casserole dish, put one pound of HALF COOKED spiral noodles (water drained out) in it -- (make sure it's large enough).", "in another saute pan, saute 1 small onion, chopped small, and one stick of butter.", "Pour butter and onions over pasta in a casserole dish and mix together.", "then add --", "canned mushrooms, equal to about 1 cup and about one cup of sauerkraut, then mix together again, so the pasta, onions, mushrooms, sauerkraut are all evenly mixed together --", "then add the following seasonings.sprikled LIGHTLY.over the pasta mixture --", "onion salt, garlic salt, lawtry's seasoned salt and pepper and brown gravy mix powder -- once again stir together, until well mixed --", "put dish covered in oven at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes --", "1 pound of pasta will serve 5-6 servings or approximately 20 side dish servings -- ."]

title: Skordalia (A Garlic Sauce/Condiment)
ingredients: ["6 slices sourdough bread, thick,crusts removed", "6 cloves garlic", "12 cup olive oil", "2 tablespoons red wine vinegar", "14 cup pine nuts or 14 cup walnuts", "salt"]
directions: ["Soak bread in water.", "Squeeze dry between hands.", "Put in food processor along with garlic, pine nuts or walnuts.", "Process for 20 seconds.", "Slowly drop in olive oil and vinegar, alternately, until mixture binds into a thick mayonnaise-like sauce.", "(you may need slightly more oil and/or vinegar, depending on personal taste)."]

title: Diamond Cookies
ingredients: ["85 grams Butter", "30 grams Sugar", "1 Egg yolk", "3 drops Vanilla extract", "110 grams Cake flour", "25 grams Almond flour", "1 Granulated sugar"]
directions: ["Run the ingredients through a sifter.", "Leave out the butter until it reaches room temperature.", "When the butter develops a mayonnaise-like consistency, add the sugar and mix well.", "Add the egg yolk and mix well.", "Add the vanilla extract, too.", "Add the sifted ingredients and mix lightly with a rubber spatula.", "Once all of the flour has mixed in, form into one ball with your hands.", "Divide the dough into half.", "Roll into 20 cm sticks.", "Tip: Use cardboard cores from plastic wrap to form the dough.", "Chill for about an hour in the freezer.", "Sprinkle granulated sugar on the frozen dough.", "Slice 1 cm thick.", "Place on a baking sheet.", "Bake for 20 minutes in preheated oven 320F/160C.", "It's very soft just after baking.", "It will be crispy chilled."]

title: Peanut Butter Triangles
ingredients: ["1-1/2 cups butter, softened", "3/4 cup Kraft Smooth Peanut Butter", "1 cup firmly packed brown sugar", "2-1/2 cups flour", "3/4 cup finely chopped peanuts", "2 squares Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate, melted"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350F.", "Cover 2 baking sheets with parchment paper or foil; set aside.", "Beat butter and peanut butter in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended.", "Add sugar; beat until light and fluffy.", "Gradually add flour, beating until well blended after each addition.", "Add peanuts; mix well.", "Divide dough into 4 equal portions and flatten each into a 6-inch circle on the prepared baking sheets.", "Cut each circle into 16 triangles.", "(Do not separate triangles.)", "Bake 10 to 14 min.", "or until lightly browned.", "Separate triangles, using sharp knife to cut through cookies, if necessary.", "Cool completely on wire racks.", "Drizzle evenly with chocolate.", "Let stand until chocolate is firm."]

title: Edamame Hummus
ingredients: ["1 head Garlic", "1 Tablespoon Olive Oil", "12 ounces, weight Frozen Edamame (shelled)", "1 whole Lemon, Juiced (1 Lemon Should Yield 3-4 Tablespoons)", "1/2 teaspoons Salt", "1 Tablespoon Tahini (stirred Well)", "1 dash Cayenne Pepper", "Salt And Pepper, to taste"]
directions: ["Preheat your oven to 400 F. Cut off the top of the head of garlic, remove outer papery layer and place the garlic on a sheet of foil.", "Drizzle the top with 1 tablespoon of olive oil.", "Wrap the garlic in the foil and roast in the oven until soft and golden, about 40-50 minutes.", "When its done and cooled a bit you can squeeze the cloves out of the peel.", "Bring a medium pot of water to boil then add the shelled edamame to the boiling water.", "Cook for 4 to 5 minutes then drain and rinse with cold water.", "In the bowl of a food processor add the edamame, lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, tahini and dash of cayenne pepper.", "Pulse until well combined.", "Add in 4-6 cloves of the roasted garlic.", "Pulse until the hummus is completely smooth.", "Taste for seasoning and add salt and pepper to taste."]

title: Pecan Pie Bars
ingredients: ["2 12 cups shelled pecans", "2 cups flour", "78 cup butter, cut into 1/2 inch pieces", "12 cup brown sugar", "18 teaspoon salt", "12 cup butter", "1 cup brown sugar", "13 cup honey", "2 tablespoons heavy cream"]
directions: ["Chop the pecans in a food processor.", "Roast in a jelly roll pan in 350 degree oven for 5 to 7 minutes.", "Watch carefully do not let burn.", "Take out and let cool.", "Whiz the next four ingredients in a food processor until it forms small lumps.", "Spread into a 13 by 9 inch pan and press into an even layer with a spatula (or your fingers).", "Bake in a 350 degree oven until it is just starting to color, about 20 minutes.", "Meanwhile melt the butter in a saucepan and stir in the brown sugar, honey and cream.", "Simmer for a minute and stir in the nuts.", "Pour over the hot shortbread base and return to the oven for another 15 to 20 minutes.", "Cool completely before cutting into bars."]

title: Pecan Chocolate Squares
ingredients: ["1 cup butter, softened", "1 cup firmly packed dark brown sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 teaspoon vanilla", "2 cups all-purpose flour", "14 teaspoon salt", "6 ounces semisweet chocolate, chopped", "1 12 cups chopped toasted pecans or 1 12 cups almonds"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350 degrees.", "Grease 9 x 13 inch baking pan.", "In large bowl, with mixer on high, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes.", "Add yolk and vanilla, and beat until combined.", "Reduce mixer speed to low, and add flour and salt until soft dough forms.", "Press dough evenly into bottom of pan.", "Bake 25 minutes or until browned.", "Sprinkle chocolate pieces on top, and bake 5 minutes longer.", "Remove from oven; with knife, spread melted chocolate to cover.", "Top with nuts, gently pressing into chocolate.", "Let cool completely."]

title: Grilled Asparagus W/ Balsamic Vinaigrette
ingredients: ["1 lb asparagus", "1 tablespoon red wine vinegar", "1 12 tablespoons balsamic vinegar", "1 shallot, minced", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "3 -4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil", "salt and pepper (I used about a teaspoon of each)", "12 lemon"]

title: Warm Spinach-Parmesan Dip
ingredients: ["2 tablespoons butter", "2 tablespoons olive oil", "1 3/4 cups chopped onion", "6 large garlic cloves, minced", "2 tablespoons all purpose flour", "1/2 cup chicken stock or canned low-salt chicken broth", "1/2 cup whipping cream", "1 10-ounce package ready-to-use fresh spinach leaves", "1 cup (packed) grated Parmesan cheese", "1/4 cup sour cream", "1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "Baguette slices, toasted"]

directions: ["Cream the butter and sugar into a bowl until pale and thick.", "Add the heavy cream and mix.", "Since it's just a small amount, it won't separate.", "Add the sifted flour, cocoa, and almond flour to Step 2 and mix in a cutting motion.", "When the batter begins to stick to the bowl, gather it all into one lump.", "Separate the batter into halves and form 2 cylinders with a diameter of 2 cm.", "Wrap them up and chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.", "Adjust the shape and leave in the freezer for 30 minutes.", "Cut pieces to a width of 7 mm and bake in a oven at 160C for 13 minutes.", "Then they're done.", "Note: The chocolate chip cookies on the right in the picture were made by breaking up 1 bar of chocolate and mixing with black cocoa powder.", "When cutting the chocolate chip batter, they can easily crumble, so use a knife warmed with hot water or heat and then slice.", "Maple Shortbread", "Matcha Shortbread.", "Kinako Soybean Flour Shortbread", "Cherry Blossom Cookies"]

title: Almond Kit Hillie Recipe

title: Carrots and Kale
